email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Confirmation for Iron Ore Pellets
email_chain.body:
Hi Mark,

We need to arrange the shipment of 50,000MT of iron ore pellets from South Korea to the Bahamas. We have a shipping slot available in the first week of September. Can you confirm the availability of your vessel for these dates?

Best regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Confirmation for Iron Ore Pellets
email_chain.body:
Hello Paul,

I confirm that we have 50,000MT of iron ore pellets ready to be shipped to the Bahamas. If the vessel availability aligns for the first week of September, I will book the slot.

Best,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Confirmation for Iron Ore Pellets
email_chain.body:
Hi Mark,

That sounds great. I will confirm the vessel availability with our contacts in South Korea and get back to you shortly.

Best regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sugar Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I am interested in arranging a shipment of 6,000MT of sugar from Santos to Rotterdam. We are looking at a FOB basis with a minimum laycan of 90 days to allow negotiation. Can we discuss this further at your earliest convenience?

Regards,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Corn Consignments
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Following up on our previous engagements, I'm also interested in the terms for 1MT consignments of corn. Could you provide me with the basic conditions for this?

Regards,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Details Requested for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello David,

I hope you and your family are well. I am writing to reiterate the details required for the M/T charter of sugar from Santos to Rotterdam with a minimum laycan buffer of 90 days as per your proposal.

We need the 6,000MT to be delivered within 21 days from approval. Our internal committee is reviewing this, and I will be able to provide more specifics once we secure their approval.

Should you need more details or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Thank you,
Cherie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity and Freight Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Glenn, How about a 24,000MT capacity for corn shipping from Hampton, USA to Frankfurt, Germany? Also, do you have any outgoing freighters from your base next month on Saturdays? Thanks, Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity and Freight Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Scott, Thanks for reaching out. I am currently not looking for freighters, but I can send out a request next week to get some shipping estimates for you. Best Regards, Glenn

email_chain.subject: Request for Specific Freighter Services
email_chain.body: Hello Glenn, Your message has been received. Could you arrange for a freighter capable of moving approximately 50 tons per day from Tampa, Florida to Frankfurt, Germany for next Saturday and the following one? We can provide all necessary documentation for the service. Best Regards, Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Specific Freighter Services
email_chain.body: Hi Scott, Your previous messages were received. Just to confirm, your request is for a freighter capable of 50MT per day transport on both days mentioned? I'll procure the necessary information. Best Regards, Glenn

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sulfur Supply from South Korea
email_chain.body: Hello, We are in need of 4500MT of sulfur to be shipped from South Korea to the port of Abidjan. Could you please let me know the price and availability of this product in your stocks? Regards, Minos

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sulfur Supply from South Korea
email_chain.body: Hello, Thank you for your email. We currently have a stock of one million kilograms of sulfur; however, it originates from the Ivory Coast, not South Korea. Could you please provide more details on your requirements? Regards, Nathalie

email_chain.subject: Meeting Request to Discuss Sulfur Supply
email_chain.body: Hello, I will come to your office to discuss the sulfur supply in person. Please let me know a suitable time. Regards, Marianne

email_chain.subject: Query about transport of coal in July
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jackson,

Could you let me know what is the leading inland point for coal from Felixstowe to Rotterdam in July?

I hope to speak with you soon,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Query about transport of coal in July
email_chain.body:
Dear Melissa,

There are a variety of ways to get coal to Rotterdam: The first is rail from Felixstowe to The Hook where it is loaded onto barges. The second is by sea.

However, the leading inland point for coal from Felixstowe to Rotterdam in July is via rail.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Query about transport of coal in July
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrew,

Thank you for taking the time to write to me. I appreciate the information and look forward to working with you in the future.

Best regards,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Query about transport of coal in July
email_chain.body:
Dear Melissa,

It was a pleasure speaking with you. Feel free to call me anytime.

Best,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Thank you
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrew,

I hope all is well. Just a quick note to say thank you for the informational email I received. It was very helpful. Thank you for your time.

Best,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vessel Availability in Aqaba
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bensoussan,

Can you confirm if your vessel Equinox is currently in Aqaba? Looking forward to potentially working with you.

Best regards,
Hari

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Vessel Availability in Aqaba
email_chain.body:
Greetings,

Thank you for your contact. Regarding the vessel Equinox, please note the following:
- The ship is not available between October 10 - December 15, 2019.
- The ship will be available for employment starting December 16, 2019.
The general cargo capacity of the vessel is 8800 DWT. Please advise if you are interested in discussing further.

We are looking forward to working with you.

Best regards,
Captain

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability for Equinox
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain,

Thank you for the prompt response and detailed information. We are indeed interested in your vessel and plan to send our formal terms of charter proposal soon. Could you please provide additional details regarding the fuel consumption of the ship?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Hari

email_chain.subject: Re: Details Requested for Vessel Equinox
email_chain.body:
Dear Hari,

Thank you for your interest in the Equinox. Regarding your inquiry about the fuel consumption, I will provide you with the necessary details shortly. We appreciate your initiative in preparing a formal charter proposal.

Best regards,
Captain

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Your Response
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain,

Thank you for your prompt response and for agreeing to provide the fuel consumption details. We look forward to receiving the information and moving forward with the charter proposal.

Kind regards,
Hari

email_chain.subject: Summer Promotions and Special Rate Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Sandy,

I hope this message finds you well. I want to highlight a few opportunities that could benefit our marketing efforts for the season:

1. Open houses or webinars that you or your team could participate in.
2. Availability of written guides that delve into the various operations of FESCO.
3. Various additional marketing opportunities currently available with us.

Additionally, I wanted to inform you about the European Summer Sale we are launching, featuring 60% off the list rates for all containers booked by July 20th, 2019. Moreover, all European shipments booked before September 1st will benefit from an extra 25% discount.

For customer inquiries looking for interesting summer destinations, we are also offering attractive rates to Portugal.

Please feel free to contact your account manager or myself for more detailed information about these promotions.

Best regards,
Diane

email_chain.subject: Re: Summer Promotions and Special Rate Information
email_chain.body:
Hello Diane,

Thank you for the detailed update on the new promotions. I will add this information to my ongoing projects. Can you provide me with more specifics on the promotion that includes rail and ocean shipments? Is it limited to services between Europe and North America? Also, could you clarify if the rail promotion is applicable to all rail lines or only specific ones?

Thanks,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Summer Promotions and Special Rate Information
email_chain.body:
Hi Sandy,

Regarding your inquiry about the rail promotion, it is applicable to any rail mode used in any direction. However, it's only available to shippers who book their shipments before July 20th. This promotional deal is accessible to shippers on the east coast primarily; nevertheless, you can choose to promote it in other directions as suits your marketing strategy.

Please note that this special rate cannot be applied to shipments within North America.

Additionally, we have exclusive ocean promotions currently available for services to the U.S. East Coast, alongside another promotion for several ports on the U.S. West Coast including Los Angeles, Long Beach, and more. For a complete overview of available ports, do visit: http://www.silverferries.com/lotes

Kind regards,
Diane

email_chain.subject: Re: Summer Promotions and Special Rate Information
email_chain.body:
Hello Diane,

Thank you for the clarifications. I have updated my email footers to include the rail promotion and am currently reviewing the port list for the Gulf Coast to consider for further promotions to our customers in that area.

Please let me know if there is any additional way I can assist.

Best regards,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Request for Confirmation on Portugal Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Diane,

I noted in your recent communications about a promotion offering lower rates to Portugal. Could you confirm if this implies reduced transportation rates for the summer? Understanding is it only applies for shipments booked by July 20th, 2019.

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Corrugated Cardboard and Fructose Syrup
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Chan,

Could you please calculate a freight estimate for 5,800MT of imported corrugated cardboard from Atlanta to Singapore under FOB terms? Additionally, I would like to request a sea rate for 5,400MT of fructose syrup from Baton Rouge to Antwerp on a vessel departing in October.

Regards,
Joseph

email_chain.subject: Freight Cost Inquiry for Lumber
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Chan,

How much does it cost to transport 6,000MT of lumber from Melbourne to Darwin?

Sincerely,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Summary of Freight Requests
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Chan,

To summarize, Joseph needs a freight rate estimate from Atlanta to Singapore under FOB terms and a sea rate for fructose syrup from Baton Rouge to Antwerp. Bill requires a freight rate for lumber from Melbourne to Darwin.

Please let us know if there are any other details needed.

Thanks.
Jasmine

How can I check if a course I registered with Udemy 6 months ago is still valid? It is affiliated with Harvard University but appears 'Inactive'. Could it have expired?

Dear Esther,

Could you please check if the course has been updated? You may want to try accessing the content again.

email_chain.subject: Re: Course Validity Inquiry

I have successfully accessed the content. Thank you!

Kind Regards,

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Order Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Logistics Manager, I am trying to place a cargo shipment order from Port Klang to Los Angeles and would appreciate your assistance with shipping my container. It is a 32m container. Please let me know if you need any further information. Feel free to call or email me anytime. Yours truly, Name

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Order Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Name, Thank you for your email. I have reviewed your request and can confirm we are able to assist with your shipment. Please check the details below and confirm if they are correct: Product: Container Customer Name: Name Customer Number: 123 Container Type: 40FT Container Quantity: 1 Container Size: 12m x 8m x 8.5m Container Weight: 20 Tons Shipping Term: Discharge Port: Port Klang Delivery Term: Delivery Port: Los Angeles Payment Terms: L/C at sight Tracking Number: 00012 Best regards, Logistics Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Order Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Logistics Manager, Thank you for the prompt response. I confirm that all the details are correct. Please proceed with the shipment arrangements as specified. Best regards, Name

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Confirmation: Rotterdam to Singapore Cargo Movement

We plan to move 2,500MT of white cement from Rotterdam to Singapore with the following schedule:

- On Board: 06 Feb

Could you please confirm all relevant details for this cargo, including the availability of empty slots during these dates?

Regards,
Martina

email_chain.subject: Re-scheduling Cargo Movement Date

Thank you for your prompt reply. We are unable to load the cargo from Rotterdam as initially planned. Therefore, we request to re-schedule the cargo loading to 25 Jan 2021.

Best regards,
Martina

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Needed for Revised Cargo Movement Dates
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Storage Request for Coffee Beans in Amsterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Ralph, Could you hold 3,000MT of coffee beans in Amsterdam, until we find a slot to get them to Brussels? Please let us know your demurrage rate. Best, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Re: Storage Request for Coffee Beans in Amsterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Pedro, Could you also kindly send me your reference number that you used to make the payment? Thank you. Best, Ralph

email_chain.subject: Reference Number and Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Ralph, Thanks for your prompt reply. The reference number for the payment is XYZ123ABC. Could you please confirm your bank account details as well? Thanks, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Bank Account Details
email_chain.body: Hi Pedro, Here are my bank account details: Account Number 1234567890. Best, Ralph

email_chain.subject: Clarifications Needed Regarding Coffee Beans
email_chain.body: Hi Pedro, Could you kindly answer these questions to better assist with your request? 1. What kind of beans do you want? 2. For how long will you need storage? 3. How many kilograms per day are you planning to ship? 4. Which port in Belgium do you want to use for discharge? 5. When do you plan to pick them up? Thank you for your time. Best, Ralph

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarifications Needed Regarding Coffee Beans
email_chain.body: Hi Ralph, Regarding your questions: 1. Arabica beans. 2. We will need storage for approximately one month. 3. We plan to ship around 100 kilograms per day. 4. The port for discharge in Belgium will be the Port of Antwerp. 5. We aim to pick them up by the end of next month. Best, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Shipping Enquiry: Antwerp to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Hi there, We are exploring options for shipping 3,000 metric tons of containers from Antwerp to Alexandria, Egypt. Could you please provide us with the CFR (Cost and Freight) rates for this shipment? Regards, Chantal

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Enquiry: Antwerp to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Dear Chantal, Thank you for your request. Can you confirm the specification of the goods? Specifically, we noticed that you might be referring to cylindrical bulk goods given the tonnage mentioned. We need these details to provide an accurate CFR quote for a single container load to Alexandria Port. Regards, Logistics Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Enquiry: Antwerp to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Dear Logistics Team, Thank you for your prompt response. We aim to ship refrigerators with the following specifications: - 250 Volt, 50 Hz - Dimensions: 1.5 meters x 1.5 meters x 2.5 meters - 3 units per 20-foot container, with a total of 40 containers. The total volume would be 40 CBM. Looking forward to your detailed quote. Best regards, Chantal

email_chain.subject: Update on Barge Readiness and Final Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Lee,

Thank you for your prompt response regarding the 5000MT Naphtha transport from Singapore to Rotterdam. Our barge is nearly ready, with the final engine tests scheduled to complete this week. You can expect the final estimate by next week.

Kind regards,
Sofia

email_chain.subject: Final Engine Tests Completed and Quote Received
email_chain.body:
Good morning Ms. Lee,

I'm pleased to inform you that the final engine tests on our barge were successfully completed yesterday. We have also received the initial quote for the transportation. Please review the attached final estimate and let us know your decision.

Kind regards,
Sofia

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Engine Tests Completed and Quote Received
email_chain.body:
Hello Sofia,

We forwarded the final estimate for the barge to Ms. Lee earlier this week. As we haven't received any feedback on that estimate yet, we assume that she is reviewing it. Please advise if there are any updates or if further actions are needed.

Kind regards,
Bako

email_chain.subject: Invitation for Discussion on Barge Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

We received your inquiry about barge transportation from Singapore to Rotterdam. We would like to invite you to our company to discuss the pricing and other details. Looking forward to your visit.

Kind regards,
Your Company

email_chain.subject: Invitation for Meeting to Discuss Barge Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Lee,

Following up on our previous correspondence regarding the barge transportation from Singapore to Rotterdam, we would appreciate the opportunity to discuss the finalized details and pricing in a personal meeting. We hope to welcome you to our office soon.

Kind regards,
Your Company

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about dedicated freight availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Jo,

We are on the lookout for a dedicated freight for our shipping needs. Do you have any cargos on route that would meet our shipping requirements?

Thanks!
Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about dedicated freight availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Ray,

Thanks for your inquiry. We are currently discussing potential routes with our supplier and are awaiting their confirmation. We will update you as soon as we get a response.

Regards,
Jo

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about dedicated freight availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Jo,

Sorry for the delay in following up. It seems that our supplier will not be able to manage logistics for the next week due to unforeseen expenses in their home country. Could you perhaps manage something in a week's time?

Thanks,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about dedicated freight availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Ray,

Unfortunately, we still don't have any available cargos that match your requirements. However, we will notify you once something suitable comes up.

Thanks,
Jo

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Update Needed on Shipping Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Jo,

I apologize for the interruption, but we urgently need an update regarding the cargo shipment. If we don't get our cargo out soon, we risk significant delays. Please let us know at your earliest convenience.

Thanks,
Nancy

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Update Needed on Shipping Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Nancy,

I apologize for the delay in response. Unfortunately, we still do not have any available freight options at the moment. We will keep your information on record for any future opportunities. Have a great day!

Thanks,
Jo

Dear Mehdi,

email_chain.subject: Charter Offer for 10.5 Days at Port in Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Luca,

I am pleased to offer you a charter for a duration of 10.5 days at the port in Busan. Please check the attached schedule for more details. We currently have an open window to secure this charter, with an expected time of arrival (ETA) in Hong Kong on May 3rd. We have 6 units available, each with a capacity of 1,750m3. The total charter cost for a three-week period is USD 840,000.

Best regards,
Davin

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Charter Rate and Volume
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Luca,

Based on the schedule provided in Attachment 1, we are offering to charter 1 unit of 1,750m3 at the rate of USD 1,800.00 per cubic meter per day, which totals to USD 3,150,000.00 for the duration. Please confirm receipt of this offer and respond within 4.5 hours from the time you received this email.

Regards,
Fabio

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about vessel availability for sugar transportation
email_chain.body: Ms. Lin, we are organizing the shipment of 20,000MT of sugar from Kobe to Ma'anshan. We have space available on the Ricka Maru on 15 May. Could you please confirm if this vessel is available for your cargo? Yours truly, Don

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Need confirmation of vessel availability
email_chain.body: Hi Don, I've been trying to reach you regarding the availability of the vessel Ricka Maru. We have space on this vessel scheduled to depart port on 19 April. If you could confirm its availability, I can proceed with placing our order. Thank you, Jona

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Need confirmation of vessel availability
email_chain.body: Thanks for your message, Jona. We are currently short of space, but we are expecting 40,000MT of sugar from Vietnam to Kobe soon. That will clear up some of our space requirements. Best regards, Scotty

email_chain.subject: Request for immediate vessel availability
email_chain.body: Thank you for the update, Scotty. As our customers have tight schedules, we need to resume bookings soon. We will require an additional 10,000MT of sugar shipped from Kobe to Tianjin port in China within the next 15 days. Our firm is prepared to pay a premium for immediate availability. Please let us know if the Ricka Maru or any other vessel is available. Best regards, Sean

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for immediate vessel availability
email_chain.body: Hi Sean, unfortunately, the Ricka Maru isn't available for your cargo currently. I can offer a few other vessels, but that would mean a slight delay in your delivery schedule. I will send you a list of available vessels along with their estimated delivery schedules shortly. Thank you, Don

email_chain.subject: Update on Ricka Maru scheduling
email_chain.body: Thanks for your message, Don. The Ricka Maru is now scheduled correctly. Regarding the delivery schedules, there are no changes in our fleet’s current schedule. Best regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Spot Deals for High-Grade Chinese Coal
email_chain.body:
Hi Shubham,

We are currently looking to secure spot deals for high-grade Chinese coal. We are interested in procuring approximately 8,000 metric tons of coal, preferably sourced from Southeast Asia and delivered to Europe. Could you please check your system for any available spot cargoes that meet these specifications?

Thanks,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Spot Deals for High-Grade Chinese Coal
email_chain.body:
Hello Charlie,

Thank you for your inquiry. Based on current availability, here is our quote:

- Requested Quantity: 8000 MT
- Reference: RBSVMPD
- Date of Proposal: April 22, 2022
- Load Port: Bangkok
- Expected Delivery: July-August
- Coal Grade: Class 4
- Price: Rs 5500 per Metric Ton

I hope this information is helpful to you!

Regards,
Shubham

email_chain.subject: Details Request for the Offer Placed on 5th August 2012
email_chain.body: Dear Vendor, I hope this email finds you well. I would like to confirm an offer you placed for us on 2nd November. Could you please provide the details, including price and quantity per shipment, for the offers placed on 5th August 2012? I look forward to your prompt response. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Details Request for the Offer Placed on 5th August 2012
email_chain.body: Hello John, Thank you for your email. Unfortunately, due to the error in pricing that occurred on our part, we are unable to proceed with the offers discussed on 5th August at this time. We appreciate your understanding and hope to serve you under better terms in the future. Best, Vendor Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Details Request for the Offer Placed on 5th August 2012
email_chain.body: Understood, thank you for clarifying the situation. John

email_chain.subject: Contract Sent for Provisioning
email_chain.body:
Dear Felix,

The contract was sent.

Hope you are doing fine.

Best regards,
Ms. _________

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract Sent for Provisioning
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Thank you for your email. You are indeed welcome to provision your ship. Please make sure to place the contract within your Letter of Intent (LOI). Please provide us with your LOI as soon as possible.

Kind regards,
Felix

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement of Received Contract
email_chain.body:
Dear Felix,

Thank you for sending the contract. I will review it and get back to you ASAP.

Best regards,
Felix

email_chain.subject: Thank You Note for Cooperation
email_chain.body:
Hey Felix,

Just a quick note to say thank you for your speedy reply and confirming the receipt of the contract.

Best regards,
Ms. _________

email_chain.subject: Charter Request from Tangier to Halifax via Lagos
email_chain.body: Mr. Martinez, We need to charter a vessel from Tangier to Halifax. Our cargo specifications entail initially loading 20,000MT of iron ore at Bremerhaven, followed by an additional pickup of 15,000MT in Lagos. Could you provide us with your best pricing and the estimated lead time to loading? Thanks, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Request from Tangier to Halifax via Lagos
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, Thank you for your inquiry regarding the transportation of iron ore from Bremerhaven to Lagos and Halifax. We are pleased to offer our logistics services for your cargo. The current lead time to loading is approximately 10 to 12 weeks. The rate at the loading port will be $4.00 USD per metric ton, and the additional cargo from Lagos will cost $1.00 USD per metric ton. We are open to further discussions to meet your budgetary requirements. Please let us know how you wish to proceed. Best regards, Mr. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Concerns about the Pricing and Lead Time
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Martinez, I'm interested in proceeding with the chartering of the MV Unknown from Tangier to Halifax, including the stop in Lagos. However, I am concerned about the recent increase in the floating rate, which might exceed our budget. Could you please provide the current rate and advise on the cost implications at the intermediate port? Additionally, the lead time to loading is longer than our project timeline permits. Is there a possibility to expedite this? Looking forward to your prompt response. Regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Concerns about the Pricing and Lead Time
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, Thank you for your feedback. Regarding the floating rate, we are currently charging $1.50 USD per metric ton in London; however, rates can vary. We can discuss adjusting this to fit within your budget. As for expediting the loading process, we'll do our best to accommodate your schedule. Please confirm if these terms are acceptable so we can finalize the charter. Best, Mr. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation and Contract Details
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, Attached, you will find the contract detailing our terms of cooperation and the logistics schedule for transporting your cargo. Please review the general conditions and signal any amendments as soon as possible. We recommend payment through our primary European bank account as detailed in the General Conditions clauses 9-11. Looking forward to your final confirmation. Warm regards, Mr. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zhang,

I’ve confirmed a shipment of 7,000MT of palm oil from Antwerp to Shanghai. Could you provide us with a quick freight quote for this route? Also, do you foresee any port draft limitations that we should be aware of?

Kind regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Yes, your shipment is confirmed! I’d recommend choosing the Neptun (NEO3), which is a hybrid vessel with a very low port draft. There’s no draft limitation for NEO3 when discharging in Shanghai's deepwater port.

Best regards,
Tiffany

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on Port Selection
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiffany,

Thank you for your quick response. For the product I’m planning to import next, which consists of bulky items like yarn and socks, which port would you recommend for discharging? I’m looking for a solution that minimizes costs in terms of draft and manpower.

Thanks!
Best regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Inquiry on Port Selection
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

For your upcoming import of bulky items, I recommend starting the discharging in Nanjing. If the vessel can remain at the port for approximately four days, it will reach optimal draft conditions, improving discharge efficiency. Nanjing also offers lower costs related to manpower and cargo handling compared to Shanghai.

Best regards,
Tiffany

email_chain.subject: Contact Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiffany,

We have great intentions to work with your company. Thank you for your advice. If possible, could you forward your contact details so I can connect you to the right department here?

Best regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Contact Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Please find our contact details below:

Phone: +65 6225 2226
Tiffany Yu (General Manager)

Looking forward to our continued collaboration!

Best regards,
Tiffany

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Contracting Suezmax Vessel
email_chain.body: We’ve been conducting research and identified a suitable vessel for your needs: a Suezmax under timecharter from Chittagong to Baku in April 2014. We believe this will be optimal as it saves a port on your itinerary and cuts your freight costs by half compared to an equivalent vessel. We hope you’ll consider this proposal and feel free to reach out with any questions. Thank you!

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Contracting Suezmax Vessel
email_chain.body: Thank you for your proposal dated the 17th. We have consulted with our Freight Rates department, and they are excited about the efficiency and cost-effectiveness of the suggested vessel for our conference in Baku this April. While our main team is outbound to enjoy the conference, the Freight Rates team will remain to finalize the booking and will contact you first thing tomorrow. We truly value our partnership and look forward to fruitful collaboration.

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Contracting Suezmax Vessel
email_chain.body: Following up on our previous conversation, our Freight Rates department has reviewed the details and confirmed the suitability of the Suezmax for our business requirements. They will be in touch tomorrow to proceed with the booking. We appreciate your focused efforts and assistance.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargo Handling and Rates
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Vasquez, We have 2,000MT of explosives ready to be shipped from Al Jubail to Charleston. Could you please confirm if partial cargo is acceptable and provide your lump sum rate? Sincerely, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargo Handling and Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Sims, We can accommodate partial cargo. However, I am unable to confirm the lump sum rate at the moment as we are still discussing it with the port authorities. Regards, Laura

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation of Charges and Rates
email_chain.body: Greetings John, Your cargo from Al Jubail port is ready for delivery. Please note the partial cargo will incur a surcharge of $2,500. The lump sum rate for the 2,000MT shipment has been set at $15,000. Kindly confirm receipt of this email. Sincerely, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation of Charges and Rates
email_chain.body: Thanks for your confirmation, Laura. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Payment and Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, We have received your email and confirmation. We have sent $1,000 as a deposit to your account for booking. We will book your cargo as partial cargo in a shipment from Al Jubail to Charleston and contact you when it's ready. Best Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Shipment Booking Notification
email_chain.body: Dear John, Your shipment is booked as of today. You can expect your shipment to arrive next month. Thanks, Laura

email_chain.subject: Additional Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Vasquez, Please let us know if you have any other questions regarding our shipment or require proof of delivery. Best Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Dawson,

We need a vessel for 6,900MT of liquefied petroleum gas from Port Clinton to Port of Long Beach. Could you advise on your next open laycan, and do you accept lumpsum deals?

Regards,
Sean

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Sean,

We appreciate your interest in our service. Currently, all of our vessels are in layup and will not become available until April 2016. We generally do consider lumpsum deals.

Thanks for inquiring,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Query about Charter Costs
email_chain.body:
Hello Natalie,

Referring to our cost review in Q1 of 2014 which totaled $3.8 million:

- Laycan: April 2016
- Storage: $1,500,000
- Charter: $1,000,000
- Break bulk: $1,250,000

I would like to discuss the possibility of reducing the charter cost by considering one of your larger vessels.

Best regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Palm Oil Transport from Mombasa to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hello Sam, We are looking to arrange transportation for a 5,000MT cargo of palm oil from Mombasa to Hamburg. Could you please provide the day-rate and explain the booking procedure? Thank you for your assistance. Regards, Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Palm Oil Transport from Mombasa to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Sorenson, Thank you for your emails dated 27 April 2010 and 28 April 2010 concerning the shipment of palm oil. The special rates offered are agreeable, and we plan to have the cargo ready by the third week of May. We would appreciate an indication of when these rates would be confirmed for loading, so I can update our client accordingly. Looking forward to your prompt response. Kind regards, Julia

email_chain.subject: Meeting Request at Houston Office
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Saulo, I am Russell Benson, the Production Manager at Edwards International. I will be in Houston from May 25th to 27th and would like to visit your office on the afternoon of May 26th to discuss our contract. Please let me know your availability. Thank you. Kind regards, Russell

email_chain.subject: Request for Removal from Database
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, My email was included in your database when I joined WORLDCOC but we are no longer associated with them. Please remove me from your database. Regards, Wan

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Your Project
email_chain.body: Hello, I am impressed with your project, particularly the focus on effective networking. If you need further assistance, do not hesitate to contact me, as I am here to help. Also, feel free to share your thoughts on the project; your feedback is crucial. Be nice. Sincerely, Gabriella

email_chain.subject: Capacity Inquiry for Methanol Shipment in Early May
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Hoff,

I have a large shipment of Methanol that needs to be moved from Daman to Tianjin. I'm aiming for an early May slot and would need a capacity for 2,000 MT. Could you confirm if this is possible?

Thanks!
Kory

email_chain.subject: Re: Capacity Inquiry for Methanol Shipment in Early May
email_chain.body:
Hello Kory,

Thank you for reaching out. Your request has been noted, and I'm checking with our manager regarding the availability for early May for the 2,000 MT of Methanol. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
James
Shanghai Linger Machinery & Equipment Development Co., Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Arrangement for Payment of Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm ready to proceed with the order. Should I send the bank details over email for the payment of our 2,000 MT Methanol shipment?

Best regards,
Kory

email_chain.subject: Payment Method Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Kory,

This is in continuation of Mr. James's previous email. Concerning payment, PayPal would be our preferred method, though I am unable to finalize that decision independently. Please await confirmation from our end.

Regards,
Marcus

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Gasoline from Qatar to Singapore
email_chain.body: I'm looking for a potential shipper for gasoline from Qatar to Singapore. Can you provide a quote for shipment around October 6th or 7th with an expected transit time of 20 days? I'd be happy to review and provide a counteroffer if needed. Best, Carl

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Gasoline from Qatar to Singapore
email_chain.body: Hi Carl, Yes, we can manage FOB shipment from Doha/Hamad Port around October 6th or 7th with an expected transit of 20 days to Singapore, P.O.R. at Singapore Port. Please confirm if this suits you. Additionally, could you please share the CIF price for the same shipment along with the Proforma Invoice? Kindly forward this email and the Proforma Invoice from your cargo agent to marwan@example.com and keep us both cc'ed. Thanks and regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Gasoline from Qatar to Singapore
email_chain.body: Hi Sahel, I would like to change the previous request. Could you check availability for a cargo with a transit time of 15-20 days to Singapore in the same 40 ft container freight? Thank you, Carl.

email_chain.subject: Re: Change Request - Inquiry for Shipping Gasoline
email_chain.body: Hi Carl, I looked into the updated shipping details. Unfortunately, I have not found any available cargo fitting the October 8th FOB departure from Doha to Singapore with 15 days of laytime required. However, I can provide a quote for another container shipment from Qatar to Singapore with a transshipment on October 8th FOB. Please advise if you wish to proceed. Regards, Sahel.

email_chain.subject: FOB Shipment Enquiry from Le Havre to Fuzhou
email_chain.body: Hey Mei, On behalf of Acme Inc, I’m writing to arrange a shipment from your shipper in Le Havre to my client in Fuzhou. I was hoping that you could supply me with a rate indication for FOB. Could you please let me know your earliest delivery availability, and is this a regular trade lane for you? Best, Simone

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Shipment Enquiry from Le Havre to Fuzhou
email_chain.body: Dear Simone, I would be very happy to arrange a FOB shipment from Le Havre to Fuzhou. We have some cargo available for immediate shipment, and we can be flexible on lead time as our schedule is not yet filled. I will work to secure you the earliest delivery possible. You should receive the bill of lading within 5 business days. Looking forward to working with you, Yan Xu

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Shipment Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Yan, I’m glad to confirm that we will be proceeding with the shipment this week. I look forward to receiving the bill of lading in time for export. Thank you, Simone

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Shipment Availability Issue
email_chain.body: Hi Simone, Thank you for your confirmation. I am sorry to inform you that our current plans do not permit the shipment of your cargo this week. Although we had some availability, we have unfortunately secured our ship for another customer. I apologize for the inconvenience. Please let me know if we can assist you in the future. Best regards, Yan Xu

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipment Requirement: Lagos to Cotonou
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Toussaint,

Are you available to load 18,000MT of tractors from Lagos to Cotonou as soon as possible? Please include the costs for tug and pilotage in your quote.

Sincerely,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Requirement: Lagos to Cotonou
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

I am available to load your consignment as early as this week. We can handle the 18,000 MT within 5 days from the go-ahead.

Yours Sincerely,
Toussaint.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Requirement: Lagos to Cotonou
email_chain.body:
Dear Toussaint,

Thanks for your quick response. Could you please call me at +234-703-846-5336 so we can further discuss the details of this deal? It would be best between 1:00 PM and 3:00 PM today.

Thank you.
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Requirement: Lagos to Cotonou - Phone Call Time
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

Thank you for scheduling the call. I will make sure to contact you between 1:00 PM and 3:00 PM today as requested.

Yours Sincerely,
Toussaint.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Requirement: Lagos to Cotonou
email_chain.body:
Dear Toussaint,

I am available now for the call. Please contact me as soon as possible.

Thanks.
Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Requirement: Lagos to Cotonou
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

I am ready to call you now. Are you still available?

Yours Sincerely,
Toussaint.

email_chain.subject: Business Verification and Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Hello Noah,

In order to proceed with handling your transaction, I require your organization's details including name, address, and the specific information to process the cargo. Can you provide these details? Also, please confirm if you would like me to officially be part of this transaction.

Thanks,
Toussaint

email_chain.subject: Order Inquiry for Chinese Whiskey
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Olsen,

We have an order for 12,000MT of Chinese whiskey from Hodeida. When would you like it shipped? We're able to have it shipped by mid-April with advance notice.

Cordially,
Kerry

email_chain.subject: Re: Order Inquiry for Chinese Whiskey
email_chain.body:
Hi Kerry,

Thank you for reaching out. Could you please confirm the number of barrels equivalent to the 12,000MT of Chinese whiskey? Based on our logistics, it should take roughly 20 days for the shipment to arrive at Hodeida.

Kind regards,
Kelsey

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Shipping Cost Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Kelsey,

Thank you for your question. I am happy to confirm that we are ready to send 12,000MT of Chinese whiskey. Could you please send us the shipping cost?

Best regards,
Kerry

email_chain.subject: Shipping Timeline and Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Kelsey,

Thanks for sending the shipping cost details. The bill of lading has been processed, and the shipment of Chinese whiskey from Shanghai will be conveyed by sea and is scheduled to arrive at Hodeida by April 20. Please let me know if you need further information.

Regards,
Kerry

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Kolhe's Offer
email_chain.body:
Good evening Mr. Gates,

On my flight out of Moscow this morning, I was approached by a former Kolhe industrial sales rep who shared that you would likely not consider giving Kolhe a deal similar to the one they are proposing to me. He suggested that discussing this matter with the right people could reflect positively on my activities.

Could we discuss this matter further to validate his claims?

Best regards,
Sean

email_chain.subject: Exclusive Offer on Ignition Tubes
email_chain.body:
Dear Sean,

Following up on your request for a meeting on the 27th, Kolhe is excited to present a special offer for the upcoming batch of ignition tubes available in March. Currently, the bid stands at $200 per kit for 1 million kits. However, we propose a reduced price of $100 per kit, with a commitment to purchase an additional 500 thousand kits later, priced at $1 million total, and an annual procurement of ten million tubes at the continued rate of $200 each.

This deal secures a stable revenue stream for Kolhe until we can fully ramp up our production. It also offers you a lucrative opportunity to double your investment while reducing initial costs.

Best regards,
Kolhe Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Gates,

I am under the care of the State Department of Public Health in New York. Following a recent court order to confiscate my health records, I have filed an appeal against this action. I have reached out to the Office of the Inspector General for further support.

I request your assistance in notifying the Inspector General and the State Department of Public Health about the unconstitutional and unethical nature of the 15-day confiscation deadline, and to highlight that my records are still held at their facility.

Your support in this matter would be immensely appreciated.

Best regards,
[The Patient]

email_chain.subject: Re: Health Concerns
email_chain.body:
Hello Mike,

I received your inquiry today and apologize for the delayed response. I must confess, I have been somewhat negligent in attending to this matter in recent days. Regarding my health, it has been quite some time since my last thorough medical examination; nevertheless, I have noticed a significant increase in my heart rate, potentially exacerbated by stress.

I appreciate your concern and will schedule a medical review shortly.

Best regards,
Mr. Gates

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Naphthalene Shipment from Escondido to New Orleans
email_chain.body:
Dear Shipping Co.,

I am interested in shipping 4,000MT of Naphthalene from Escondido to New Orleans. Could you please inform me of the earliest available schedule for handling this cargo? Additionally, are there any weather-related risks during the proposed dates?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Rate Proposal for Consolidated Cargo from New Orleans to Escondido
email_chain.body:
Dear Sally,

Following our recent discussions, I would like to present our rate proposal for the consolidated shipment of cargo from New Orleans to Escondido. Please review the details at your convenience and let me know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Offer for Naphthalene Cargo from New Orleans to Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Sally,

We appreciate your interest in our shipping services. Attached please find our offer for transporting a similar cargo of 3,500MT from New Orleans to Salalah, assuming 90% on-time performance and comprising a single shipment. Our rates are specified in the attached document.

Best regards,
Isabel

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Naphthalene Cargo from New Orleans to Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Isabel,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed offer. I confirm the receipt of your quotation. Could you please proceed with the necessary arrangements for an early confirmation?

Best regards,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 2,000MT Impregnated Paper Shipment from Busan to Tarragona
email_chain.body: Hello Sushila, We are looking to arrange a 2,000MT shipment of impregnated paper from Busan to Tarragona. Could you please provide your earliest possible delivery date? Additionally, do you offer a 'ship from port' rate if we proceed with payment on the day of delivery? Looking forward to potentially working together. Best regards, Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for 2,000MT Impregnated Paper Shipment from Busan to Tarragona
email_chain.body: Dear Sebastian, I can confirm the earliest delivery date as 2nd September. Our rate ex Busan port is EUR 19,900.38. Please refer to the attached documents for detailed terms. Best regards, Sushila

email_chain.subject: Request for Pricing Discussion and Future Cooperation
email_chain.body: Dear Sushila, Thank you for your prompt reply. We would like to discuss the pricing further. Could we possibly arrange a call or Skype chat to go over the details? Do you also have other 2,000MT cargoes for future transactions, or is there a way to develop a continuous selling relationship? Best regards, Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Pricing Discussion and Future Cooperation
email_chain.body: Dear Sebastian, Unfortunately, we do not have any extra stocks available at the moment. However, we will keep your details on record and inform you as soon as we receive new cargo. Sincerely, Sushila

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Your Assistance
email_chain.body: Dear Sushila, Good morning. I just wanted to express my appreciation for your patience and clarity in responding to our queries. Best regards, Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Continued Interest in 2,000MT Impregnated Paper Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Sushila, We remain very interested in facilitating the 2,000MT shipment of impregnated paper from South Korea. Looking forward to any updates you may have. Kind regards, Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Request for CFR Quote for Corn Cargo from Vancouver to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Zhang,

We have approximately 14000 mt of corn that needs to be shipped from Vancouver to Busan. Could you please send us your best quote on a CFR basis?

Thank you.
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for CFR Quote for Corn Cargo from Vancouver to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Louis,

Thank you for your email. Our current CFR offer for the shipment of 14000 mt of corn from Vancouver to Busan is detailed below. Please let me know if this offer is acceptable so we can proceed with the negotiations for the confirmed cargo booking.

Best regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: Re: CFR Quote Adjustment Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Helen,

Thank you for your reply. I noticed your previous offer was above our maximum freight rate. Could you please provide your best offer and include the proposed shipping schedule?

Thank you.
Louis

email_chain.subject: Updated CFR Offer for Corn Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Louis,

Thank you for your reply. The current offer for 14000 mt of corn from Vancouver to Busan is as below. The planned departure date is 9th of July. I hope this meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: Re: Updated CFR Offer for Corn Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Helen,

Thank you for the update. Please revise your previous quote by applying a 20% discount.

Thank you.
Louis

email_chain.subject: Revised Quote for Corn Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Louis,

Thank you for your email. The revised quote for the 14000 mt of corn, now including a 20% discount, is as follows. Please let me know if this new quote meets your approval.

Best regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: Confirmed Booking for Corn Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Helen,

Thank you for the revised quote. We find it acceptable and would like to confirm the booking for the shipment. Please let us know the next steps.

Thank you.
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmed Booking for Corn Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Louis,

Thank you for confirming the booking. The next steps will involve contract finalization and scheduling precise loading times. I will send the necessary documents by tomorrow.

Best regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Refrigerated Container Capabilities
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shan,

We are planning to transport 33,000L of ginger essential oil from San Francisco to Taipei and are interested in using your refrigerated containers, considering it is a perishable product. Could you confirm if this is possible and advice accordingly?

Kind regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Refrigerated Container Capabilities
email_chain.body:
Dear Kate,

Thank you for reaching out. We're happy to assist with your shipment of ginger essential oil. Our ISO containers are perfect for maintaining the required temperature during transit and ensuring the product arrives in perfect condition. Additionally, we offer comprehensive logistics, including pickup from your warehouse and delivery to your preferred port.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have further questions.

Kind regards,
Mr. Shan

email_chain.subject: Dry Ice Shipment Costs Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I am interested to know the cost and container requirements for shipping dry ice from Chicago to Hong Kong. Would a 20ft container suffice for this purpose?

Kind regards,
Stacy

email_chain.subject: Re: Dry Ice Shipment Costs Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Stacy,

Thank you for your inquiry. For shipping dry ice, we use ISO containers due to their airtight seals and ability to be refrigerated at very low temperatures. A 20ft container would be suitable depending on the quantity of dry ice. We can provide more precise details upon knowing the specific volume you wish to ship.

Best regards,
Customer Service Team

email_chain.subject: Details of Our Shipping Services and Costs
email_chain.body:
Dear Kate,

Further to your interest, I’ve attached a price list reflecting various container options and related costs. Transport options via road, rail, sea, or air are available, depending on what is most efficient for your shipment to more than 200 countries.

Please review and let us know how you'd like to proceed.

Warm regards,
Mr. Shan

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote from Richards Bay to Colombo
email_chain.body: Good Morning, We need to ship a cargo of iron ore from Richards Bay to Colombo. We require a capacity of 5,800MT of Dry Bulk Container. While our preferred carrier is Gunvor, we are open to quotes from alternative carriers as well. Please provide your rate offer within the next 24 hours. Thank you for your cooperation. Best Regards, Shyla, Leighton Cargo Logistics

email_chain.subject: Freight Requirement from Liverpool to East Africa
email_chain.body: Good Evening, Unfortunately, Gunvor is unable to provide 5,800MT of DBC iron ore from Richards Bay to Colombo due to existing commitments. We are looking to ship freight from Liverpool to East Africa, to be released on 28th November 2018. Please provide rates along with loading and discharging terms. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for your cooperation. Best Regards, Shyla, Leighton Cargo Logistics

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Follow-up on Alternative Carrier Rates for Iron Ore
email_chain.body: Hey! This is Shyla from Leighton Cargo Logistics. We are still awaiting a response regarding alternative carrier rates for our iron ore cargo from Richards Bay. Have you had a chance to proceed with this request? Please reply with the necessary rates and terms. Thank you for your cooperation. Best Regards, Shyla

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for 30MT Iron Ore Ship from Richards Bay to Durban
email_chain.body: Gunvor, SA, as per our earlier discussions, I am sending this request on behalf of Immanuel, the owner. We need a quote for shipping 30MT of iron ore from Richards Bay to Durban. The delivery timeline is tight, hence prompt response with rates will be appreciated. Below are the rates from my other contacts for your reference. Best Regards, Shyla, Leighton Cargo Logistics

email_chain.subject: Request for Charter Draft and Minimum Ities Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Gil,

Glad you can assist with this charter for us. We will need the draft and minimum ities contract. Can you let us know when these will be ready? The ship is expected in Haifa in 11 days. Thanks for your fast response.

Regards,
Miguel.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Charter Draft and Minimum Ities Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Miguel,

We are moving ahead with the contract. I am working on the draft and will ensure it includes the requested Minimum Ities agreement. Could you please clarify the expected days of operation including any special requirements? This will help me tailor the draft appropriately.

Kind regards,
Gil.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Charter Draft and Minimum Ities Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Gil,

Please find attached a Microsoft Word file with our proposed schedule for the contract days. The relevant days are: Day 1, Day 2 at Port of Shanghai, and further details for Days 3 to 5. Please review and adjust according to your requirement.

Thanks,
Miguel

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Charter Draft and Minimum Ities Contract

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Purchase 20MT
email_chain.body: Mylene, Thanks for the reply. If you confirm the availability of 20MT, we can proceed and arrange delivery for February 15. We will invoice in Canadian dollars, and your company can invoice in RMB. We will also handle the shipping arrangements. Kind regards, Travis

email_chain.subject: Finalization of Wheat Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Travis, Yes, we have 20MT of wheat ready for delivery on February 15. The FOB price is 141 USD, with shipping rates from Shanghai at 25 USD per MT and our rates will be 33.75 USD per MT, under the incoterm EXW. We need a buyer prepared to cover the buying and shipping costs. Please confirm ASAP if you accept our offer. Thanks in advance, Mylene

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Purchase and Payment Details
email_chain.body: Thanks, Mylene, for the quick response. We are interested in purchasing the wheat. Please provide your bank account details for the wire transfer, and we will arrange delivery on the 15th. Our invoice will be in Canadian dollars, and your company can invoice in RMB. Your company will handle the shipping from Shanghai to Montreal. Kind regards, Travis

email_chain.subject: Query about Freshwater Tankage Capacity
email_chain.body:
Hey Mateo,

How are you doing? While reviewing the specifications of your vessel, I noted that the onboard fuel tankage is quite adequate. However, I am concerned about the capacity of the freshwater tankage. Could you provide information on how the water demand on board compares to the volume of water your vessel can carry?

Thanks,
Best regards,
Martina

email_chain.subject: Water Consumption Details Needed for Vessel Proposal
email_chain.body:
Hello Mateo,

My team is currently working on our offshore support vessel proposal, and we need to accurately quantify the amount of water on board. I understand that the onboard fresh water tankage is calculated to be sufficient for three weeks. However, does this estimation take into account the daily washing needs of the crew? Specifically, how much water is needed for sanitary purposes, laundry, and deck washing? Additionally, could you provide the data on the volume of water consumed by the engines over the last five years?

Thank you,
Sharon

email_chain.subject: Concerns about the upcoming presentation and meeting schedule
email_chain.body: Mr. Cano, I would like to express some concerns about my commitment to making the opening presentation. I feel overwhelmed and suggest you refrain from imposing additional risks of failure on me. Moreover, I believe Miguel may not be suited to handle the logistics for our opening. As this project is heavily political, I recommend relying on more politically adept personnel. I'm unsure if I can attend our next planned meeting; please ask Miguel to consider rescheduling. I'll provide a definite update by Monday. The earliest I can deliver the presentation is November 21. Your guidance is appreciated. Regards, Celeste.

email_chain.subject: Rescheduled Project Planning Meeting
email_chain.body: Ms. Silver, due to some confusion with the meeting dates and following your suggestion, I've rescheduled our project planning meeting to August 24. Please confirm your availability for this date. I look forward to your confirmation. Best, Miguel

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Meeting Date
email_chain.body: Ms. Silver, I need to confirm whether the date of August 24 for our project planning meeting is final from your side. Please let me know by August 21 if you are unable to make it. It's essential we align on this to proceed effectively. Regards, Miguel

email_chain.subject: Final Date for Project Planning Meeting
email_chain.body: Miguel, could you confirm if the final date for our project planning meeting is set for August 24? I need to arrange my schedule accordingly. Thanks, Celeste

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Date for Project Planning Meeting
email_chain.body: Ms. Silver, yes, August 24 is confirmed as the final date for our project planning meeting. Let me know if you face any issues. Regards, Miguel

email_chain.subject: Review of Project Plan

email_chain.subject: Shipping Details Confirmation Requested
email_chain.body:
Hi Judith,

To clarify, are you referring to our capabilities to import steel rebar? We currently undertake movements of steel rebar up to 10,000 tons from various locations including Budapest to California. Our next shipment is expected to arrive at Oakland, CA by ship on September 26, 2018. For the onward rail journey, options include:

- Train 1015101 (Westbound)
- Train 5117001 (Eastbound)
- Train 2022012 (Westbound)
- Train 5159001 (Eastbound)

Collection can occur at:
- Calinland Terminal
- Door 85, Roll-on/roll-off at 35th Street & 2nd Avenue, Oakland, CA 94607.

Please confirm which options you prefer.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Container Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Judith,

Following up on our earlier discussion, we currently have 100 containers available which can accommodate approximately 5,000 tons of steel rebar. Please confirm if this meets your requirements as previously mentioned.

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Request to Charter Your Vessel MV
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Palazzani,

We are back with our request to charter your MV. Attached please find the charter parties and the rates for your vessel. Please note that our rates are fixed. We kindly request a final reply at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Phoebe

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Charter Your Vessel MV
email_chain.body:
Dear Phoebe,

Thank you for your inquiry. We are pleased to receive your proposal and the attached charter parties. After careful review, we would like to suggest making changes to the terms as follows:

1) The charter parties will be generated automatically by us in PDF format. The terms can be customized before the charter is signed, including rates, charter duration, and safety requirements.

2) Please refer to our terms and conditions as outlined on our website at http://www.onlinedonecharter.net/. These must be read and agreed upon by your crew before they are eligible to serve on our vessel. We recommend you incorporate these into your preparations.

We look forward to your adjustments based on these suggestions.

Best regards,
Mr. Palazzani

email_chain.subject: Revised Terms for Chartering Vessel MV
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Palazzani,

We have reviewed your suggestions and have amended our initial proposal accordingly. Please find the amended terms attached. Could you kindly send us a hard copy of the finalized charter party reflecting our amendments?

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
Phoebe

email_chain.subject: Document Preparation for Charter Agreement
email_chain.body:
Dear Phoebe,

Thank you for the amendments. Before moving forward, please ensure to forward the legal documents of all your crew members. This includes valid passports, relevant completion certificates, valid ship security clearance, and medical certifications (Med5). For more details, refer again to the terms and conditions on our website at http://www.onlinedonecharter.net/.

Please let us know if you have any further questions.

Best regards,
Mr. Palazzani

Project Manager, Interocean Enterprises

Thanks, Ben Baker

Ben Baker

email_chain.body:
Dear Charter Department,

We are looking to charter a cargo ship for the transportation of 3,000 metric tons of dairy products from Trieste to Rotterdam. We are ready to discuss the price and terms, specifically seeking to negotiate a shorter laytime. Could you please inform us of your current Time to Release (TTR)?

We would appreciate a quote for your services at your earliest convenience.

Yours truly,
Danny

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Request for Cargo Ship Charter - Trieste to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Charter Department,

Thank you for your prompt response. It is imperative that we finalize the signing of a cargo ship as soon as possible. Our client is eagerly waiting, and any delay could severely impact their business. Please provide your Time to Release (TTR) as we cannot proceed without this information.

Once again, we request a quote for your services reflecting our discussion on reduced laytime.

Yours sincerely,
Danny

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Transport from Daesan to Osaka
email_chain.body:
Hi Jonas,

We require 900MT of non-Alcohol and Fuel Cargo (NAAF) from Daesan to Osaka. We are considering utilizing your vessel on the following dates:
- Wednesday, May 23rd with delivery hoped by Friday, May 25th.
- Thursday, May 24th with delivery hoped by Saturday, May 26th.
Could you please confirm availability and delivery feasibility on either of these dates?

Many thanks,
Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Transport from Daesan to Osaka
email_chain.body:
Dear Chen,

I apologize for the delay in response. To proceed, I need further details on the cargo type and the preferred shipping dates. Our inability to provide a rate earlier was due to the lack of complete information. Specifically, if the cargo types are the same for different days, please confirm so we can ascertain a consistent shipping rate and estimate the transit time accordingly which stands at roughly two days for each journey.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Transport from Daesan to Osaka
email_chain.body:
Hi Jonas,

First, my apologies for the confusion earlier. I have attached detailed cargo information for your perusal. Please confirm the arrival dates, otherwise we will be planning to transport 3 to 5 trailers of the same aforementioned cargo from Daesan.

Thanks,
Chen

email_chain.subject: Request for Ocean Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

We have a bitumen shipment from Jubail, Saudi Arabia to Salalah, Oman scheduled for next month. The cargo is classified under HS Code 27099010, consisting of 100T packaged in a 20ft GP container, with a total package quantity of 37 units. We are very interested in receiving an ocean freight quote from Al Mada Shipping Company. 

Best regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Ocean Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Victor,

Thank you for reaching out to Al Mada Shipping Company regarding your upcoming shipment. Here are the details for the proposed service: 
- Scheduled arrival: October this year.
- Container: One 20ft standard GP (dry cargo, no lashings).
- Charges: Our freight charge is USD 2500, with a bunker adjustment charge for October of USD 75.

We will provide you with all necessary documentation, including the bill of lading, loading list, and certificate of origin. Our team will also keep you continually updated on the status of your shipment.

Kind regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Ocean Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Sophie,

I am reaching out to request an ocean freight quote for a bitumen shipment from Jubail, Saudi Arabia to Salalah, Oman, scheduled next month. The shipment consists of 100T of cargo packed in a 20ft GP container, with a package quantity of 37. We would appreciate your assistance with this.

Best regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Ocean Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

Thank you for considering our services for your shipping needs. Unfortunately, after reviewing your request, we regret to inform you that we will not be able to assist with your shipment. Our specialization lies in perishables and LCL cargo rather than full container loads, and we do not provide ocean freight forwarding services for such shipments.

Kind regards,
Sophie

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Your Support
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

We are thrilled to have Al Mada Shipping as our logistics partner. Your timely responses and professional approach have greatly impressed us. We are confident in your team's ability to manage our shipment effectively and appreciate your commitment to delivering exceptional service. Thank you for being a trustworthy and efficient partner.

Best wishes,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Price for Rio to Algeciras crude ship
email_chain.body:
Hello Kathy,

Thank you for the lovely fresh coffee I received yesterday. I hope you enjoyed your vacation.

I have a question regarding your pricing for shipping crude from Rio to Algeciras. We are shipping 10k tons a month from this port and require a better price to stay competitive.

Could you provide us with an updated price so we can proceed with the contract?

Thanks,
Tabitha

email_chain.subject: Re: Price for Rio to Algeciras crude ship
email_chain.body:
Hello Tabitha,

Thank you for your email. After reviewing the current rates, we are still charging the same amount due to the rates on the freight markets. Unfortunately, we cannot offer a lower price at this time.

If these terms are unsatisfactory, you might consider exploring other shipping companies.

Sincerely,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Do you have any equipment open for sale?
email_chain.body:
Hello Lars,

I recently spoke with Eric at your sales meeting, and he mentioned that you might have some equipment for sale.

Could you provide details and the asking price for any equipment you are currently offering?

Thanks,
Walter

email_chain.subject: Proposal on Seawater Processing Plant
email_chain.body:
Hello Walter,

Following your inquiry and subsequent discussion with Eric about your proposal, we do have some equipment that may interest you. One available item is the Sea Water Desalination Unit, model JETKA150, in good working condition.

For more information and to discuss the terms, please contact us at 800-322-2687.

Sincerely,
Lars Bjerregaard

email_chain.subject: Offer on equipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Lars,

Thank you for your response.

We are interested in acquiring the Sea Water Desalination Unit, model JETKA150. However, our budget allows us to offer $15,000 for this unit. If this price is not acceptable, I understand we may need to explore other options.

Thank you.
Walter

email_chain.subject: Price for seawater desalination unit
email_chain.body:
Hi Walter,

Thank you for your offer. Currently, due to market conditions, we are unable to accept your proposed price for the JETKA150 unit. We will consider adjusting our prices, but at this moment, we cannot match your offer.

Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards,
Lars

email_chain.subject: Your Proposal
email_chain.body:
Hello Lars,

Thank you for considering my offer. I am truly interested in the desalination unit. My budget is $100,000 for multiple equipment purchases, of which the JETKA150 could be part. If you could provide a more competitive offer, I would appreciate continuing our negotiation.

Thank you.
Walter

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Documentation for Funchal Client
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Luis,

It has been brought to my attention that you will be overseeing the documentation for our mutual client in Funchal next month. I must inform you that we are currently unable to guarantee that 50% of the required documents, such as notices of loads and demurrage, will be prepared in time. As such, we cannot be held accountable for any further costs that may be incurred. Should you wish to discuss this issue further, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best wishes,
Margarita Madison

email_chain.subject: Re: Upcoming Documentation for Funchal Client
email_chain.body:
Dear Margarita,

I am concerned upon learning that significant documentation will not be ready, which could lead to substantial complications on the day of sailing. This would also place undue pressure on our client, which is unacceptable. I must insist that all necessary documentation be issued and available as required. I have emphasized previously that full documentation is essential to safeguard our client's interests.

Please confirm by Wednesday that you will provide the documentation to the best of your ability. If I do not receive a confirmation by Wednesday end of day, I will have to issue a letter of indemnity on behalf of my client.

Kind regards,
Luis Perez

email_chain.subject: Client Satisfaction Issues During Recent Cruise
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I wish to address a concern regarding our client's recent experience on your cruise, which was different from what was advertised. The itinerary online mentioned a 5-hour lunch break during the daylight hours; however, this was shortened to just one hour at the beginning of the afternoon. Subsequently, our client had to miss the second part of the cruise due to an upcoming trip the next morning.

After the stop, the client felt the need to change her outfit for dinner, expressing her dissatisfaction. As a representative, it is challenging to justify her actions fully, yet it's clear that the shortened break contributed significantly to her disappointment. I feel that some form of compensation for our client would be reasonable under these circumstances.

Best regards,
Luis Perez

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, We have a cargo of 3,000MT of ammonium nitrate to be shipped from Karachi to Rotterdam. Could you please provide your best quote for loading and confirm if you can complete the delivery by Saturday afternoon? Additionally, please forward a copy of the information for our records. Thanks, Olga

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Olga, Thank you for your email. We can transport your full container load (FCL) of ammonium nitrate to Rotterdam on November 23. The tonnage has been noted as 2,300MT, which we understand might be an error. Please confirm the correct weight. We would need the following details to proceed: (A) Exact loading and discharge ports, (B) Arrival date at Karachi, (C) Origin country code, (D) Destination country code, (E) Bill of lading number, (F) Required loading date, (G) Required gate in time, (H) Special handling instructions such as stowing below deck, (I) Product description, and (J) Terms of payment - CIF Rotterdam, FOB Karachi. Best regards, Ahmet Tur

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Ahmet, Thank you for your quick response. The correct weight for the ammonium nitrate shipment is 2,700MT. Please update our agreement and proceed with the necessary preparations. I will send the additional details required for the bill of lading and other paperwork shortly. Best, Olga

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quotation - Correction and Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Olga, I've updated the documented weight of the shipment to 2,700MT as confirmed. We are all set to proceed once we receive the additional required details from you. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to finalizing the preparations for your shipment. Best regards, Ahmet Tur

email_chain.subject: Co-op Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Warren,
Attached you will find a request from Ms. Adler. I would be grateful if you can offer her the same rates for 4,000MT of polypropylene from Al Jubail to Trieste. Please be quick, as Ms. Adler is anxious to proceed with the cargo.
Kind Regards,
Arun

email_chain.subject: Co-op Response
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Adler,
The attached file indicates rates for 4,000MT of Polypropylene from Al Jubail to Trieste. Can you please confirm the size, quality, and delivery terms?
Kind Regards,
Arun

email_chain.subject: Co-op Response
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mehta,
Please see the attached instructions for the cargo.
Best Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,
Many thanks for the offer. Can you please send the rates in the requested format?
Best,
Arun

email_chain.subject: Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Arun,
Attached is the latest update for 4,000MT of Polypropylene from Al Jubail to Trieste. Please note that the most competitive rates would require 30 days sailings and your bookings within 14 days will need to be paid in FOB Al Jubail terms. Please send us an email confirming acceptance of the rates.
Best Regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Cargo Transport Inquiry: Suez to Malaysia
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Gomez, could you please confirm if your vessel can take 6,000MT of asphalt from Suez to Malaysia on August 15, 2013? Thank you. Best regards, Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transport Inquiry: Suez to Malaysia
email_chain.body: Dear Vanessa, thank you for your inquiry. I would like to confirm that our vessels have the capacity available to transport 6,000MT of asphalt from Suez to Malaysia on your requested date of August 15, 2013. Best regards, Mr. Gomez

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transport Inquiry: Suez to Malaysia
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Gomez, thank you for your prompt response and confirming the availability. We are not considering alternative options since this route meets our needs. Kind regards, Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: UK Markets and Chemical Product Handling
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wood,
Does your office handle chemical products such as methyl hexane? Additionally, how do you view the performance of the UK markets in January this year?
Thank you for your attention.
Best regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: UK Markets and Chemical Product Handling
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,
Unfortunately, we currently do not handle chemical products such as methyl hexane, and I am not equipped to provide insight into the UK market's performance in January.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We will update you as soon as possible.
Kind regards,
Jonah Jones
Your Team at ABC

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: UK Markets and Chemical Product Handling

Dear Jon,
We have relayed your inquiry regarding the handling of chemical products and the performance of UK markets in January to our headquarters in London for further discussion.
We appreciate your patience and will follow up accordingly.

Jonah Jones
ABC Company

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: UK Markets and Chemical Product Handling
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,

Our team is reviewing the performance of the UK markets in January and will reach out to you shortly with more information.
