Jonah Jones
ABC Company

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Backload Campaign Report
email_chain.body:
Dear Madame Van Den Dungen,

I’ve reviewed your recent report on Maersk’s backload campaign, estimating it will generate US$30 million in business. Could you clarify whether this projection utilizes proprietary methodologies, or is it based on publicly accessible data?

Yours faithfully,
Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Backload Campaign Report
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wilson,

Thank you for your interest in my research. While the report itself is confidential, the analysis is largely based on data that is publicly accessible. I hope this clarifies your query about the authenticity and basis of the projections.

Please feel free to reach out for further information.

Kind regards,
Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Backload Campaign Report
email_chain.body:
Dear Miss Elise,

Thank you very much for clarifying the basis of your projections. The information you plan to share will indeed be beneficial for our ongoing backload campaign. I will ensure that all relevant data needed for your research is provided to maintain its reliability.

Looking forward to your updated report.

Kind regards,
Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Backload Campaign Report
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wilson,

Thank you for agreeing to provide the necessary data. Your collaboration will undoubtedly enhance the accuracy of the final report. I am confident that you will find the results satisfactory.

Best regards,
Elise

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability for Solid Aromatic Fertilizers Transportation
email_chain.body: Hi Renaldo, We have a 1,000MT cargo of solid aromatic fertilizers that needs to be transported from West Java to Northern Sumatra. Could you please check your vessel's availability for this route during your next laycan period? Looking forward to your earliest confirmation. Best Regards, Arnolda

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability for Solid Aromatic Fertilizers Transportation
email_chain.body: Hi Arnolda, I am currently traveling to Surabaya and will be heading to Pangkalan Bun soon. I can be available to discuss further details on either Wednesday or Thursday. Will update you as soon as possible. Best Regards, Renaldo

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability for Solid Aromatic Fertilizers Transportation
email_chain.body: Hi Renaldo, That’s fantastic. Thanks for the updates. We’re aiming for a delivery on May 2nd. Is it possible for you to ensure the cargo reaches Northern Sumatra by then? Best Regards, Arnolda

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Demurrage Charges and Payment for New Order
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Turner, I received your email concerning the shipment of soybean 2607 from Singapore to Hampton Roads, Virginia, which includes a demurrage charge of $13,500. However, I intend to make a payment for our 4th order of 3,000MT of automobile gas from Singapore to Kandla, with 45 days laytime, and a demurrage charge of $3,500. I believe the difference in charges seems excessive. Could you please review this and let me know your thoughts? Thank you very much, Simon.

email_chain.subject: Re: Query Regarding Demurrage Charges and Payment for New Order
email_chain.body: Dear Simon, Thank you for your email. It's important to note that our terminal demurrage policies differ. At the Port of Newark, for example, the terminal demurrage is calculated on a per day, per TEU basis at a rate of $5.00. Additionally, it factors in the duration the vessel remains at the dock or in nearby waters, and the number of TEUs still on board. Could you clarify whether your question about demurrage is related to the time the ship spends in Singapore, or is it about the amount, in metric tonnes, for which you'll be charged? Looking forward to your clarification. Regards, Mr. Turner

email_chain.subject: Further Clarifications Needed on Demurrage Calculations
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Turner, Thank you for your response. I need further clarifications: 1. Is there a minimum timeframe the ship needs to stay in Singapore before demurrage charges apply? 2. What would the demurrage charges be for shipments of automobile gas weighing 3,000MT, 6,000MT, 15,000MT, and 24,000MT respectively? Sincerely, Simon

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Clarification Required on Ship Clearing Time
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Turner, As I mentioned in my previous email, could you please inform me about the estimated time required to clear the ship in Singapore based on the weight of my order? Thank you, Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Clarification Required on Ship Clearing Time
email_chain.body: Dear Simon, Thanks for the detailed explanation. I also received a similar case this morning which was straightforward; the vessel was cleared on the 21st of August, and demurrage started from the 22nd. In your case of purchasing a small quantity (3,000MT), the charterer, as per the charter party, should cover the terminal demurrage, since this is considered a short term booking. It’s crucial for the charterer to ensure the ship isn't unnecessarily delayed. Regards, Mr. Turner

email_chain.subject: Request for cargo shipment from St. John’s to Antwerp
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Barker, Could you handle an 8,000MT cargo of chemicals from St. John’s to Antwerp? The cargo is ready for stowage on our vessel. Please let us know if you have a time slot available to avoid any scheduling conflicts. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for cargo shipment from St. John’s to Antwerp
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for considering our company. I checked the logistics, and currently, we do not have the required equipment available for your cargo. We do, however, have several crew members (Engineer, Purser, and Chief Officer) interested in temporary employment. Could you please send additional details regarding temporary positions? Best regards, Raj

email_chain.subject: Employment Inquiry for M/V NESTROVE Crew
email_chain.body: Hi Raj, I serve as the Chief Officer on the M/V NESTROVE and am actively seeking additional sea time and employment opportunities. I have 9 years of experience in the shipping industry working with Seafarers Security Management Services on a variety of vessels. Could you please send me the details of the employment contract? My email is john@nestrove.org. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Further Employment Inquiry for M/V NESTROVE Engineer
email_chain.body: Dear Raj, I would also like to inquire about opportunities for our Engineer, who has 10 years of experience in shipping, particularly with chemicals cargoes, liquefied gases, and marine fuels. We noticed your vacancy posting online and are keen to understand more about the positions available. Could you send a copy of the employment contract to xyz@gmail.com? Thank you, John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Molasses Transport from Seattle to Santos
email_chain.body: I need a vessel for 10,000MT of molasses from Seattle to Santos. A late July laycan works for us. Do you include free port dues in your quotes? Thanks, Dorcas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Molasses Transport from Seattle to Santos
email_chain.body:
Good day Dorcas,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the transport of 10,000MT of molasses from Seattle to Santos. Can you please confirm whether the quote should include port dues? We can check for vessel availability in late July as you indicated.

Please let me know your position on this.

Sincerely, [Contact info removed]

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Molasses Transport from Seattle to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

Thank you for the prompt response. Yes, please include the port dues in the quote. Any information on the next available vessel this month would be appreciated as well.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Dorcas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Molasses Transport from Seattle to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Dorcas,

I will check for available vessels that can accommodate 10,000MT of molasses for the specified route and dates, including port dues in the quote. I will get back to you with the options as soon as possible.

Best regards,
[Contact info removed]

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Shipping 7,000MT of Gasoline
email_chain.body:
Dear Capt. Zaramela,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the possibility of shipping 7,000MT of gasoline from Al Jubail to Karachi. This is a significant order, and I suggest we discuss the details further. Let's schedule a meeting on Monday at 5pm GMT to finalize the arrangements.

Best regards,
Johnathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Shipping 7,000MT of Gasoline
email_chain.body:
Hello Capt. Zaramela,

As we planned, let's meet next week on Wednesday, 4 May at 5pm GMT. Currently, the availability of the Pakistani fleet is constrained and poses some uncertainty. We might consider a plan B to divert the shipment to Bahrain or the Indian Subcontinent depending on fleet availability.

Best,
Johnathan

email_chain.subject: Interest in Brokerage Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Capt. Zaramela,

I received your message and am enthusiastic about the prospect of acting as a broker for your current shipping portfolio. Please let me know your availability to discuss this further.

Regards,
Johnathan

email_chain.subject: Update on Current Status
email_chain.body:
Hi Capt. Zaramela,

We are currently handling a high volume of operations, but we are progressing. We look forward to starting our collaboration soon once our current workload stabilizes.

Best regards,
Johnathan

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Coal Transportation

Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Coal Transportation

Mr. Koyama

email_chain.subject: Status Update on Vessel Load Schedule

email_chain.subject: Re: Status Update on Vessel Load Schedule

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Nakhodka to Hamburg Schedule

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Vessel Offer Prices and Terms

This task includes several vessels for which I am seeking offer prices and terms. Please give Nikolai or myself a call as soon as possible for a brief discussion on these loads, especially as he will be unavailable until March 15. Looking forward to the call. Best wishes, Wayne

Kim P. The

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Special Handling and Customs Clearance for Cricket Equipment
email_chain.body: Hello Andrea, I’m currently arranging to ship a container full of cricket equipment from Brisbane to Quetta. Could you please advise if there are any special handling requirements during the transit or any specific customs clearance procedures needed for the equipment? Regards, Saroop

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Special Handling and Customs Clearance for Cricket Equipment
email_chain.body: Hi Saroop, great to hear from you! I've just obtained my visa to travel, ready to assist with the shipment logistics once it arrives. Regarding the cricket equipment, it would be efficient to hire a local customs agent to clear the shipment. Can you confirm if you've arranged for pickup from the port and contacted the shipping agent? Best regards, Andrea

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Special Handling and Customs Clearance for Cricket Equipment
email_chain.body: Hey Andrea, Thank you for the advice. I've hired a local customs agent as recommended. Pickup and other arrangements are all set at the port. To ensure the smooth clearance of our equipment, could you advise on payment for clearance and fees involved with trucking? Also, do ensure our container's space sufficiency as it's imperative all equipment fits. Cheers, Saroop

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Special Handling and Customs Clearance for Cricket Equipment
email_chain.body: Hi Saroop, For the clearance fee, it's most secure to use a pre-paid card and retain all receipts, which you can settle directly with the agent upon your arrival in Quetta. For trucking, the agent will provide a quote or invoice beforehand—ensure to get a copy for your records for any potential extra fees. Regarding container space, it might be wise to verify the quantities with your shipping agent to prevent any issues. Best, Andrea

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Cargo Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body:
Guten Tag Herr Schreiber,

I am enquiring about a 10,500MT cargo of feed intending to be shipped from Rotterdam to Antwerp. Could you please confirm if this shipment would conform to the standard schedule and if there are any expected delays?

Cheers,
Charlotte

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Cargo Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body:
Guten Tag Frau Gilson,

Yes, the shipment of 10,500MT from Rotterdam to Antwerp is scheduled as per the standard timeline, and no delays are expected currently.

Regards,
Gilbert

email_chain.subject: Request for Offer - Additional Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Guten Tag Herr Schreiber,

I'd like to request an offer for an additional shipment of 15,000MT of feed from Rotterdam to Antwerp, ideally in the third week of December. I look forward to your proposal.

Thanks in advance,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Offer - Additional Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Guten Tag Frau Whitman,

We can arrange for a 15,000MT vessel charter to Antwerp, departing from the Netherlands in the first week of December. Please let us know if this aligns with your scheduling needs so that we can proceed with the quote.

Regards,
Gilbert

email_chain.subject: Freight Requirement Query
email_chain.body: Hello there, we need to transport 200,000 tonnes of cargo per 40ft trailer from New Orleans to Houston. Do you have any open slots for a late-week laycan? Thanks! Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Requirement Query
email_chain.body: Hello Zoe, we do have space, but only for the second half of the week. Could you please provide more details on the freight so that we can send you a quote? Also, would you like us to get third-party quotes for comparison? Thanks, Logistics Coordinator

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Requirement Query
email_chain.body: Hi, can you confirm again that you have an open slot for the second half of the week for 200,000 tonnes per trailer? Also, yes, please provide third-party quotes as well for comparison. Thanks, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Requirement Query
email_chain.body: Hi Zoe, confirmed, we can accommodate your freight request in the second half of the week. We will work on getting those quotes and revert shortly. Thanks, Logistics Coordinator

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Requirement Quotes
email_chain.body: Hey, I checked your quotes and found them to be about 5 times the going rate. Thanks, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about weekend loading and alternative transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Margo,

I hope this message finds you well. We are planning to ship 2,400MT of soybeans from Baltimore to Yokohama and wanted to check if you load on weekends? If that's not available, would Houston be our next option? Additionally, could you provide information on alternative transportation such as chartering a vessel or using rail services?

Warmly,
Celine

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about weekend loading and alternative transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Celine,

Thank you for reaching out. Currently, we do not load on weekends. Yes, Houston would be the next available port. Concerning alternative transportation, I can explore options for a chartered vessel or rail transport and provide you with the details shortly.

Best regards,
Margo

email_chain.subject: Shipping Arrangements for Houston to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Margo,

This is Celine Wang from ABC Ship. I am currently in the U.S. with our container ready to be transported. We need to ship it by truck from Houston to your facility. The estimated departure is on June 14th. We have also chartered a vessel that will sail on June 22nd to China. Could we collaborate on this shipment?

Best regards,
Celine

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipment of Crude Palm Oil from Kalimantan to Chennai
email_chain.body:
Hi, We are looking for an opportunity to ship a 4,600MT cargo of crude palm oil from Kalimantan to Chennai. We propose a 10% discount on cash payments. Please let us know if you have any vessel capacity available for this route in the next two weeks. The required details are as follows:

- Loading date: 26th April 2023
- Discharge port: Chennai
- Estimated Time of Arrival: 3rd May 2023

Our freight quote is as follows:
- Head Office (HO): US$40.85/MT FOB, ex-Manado, with a 10% discount on cash payment
- Assigned Sales (AS): US$42.13/MT FOB, ex-Manado

The vessel capacity required is about 55,000 DWT with a loading capacity of 5,500 MT/hr. We are open to discussing further details.

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Shipment of Crude Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi, I hope you are doing well! We are pleased to inform you that we have identified a suitable opportunity that matches your cargo and schedule requirements. Here are the details:

- Commodity: 4,600 MT Crude Palm Oil (CPO)
- Loading port: Manado, Kalimantan
- Discharge port: Chennai
- Loading date: 26th April 2023
- Estimated Time of Arrival: 3rd May 2023
- Pricing terms: US$40.85/MT FOB, ex-Manado with a 10% discount on cash payments.

Our available vessel is the 2x BSL 84,000 DWT, currently with a capacity of 50,000 DWT and a loading rate of 5,500 MT/hr. We look forward to your confirmation to proceed with the necessary arrangements.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi, We have reviewed your offer and are pleased to accept the proposed sale terms and proceed with the contract execution. Please keep us informed of any changes in the schedule or technical specifications of the vessel. Kind regards.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request: Methanol from Yokohama to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Fleming,

My client intends to ship 2,300MT of methanol from Yokohama to Halifax on the 14th of this month. I am concerned that your current schedule may not be able to accommodate this request. Could you please confirm the possibility of arranging this shipment within the next hour? Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
Trudy

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request: Methanol from Yokohama to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Jones,

You were correct about our schedule challenges. However, I can confirm that we can accommodate the shipment of methanol on the 14th exclusively on the Maersk vessel. This arrangement will incur an additional charge of $300. I apologize for any inconvenience caused by not meeting your 4:00 P.M. target previously. Let me know if you have any further questions.

Thanks,
Nick Fleming

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Arrangement Confirmation & New Project Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mr. Fleming,

Once again, I am grateful for your diligence in promptly addressing the shipping needs. Your effort in reorganizing the team to facilitate this and future projects does not go unnoticed. I will be recommending your services highly to others in need of dependable project management. I also have a new project that may be a good fit for Maersk, and I believe it will benefit from your continued excellent service. Please let me know if you’re interested and what the next steps would be. You can reach me at (555)-555-5555.

Best regards,
Trudy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Alternative Soybean Oil Supplier
email_chain.body: Hi Phyllis! Thanks for the list of soybean oil samples. Unfortunately, we will not partner with that firm this month as their certificates were only issued upon partial payment. Could you please recommend another supplier? Warm regards, Russell Garan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Alternative Soybean Oil Supplier
email_chain.body: Hello Russell, I have another supplier in mind and will initiate contact with them immediately. By the way, how is the convention going? I recall you participated in the 'Get Real Seminar', which I found quite enlightening. Thank you for recommending it. Regards, Phyllis

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Alternative Soybean Oil Supplier
email_chain.body: Great, I am really excited about trying out the new supplier! On another note, we're hosting our annual program convention in San Jose in two weeks. We would be delighted if you could attend, and we'll happily reserve a room for you. Warmly, Russell

email_chain.subject: Request for Bitumen Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: Sarah, I am writing to request a proposal for 6,000MT of bitumen shipment from Japan to Valletta for next month. Could you please confirm if part shipments are permissible? Please send your proposal to 7ceoawwz@warpmail.net.

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Bitumen Shipment from Japan to Valletta
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Attached please find the proposal for the 6,000MT bitumen shipment from Japan to Valletta as you requested. Please review the proposal at your earliest convenience and let me know if it meets your requirements or if any modifications are needed. Looking forward to your feedback. Anna <Attachment>

email_chain.subject: Re: [ICB00006000028989] Request Quote for 6,000MT of bitumen
email_chain.body: Hi, I reviewed the shipping documents and found discrepancies in the sold amounts and the attached replies. It seems from the attachments that the initial 6,000MT is split into partials of 1,500MT and 3,500MT respectively. Can you clarify if this partitioning was agreed upon? Thanks, Ali <Attachment>

email_chain.subject: Re: [ICB00006000028989] Request Quote for 6,000MT of bitumen
email_chain.body: Hello Ali, Thanks for your email. Yes, the 6,000MT was indeed split into parts, with sales of 3,500MT already closed. The partial shipment was based on the preliminary agreement with the client. Let me know if you need more details. Regards, Anna

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Shipping Details and Documentation Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Newbauer,

As part of our ongoing commitment to streamline our operations, we require all vendors to provide clear shipping details upon booking any order. This reminder is being sent to you via Freightos' automated invoicing system to ensure transparency and efficiency in our process. We have attached a spreadsheet listing current exceptions. Please review it at your earliest convenience:

https://d03i6a5h40mh27.cloudfront.net/uploads/attachments/uploaded_files-1574058943-06e3cf4a-0c53-4e44-9992-b0e8f12a0f06.xlsx

Additionally, should you require any further documentation to support your logistics or any claims, do not hesitate to let us know.

Thank you,
Jasmine

email_chain.subject: Documentation to Support Vendor Claim Disputes
email_chain.body:
Hi Jesse,

I have compiled the necessary documents to address and support the dispute concerning our vendor and their carrier. Although the provided documents might seem insufficient, we are prepared to furnish additional information as required. Please find the details in the spreadsheet linked in my previous email and let me know how you feel about proceeding with this action. I believe it aligns with the standard practices as highlighted in my subsequent email about the DOT's requirement and response.

Thank you,
Jasmine

email_chain.subject: Request for DOT Violation Records
email_chain.body:
Dear Department of Transportation,

We request the violation records and specific compliance details regarding the electronic logging devices used by our contracted trucking company. If no violations are found, or if you choose not to issue a citation, please ensure the carrier undertakes a stop, thoroughly documents, and reports the inspection of their ELD system to prevent any future discrepancies.

This documentation is crucial for ensuring compliance with DOT regulations and helping to resolve our current claim dispute.

Sincerely,
Jasmine

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for cargo shipment of ethylene oxide
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Villani,

My client has a shipment of 14,400MT of ethylene oxide (EO) from the Port of Bahia Blanca. Can you accommodate that cargo on your vessel? Please let me know if you need more details.

Thank you,
Ahmed

email_chain.subject: EH 0014702904 (update)
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Villani,

Following up on my earlier email regarding the shipment of 14,400MT of ethylene oxide from the Port of Bahia Blanca. I would appreciate it if you could confirm the availability of your vessel to accommodate this cargo.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Ahmed

email_chain.subject: Re: EH 0014702904 (update)
email_chain.body:
Dear Ahmed,

Thank you for your emails. Can you please provide more details about the required logistics and expected dates of shipment? This will help us to better assess the feasibility and prepare an appropriate response.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Mr. Villani

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: EH 0014702904 (update)
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Villani,

Thank you for your prompt response. The cargo needs to be shipped from the Port of Bahia Blanca to our designated port by the end of this month. The commodity is Ethylene Oxide, and the total quantity is 14,400MT. We are looking to finalize the arrangements as soon as possible.

Please let us know your vessel's availability and any other requirements from your side.

Best regards,
Ahmed

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cotton Sales and Shipping Procedures
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Could you send some sellers to my office next week for a price enquiry? Also, could you explain the procedure you use when dispatching cotton from Port Sudan to Qingdao?

Best regards,
Isabelle

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cotton Sales and Shipping Procedures
email_chain.body:
Hello Isabelle,

Thank you for your inquiry. Please contact Mr. Adebayouba Ayodeji at your convenience through email or call us direct in Lagos at +234-803-571-0994 for details regarding the sellers' visit.

Regarding cotton shipping, our hopper barges typically transport the bales from the local farms to Port Sudan, where they are loaded onto vessels destined for Qingdao.

Best regards,
Mutebi Group Plc
[Est. 1986]

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up Questions
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Could I get Mr. Adebayouba Ayodeji's email address to discuss further? Also, I have a few more questions:
- Is there after-sales service after the cotton is harvested?
- How much is the average acreage yield of cotton per hectare?
- Are you affiliated with any cotton gins, and if so, how could we establish a business relationship?
- Are you currently supplying cotton to spinning mills in Nigeria, and are there available capacities for the 2015/2016 season?
- How do you set the prices for each cotton type on your platform?

Thank you,
Isabelle

email_chain.subject: Your Inquiry about Cotton Sales Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Isabelle,

This is Michael Adebayo, working directly with Mr. Ayodeji Adebayouba. You can reach him via this email address: ayodeji@mutebigroup.com

Feel free to ask any further questions you might have directly to him.

Best,
Michael Adebayo
Regional General Manager

email_chain.subject: Providing Details on Partnership Opportunities
email_chain.body:
Dear Isabelle,

We are grateful for your interest in our cotton farming operation. We are currently partnering with experienced cotton farmers in Benue State and are open to long-term partnerships with investors and clients like yourself.

With our current yield averaging 900 kgs per acre, we anticipate achieving higher yields and have sufficient capacities available for the 2015/2016 season. We base our pricing on market trends and internal cost analyses to ensure competitiveness.

Looking forward to further discussions.

Best regards,
Adebayouba Ayodeji
Regional General Manager

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Sugar Delivery Schedule to Libreville
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Boone,

I hope this message finds you well. We have received a request from our customer in Libreville for a shipment of 8,500MT of sugar. They have emphasized that receiving this cargo by December 20th would significantly assist with their year-end accounting figures. To facilitate this, they suggest that the berth time could be reduced by one day. Could you please confirm whether this adjustment to the schedule is possible?

Yours truly,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Sugar Delivery Schedule to Libreville
email_chain.body:
Dear Jack,

I agree to arrange the dispatch as requested, aiming for delivery on or before December 20th. Please provide the specific container number and confirm the adjusted delivery schedule at your earliest convenience.

Yours truly,
John Boone

email_chain.subject: Query About Load-out Services for Gas Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

We are planning to transport 40,000 barrels of gas from Pusan to Duisburg and are scheduled to dispatch in a few days. I would like to know if your company can handle the load-out at Pusan. If not, could you suggest any reliable partners in South Korea that might assist us?

Warm regards,
Micah

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Load-out Services for Gas Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Micah,

I appreciate your inquiry. Currently, my company does not handle load-outs for that route, but I have a contact in South Korea who could potentially assist. I will reach out to them and confirm whether they can take this on.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Load-out Services for Gas Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

That sounds great. Please keep me updated, and if your contact agrees, do let me know the revised cost they propose.

Thanks,
Micah

email_chain.subject: Re: Query About Load-out Services for Gas Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Micah,

I’ve confirmed with the contact and they are available to handle the load-out. However, the cost will be $400 more than your initial quote. I assure you that they are very reliable and have excellent service. If this cost adjustment is acceptable, I can initiate the necessary arrangements.

Regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Urgent: 10,000MT Fuel Oil Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Baker, Could you arrange the transportation of 10,000MT of fuel oil from Marseille to Liverpool this weekend? Additionally, could you please provide your rate for the blanket tariff? Also, attached is our last shipping invoice which requires your signature and needs to be returned to us as soon as possible. Thank you for your assistance. Best regards, Jolanta

email_chain.subject: Signing of Invoice and Verification of Details
email_chain.body: Thank you for attending to the previous request, Mr. Baker. I have all the necessary documents ready to sign the invoice. For our records, could you confirm if we have your most current contact details? It's imperative for us to keep accurate records. I will be in the office tomorrow, Thursday at 11 AM and hope to discuss this in person. Best regards, Dirk

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Rates for Bitumen Transport
email_chain.body: James, I have a 4,000MT cargo of bitumen that needs loading from Jubail next week. We require a vessel that can offer a transit time of 15-22 days. Could you provide any rates and vessel names that could accommodate this request? Regards, Allan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Rates for Bitumen Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Allan, 

Thank you for your email. We apologize for the delayed response due to high workload. Unfortunately, the vessel we have planned for Qingdao can only provide an 11-day transit time. Please find attached a proposal which outlines the transit details and conditions. We also have interest in arranging a subsequent loading of 800MT from Jubail. Looking forward to your response. 

Regards, James

email_chain.subject: Additional Vessel Options for Bitumen Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Allan,

Following up on James' last email, I wanted to inform you that we have a range of vessels that are capable of providing an 11-day transit to Qingdao, with a vessel arriving in Jubail next week. Please review this option and let us know your thoughts. 

Best regards, Alexandra

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Sugar from London to Paris
email_chain.body: Dear Adina, could you please provide a freight quote to move 150MT of sugar from London to Paris by train? We are planning to schedule this shipment for three months from now. Thank you, Hugo

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Diamonds from Helsinki to Berlin
email_chain.body: Hello Adina, I would appreciate if you could provide a quote for transporting 30MT of diamonds from Helsinki to Berlin by car. We aim to have the shipment three months from today. Regards, Martin

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Needed: Timber from Copenhagen to St. Petersburg
email_chain.body: Hi Adina, Please send me a quote for moving 60MT of timber from Copenhagen to St. Petersburg via barge. We are looking to schedule this for three months from now. Thanks, Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Transportation Quote Request: Gravel from Stockholm to Moscow
email_chain.body: Dear Adina, I need a quote for transporting 20MT of gravel from Stockholm to Moscow by train. We plan to ship this three months from today. Best, Peter

email_chain.subject: Quote Request: Soybeans from Oslo to Vilnius
email_chain.body: Dear Adina, Please provide a transportation quote for 90MT of soybeans from Oslo to Vilnius via train, intended to be scheduled three months from today. Thank you, Anna

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Inquiry: Flowers from Riga to Oslo
email_chain.body: Hello Adina, Can you please quote for moving 10MT of flowers from Riga to Oslo by train? We are looking to organize this shipment three months from now. Sincerely, [Client Name]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipping terms and rates from Baku to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Luisa,

We have a small shipment from Baku to Rotterdam. Could you provide me with the agreed terms for the requested dates? Also, could you confirm your rates for similar cargoes?

Regards,
Jennifer

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry about shipping terms and rates from Baku to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Jennifer,

It's amazing to hear from you! I can't believe it's already Tuesday; it feels like just yesterday you were here. Time flies, and my role at Questor is keeping me very busy with all the exciting developments. Among other projects, we are reviewing the first 10% of our upcoming book, aiming for a revised draft by dinner tonight with the editors.

Regarding your shipment inquiry, I'll review the terms for the requested dates and confirm the rates for similar cargoes by tomorrow morning.

Best wishes,
Luisa

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Loading Date
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

Thanks for your enquiry. I can confirm that the loading date is Monday, April 8th. Would you like me to forward the bill of lading and invoice to you?

Regards,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Sample Bill of Lading and Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

Please find a sample Bill of Lading below and further details on the link provided. This is the general document which we use to load and ship containers to Europe. Due to the current market conditions, clearance of containers at the US port needs to be completed swiftly. For the Fos port, clearance and a bond for 2 days is required. The Bond Opening Cost is approximately $600-$650 / TEU. Other pre-delivery costs will be specified in the document.

Please let us know if you have any further questions. We're here to assist.

Kind regards,
Rachel

email_chain.subject: Your Recent Invoice and Additional Charges
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

Attached is your most recent invoice. Would you like me to include the loading charges as well?

Regards,
Lauren

email_chain.subject: Loading Charges for Your Containers
email_chain.body:
Hi Sacha,

The loading charges for the containers have been attached. All other costs have been adjusted in the original booking.

Regards,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Operation of LPG Tank on April 12
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Thomas,

It appears that you will need to operate one of your LPG tanks on the 12th of April, is that correct? Please let us know if you have any questions.

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Re: Operation of LPG Tank on April 12
email_chain.body:
Hi Eric,

How are you doing? I have a tank size of 800 gal LPG and the original filler hose is 1.25″. Can you supply a larger hose to connect to our tanks?

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Giovanni

email_chain.subject: Re: Operation of LPG Tank on April 12
email_chain.body:
Hello Giovanni,

The 1.25" hose will probably work just fine. An 800 gal tank is small, typically used to service residential or small business establishments. However, I would be willing to give you a quote for a 1.25" hose and another one after measuring to determine the exact size needed. If you would like to proceed, I could have it delivered to you by tomorrow morning.

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Re: Operation of LPG Tank on April 12
email_chain.body:
Thanks, Eric.

I will wait for your response regarding the measurements and quote.

Regards,
Giovanni

email_chain.subject: Request for Immediate Chemical Fertilizer Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Marsden, Our customer in Hanoi is interested in having 3,000MT of chemical fertilizer delivered from Qingdao to Hanoi as soon as possible. Could you provide us with an immediate quote? Thanks, Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Immediate Chemical Fertilizer Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Andy, The ocean rate from Qingdao to Vietnam is currently around US$20,000 for 3,000MT. The bill of lading will be ready in a couple of days. Alternatively, we can offer break-bulk shipping with a smaller vessel for US$25,000. The delivery would take approximately 30 days, with air transportation costs to be considered further. Please let us know if this fits your needs. Sincerely, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Quote and Payment Inquiry
email_chain.body: We are really interested in firming up this deal. Could you provide your bank information so that we can arrange payment via cheque or wire transfer? Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Quote and Payment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Certainly, Andy. The following information can be used for the wire transfer: Bank Address: Industrial Bank Co Ltd, No.2 Building, No.3 Section, Industrial Bank Bank of China, Tianjin Branch BIC Code: BKTCPEBJ Best regards, Maria

email_chain.subject: Request for Preliminary Quote for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Shah,

Could you please fix 50,000MT of coal from Jeddah to Busan, including B/L with INCOTERMS DAF, DDU, and DDP? Would you mind letting us know your preliminary quote?

Best wishes,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Preliminary Quote for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Nick,

We have received your enquiry; thank you for contacting us. I am checking the availability and will get back to you shortly.

Best regards,
Namrata

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for MGO Transportation Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shah,

We are in discussion with an oil exporter interested in purchasing 50,000MT of MGO from Busan to Jeddah. We are looking for a suitable carrier who could transport two consignments, one 8000MT and the other 9000MT, to BAP Jeddah from Busan. We aim to start load preparation within 48 hours and require the vessel to be ready on 16th October. Please provide your best quote.

With regards,
Namrata

email_chain.subject: Proposal for MGO Transportation Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Namrata,

We have reviewed your enquiry of transporting 1 x 8000MT + 1 x 9000MT MGO from Busan to Jeddah and have formulated a competitive and attractive proposal regarding price and delivery, which we are attaching herewith. We are confident that our proposal will meet your needs, and we would appreciate your feedback within the next two days so we can proceed accordingly.

If you require further details, please feel free to contact us.

Best regards,
Shah

email_chain.subject: Approval of MGO Transportation Proposal
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shah,

Thank you for the detailed reply and competitive quote. We are keen to proceed with this deal as our client has stressed the urgency and importance of this shipment. Please consider this positive indication to proceed with the arrangements.

Best regards,
Namrata

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about cargo capacity for rock salt shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

Could you please confirm if you have a 2,000MT capacity available for a rock salt shipment from Rotterdam to Dalian, similar to the previous arrangement discussed? Thank you.

Best regards,
Ted

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry about cargo capacity for rock salt shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Ted,

Yes, we do have the capacity. However, please note that we are currently in our high season and fully booked for the next three months.

Thank you,
Martin

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry about cargo capacity for rock salt shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

Thanks for the prompt response. I was under the impression from your freight schedule that ample capacity would be available this summer. Could you please confirm?

Best regards,
Ted

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about vessel availability for cargo load from Gdańsk to Izmir
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Okabe,

Please confirm that your vessel is still available to load 6,000MT of rapeseed oil from Gdańsk to Izmir. Could you also confirm the off-hire charge and any demurrage related to the charter party?

Regards,
Denys

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about vessel availability for cargo load from Gdańsk to Izmir
email_chain.body:
Dear Denys,

I received your email regarding the cargo of rapeseed oil. Can you please confirm the vessel's name?  Once I have this information, I will forward it to Ms. Elizabeth for further action. Unfortunately, I don't have her personal contact details to share.

Best regards,
Mr. Tatsuki

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about vessel availability for cargo load from Gdańsk to Izmir
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tatsuki,

Thank you for your prompt response. The vessel designated for this shipment is the SS Freighter. Please forward this information to Ms. Elizabeth and ask her to confirm the loading and delivery arrangements.

Best regards,
Denys

email_chain.subject: Cargo Packing Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Denys,

Please find below the details of the packing for the rapeseed oil cargo:

- Outer shipping container
- Internal stacking shelves
- Outer mat

If you have any questions or need further details, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargoes Transfer from Singapore to Tanjung Pelepas
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ho,
How can we work together on a potential cargoes transfer from Singapore to Tanjung Pelepas, comprising of the following:
1) 8,000 MT STYRENE liquid
2) 2,500 MT METHYL DIETHYL KETONE
3) 2,000 MT COPPER SURFACTANTS
4) 4,000 MT STYRENICS DERIVATIVES
Best regards,
Dirk

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargoes Transfer from Singapore to Tanjung Pelepas
email_chain.body:
Dear Dirk,
I received your email regarding the potential cargoes transfer. Here is our quotation:
1) 8,000 MT STYRENE liquid = USD 600,000.00 per unit (FOB/CFR basis).
2) 2,500 MT METHYL DIETHYL KETONE = USD 620,000.00 per unit (FOB/CFR basis).
3) 2,000 MT COPPER SURFACTANTS = USD 250,000.00 per unit (FOB/CFR basis).
4) 4,000 MT STYRENICS DERIVATIVES = USD 1,000,000.00 per unit (FOB/CFR basis).
Please let me know how you would like to proceed.
Best regards,
Mr. Ho

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel for Cargoes Transfer
email_chain.body:
Dear Dirk,
Thank you for your email regarding the potential cargoes transfer for the following items:
1) 8,000 MT STYRENE liquid
2) 2,500 MT METHYL DIETHYL KETONE
3) 2,000 MT COPPER SURFACTANTS
4) 4,000 MT STYRENICS DERIVATIVES
We are pleased to inform you that M.S. CARABINELLE will sail from Singapore to Tanjung Pelepas for the above cargoes. The ship will be dispatched on 21st November 2016 for discharge at PJM and will proceed to SHELL TERMINAL 3 in Peninsular Malaysia on 26th November 2016 for loading. A covering document will be issued by PJM immediately on your arrival.
Best regards,
Johan

email_chain.subject: Case 21-20326 Update: 3DAYLY LLC Bankruptcy Proceedings

The entities operate in transportation and several other industries and are headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut with notable operations in various locations.

The State Court granted a stay on March 29, 2021, following which the automatic stay and conversion under 28 U.S.C. § 1471(a) were requested to take effect.

Regarding routing, unfortunately, we cannot change from Rotterdam to Las Palmas to include Tangier, even though it would save on distance and fuel. Moreover, we have secured a vessel that can carry your cargo available in two weeks. If your client can prepare the cargo by then, could you confirm the readiness? Regards, Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Routing and Next Cargo Load Possibility

email_chain.subject: Re: Please Confirm the Cargo Route

email_chain.subject: Exploring Email Communication for Job Offer Acceptance
email_chain.body: I am thrilled about the job offer and am currently crafting my introductory emails to the team. I want these to reflect professionalism and confidence. How do you suggest I address these emails? Should I employ a more formal tone throughout?

email_chain.subject: Re: Exploring Email Communication for Job Offer Acceptance
email_chain.body: It's great to hear from you! For addressing your new colleagues, using their full name, such as 'Dear Mr. Ron Goldie,' is preferable. Avoid overly generic salutations like 'Dear Sir,' as they might seem impersonal. As for the tone, a balanced approach that is both professional and welcoming would be ideal.

email_chain.subject: Thank You for the Guidance
email_chain.body: Thank you for the clarification and suggestions on the salutations and tone. I will certainly follow this advice for crafting my introductory emails. Additionally, for formal communications such as sending an apology or rescheduling an interview, would you recommend an email or a conventional letter?

email_chain.subject: Re: Thank You for the Guidance
email_chain.body: For most communications including apologies or scheduling matters, emails are preferred due to their immediacy and efficiency. Formal letters are rarely necessary but might be used for very official communications. Ensure that your emails are concise, specific, and maintain a respectful tone.

email_chain.subject: Final Query: Confirming Details for Upcoming Recruitment Trip
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Goldie, I am confirming my travel arrangements for the recruitment process in London. I will be arriving from Paris on the 11th of November, approximately at 6:30 PM at Paris Nord. I would appreciate if you could arrange transport from the station to the hotel. Looking forward to our meeting.

Gaby

email_chain.subject: Re: Capacity and Scheduling for Lard Shipments

Thank you for your prompt response. The priority is to cover the additional shipping capacity for the 1,500MT from July 1st to August 10th due to the truck breakdown. Following that, we still need to ensure the rest of the 4,500MT can be transported from July 1st to August 15th from Busan to Davao.

Best regards,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: New Video Clipping Java Applet
email_chain.body: This email includes a new Java applet designed for video editing. The applet allows users to create a clip from a video file with a maximum length of 10 seconds. At the start of each clip, a 'Start' button appears. Pressing this button will play the clip, and it will change to 'Pause' if the video is paused, which can be resumed by clicking 'Start' again. Users can also slide through the video clip using a slider. The applet is compatible with Chrome, Firefox, and Internet Explorer.

email_chain.subject: Re: New Video Clipping Java Applet
email_chain.body: Thank you for the new applet. Can you confirm if there are any specific aspects of the applet's functionality or limitations we should be aware of during beta testing?

email_chain.subject: Testing the Video Clipping Applet
email_chain.body: When testing the applet, please focus on the reliability of the 'Start' and 'Pause' functionalities and the smoothness of the slider. Additionally, ensure compatibility checks across different browsers as mentioned and provide feedback on any discrepancies or issues encountered.

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Beta Testing Video Clipping Applet
email_chain.body: We've completed the initial round of testing. The applet performs well on Chrome and Firefox. However, some issues were noticed on Internet Explorer, particularly with the slider functionality not being as smooth. Further investigation might be needed.

email_chain.subject: Adjustments and Next Steps for Video Clipping Applet
email_chain.body: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We will address the issues on Internet Explorer and deploy an updated version of the applet. Please test the updated version when it's released and continue to provide feedback.

email_chain.body: Dear Max, Thank you for your prompt response. I am reviewing your proposal and will notify you soon about my decision. Best, Aisha

email_chain.subject: Regarding the Proposal Submission
email_chain.body: Aisha, Thank you for considering my proposal. Please take your time to review it. I am here to provide any further information you may need. Looking forward to your favorable reply. Regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Approval of Proposal and Next Steps
email_chain.body: Dear Max, I appreciate your promptness and would like to proceed with your services for the contract. It is essential this contract is completed within the coming few days. Please confirm if you are able to meet this deadline. Regards, Aisha

email_chain.subject: Capacity Confirmation for Shipping 500MT to Japan
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Dawson,

We are planning to send 500MT of sheets from the US to Japan next week and would like to confirm if you have the capacity. Please let me know if the schedule and the logistics can be arranged.

Thank you,
Hilda

email_chain.subject: Re: Capacity Confirmation for Shipping 500MT to Japan
email_chain.body:
Hello Hilda,

Thank you for your inquiry! Yes, we do have the capacity to ship 500 MT of sheets to Japan. The vessel, Convey 35, is expected to depart from Chicago on Thursday the 8th and arrive around the 15th. Please confirm this schedule works for you and send us the name of your buyer in Japan along with a purchase order or any other required documents.

Best regards,
Matyas

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Shipping Schedule and Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Dawson,

That schedule works for us. We will be loading the shipment from our Chicago warehouse today and it should arrive at the port around 10am tomorrow. Please confirm if this timing is suitable or if there are any special instructions for the loading.

Best,
Hilda

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Shipping Schedule and Details
email_chain.body:
Good morning Hilda,

Loading the shipment at the scheduled time tomorrow is perfectly fine. We will ensure that all arrangements are in place for the loading at the Chicago port. Looking forward to receiving your load confirmation.

Best regards,
Matyas

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation and Load Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Matyas,

Thank you, we will send the load confirmation and the required documents to your shipping team tomorrow around 10am. Please let us know if there is anything else we need to provide or prepare.

Sincerely,
Hilda

email_chain.subject: Cargo Delivery and Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Cunnane, I would like to confirm the expected delivery date for the cargo with UPS tracking number 4202000796458. Could you also confirm if the payment has been received? Best regards, Gerald

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Cancellation Request for Shipment UPS 4202000796458
email_chain.body: Hello, I would like to cancel the shipment for UPS 4202000796458 due to unconfirmed and incorrect information. It's urgent, as we need to deliver these goods by May 31st. Could you please inform us about the issue? Best Regards, Gerald

email_chain.subject: CONFIRM DELIVERY DATE UPS 4202000796458
email_chain.body: From the attached file, I have included information regarding the payment and the shipping details. This should help resolve the issues. Please refer to the file when responding. Best Regards, Gerald

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Cancellation Request for Shipment UPS 4202000796458
email_chain.body: Hi Gerald, I have checked the record and found that the parcel was shipped on April 22nd, and should be expected to be delivered in 5-10 days. Additionally, the payment was received on June 2nd. Please check the tracking number for precise information. Best regards, Mr. Cunnane

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo from Jubail to Salalah
email_chain.body: Good morning Matthieu, We are looking to charter a 7,100MT cargo of bitumen from Jubail to Salalah for delivery in 2 months. Could you offer your best freight idea and vessel? Regards, Hans

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry for Bitumen Cargo from Jubail to Salalah
email_chain.body: Dear Hans, We can offer various vessel types including ECO Type, Safety Ship Type, and a 20-year-old Clean Built Type. For exact rates, kindly check our website at http://www.kawashima-trading.com/BestPrices_2007-05-24.html and details are available at http://www.kawashima-trading.com/About.htm. Looking forward to your response. Best regards, Matthieu Kawashima, CEO, Kawashima Trading Corporation Inc.

email_chain.subject: Query on Pricing Details
email_chain.body: Hi Matthieu, Reviewing the prices for bitumen on your website, I noticed they are higher than current market rates; USD 32,000/MT FOB Gulf, compared to USD 27,000 typically seen lately. European prices also seem elevated compared to the USD 22,000/MT FOB seen there. Can you clarify these pricing disparities? My interest in the Japanese market remains strong, given my background in petroleum products. Thanks, Hans

email_chain.subject: RE: Query on Pricing Details
email_chain.body: Dear Hans, Thank you for your inquiry. The bitumen price, though appearing high, matches the recent surge in Europe. Despite fluctuations, we maintain competitive rates. Japan remains a vibrant market for bitumen, and we're optimistic about ongoing demand. For freight rates, please visit our website at http://www.kawashima-trading.com/Default.aspx?menuid=32#cargo/spot. Best, Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Confirming Freight Options
email_chain.body: Matthieu, We haven't received any viable offers from other ship owners. Given the pressing timelines to deliver at Osaka by the 1st and 4th of July, and subsequently to Port Said by August 7th, we are concerned about potential European shipping delays affecting vessel availability. Your assistance in confirming options would be invaluable. Regards, Hans

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Anwari,

Do you have a suitable vessel for transporting 10,000MT of sugar from Penang to Harare next week? We are interested in this particular cargo size and can make a partial payment upfront for the voyage. Looking forward to your prompt response.

Thank you,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Vessel Availability for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Oliver,

We have a vessel that can accommodate 10,000MT as excess capacity which is currently scheduled for transporting 65,000MT of sugar to Myanmar. If this arrangement suits your requirements, we can proceed with the necessary arrangements. Please confirm the date for the shipment at your earliest convenience. We are also in agreement with receiving a partial payment.

Regards,
Azim

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Vessel Availability for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Azim,

Thank you for your prompt response. We agree to proceed with the shipping arrangement on your vessel that's currently bound for Myanmar. Please confirm receipt of a 10% advance payment which will be treated as the third installment for this voyage.

We look forward to your confirmation to finalize the details.

Best regards,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Vessel Availability for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Oliver,

We confirm the receipt of your email regarding the 10% advance payment. Rest assured that all installments will be duly noted in our accounting. We will proceed with releasing the original bill of lading and inform you of the loaded sugar weight shortly. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
Azim

email_chain.subject: Request for Deionised Water Transportation from Germany to Lisbon

We need 4,200 MT of deionised water transported from a chemical plant in Germany to Lisbon. Could you arrange an FOB delivery to be picked up by an inland carrier?

Pat

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Deionised Water Transportation from Germany to Lisbon
email_chain.body:

Regarding the transportation, I am currently in touch with several local carriers specializing in liquid transport who can handle the water shipment to Lisbon. I will confirm the details and get back to you with the information on the freight forwarders.

Cheers,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Freight Rates Inquiry for Multiple Vessels
email_chain.body:
Hi Brakaldo,

Could you please provide the freight rates from Spain for the following vessels and respective commodities for a quantity of 50,000m3:
- Durban: LPG, any available date
- FOS: Naphtha, 1st September
- St. Johns: Naphtha, 3rd September
- Tripoli: Naphtha, 4th September

We're looking for competitive rates even if the price is high, provided the service meets our requirements. Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Required for U.S. Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Could you specify the type of products and their properties that need to be shipped to the United States? This information is essential for us to assess any special handling or regulations required, as well as to provide an accurate quote and suggestions for faster delivery methods. Our customer in Florida expects delivery within a month. Please provide these details at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Brakaldo Shipping

labels.vessel: Durban, FOS, St. Johns, Tripoli, Grand Cape

email_chain.subject: Update: Representative on Leave
email_chain.body:

I am writing to inform you that Mr. Green will be on leave starting tomorrow. I will be stepping in as your point of contact until we appoint a new representative. Please feel free to call me next week to discuss your needs, and I will ensure you are connected with our top representative.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Application for Sales Representative Role
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I am John Doe, Director of Sales at Palinka Company. Given our long-standing business relationship and my understanding of your need for a representative in your country, I would like to apply for this role. My credentials include:

1. A Bachelor's degree in Sales from University of North Carolina.
2. Seven years of experience in sales, being fluent in both English and Polish.
3. A consistent record of exceeding all targets set by my previous employer.

I am ready to relocate immediately with an initial salary expectation of $2000 per month. I look forward to your consideration.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Handling Your Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Lewis,

Further to our ongoing discussions, please let me know the amount you wish to transact and how urgently you need this to proceed. I will do my utmost to expedite the process.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Customs and Bond Requirement
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Daniel,

I was informed by Mr. John that his country's customs require a $1 million bond for each shipment, which is common in many client countries. He has been instructed to gather the necessary documentation to resolve any potential issues with customs.

Please advise on your next steps.

Thank you,
Jack Burns

email_chain.subject: Re: Customs and Bond Requirement
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. John,

As per Mr. Lewis's bank, please ensure the bond papers are obtained from the client's company as soon as possible. Kindly update me with your decision shortly.

Best regards,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Bond Papers Update
email_chain.body:
Good day sir,

Following recent communications with John, I have been informed that the bond papers will be authorized by his supervisor before dispatch. We aim to ship them on the next available flight. Please confirm the precise delivery address to ensure timely delivery.

Thank you and looking forward to continuing our successful business relationship.

Sincerely yours,
Daniel James

email_chain.subject: Invitation to Invest in Dry Bulk Shipping
email_chain.body: Hi M. Corbin, Do you plan to invest in dry bulk shipping? Our selection process has begun. Please let us know your thoughts on participating. Also, it seems your inbox is getting full. Could you please look into it? Thank you! Best regards, Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation to Invest in Dry Bulk Shipping
email_chain.body: Hello M. Corbin, Thanks for your query. The recent interest in 'dry bulk finance' particularly centered in Singapore suggests substantial capital inflows from banks and investment firms. However, whether these investments will yield higher returns for the sector remains uncertain. If you seek further insights into the risks and opportunities of this investment, please feel free to contact me. Regards, Anatoliy

email_chain.subject: Details on Dry Bulk Market Conditions
email_chain.body: Dear M. Corbin, The dry bulk finance market is expanding, encouraged by low interest rates and a rise in commodity demand. Nevertheless, these low rates often thin profit margins for shipping companies by enabling cheaper borrowing but limiting earned interest on revenues. Alongside, a dip in commodity demand could compel companies to maintain surplus inventory, adding to operational costs. An optimal strategy would be focusing on cost reduction for enhanced efficiency. Interested in exploring potential investment strategies? Best, Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Estimate - Diesel Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We have a request from a customer to ship 10,000MT of diesel from Port Klang to the Port of Vanikoro. Could you please provide us an estimate for voyage time, bunker cost, and insurance rate?

Best regards,
Irina

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate - Diesel Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Irina,

Thank you for reaching out. I will collate the required information and get back to you shortly with the estimated voyage time, bunker cost, and insurance rates for transporting 10,000MT of diesel from Port Klang to the Port of Vanikoro.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate - Diesel Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Irina,

Following up on your request, here are the estimated details:
- Voyage Time: Approximately 14 days
- Bunker Cost: USD 20,000
- Insurance Rate: 0.5% of cargo value

Please let me know if you need more details or further assistance.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate - Diesel Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the quick response and the detailed estimates. I will discuss this with our client and get back to you if we decide to go forward or if there are any changes.

Best regards,
Irina

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Vessel Capability and Cost for Clinker Transport
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Franco, Can your vessel accommodate the transportation of 10,000MT of clinker from Sohar to Mombasa? Additionally, do you use a bunker escalation clause, or is there a possibility to secure a fixed rate? Warm regards, Paula

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: I'm looking for any information on CO2/C2/15. Our broker has been unable to provide an immediate rate. Currently, the frequency of voyages is limited, only a few per year. We've seen market quotes around $25,000/tonne but none have been accepted for our company yet.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: We have no current cargoes available for CO2/C2/15, but we are actively working on securing some. Please stay tuned for updates.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: I will not take 'no' for an answer regarding CO2/C2/15! Please answer the following: 1. What is the daily rate? 2. What is the minimum booking/cargo requirement? 3. What details can you provide about the bunker clause? 4. What are the LCL specifics for CO2/H2/12 and grain-specific LCL? 5. What is the minimum volume for CO2/C2/15? 6. Are runs regular or sporadic?

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request on CO2/C2/15
email_chain.body: Unfortunately, I still don't have the details on the bunker clause, and rates for CO2/C2/15 and its variations remain undefined. Surprisingly, our contacts are also unaware of their rates, indicating perhaps some competitive concerns within your company. You might need to check with another carrier, as the information remains elusive.

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation for Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cortez,

This is to confirm that your payment has been successfully processed for the coal shipment scheduled from June 14 to July 15. We have recorded a value date of October 10, 2010, in our system. The delivery is scheduled within the stated parameters. Please retain this email for your records.

Best regards,
Keven Gorlin

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Heater Purchase

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Clothing Pallets
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Vargas, We'd like to schedule 200 pallets of clothing from Houston to Barcelona. Could you please inform us about the best week to send them to ensure timely arrival at the port? Additionally, we're interested in discussing if there are flexible options for insurance rates. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Insurance and Shipping Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello, I was recently in touch concerning the pallets of clothing intended for shipment to Lisbon, Portugal. What is your standard insurance coverage, and is it possible to extend it further if necessary? Also, can you provide the specific rate in advance for the shippers? Lastly, how long would it take for the shipment to reach the port of Lisbon? Thank you! John

email_chain.subject: Re: Insurance and Shipping Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello John, For shipments to Portugal, our standard insurance rate is $1.50 per kg, which can be increased up to $2.50 per kg for an additional fee of $1500, covering $3 per pallet. We also organize pickups in Dallas or Houston, which you'll need to arrange as soon as possible. Kind regards, Mr. Vargas

email_chain.subject: Shipment Loading Completed

Could you provide an accurate estimation of the departure date to Lisbon? I'm eager to get these products to market. Thank you for your assistance. John

email_chain.subject: Final Shipping Confirmation

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Shipping Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, Yes, we'll manage to get the 4 shipments to the port before 5pm on the 24th, as agreed. Please arrive at the warehouse by noon to ensure smooth processing. Regards, Mr. Vargas

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipment from Gdansk to Izmir

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipment from Gdansk to Izmir

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipment from Gdansk to Izmir

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Power Transmission Coils

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Power Transmission Coils
email_chain.body:
Dear Kevin,

No: 1
Description: Coil
Quantity: 1000MT
Unit: MTN
Length: 14000mm
Width: 2100mm
Height: 2200mm

Concerning the shipment, the delivery date of our vessel ranges from September 25, 2023, to September 30, 2023, depending on our vessel's estimated time of arrival (ETA). Could you let us know the earliest possible shipping date you can arrange? Also, the delivery date for your vessel to Gwangyang Port remains to be confirmed.

email_chain.subject: Order Placement and Terms Request

email_chain.subject: Request for Sample of Instant Meal for Kids

email_chain.subject: Re: Car Sale Confirmation

You can reach out to me directly anytime if you need assistance or have questions. Looking forward to a smooth transaction and future opportunities to work together. Best regards, Mr. Ye

email_chain.subject: Original question
email_chain.body:
Hello, 

Thank you for your willingness to assist. I am working on a college assignment and need some guidance with the code I have written. Here's what I have so far: 

if (data < 200)
  print 'data is low'
else
  print 'data is high'

I would appreciate it if you could check this for me.

Thanks in advance,
The Chapman

email_chain.subject: Respond to email
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Chapman,

I hope your problem has been solved with the information I previously sent, but if you have any more questions, please do not hesitate to ask.

Also, here's an example on how to create a loop in a script:
for (i = 0; i <= 10; i++) {
    print i
}

Sincerely,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Thank you for helping me
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Chapman,

Thank you for the help. I figured it out.

Thanks,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Closing Response
email_chain.body:
Mr. Chapman,

Thank you for your response. I am glad we could resolve it.

Kind regards,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Freight Quote

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Additional Transport
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Urea Purchase and Shipment
email_chain.body:

We are planning to load approximately 600 tonnes of Urea from Bandar Lampung to Java into bulk carriers. We anticipate the first shipment date to be July 10th, with a subsequent shipment scheduled for two weeks later. Could you please confirm if these dates are feasible for you?

Best Regards,
Eddie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Urea Purchase and Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chen,

It was great receiving your offer last Friday. Our company, Volero Agri Indonesia, is looking to purchase 600 tons of fertilizer for delivery at Lumajang on Java island. I would like to schedule a meeting next Thursday at your Jakarta office to finalize the details. Please confirm if this is convenient for you, and I will coordinate with our local office to confirm the loading and pickup details.

Many thanks for your prompt attention, and I look forward to our meeting next week.

Best wishes,
Eddie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Purchase and Shipment Coordination
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chen,

Thank you for your email today. I have checked with our local office and they will be sending a letter to confirm our agreement regarding the requirement for us to load 600 tons of fertilizer. We will contact you with further details as soon as they are available. I am looking forward to our meeting on August 24th in Jakarta.

Best wishes,
Eddie

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Requested for Fertilizer Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chen,

I wrote to you on August 13 seeking confirmation for the delivery details of our fertilizer shipment scheduled for August 24th in Jakarta. I appreciate your prompt reply on the same day. Could you please confirm that all the details I have sent are correct? We will get in touch as soon as we receive further information.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Eddie

email_chain.subject: Awaiting Update on Fertilizer Shipment Agreement
email_chain.body:

I referred back to your email on August 13 and am still awaiting confirmation from our local office regarding our agreement. Could you please advise if they have sent you the confirmation letter and if you are holding to confirm the shipment details I provided? Your website is very impressive, and I appreciate the service that you are providing.

Best regards,
Eddie

Joanna

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping of Abrasive Materials - Arrival Slot Confirmation

Could you please confirm if the loading of materials will be complete by Wednesday? Upon your confirmation, we will finalize the delivery schedule and inform you of the number of vehicles needed for picking up this large shipment.

Yours faithfully,
Rachel

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping of Abrasive Materials - Delivery and Loading Time Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your reply, Rachel!

We will indeed ensure that all materials are ready and loaded by 9:00 AM on Wednesday. We will await your confirmation on the vehicle arrangements.

Best regards,
Andrew

Bahl Crew

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Crude from Belawan to Penang
email_chain.body: Hello, We're looking to ship approximately 4,000 MT of crude from Belawan to Penang. Could you let us know if loading by the 12th is possible and also provide the loading rate per hour? Cheers, Victoria Chan Canac Pacific Pte. Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Crude from Belawan to Penang
email_chain.body: Hi Ms Chan, I’m currently away from the office and will return next Tuesday. Could you please contact me via my cellphone at +64 642-7854 in the meantime? Regards.

email_chain.subject: Request for Information Retrieval
email_chain.body: Hello, I was wondering if you could confirm whether any emails or letters were received regarding our inquiry? If yes, please specify which ones, including the date and time they were received. I would also appreciate it if you could remind me of the name of your company. Many thanks for your assistance, Nicholas Dombi The Banana Community, USA.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Information Retrieval
email_chain.body: Hello Nick, Regarding your request for personal information, I saw the form addressed to Mr. Ray White at 1 Sturt Street, Port Melbourne, indicating Victoria Chan's name but at a different address. It appears there was some confusion, as I assume the required info is related to a previous correspondence and not for rental services. Nick, could you clarify your intent with this request? Regards.

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Chemical Dispersants for Oil Spill Clean-Up
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ambrose,

I hope this message finds you well. I recently observed ongoing clean-up efforts in the Gulf of Mexico following the significant oil spill earlier this summer. The situation underscores the need to address the environmental impact promptly.

For the clean-up, an estimated 40,000 tons of chemical dispersants are required to effectively manage the spill. We are considering strategies to contain the crude oil, with an eye on meeting the demands of leading oil corporations, including those with substantial operations in the Gulf, such as Chevron.

Could you provide guidance on acquiring the necessary dispersants? Furthermore, arrangements for the transport vessel to deliver these chemicals will also be needed.

Looking forward to your insights and assistance in coordinating these efforts.

Best regards,
[Sender's Full Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Chemical Dispersants for Oil Spill Clean-Up
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out concerning our dispersant needs. Could you please specify the types of dispersants available? Additionally, how can we monitor and control the dispersant spread in the marine environment once applied?

Best regards,
Ms. Ambrose

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Chemical Dispersants for Oil Spill Clean-Up
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ambrose,

We appreciate your prompt response. Currently, we have a stockpile of chemical dispersants ready for dispatch. The use of these dispersants can be managed by dispersing them into the water column, an approach that allows for modulating the depth and concentration effectively.

While chemical dispersants are our primary method, we also have in-situ burning as a secondary option; however, it remains under testing and awaits approval. This technique offers more control over the burning depth, thereby localizing its environmental impact.

Let us know how you wish to proceed.

Best regards,
[Sender's Full Name]

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote (Los Angeles Shipment)
email_chain.body:
Hello Ivan,

We are preparing to ship 15,500MT of MGB xanthate from Port Klang to Los Angeles. Please include both ocean and inland transportation rates in your quotation, along with the vessel schedule.

Regards,
Jun

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote (Los Angeles Shipment)
email_chain.body:
Hello Jun,

I have a quick question before proceeding further. Our mutual T&C generally include EPC terms that may not cover customs clearance. I need to confirm that this doesn't affect the costs we've previously discussed. I will check with our legal team and revert back to you shortly.

Cheers,
Ivan

email_chain.subject: Freight Terms and Conditions Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Jun,

Please find attached the price list and freight terms & conditions for your review. Let me know which terms specifically you are examining so that I can coordinate with our Sales Head for approval.

Thank you,
Ignacio

email_chain.subject: Clarification on EPC Terms and Customs Clearance
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your patience. Please rest assured, the terms and conditions, including customs clearance charges, are taken into account in our initial FOB pricing, ensuring that it will not affect the final cost. 

Hope this clarifies your concern.

Best regards,
Ivan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity for Nuts and Bolts
email_chain.body:

We have a cargo of 3,500MT of nuts and bolts that needs to be shipped from Amsterdam to Budapest next month. Could you please let me know if you have any capacity available? Additionally, could you provide details on your demurrage charges?

Thanks,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity for Nuts and Bolts
email_chain.body:

Great hearing about the deal. I believe we can manage your cargo. I'm currently working to secure a vessel within this month. Attached is a proforma invoice for your review.

Ali

email_chain.subject: Agreement on Price and Payment Terms
email_chain.body:

Thank you for the quick response. Our client has agreed to a price of €350,000, plus an additional €50,000 for insurance and port fees. Payment should be completed within 20 days. Please inform us when we can expect the payment from your end.

Best regards,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Update on Payment and Delivery Preferences
email_chain.body:
Mr. Hayes,

No worries about the delay. Last week, I sent you details regarding our client’s preferred method of payment and delivery. Could you please confirm if these are in order?
