email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Quick Response
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Harper,

I must commend your extraordinary response time. Your assistance has been crucial for our client’s decision-making. Your expertise in the field is truly appreciated.

Thank you,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Payment Process
email_chain.body:
Mr. Harper,

I must inform you that Nick cannot wait 20 days for the balance payment. He has clearly stated from the start that he is not inclined to incur interest fees. We need to find an alternative solution promptly or consider canceling the shipment.

Regards,
Lenny

email_chain.subject: Transport Inquiry for Diesel Fuel from Jakarta to Port Blair
email_chain.body:

We have a cargo of 6,000MT of diesel fuel intended to be shipped from Jakarta to Port Blair in early March. Could you please provide a general freight estimate? Additionally, could you inform us about your preferred demurrage policy?

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Oil Shipping Details
email_chain.body:

Please confirm the appropriate loading berth, demurrage policy, and any necessary documents as previously discussed in our email dated 29/01.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Cost Estimation Request to Jebel Ali
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Beck,

Can you please provide an estimate for the cost of shipping a 2,000MT shipment of sand and gravel from New Orleans to Jebel Ali? Additionally, could you submit a final offer within a week?

Regards,
Khalid

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipping Estimates
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Beck,

Thank you for providing the initial estimates. Could you please consolidate them into a single estimate which captures the cheapest option available for each type of shipment?

Regards,
Khalid

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Shipping Estimates
email_chain.body:
Dear Khalid,

No, I'm afraid combining different shipment types into one estimate is not possible as it would actually increase the overall cost compared to choosing a single type of service.

Best regards,
Mr. Beck

email_chain.subject: Insurance Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Beck,

Could you please inform me of the insurance rates for a 2,000MT shipment of sand and gravel from New Orleans to Jebel Ali? As I am new to this process, I aim to secure a favorable deal.

Regards,
Khalid

email_chain.subject: Re: Insurance Rates Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Khalid,

The insurance rate for a 2,000MT shipment of sand and gravel from New Orleans to Jebel Ali will be $3,000. It's advisable to consider whether the insurance cost justifies the overall expenditure of the shipment.

Best regards,
Mr. Beck

email_chain.subject: Total Price Inquiry for Sand and Gravel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Beck,

Could you kindly provide the total price including insurance for shipping 2,000MT of sand and gravel from New Orleans to Jebel Ali?

Regards,
Khalid

email_chain.subject: Re: Total Price Inquiry for Sand and Gravel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Khalid,

The total cost to ship 2,000MT of sand and gravel from New Orleans to Jebel Ali, including insurance, will be $1,200.

Best regards,
Mr. Beck

email_chain.subject: Discussion on City's Five-Year Goals
email_chain.body:
Hello Commissioner Kennedy,

I am writing to you on behalf of the local Chamber of Commerce. We have developed a comprehensive list of goals for our city for the next five years and are eager to discuss how these align with the city's business priorities. I've attached the document outlining our goals and would appreciate the opportunity to discuss them with you in detail.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions prior to our meeting.

Thank you.
Kevin W. Murphy

email_chain.subject: Five-Year City Development Plan
email_chain.body:
Dear Commissioner Kennedy,

I am pleased to share with you the detailed five-year plan we've developed for our city, emphasizing our commitment to making our community a better place to live. The attached goals are specific and thoughtfully prepared, and we are hopeful that you will support our vision.

I look forward to our upcoming meeting and am eager to hear your feedback and suggestions.

Best Regards,
President of the Chamber of Commerce

email_chain.subject: Request for Input on the City's Five-Year Plan
email_chain.body:
Dear Commissioner Kennedy,

As Mayor, I am reaching out to gather your insights on the proposed five-year plan for our city. We have identified several critical issues that we aim to address within this period. By collaborating effectively, I believe we can achieve these goals, and your input would be invaluable.

I look forward to your thoughts and suggestions.

Best regards,
Mayor

email_chain.subject: Discussion of City's Five-Year Improvement Goals
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I hope this message finds you well. As the new Chairperson of the City Council, I have been proactively working towards setting actionable goals to enrich our city life over the next five years. I am keen to discuss these initiatives with you and would value your opinions on them.

Looking forward to your feedback.
Best,
Chairperson of the City Council

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Discharge Procedure for Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body:

With kind regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Discharge Procedure for Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Farah,

The coverage provided by our letter of credit extends from port to the final destination. However, you will need to arrange for the customs declaration in Istanbul.

Regards,
Murray
Managing Director
Logistics Constructions Pty Ltd
Phone: 0415 461 923
info@logcon.com.au
Services: Sea and air freight, customs declarations, risk management.

email_chain.subject: Discrepancy in Delivery and Invoice Documentation
email_chain.body:
Dear LCL Operator,

Upon reviewing the last shipment delivered to Colombo, I have observed several discrepancies that prevent us from processing payment. The details are as follows:
1) Invoice number and date of delivery do not match with the consignment records. Attached delivery notes exhibit identical invoice numbers erroneously tied to multiple consignments.
2) In another instance, the invoice number on the delivery note differs from our records.
3) Repeated occurrence where the invoice number does not correspond with the listed consignments.
Please address these issues at your earliest convenience.

Best regards.

email_chain.subject: RE: Chemical Spill at Railyard
email_chain.body:
Hello,
My name is Jane Doe and I work for ExxonMobil. We've had an incident involving a derailment of tank cars which resulted in a chemical spill of 100,000 lbs. into the Kanawha River. Governor Tomblin has declared a state of emergency in Jackson and Kanawha counties, West Virginia. Additionally, due to this event, the port operations for the vessel Cosco Kuwait are halted this weekend. Could you please let us know if there is any vessel space available? Thank you.
Best regards,
Jane Doe

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Urgent Request for Vessel Space due to Chemical Spill
email_chain.body:
Dear Team,
Following up on my email from yesterday regarding the chemical spill into the Kanawha River, we are in a critical situation as the afflicted area is non-navigable. Besides, the operators at the Oil Terminal in Point Pleasant are considering an emergency discharge into the creek. Virginians for a Natural Gas Free America are lobbying for state emergency declaration to shut down the Dominion Natural Gas Pipeline comprising the Richmond area. Your advice and assistance on the availability of an alternate vessel would be greatly appreciated.
Kind regards,
Jane Doe

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Liquid Butane Transport from Melbourne to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Carson, I'd like to check the rates and necessary schedule for transporting 10,000MT of liquid butane from Melbourne to New Orleans. Could you also inform if this needs to load mid-month to ensure timely execution? Thanks, Brian

email_chain.subject: Request for Rates and Lead Times for 1000 MT Liquid Butane from Melbourne to New Orleans
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Johnson, I am looking into shipping rates for 1000 MT of liquid butane from Melbourne to New Orleans. Could you provide me information on the rates and available lead times? Thanks, Brian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Rates for 10,000 MT Liquid Butane from New Orleans to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Owens, I am interested in learning about the transport rates and lead times for 10,000 MT of liquid butane to be sent from New Orleans to Melbourne. Could you please let me know your conditions? Thanks, Brian

email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry for 10,000 MT Liquid Butane Shipment from New Orleans to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Johnson, Could you provide me with the rates and lead times for a shipment of 10,000 MT of liquid butane from New Orleans to Melbourne? Thank you, Brian

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body: Hi Max, We’re considering an opportunity to ship 2,200MT of salt from Spain to Bahrain. Are you available to provide a quote and a shipping schedule? Warmly, Karen

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body: You’re in luck, Karen! Our logistics and procurement teams are just about ready to evaluate your opportunity. Once we’ve completed our analysis, I’ll get back to you with a quotation within a day or two. Warmly, Drew

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body: Hi Drew, Just a follow-up on our upcoming opportunity. We will be completing the paperwork within the next few days, so we’re ready to lock in your rate when you’re ready to offer your quote. Best, Karen

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body: Thanks, Karen! We’ll send our price proposal as soon as possible. In the meantime, please contact me when you’re ready to ship. Warmly, Drew

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipment from Arica to Barcelona
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Sol, We’re looking at a shipment of 2,500 MT of soybean meal from Arica to Barcelona. Do you handle biodiesel on owners’ account, and can you accommodate a 5-day laycan extension? Thank you, Jule

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about shipment from Arica to Barcelona
email_chain.body: Hello Jule, Great to hear from you. For any further inquiry regarding our bulk trade, please contact my colleague, Mr. Irving Lim. He has taken over my business development tasks, now that I’m busy with upcoming litigation. Hope that all’s going well in your neck of the woods! Best, Mr. Sol

email_chain.subject: Handling Your Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Jule, As for the requested BOD shipment from Guayaquil to Koper, the ship will set sail on September 6, and is expected to arrive in Koper on October 13. As the said shipment falls within my new business scope, I would be honored if you could arrange for the release and delivery of the cargo to our appointed intermediary. Please advise the schedule for cargo delivery. Best regards, Irving Lim, Epsiquio Shipping Services AG

email_chain.subject: Finalization of the BOD Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Epsiquio, Regarding the commodity request from Mr. Sol, the BOD shipment will arrive in Koper on October 13. I have already informed our appointed intermediary. Please advise when the release and delivery of the cargo can be arranged. I'm looking forward to your response. Best, Irving Lim, Epsiquio Shipping Services AG

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of the BOD Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body: Hello Irving, You asked if we can come over and sign off on the PD shipment to be delivered to Maassluis. I’d like to confirm that we’re planning to come over on 1 November. The vessel is expected to arrive in Rotterdam on October 27. Best regards, Epsiquio Shipping Services AG

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of PD Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Epsiquio, Thank you for the confirmation regarding the delivery schedule of the PD cargo. I’m glad that everything is going smoothly. Our attention is always focused on your requests and corresponding requirements. We look forward to cooperating with you in the future. Best wishes, Irving Lim, Epsiquio Shipping Services AG

email_chain.subject: Feed Barley Shipment from Nador to Ningbo in November
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Gibson, We are looking to ship 600MT of feed barley from Nador to Ningbo in November. Could you please provide us with the earliest laycan you can guarantee? Regards, Fadi

email_chain.subject: Re: Your Nador Shipment Query
email_chain.body: Hi Samer, I'm very sorry, but our vessel in Nador is currently occupied and is headed to Europe shortly. Unfortunately, there are no other shipping options available from Nador at this time. The earliest possible timeframe I can offer for an alternative arrangement would be the second week of November. Regards, Fadi

email_chain.subject: Trans-shipment Query for Nov. 10th
email_chain.body: Hi again Fadi, Just wondering if we still stand on the November 10th option for trans-shipping to Ningbo from Jebel Ali Port? Regards, Samer

email_chain.subject: Availability at Tanjung Pelepas
email_chain.body: Hey Fadi, Just giving you a heads up that we have a reservation to load 75MT feed barley at Tanjung Pelepas on Friday, November 5th. We could transport your freight but need confirmation to secure a spot because the earliest we can get to the port is Saturday, November 6th. Let me know if this works for you. Thank you, Sharif

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargo Weight and Freight Adjustment for May Shipments
email_chain.body:
Hello Dr. Moreno,
Could you provide the weight for 8,000MT of BTI pulp that is scheduled to arrive at Damen via Colombo, Panama, Suez on the 21st of May? Additionally, are there any possibilities to adjust the freight arrangements for May 10th?
Sincerely,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Transit Time Update through Panama Canal
email_chain.body:
Hello Dr. Moreno,
I thought it would be helpful to update you on our Panama Canal transit times. The current estimated time is sitting at 31 hours, which might allow for an earlier arrival in Colombo. I will keep you posted with further updates.
Best regards,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Response to Transit Time Update and Freight Proposal
email_chain.body:
Dear Dana,
Thank you for the update. Despite your optimistic estimate, we have not observed favorable transit times on that day. Nevertheless, we've arranged for a backup container. There is also an option to dispatch a smaller volume of BTI pulp with considerably shorter transit times. We haven't proposed a payment adjustment yet, but if you wish to suggest one, we will consider it and let you know the feasible solution.
Best,
Dr. Moreno

email_chain.subject: Request Information for Early Departure on May 10th
email_chain.body:
Please let me know if there's any arrangement possible for the early departure on May 10th or 11th.
Sincerely,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Update: Freight Commitment for May 18th
email_chain.body:
Hi Dr. Moreno,
Thank you for your offer. We are interested in proceeding with it but cannot commit fully until we know the exact volume we're able to ship on that date. We are still awaiting the container from Colombo, expected by Wednesday. Once we receive confirmation about our cargo volume, I will promptly get back to you regarding the shipment arrangement for May 10th.
Thanks again for all your assistance.
Best regards,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Lower Rate Offer for May 9th and 10th
email_chain.body:
Dear Dana,
I'm pleased to confirm our discussion. We can offer a lower freight rate for the 9th and 10th of this month. However, please note that we can only dispatch the cargo no earlier than May 18th, as the exact volume of BTI pulp you are shipping is yet to be determined.
Kind regards,
Dr. Moreno

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for Crude Shipment
email_chain.body: In London, we have a 200,000 MT crude shipment from the US Gulf of Mexico to China via the Suez Canal. Can you confirm if your vessel can load by week 16 and commence laycan by week 17? Additionally, we have a 100,000 MT shipment of crude from the Middle East to the US Gulf of Mexico via the Suez Canal. Could you confirm if your vessel can handle this load by week 15 and laycan by week 16? Kind regards, Marius

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for Crude Shipment
email_chain.body: Thank you for your message. Please confirm the schedule for our vessel, Afrindia FSRU, which is chartered by an Asian partner. It is set to load approximately 250,000m3 of crude on Monday, 11th May 2020 and be cleared for sail by Tuesday, 12th May 2020, under a time charter. Kind regards, Marnie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for Crude Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Marnie, Thank you for your reply. I am currently operating in the China/Asia region and am not involved in the chartering negotiations. Kindly contact the chartering partner directly. They will be able to provide the necessary assistance. Regards, Marius

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Chartering Party
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email. Please note that this charter concerns Matson Steamship Co, Inc (Matson Line). Kindly contact them directly regarding this matter. Kind regards, Marnie

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Clarification on Chartering Party
email_chain.body: Please refer to the previous email we sent you regarding contacting the chartering party. It seems there was a misunderstanding in our correspondence. Regards, Support Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipment from Antwerp to Liverpool, April Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. O'Donnell,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to arrange a shipment of 5,000MT of base chemicals from Antwerp to Liverpool. Could you please confirm if your vessel is available for a mid-April laycan, and provide the associated costs?

Best regards,
Lorena

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Shipment from Antwerp to Liverpool, April Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Lorena,

Thank you for reaching out. We can accommodate your shipment with a laycan starting on the 7th of April. The rate would be $10,000 per vessel. Please let me know if this suits your plans.

Kind regards,
Brendan

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Shipment from Antwerp to Liverpool, April Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Brendan,

Thank you for your prompt response. I will discuss this with our Managing Director and get back to you soon.

Best regards,
Lorena

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Speedboat Transfer
email_chain.body:
Hello Shadrack,

I would like to inquire about arranging a speedboat transfer for three people from Lagos to Johannesburg. Could you provide me with the cost for this service? Thank you.

Best regards,
Danny

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Speedboat Transfer
email_chain.body:
Dear Danny,

Thank you very much for your inquiry about the speedboat transfer. Unfortunately, I must inform you that a direct transfer by speedboat from Lagos to Johannesburg is not feasible due to the nature of the geography as Johannesburg is not accessible by sea.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Best regards,
Shadrack

email_chain.subject: Invoice Issue

I would like to send you an invoice for the services rendered. Please confirm the amount and provide any further details required.

Thanks,
[Sender's Name]

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Richards Bay to Durban Transport
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Richards Bay to Durban Transport
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipping Query: Durban to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:

We’d like to load 8,000MT of gasoil from Durban to Richards Bay. Would you confirm your earliest laycan, and is port dues included in your quote?

email_chain.subject: Assistance with LNG carrier rates and chartering a product tanker
email_chain.body: The market for LNG carriers seems to be tightening. Could you provide insights on where you foresee the rates heading in the next 2-3 months? Additionally, we are looking to charter a product tanker with a capacity of 20,000 DWT to transport Liquid Petroleum Gas from Georgia to Trieste. I would appreciate it if you could assist us in finding a suitable vessel for this charter. Many thanks, Lily

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with LNG carrier rates and chartering a product tanker
email_chain.body: Many thanks for your email, Lily. With the current market demand, I will keep an eye on the LNG carrier rates and also start searching for a suitable product tanker for your needs. We have received several requests for barge charters recently, so there should be options available. I will get back to you as soon as I find something that meets your specifications.

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Assistance with LNG carrier rates and chartering a product tanker
email_chain.body: Thank you for your prompt response. We will continue to monitor the LNG prices closely. Also, given the consistent and increasing demand for crude oil in Southern China, receiving competitive rates remains a priority for us. Thanks again for your efforts. Best regards, Lily

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry from Manila to Shanghai for Hydrogen Sulphide
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Pinkus,

We have a quantity of 1,800MT of hydrogen sulphide to ship from Manila to Shanghai. Could you please confirm your earliest laycan slot and clarify if you quote under CIF terms?

Thanks,
Margaret

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry from Manila to Shanghai for Hydrogen Sulphide
email_chain.body:
Hello Margaret,

Thanks for your inquiry dated January 9th. Please find attached our bid under DAP terms. I understand this might not be what you were looking for. However, I wanted to check if you might consider DDP terms for your shipment.

Thanks,
Weiming

email_chain.subject: DDP Quote for Your Hydrogen Sulphide Shipment to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hello Margaret,

I've reviewed your requirement for shipping 1,800MT of hydrogen sulphide from Manila to Shanghai. Apologies for the slight delay; we can offer a DDP quote of $10,000. I am currently engaged in other projects, but I will send more details soon.

Best regards,
Robert Jones

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Antimony Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Donohoe, 

Can you provide your freight rate for a 1,400MT shipment of antimony from Cairo to Sunderland with an expected transit time of 22 days?

Cheers,
Jing

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Jack, 

I am glad to hear from you! I got your previous message regarding the interesting rate. Could you please provide the freight rate for a 200,000MT shipment of cobalt ore from Congo to China?

Cheers,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Request to Include My Previous Response
email_chain.body: Hello Emily, Did you read my recent email? Could you please include my previous response in this correspondence? Thank you, Ousmane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Include My Previous Response
email_chain.body: Hi Ousmane, Thank you for your email. Can you clarify which specific email you are referencing so I can include the appropriate response? Best regards, Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Include My Previous Response
email_chain.body: Hey Emily, I think you forgot to include my response in the email I forwarded to you. Please include it in this email! Thanks, Ousmane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Include My Previous Response
email_chain.body: Dear Emily, I forwarded you my email. It would be great if you could include my response in this email. Thank you, Ousmane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Include My Previous Response
email_chain.body: Dear Emily, Can you please include your response to my email in this one? Thank you, Ousmane

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Include My Previous Response
email_chain.body: Dear Emily, I responded to your email and I would like for you to include my response in this email. Thank you, Ousmane

email_chain.subject: Request for Bulk Chemical Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Michael,

Can you assist us with transporting 3,000MT of bitumen from the Mediterranean to North America? What would be the per-day rate, and would you offer insurance under DAP terms?

Kind regards,
Pietro

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Request for Bulk Chemical Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Michael,

I wanted to follow up on my previous email regarding the transportation of bulk chemicals with SPS. Could you please respond at your earliest convenience to discuss? Thanks!

Best regards,
Pietro

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Options - Sulfuric Acid Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Amit,

Could you provide the landed cost information for shipping 4,000MT of sulfuric acid from Manzanillo to South Texas? Do you have any vessel options available?

Thanks,
Sally

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Vessel Options - Sulfuric Acid Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sally,

No problem, I'm currently working on your quote for the sulfuric acid shipment. Here are the available vessel options:

1. Magenta - Cheapest option, longer transit time
   Transit Time: 37 days
   Freight Cost: $5,990

2. PCT - Fastest vessel, though quite expensive
   Transit Time: 26 days
   Freight Cost: $29,990

The vessel from Magenta will set sail on January 15th. Please ensure your security letter for customs is ready by then.

Regards,
Amit

email_chain.subject: RE: Manzanillo to Corpus Christi – FOB Sulfuric Acid
email_chain.body:
Hello Amit,

Thank you for the details. Unfortunately, my security letter was not ready for the January 15th sail date. We are working on getting it approved in time for the next available date.

Please keep me updated on the sailing schedules.

Thanks again!
Sally

email_chain.subject: RE: Manzanillo to Corpus Christi – FOB Sulfuric Acid
email_chain.body:
Hi Amit,

Please confirm that we are still on track for the January 31st sail date with Magenta. We received our security letter today, so everything is set on our end.

Thanks,
Sally

email_chain.subject: RE: Manzanillo to Corpus Christi – FOB Sulfuric Acid
email_chain.body:
Hi Sally,

That's great news about your security letter. I will confirm with Magenta regarding the January 31st sail date and get back to you as soon as I have a confirmation.

Also, please find attached a link to our latest newsletter, which might be of interest to you.

Regards,
Amit

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: Crude Oil Shipping from Montara to Asaba
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Mahadevan, Thank you for providing your most recent rates for carrying crude oil from Montara to Asaba. My client is considering your shipment plan, and would like you to provide us a shipping price for two shipments of crude oil. The first shipment consists of 60,000MT scheduled to leave Montara on the 17th of December. We would like to receive your price quotation by 5:00 PM of the 13th. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. Sincerely, Rishi

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Crude Oil Shipping from Montara to Asaba
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Rishi, Thank you for your inquiry. We're happy to cater to your transportation needs. Attached is a competitive quote for the two shipments of crude oil from Montara to Asaba. The first shipment is scheduled as desired, and we’re ready to maintain this timeline. My client expects the first delivery by January 18th. We'd like you to confirm this shipment schedule by 12:00 PM of the 20th of December. Sincerely, Rashida

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation Required: Crude Oil Shipments Schedule
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Rishi, I am confirming the details as previously discussed. The first shipment of 60,000MT is expected to arrive at the terminal on the 19th of January. Please find the attached quotation which includes all the necesssary logistics details. Ensure the delivery of these shipments by confirming the service by 12:00 PM of the 22nd of December. Thank you for your prompt response to this matter. Sincerely, Rachael

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Cold Storage Units
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Jones,

This is Joe from the cold chain team. We have a request for an additional five tonnes of cold storage units from Yangon to Weymouth. Confirmation will follow soon. Stay safe.

Cheers,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Temperature Controlled Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Jones,

We have received a new request from a client in Britain for the transport of one thousand tonnes of temperature-controlled units to be delivered to the south coast by Monday morning. If you have any spare units, we would appreciate your support.

Please let me know if this is possible.

Cheers,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Request for a Phone Meeting
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Jones,

I hope this message finds you well. I was hoping to discuss a few updates and check in with you over the phone. Would you be available this afternoon around 3:00 PM?

Thanks,
Marcus

email_chain.subject: Availability for a Quick Call Today
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Jones,

I have some updates to share with you and was wondering if you might have time to talk this afternoon. Please let me know if you’re available for a brief discussion.

Hope that’s okay.
Matt

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Previous Messages
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Jones,

Apologies for our multiple messages. I wanted to touch base and see if you have time this afternoon for a quick chat to discuss several matters.

Would you be available for a quick phone call today?

Thanks,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Cold Storage Units
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Jones,

We urgently require additional cold storage units from Bangkok to Guernsey by tomorrow morning. Could you please confirm if this would be possible?

Thanks for your help.
Cheers,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Request for Immediate Transfer of Units
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Jones,

Could you arrange for the units we need to be sent from Yangon to Plymouth tomorrow morning? Your assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you very much.
Joe

email_chain.subject: Immediate Requirement of Units
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Jones,

We need to transfer units from Phnom Penh to Cardiff by 4:00 PM tomorrow. Could you please confirm availability and arrangement?

Thanks,
Matt

labels.commodity: Cold storage units, Temperature controlled units

email_chain.subject: Re: Desk Item
email_chain.body: Mr. Whitten, This is a follow-up to my previous email regarding our shipment. I'm concerned that our shipment will be delayed by a week. If you've got availability in the middle of next month, please let me know so we can reschedule accordingly. Kindest regards, Brandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Desk Item
email_chain.body: Mr. Whitten, I apologize for my delayed response. I've been busy with prior commitments. The desk item is now prepared for shipment and I plan to dispatch it to you on Monday. Regards, Brandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Desk Item
email_chain.body: Mr. Whitten, The desk item has arrived and we loaded it onto the dock yesterday. It's currently en route to you. Sincerely, Brandy

email_chain.subject: Desk Item Arrived
email_chain.body: Mr. Whitten, Thank you for the shipment coordination. I'll be at the dock this Monday afternoon and will give you a call just before we leave. I'll also confirm once we have arrived at the destination. Regards, Brandy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipping 3,500MT FOB from Daesan to Kaohsiung
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Park,

I am interested in shipping 3,500MT of [insert commodity] from Daesan to Kaohsiung under FOB terms. Could you handle this? Additionally, could you inform me about any potential weather-related delays that might affect the schedule?

Regards,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about shipping 3,500MT FOB from Daesan to Kaohsiung
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Thank you for reaching out. We are glad to assist you with the shipment of [insert commodity] from Daesan to Kaohsiung. We have strong relationships with local factories in Daesan, ensuring a timely supply. Regarding the weather conditions, we monitor them closely and currently, we do not foresee any significant delays. Our network of ships and container ports is robust, allowing us to effectively manage any necessary route adjustments due to inclement weather.

We look forward to your confirmation to proceed further.

Best regards,
Park

email_chain.subject: Addendum: Alternative arrangements for [insert commodity]
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Upon reviewing our current capabilities, I must inform you that we are presently unable to process new contracts directly for [insert commodity]. However, we are eager to assist you by connecting you with a reliable and experienced partner in the region who specializes in imports from Daesan to Kaohsiung. Our strong relationships with numerous local importers and exporters allow us to recommend partners who can meet your specific needs efficiently.

Please let us know if you would like us to facilitate this introduction.

Best regards,
Park

email_chain.subject: Update on Operations and New Sales Office
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Singh, I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to share a quick update on our operations. In October 2024, we successfully shipped over 1,000 tanks of LPG and 300 MT of vegetable oil from Saudi Arabia to Vietnam. We are scheduled to ship an additional 300 tanks of LPG and 200 MT of vegetable oil in January 2025. Additionally, we just opened a new sales office in Tokyo. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions about our recent shipments or our new operations in Tokyo. Best regards, Nathan

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Singh, This email serves as formal confirmation that the shipment of 1,000 tanks of LPG and 300 MT of vegetable oil from Saudi Arabia to Vietnam was successfully loaded and scheduled as planned. We are also on track for the additional shipping to Vietnam in January 2025. Please do not hesitate to reach out with any questions or concerns. Best regards, Jacob Smith

email_chain.subject: Response to Updates and New Tokyo Office
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Singh, We appreciate the updates on our recent shipments. Our team is particularly excited about the opportunities that have opened up with the new sales office in Tokyo. Please let us know if you have any further questions or need more information. Best regards, Charles

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Update
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Singh, As a follow-up, this email confirms the details of the previously mentioned shipments discussed by Nathan and Jacob. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or need further clarification. Best regards, Eric Smith

labels.cargo_size: 1300 tanks of LPG, 500 MT of Vegetable Oil

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Lumpsum Rate - Furnace Oil Shipment

Perla

email_chain.subject: Enquiry about Return Cargo from Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Janowski,

I'm hoping to arrange transport for 4,200MT of grain from Manzanillo to Salalah. Do you have any return cargo from Salalah to fill up the vessel and avoid sending it back empty? It would be greatly beneficial.

Thanks,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry about Return Cargo from Salalah
email_chain.body:
Hello Mike,

Nice to hear from you. I need to clarify that the equipment in question is not a standard machine but an Arizona 18m Truck Crane 2WD with a swivel winch in front that can handle up to 1000kg (2200lbs). It has a liquid pressure test kit, a 'Smokin Box' on the side with a winch, and it's fully self-contained with 40,000 gallons of diesel.

You can view pictures and more details at our website: http://www.bradcoengineering.com

Please let me know if this suits your needs so we can discuss further about the pricing and conditions.

Best regards,
Janowski

email_chain.subject: Re: Pictures and Details
email_chain.body:
Janowski,

Thanks for the swift response. The crane definitely fits the bill. I'll take a look at the pictures on the website and get back to you to finalize pricing and logistical details.

Best,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on shipping services from Hamburg to Yokohama
email_chain.body:

I hope this message finds you well.

After reviewing your website, your range of services appears quite comprehensive. I am particularly interested in whether your company can assist with the loading and unloading of a biomass cargo from Hamburg to Yokohama. Additionally, could you provide information on whether your rates are competitive compared to other logistics providers? Lastly, could you indicate if fluctuating currency rates might impact your pricing?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on shipping services from Hamburg to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Best,

It seems there was a delay in my previous message reaching you, possibly ending up in your spam folder. Since I last wrote, I have noticed an increase in shipping charges for containers from Hamburg to Yokohama over the past two months. Given this, would you be able to offer a discounted rate? Please confirm by email, and I am willing to cover any additional expenses incurred due to the response delay.

Thank you once again.

Warm regards,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Response to your shipping inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Natalie,

I apologize for the delay in responding; I have been occupied with a series of meetings. Regarding your request to ship a 20-foot container of biomass from Hamburg to Yokohama, I would need some more details about your cargo to provide an accurate estimate. Please provide the specifics at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Mr. Best

email_chain.subject: Additional cargo details for shipping quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Best,

I've sent the required cargo details via text. Looking forward to your shipping quote.

Thank you.

Best,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Potential bullish breakout in NBP
email_chain.body: Good morning Chichi, It appears that the NBP (NBP%) is experiencing a breakout to the upside. Could this be a genuine bullish move? If that's the case, we should consider increasing our exposure to crude options, moving from the low 40s to the 70s. Regards, Jackie

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential bullish breakout in NBP
email_chain.body: Hello Jackie, It's great to hear from you! Indeed, the move in crude is event-driven, sparked by the Q4 2013 outlook. Despite the impressive close, the 42.5 handle did not sustain the uptrend. Currently, crude prices are stabilizing within our anticipated trading zone of 40-46. There are additional factors influencing these metrics which I'll elaborate on in a forthcoming email. Best, Chichi

email_chain.subject: Update on Crude Options
email_chain.body: Great news, Jackie! The more volatile the market becomes, the higher the associated risks. Therefore, it's advisable not to increase our exposure to crude options right now. When crude stabilized at the 42.5 handle, it confirmed that we are already in an optimal position. Warm regards, Chichi

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Crude Options
email_chain.body: Chichi, Regarding the current market scenario with crude closing above the 38.5 handle and moving to 40, thus exiting the previous trading range, we came in at 40.2 on the 7/23 call, witnessing the highest rise since 7/2 to 42.5, where it entered an overbought zone marking an uptrending market. Given this, a stop-loss at 42.5 is indeed protective, but let's discuss if adjustments are necessary considering the current volatility. Regards, Jackie

email_chain.subject: Discussion on China's Electricity Scenario
email_chain.body:
Hey Qiang,
Would you like to grab a coffee today to discuss the current electricity scenario in China and the recent flooding there?
Have a nice weekend,
Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on China's Electricity Scenario
email_chain.body:
Hey Max,
It's wonderful to see the sunlight today! I'm writing to ask if we could meet tomorrow morning at 8:30 am to further discuss the issues.
Hope to see you soon,
Qiang

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on China's Electricity Scenario
email_chain.body:
Hi Qiang,
Let's finalize our meeting for tomorrow morning at 8:30 am in my office. I'll be waiting for you there.
Best regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on China's Electricity Scenario
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,
Thank you for confirming the appointment for tomorrow morning at 8:30 am. I'm looking forward to our meeting and will be taking a cab to your office.
See you then,
Qiang

email_chain.subject: Re: Discussion on China's Electricity Scenario
email_chain.body:
Hello Qiang,
Indeed, see you tomorrow at 8:30 am. Let me know if you have any questions before then.
Looking forward to seeing you,
Max

Your cooperation is appreciated. Regards, Mr. Green

Please proceed with the quotation and container booking. Best regards, Louis

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Specifications and Booking

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry for Vessel from Singapore and Saldanha Bay

I recommend checking our scheduled operations for available rates and further information on our website at http://www.safmarine.com/trade/markets/Schedules/Schedule%20of%20Ships%20Rates%202014.pdf. email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping: 4000MT Styrene Monomer

FOB Busan: USD 50,000 per 1000 MT

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of 4000 MT Styrene Monomer

email_chain.subject: FOB + Cost Quote: 4000MT Styrene Monomer from Busan to Dar es Salaam

Frank

email_chain.subject: Commercial Invoice Request
email_chain.body:

Thank you for the detailed quote. We confirm the arrangements and costs as described. Please send the commercial invoice for our shipment scheduled on 10 August 2021, with invoice number STY40122 and shipment details reflecting 4000 MT of Styrene Monomer from Busan to Dar es Salaam totaling USD 195,000.00.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Laycan Availability and Pricing Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Smythe,

Could you advise on the next available laycan for moving 5,200MT of refined aviation fuel from Houston to Amsterdam in late September? Feel free to suggest terms on FOB or CIF basis. Also, are you open to lumpsum deals?

Kind regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Laycan Availability and Pricing Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Thank you for your query. We are available for a CIF transfer from Houston to Amsterdam, starting in the second week of September. Please confirm if this arrangement suits you, so we can proceed accordingly.

Regards,
Mrs. Smythe

email_chain.subject: Re: CIF Transfer Confirmation and Overpayment Issue
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Smythe,

The CIF transfer is acceptable. Additionally, the customer has overpaid. I will engage with them regarding a partial refund.

Regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Re: CIF Transfer Confirmation and Overpayment Issue
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

You are correct about the overpayment. Please ensure that the customer reclaims the overpaid amount. As per our contractual agreement, any profit generated due to such scenarios should be recognized.

Regards,
Mrs. Smythe

email_chain.subject: Documentation and Additional Instructions Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Smythe,

I have discussed the overpayment with the customer and forwarded a related document to you as requested. Do you have any comments on the document?

Regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Re: Documentation Review and Next Steps
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

The document is adequate. Please arrange transport for the remaining 1,200 MT of aviation fuel. This fuel is due to be consumed upon your reception in Amsterdam and cannot be transported to Belgium. Additionally, please arrange a lumpsum sale for your FOB Hamburg cargo to recover your entitlements effectively. Use the documents provided to mitigate any risks associated.

Regards,
Mrs Smythe

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Future Cargo Capacity - Japan and Other Locations

- Load 1: Delivering from Houston to Japan, with an FAS term at Houston, required delivery by end-April/May 2018.
I am also interested in availability for routes from Houston to Singapore, Yokohama, and Busan, with a similar delivery schedule (Apr/May 2018).

Best regards,
Maxi

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Routes for Crude Oil Shipments
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Schedule Inquiry for a 6000dwt Unit from Bremerhaven to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Matthieu, could you check the schedule for a 6000dwt unit for the 4th week of February from Bremerhaven to Shanghai? Thanks a lot. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Schedule Inquiry for a 6000dwt Unit from Bremerhaven to Shanghai
email_chain.body: Bonjour, After a phone call with the shipowners, we have scheduled your client's cargo positioning to Bremerhaven on February 6th with departure planned for February 16th, 2016. The ship will be loading from Berth C at Bremerhaven. It will call at Baogang on February 26th, Dayi on February 27th and arrive in Shanghai on February 28th. Expected to reach the load port at Jinqiao on March 8th. Please find the itinerary attached. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Container Booking Dates and Requirements
email_chain.body: Bonjour Matthieu, The dates for booking the containers are as follows: Latest end for commercial transshipment of containers must be by the SGM arrival date at the terminal, unless specified otherwise. Requests for changing existing bookings should begin immediately. Containers dispatched from SGM terminal should reach the consignee in a closed loop terminal or door-to-door service, barring any specifications otherwise. From the day after the last mentioned date, the SGM will be entitled to keep the equipment blocked at the storage area. Containers not from Zone 2 are allowed at Jinqiao Mahul Terminal. The first set of containers can be released 45 days after the end of the loading operation, with subsequent sets released after 50 days. Containers must conform to special conditions outlined below. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Additional Container Handling Specifications
email_chain.body: Adjustments to container handling: There is no weight limit on the 40’ and 20’ containers. Containers must not have a blockage exceeding 2.5cm measured from the center line for loading and unloading. Responsibility for non-conforming equipment lies with the carrier. Wooden blockages, exposed wooden blocks in contact with tarpaulins, or exposed wood boar­ds do not meet our standards. Each 20’ container must have a Vortex vent installed per row of pallets to mitigate risks in case of incidents such as fire or explosions. The alignment and positioning of the containers must be precise. No chemical loads are permitted without approval. Authorization is needed from the Ship's Master for hazardous substances, which are not permitted in Jinqiao. Containers from China smaller than 20’ may be offloaded directly on the floor in sheds at terminals; those from Europe need specific handling measures. Roll-on/Roll-off operations are not permitted between two terminals without appropriate safety measures. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Query on CVR Calculation
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I've had two repeat customers, one making 2,000 orders and another 1,000 orders. Do these numbers suggest they are using my online tool, or might this be through phone orders?

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Query on CVR Calculation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

It isn't possible to definitively determine if they're using your online tool or other methods like phone orders without further data. However, the significance of their repeated interactions (CVR) over a long period certainly indicates strong customer retention. You may want to track the methods of transaction in your CRM to get more precise insights.

Best,
[Consultant's Name]

email_chain.subject: Request for Most Recent Market Intelligence Report
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Davis,
Thank you for forwarding the soft copy of the Algiers-Miami report. I appreciate your help. Could you please confirm if this is the most recent market intelligence you have on the oil bulker market? If there are any updates, I would be grateful to receive them as well.
Thanks,
Madge

email_chain.subject: Request to Send Report by Courier
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Davis,
Please send me the latest report on the oil bulker market by courier as soon as possible. Thanks for assisting.
Best regards,
Iain

email_chain.subject: Regarding Algiers-Miami Report
email_chain.body:
Dear Iain,
I noticed your request for a courier delivery of the report. I must clarify that the only Genesee recipient of our report as per our records was Madge. Please confirm this is part of your internal arrangement.
Best regards,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Report Distribution
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Iain,
Following up on your emails, I wish to clarify that our agreement restricts the distribution of sensitive documents like the soft copy of the Algiers-Miami report to designated recipients only. We had sent hard copies as an addition, but unfortunately, cannot extend further without explicit permission from Genesee Companies.
I hope this clears up any confusion.
Kind regards,
Ms. Davis

email_chain.subject: Final Clarification and Document Forwarding
email_chain.body:
Dear Genesee Companies,
I have enclosed the requested information regarding the oil bulker market. As confirmed, a copy has been forwarded to Ben Davis for his reference. Please inform us if there's any further assistance you need.
Best regards,
Ms. Davis

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Grain Shipment from Rotterdam to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Could you let me know the earliest availability for shipping a container load of grain from Rotterdam to Halifax? Also, what would happen if the booking deadline is just three days from now?

Warmest wishes,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Urgent Booking Request for Rotterdam to Halifax and Return
email_chain.body:
James,

Please proceed with booking the next available ship for my container of grain from Rotterdam to Halifax. The shipment will be ready for transport in three days. I would also like to book a return container from Halifax to Rotterdam concurrently.

Kind regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Booking Request for Rotterdam to Halifax and Return
email_chain.body:
Hello Anna,

Your grain shipment from Rotterdam to Halifax is scheduled with ZIM under ID Y245877. I am coordinating to arrange for your return container from Halifax to Rotterdam to possibly depart two days before the aforementioned date. I will finalize the bookings and inform you by 1st at noon. Following that, you can manage further logistics as needed.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Update on Booking and Further Inquiries
email_chain.body:
James,

I was informed by our agent that the booking for my grain would be delayed until the 5th. I’ve also proceeded with sending the container from Rotterdam as planned today, using ZIM, Ironman, 1RIT04Z3072/3. I'll reach out again tomorrow morning for further updates.

Best wishes,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Your Booking Confirmation and Additional Transport Options
email_chain.body:
Anna,

I've confirmed your booking for the grain shipment from Rotterdam to Halifax. I'm currently checking if we can arrange your empty return from Halifax to Rotterdam via MSC/COD. I will update you as soon as possible. The ZIM shipment ID is Y245877. Let me know if you have any further questions.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Empty Return from Halifax to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Anna,

Following up on our earlier conversation, ZIM has confirmed that we can book your empty container's return from Halifax to Rotterdam via MSC/COD on the 31st. Your empty container will be moved from the ZIM terminal in Halifax on the specified date. Please provide the container number, make, and model of the engine, its weight, and its serial number for further processing.

Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote for 13,500MT Heavy Gasoline
email_chain.body: Max, We have 13,500MT of heavy gasoline in Cartagena that needs to be shipped as soon as possible. Could you provide a preliminary quote and confirm if you handle port dues under FOB terms? Best regards, Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote for 13,500MT Heavy Gasoline
email_chain.body: Hi Dan, I’m happy to assist with your shipping needs. Given potential risks including weather impacts and possible Suez Canal bottlenecks, our earliest vessel availability for loading is in 14 days. Alternatively, we can expedite shipping by using the fastest available vessel at a 7% premium should you agree to cover the additional costs and fees associated with the risk factors. I have attached some indicative cost estimates including port dues for your consideration. Please note that these are preliminary figures and may change based on the final agreement. Kind regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote for 13,500MT Heavy Gasoline
email_chain.body: Dear Max, Thank you for your prompt response. I will confirm the exact volumes by end of today. Just to note, this shipment is classified as an LPG product and will attract a 2% surcharge due to high shipping costs. I will prepare and send over the final quote today. Thanks, Dan

email_chain.subject: Final Quote for 13,500MT Heavy Gasoline
email_chain.body: Dear Dan, Thank you for confirming the exact volumes. We have secured the vessel and have sent you the detailed quote. Please confirm if you are ready to proceed with signing the contract. Additionally, we have proposed increasing the vessel's capacity by another 1,000 tons as we anticipate another customer's requirement for an additional 1,000MT. We have adjusted this in your contract terms. Regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about bunker availability in Tianjin
email_chain.body: Hello Roger, I am currently looking for bunkers in Tianjin, with a requirement of 7,500MT to be delivered to the port in Hai Phong. Could you send me your details regarding availability and pricing? Looking forward to hearing from you. Best, Nicole

email_chain.subject: Request for Contact Information

email_chain.body: Hi Roger, I know it’s a busy time right now, but I have a very good deal on a truckload of cassettes that I wanted to import into Vietnam. Can you recommend a broker that can assist us with this? Additionally, I have a stock of construction materials ready for shipment, but I need the truck arrangement sorted first. I would really appreciate any help you can provide. Thanks, Michael

email_chain.subject: Thanks and Request for Password Reset
email_chain.body: Hi Roger, thanks for getting back to me so quickly. While updating my contacts, I realized I had duplicates of your emails, which I hadn't deleted. I've already sent you a request for a password reset and will try again. Best of luck with the transition; I’m confident you'll manage well. Regards, Craig

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Whitegoods

Judy

We would appreciate if you could assist us in arranging fast discharge on this charter from the nearest port. I look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Lydia

email_chain.body: Dear Lydia, I have been very busy lately due to the recent cancellations on my vessel. You can expect our vessel to sail to the Port of Kiel for the next few days, and the vessel will be on standby at the scheduled ports. I will contact you when we arrive at Anvers. Thanks for your understanding. Best regards, Manuel

email_chain.subject: Request for Immediate Flour Shipment to Anvers
email_chain.body: Dear Manuel, We are in need of flour to Anvers, and we need your vessel ASAP. Would you be able to fit us in? Regards, Lydia

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Immediate Flour Shipment to Anvers
email_chain.body: Hello Lydia, Sorry for the delay, but I am currently not prepared for a charter to the Port of Anvers at the moment. You may like to contact an alternative shipper. Kind regards, Manuel

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Immediate Flour Shipment to Anvers
email_chain.body: Dearest Manuel, I appreciate your quick response. We will seek alternate shipping arrangements for this urgent requirement. Thank you for your assistance. Regards, Lydia

I am a second-year master's student at Stanford University specializing in development studies and have prior experience with a development-focused non-profit organization. Could you provide more information about this opportunity?

Best regards,
Isaac

email_chain.body:
Hey there,

While browsing the job postings on your website, I found a role that piqued my interest. I'm currently completing my master's degree in Public Policy at MIT and interning at an impact-focused non-profit. I'm considering applying for the mentioned position and am curious if there is an opportunity for me to join as a part-time consultant.

Dev

email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipment Loading on SNS Horizon
email_chain.body:

Martina

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment and Shipment Confirmation

email_chain.subject: Shipping Arrangement Confirmation

John

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Arrangement Confirmation

Kind regards,
Martina

email_chain.subject: Final Shipping Update
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for DAP Rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body: Good morning Mr. Cho, We'd like to inquire about the DAP rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro for a cargo of naphthalene. We are open to any vessel type and would also like to know more about your cargo insurance coverage. Thanks, Jenna

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for DAP Rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Rowe, Thank you for your email. We can offer a DAP rate of 13,250 USD from Busan to Rio de Janeiro for naphthalene using an E-Type vessel. email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for DAP Rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for DAP Rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body: Hello, Jenna. Thank you for your email. Our Terms and Conditions were updated on the 2nd. Please note that the designated carrier for RAK shipping services will handle the transportation from Busan to Rio de Janeiro. Sincerely, Hyeon-Jong Cho, Manager

email_chain.subject: Catching Up and Future Plans

The company has been going strong all summer and things seem to be picking up. How are the kids doing? Send me an email or call when you can so we can get together. We are thinking about going to Disney World next weekend.

email_chain.subject: Re: Catching Up and Future Plans
email_chain.body:
Hey Heather,

Just a quick update—I hear the storms in Orlando are quite fierce right now. Let's touch base closer to the weekend and make a final call about the Disney World trip depending on the weather.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Asphalt Shipment Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bowles,

We've got a special order of 1,600 tons of asphalt needing transport from Rotterdam to Newark. We require delivery by the end of this month and are looking for a competitive rate. Could you please provide your quotation within the next 2 hours? Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Alisa

email_chain.subject: Revised Quotation for Asphalt Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Bowles,

I apologize for the confusion, but there was an error in our initial estimate, and consequently, the final price of asphalt has increased. We now propose a new rate of $9,600 instead of the $7,000 previously mentioned. Please review and advise us on your decision at your earliest convenience. Attached is your updated contract.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Joe

Attachment: Contract.pdf

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Request for Contract Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Joe,

It appears there was a misunderstanding regarding the asphalt pricing. The original quote of $7,000 was, in fact, accurate and should be considered for the contract. Could you please update the contract to reflect the agreed $7,000 rate and confirm if there are any other details we need to adjust?

Thank you for addressing this promptly.

Regards,
Alisa

email_chain.subject: Contract Update and Finalization
email_chain.body:
Hello Alisa,

Thank you for your clarification. After reviewing with our underwriter in Amsterdam post your phone conversation, I confirm that the $7,000 rate is acceptable. We have made the necessary adjustments to the contract. Please review the final version, and let us know when you are ready to proceed. We appreciate your understanding and are here for any further assistance you might need.

Best regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Offer for 2100MT of 80/20

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request: Wuhan to Toronto
