email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request: Wuhan to Toronto
email_chain.body:
Dear Seaman,
As the shipping agent for Mr. Miller, I'm involved with the shipment from Wuhan to Toronto. Unfortunately, our contracted freighter cannot meet the 10th to 12th April laycans. Could you please advise us on your available schedules?
Regards,
Rose

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Alternative Shipping Dates
email_chain.body:
Dear Seaman,
I am following up on my previous email regarding the shipment from Wuhan to Toronto. We are still in need of confirming an alternative shipping schedule since the initial suggested dates are not feasible for your team.
Can you provide your preferred laycan dates?
Regards,
Rose

email_chain.subject: Urgency: Confirmation of Laycan Dates
email_chain.body:
Dear Seaman,
We still require confirmation on the alternative laycan dates for the shipment from Wuhan to Toronto, as previously discussed. Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated to facilitate planning on our end.
Regards,
Rose

email_chain.subject: Coal Purchase Order for February Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hello Dana,

We would like to order 2,400MT of coal from Mafraq to Beirut this month. Can you let me know the value date for payment?

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Bob Esposito

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Purchase Order for February Delivery
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

Thank you for your order. Here is my bank account information for the payment transfer:

Lebanese Bank Account Info:
Name on Account: Dana
Account Number: 401
Routing Number: 30101
Bank Name: Banque du Liban
Address: PO Box 11-2095, Riad el Solh, 1133 Beirut

We will also need a copy of your signed letter of credit to proceed with your order.

Thanks,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Issue with Recent Purchase and Payment Delay
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Howard,

Thank you for your time last Friday. We have a query regarding the dry cleaning solvents you recently purchased. Unfortunately, due to some internal issues, there's been a delay in processing your payment. This is very uncommon, and we are actively investigating the matter.

If you are still prepared to proceed with the immediate payment, could you please confirm that the credit/debit card on file is the correct one? Thank you in advance for your understanding and cooperation.

Sincerely,
Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Issue with Recent Purchase and Payment Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Tyler,

Thank you for your update. I understand these issues can arise. Please keep me informed as you gather more information about the payment issue.

Thanks and regards,
Howard

email_chain.subject: Update on Payment Issue
email_chain.body:
Hi Howard,

I would like to update you on our investigation. We identified that the payment was not sent to our bank on time due to an oversight. This has been corrected, and the payment has been rescheduled. The funds will be withdrawn from your account in the next 1-2 business days. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

Best regards,
Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Payment Issue
email_chain.body:
Hi Tyler,

Thank you for the prompt update and for resolving this issue swiftly. I appreciate your efforts and look forward to continuing our business together.

Sincerely,
Howard

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation - Liqueur Aldehyde, 10MT
email_chain.body: Dear Sir or Madam, I am writing to request a quote for 10MT of Liqueur Aldehyde to be shipped to Moshi, Tanzania in a 20FT container under FOB terms for January 2017. Could you please confirm if duty and taxes are included in your quote? Kind regards, Mr. Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation - Liqueur Aldehyde, 10MT
email_chain.body: Thank you for your enquiry, Mr. Jones. To proceed with the quotation for 10MT of Liqueur Aldehyde, could you please confirm your phone number and fax number? Additionally, please clarify if this order is for your company or for a client. We can offer negotiable rates based on the final details. We look forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Mr. Johnson

email_chain.subject: Clarifications and CIF Inquiry - Liqueur Aldehyde, 5MT
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Johnson, Thank you for your prompt response. I would like to confirm my phone number (123-456-7890) and fax number (123-456-7891). This order will be for our company. Additionally, I am interested in an additional quotation for 5MT of Liqueur Aldehyde in a 20FT container for January 2017 at FOB terms. Could you also provide the CIF price for this shipment to our bank? I am attaching a blank document with terms for your reference. Looking forward to your detailed quote soon. Sincerely, Mr. Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarifications and CIF Inquiry - Liqueur Aldehyde, 5MT
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Jones, Thank you for providing the required information. We are processing your request for both the 10MT and the additional 5MT of Liqueur Aldehyde. We have noted your interest in CIF pricing and will include that in our detailed quote. Enclosed, please find our PO# 1019 along with the corresponding documentation. The CIF price will be provided in USD. We shall initiate processing of your order accordingly. Best regards, Mr. Johnson

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Office Hours
email_chain.body:
Good evening Ms. Pasquil,
Could you please let me know if your office is open or closed? I would appreciate the information.
Regards,
Aldwin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Office Hours
email_chain.body:
Dear Aldwin,
My apologies for not responding sooner. The office hours had not been communicated to me at the time of your initial inquiry. I will get back to you at the earliest convenience.
Best regards,
Ms. Pasquil

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Office Hours
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Pasquil,
Thank you for your response. I heard from the Registrar's office that your offices are closed from 12pm to 1:30pm every day for a lunch break. Please confirm if this information is correct. It was fortunate that I contacted you outside these hours.
Thank you for clarifying this matter.
Best regards,
Aldwin

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Loading Dates and Dispatch Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Shaikh, We have received a 5,600MT shipment of adhesives from Antwerp to Narva and a 3,600MT shipment of yeast from Fos-sur-Mer to Antwerp. Could you please confirm your earliest loading date for both of these shipments? Additionally, do you offer a standard dispatch rate if we finish early? Looking forward to your prompt reply. Kind regards, Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Loading Dates and Dispatch Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Marczyk, I confirm receipt of your inquiry regarding the shipments. Both shipments were off-loaded on 3rd February from the vessel BARGE BRIGADE. We operate on port-to-port (RORO) terms and do not have a standard dispatch rate. Please inform us of your preferred earliest loading date so we can provide you with a shipping quote. Thank you for choosing us. Yours faithfully, International Forwarding & Shipping GmbH Tel. +49 221 84 07-40 http://www.ifc-jade.de/en/index.php?id=63

email_chain.subject: Request for Discount and Payment Update
email_chain.body: Dearest Shaikh, I am currently arranging the payment and considering our tight financial situation, I have requested a further discount. An updated letter of credit will be sent shortly. Thank you for your understanding and assistance. Sincerely, Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Discount and Payment Update
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Marczyk, We have reviewed your recent correspondence and our previous email exchanges. Regarding your discount request, you requested a 5% discount which was agreed upon on the 14th of February. We note the payment of $3,200.00 in Swiss Francs was received on 14th of March 2011. As agreed, we could not apply the 5% discount since the final amount was adjusted in the payment made. Please confirm receipt. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Concerns about the song 'Stairway to Heaven'
email_chain.body: Good afternoon, I was wondering about your recommendation to listen to 'Stairway to Heaven'. The concept of a stairway being able to sing strikes me as quite odd! Are you sure this is the kind of music from the past that will resonate now? I find it rather outdated and confusing. Also, wasn't it inappropriate to bring up aspects of my personal life, like my marital status, in this context? I'm genuinely trying to understand the relevance here.

email_chain.subject: Re: Concerns about the song 'Stairway to Heaven'
email_chain.body: You need to approach life with a 'No Fear' attitude and try to maintain cheerfulness. Sometimes, a light-hearted outlook can help in understanding the world better, perhaps bring a smile or spark creativity. I apologize if I overstepped by revealing too much about my private life. It wasn't my intention to make you uncomfortable. Trust is crucial, and I hope you understand that misunderstandings are not always harmful. Thank you for your patience, and I look forward to discussing more with you soon.

email_chain.subject: Request to Keep My Account Active
email_chain.body: Thank you for your assistance. I had to check my spam folder and finally found your previous responses. I don’t understand why there was a suggestion to delete my account merely because I raised concerns about a product or service. I believe I have the right to voice my dissatisfaction. Being able to express issues is crucial for me, and having this platform helps me communicate them to the relevant parties. Please review this matter and ensure my account remains active. Awaiting your prompt response.

email_chain.subject: Shipping RFQ for Sweetened Condensed Milk from Singapore to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Noor, 

We’re looking to move 20,000MT of sweetened condensed milk from Singapore to Istanbul. Could you confirm your latest rate and earliest availability?

With regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Further Use of Your Facility
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Ahmed, 

We’ve just shipped 10 containers of Peppermint chocolates from Phnom Penh. Are you interested in using our facility again?

With regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: New Printer Page for Custom T-shirts, Polos, Bags, and Caps
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Ibrahim, 

Just wondering if you’ve seen our new printer page on our website? We now offer smaller quantities of T-shirts, polos, bags, and caps with your logo on them. We can even offer custom sizes.

With regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Update After Trip
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Karim, 

We’ve just arrived back to Singapore after a very long and tiring trip. Sorry it’s taken so long to get back to you.

With regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Next Shipment After Last Consignment from Sweden
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Mustafa, 

We’ve just shipped our last consignment from Sweden. Can you help us decide on the next steps for our upcoming projects?

With regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Shipping arrangement for coal to Dubai
email_chain.body:
Hi Joseph,

We'll be loading 200MT of coal from Savannah to Dubai on Monday. Can you let us know if there is any higher tariff during holidays?

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping arrangement for coal to Dubai
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the update. We are planning to receive and deliver the coal on January 1st, 2022. Could you confirm the next sailing after this date?

Thanks,
Joseph

email_chain.subject: Coal loading confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hey John,

We had the coal loaded on Monday, January 4th. Please confirm the pickup date and location from the supplier.

Thanks,
Joseph

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal loading confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Joseph,

We will be receiving 200MT of coal on Wednesday, January 6th. The pickup location is the Savannah Port, Dock 10.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Same-day Cargo Reception
email_chain.body:
Hi Joseph,

The customer can only receive the cargo on the same day as delivery, January 6th. Can you please make arrangements for the pickup?

Thanks,
Sherry

email_chain.subject: Assistance Required for Cargo Handling
email_chain.body:
Hi Joseph,

I would be glad to assist you. Could you please share the following information?
(i) the date and time of your appointment;
(ii) the supplier's name, address, and contact number;
(iii) the name of the ship carrying the cargo.
I will get back to you with an appropriate plan.

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance Required for Cargo Handling
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Many thanks for your help. Here is the required information:
(i) Pickup is scheduled for January 6th, 12:00 pm;
(ii) Supplier is CoalCorp, 123 Industrial Rd, Savannah, GA, contact no. 912-555-1234;
(iii) The cargo is being shipped via MV CoalCarrier.

We appreciate your assistance.

Thanks,
Joseph

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability - Kotka to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

We are planning to transport 5,700MT of rock salt from Kotka to Jakarta. Do you have any available vessels for this route? Please let me know at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability - Kotka to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Joe,

You're in luck! The Klaas Nencke is heading to Kotka and has the capacity of 10,000MT, but is currently carrying 8,000MT. Therefore, it can accommodate your cargo. Let me know if this works for you.

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability - Kotka to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

We'll proceed with the Klaas Nencke for the 10,000MT. Also, we have an additional 5,000MT of rock salt in Sydney at the wharf. We'll need the Shipmate to transport it to the vessel, as we are unable to handle the transfer due to the extensive paperwork.

Regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bulk Yellow Corn Shipment from Halifax to Larnaca
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Matias,
We would like to ship 1,200MT of yellow corn from Halifax to Larnaca. Could you please inform us about your available laycan slots and the applicable charges?
Best regards,
Richard

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: 20FT container of Alfa Aloe Extract from Pakistan to South Korea
email_chain.body:
Hi Marc,
Could you please send a quote for a 20FT container of Alfa Aloe extract from Pakistan to South Korea? We are ready to provide the original sample and purchase order.
Thanks.
Regards,
Broomo Choo

email_chain.subject: Offer for Orange Liquor from Karachi
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Choo,
As per our conversation, I am pleased to offer you 10 MT of our orange liquor product (ORL) at the rate of 22 USD/MT FOB Karachi.
Kind regards,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Details of Offer for Orange Liquor
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,
I am pleased to provide details for the below product:

Product Name: Orange Liquor
Product Description: Ripe orange (broken /complete)
Packing: 25 kg net each in 20' container
Marking: Wooden top/Plastic band/White paper with ORL brand name/Date of issue
Packing Procedure: Fumigation will be done by the customer's agent before loading
Pallets: 5 pallets in 40' container
Loading Port: Karachi
Terms: EXW/FOB/CFR

Please send your offer for sample shipping.
Best regards,
Marc

email_chain.subject: Supply Partnership Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Matias,
I would like to introduce RGD FOODS, a company specializing in nutritional ingredients and food processing solutions, including wheat germ, malt extract, soy protein, and more. We are seeking to partner with reliable suppliers such as Matias Industries to ensure high-quality ingredients for our products, alongside dependable transportation and customer service.
Best regards,
Rich

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Product Details and FOB Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hey Rich,
Thanks for your prompt response earlier. Could you please provide more information about your products, such as shipping lead times, any potential delays, and other relevant details? I’m also interested in receiving your quote for the FOB port.
Thank you!
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Product Details and FOB Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hi Jan,
We can provide you with an FOB quote for any container size and are happy to discuss other requirements. Our typical delivery time is usually 7-10 days, although shorter delivery times can sometimes be arranged. Our team is ready to assist with any further inquiries or orders you might have.
Please feel free to contact me for more information or to place an order.
Best regards,
Rich

email_chain.subject: Cargo Space Inquiry for 180-Day Journey
email_chain.body:
Hey Ms. Ballard,
Can you help us fill a few empty slots on a 180-day journey from Singapore to Cape Town? We’ve got 80,000T of heavy oil and 150,000T of fertilizer to ship. We can offer a COTI discount for this service. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Space Inquiry for 180-Day Journey
email_chain.body:
Hello Devon,
We do have space available in one of our vessels for a 180-day journey, but our next available slot is in 60 days. Please send us your pricing and shipping instructions if you're interested in booking this slot.
Thanks,
Ms. Ballard

email_chain.subject: Next Available 30-Day Slot Information
email_chain.body:
Hello Devon,
We have an available slot in the next 30 days, however, this would involve bulk and finished oil so we won't be able to offer the COTI discount. The rate will be $40 per ton and the load port is Houston. Please send your forwarding instructions by 7 AM tomorrow if you wish to proceed.
Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Correction: Availability for 60 Day Slot
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Devon,
I need to correct my previous message. We don't have availability in the next 30 days but do have a slot after 60 days instead. This trip will also involve bulk and finished oil, with the same rate of $40 per ton. We can load in either Houston or Antwerp. Please confirm by 7 AM today if you're interested.
Best,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Correction: Availability for 60 Day Slot
email_chain.body:
Hey Mark,
The 60-day slot works for us. Thanks for the quick adjustment and clarity. Appreciate your help.
Best,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Initial Request for Naphtha Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear James,
We are interested in contracting for a load of naphtha transport from Kalamazoo to Philadelphia. Could you please provide a rate and confirm if you could arrange for the first shipment on May 1, 2023? We are also interested in establishing the laycan period for this shipment.
Regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Request for Naphtha Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Caroline,
Thank you for your inquiry. I will prepare a detailed quote and send it over shortly. Meanwhile, could you please confirm if the request for a double hop from Philadelphia back to Philadelphia was intentional?
Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Request for Naphtha Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
James,
Yes, the double hop was intentional. I appreciate your prompt attention to our requirements and look forward to your quote.
Kind regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Request for Naphtha Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Caroline,
That's possible. I will include this in our quote. We should be able to confirm our laycan dates by the end of this week.
Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Query on bitumen cargo loading in May
email_chain.body: Hello Saima, we have a cargo of bitumen weighing 7,200MT set to export from Sohar. The scheduled loading date is May 14th, with an estimated transit time of 10-14 days. Could you manage this with the current rates you have provided? Regards, Sarfaraz.

email_chain.subject: Re: Query on bitumen cargo loading in May
email_chain.body: Hi Sarfaraz, thank you for reaching out. As per our agreement, you need to submit your L/Cs by May 14th. I highly recommend submitting them as soon as possible. If we receive them by May 14th, we can likely issue the Bill of Lading for this cargo. Failing to provide L/Cs by that date will prevent us from issuing the Bill of Lading. Best, Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Rate and Schedule Inquiry for Bitumen Import
email_chain.body: Hi Saima, we would like to proceed with the import of one bitumen cargo as per our Memorandum of Understanding. Could you please send your most recent rate card and confirm the earliest possible loading dates? We are tentatively planning for June 15th, with D/P terms set for 90 days from the date of loading at Sohar. Kindly confirm. Best regards, Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate and Schedule Inquiry for Bitumen Import
email_chain.body: Hi Mohammed, we would be pleased to assist with your bitumen cargo loading. However, we require more details about your project to proceed. We will pass the project name to our business development department for verification with current client data. Meanwhile, I will check for availability with our local charterers. Do you require assistance with chartering a vessel in the meantime? Regards, Saima.

email_chain.subject: Request for Transport Quotation: Titanium Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Johnson,

We are arranging the shipment of 400T of unmanufactured titanium from Suzhou to Ningbo. Could you please provide us with a bid and confirm whether you have on-board transport coverage under DAP terms? 

Thank you,
Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transport Quotation: Titanium Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

Thank you for your email. The transportation cost is 27850 USD. You can have your confirmation letter by email. Please feel free to contact us at any time if you have any other requirements.

Thank you again,
Mr. Robert Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transport Quotation: Storage Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

I have checked with our clients and they prefer to use our bonded warehouse in Ningbo. Therefore, I'm going to arrange for 200T of the goods to be stored in Ningbo. Please let me know if this aligns with your logistics plan.

Thanks,
Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Re: Change in Arrangement - Titanium Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

For the updated requirement of 400T, the container price under DDP terms is 1190 USD per ton, resulting in a total of 476800 USD. I will send the detailed DDP cost calculation to you shortly.

Best regards,
Mr. Robert Johnson

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Copper Scrap Purchase in April
email_chain.body:
Hello Françoise,
Thank you for arranging the shipment of bulk chemicals from Antwerp to Tangier last week. We are now looking to purchase 5,000MT of copper scrap for April from the port. Could you please provide the details of the cargo and port charges? 
Very best,
Louise

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Copper Scrap Purchase in April
email_chain.body:
Dear Louise,
Thank you for your inquiry. The cargo and port charges for copper scrap are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000MT. We are prepared to ship in April as per your request. If you are considering ordering more than 5,000MT, please let me know your FOB price.
Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Thank You and Further Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Francoise,
Thank you for the swift response. We are interested in the 5,000MT copper scrap shipment for April with the mentioned conditions. Could we discuss the FOB pricing based on this volume?
Kind regards,
Louise

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Tanker Availability: Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Neal,

We need a tanker for 1,800MT of olefins from Shanghai to Singapore. Could you confirm your earliest berth availability? Also, do you typically quote under C&F terms?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Tanker Availability: Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Neal,

I noticed I haven't heard back regarding the 1,800MT delivery from Shanghai to Singapore as listed on your website. Could you please confirm your earliest berth availability for Singapore? Also, can you confirm if you typically quote under C&F terms?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Tanker Availability: Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Sorry about the delay - my previous message was accidentally deleted by our system. I'm replying now with our earliest availability for your 1,800MT delivery. The first possible berth opening we have is from June 11 to June 12, thus your tankers need to be in Singapore by June 7 to meet this schedule. I apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Request for Early June Berth Availability: 2,000MT Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hello Neal,

I have just accepted a new task involving a 2,000MT delivery from China to Singapore. Could you please confirm if there is any early berth availability around June 10? I would also appreciate a quote for this schedule under the same terms.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Freight for Diesel from London to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Please confirm your rate for 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg. Will your vessel be available next week for loading? Could you confirm your suggested laycan? What is your average daily demurrage rate and can this be lowered if loading is expedited? Thank you, Saul

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Freight for Diesel from London to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Glad to hear from you! Our price for shipping 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg is $1.22 per barrel FOB. Our vessel, the Agape, will indeed be available next week for loading and is scheduled to reach Hamburg around October 25th. The laycan period begins October 15th. Regarding the demurrage, our standard daily rate is $2,000 but this can be reduced if the loading process is expedited. Would you like to proceed with this transaction? Regards, Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Freight for Diesel from London to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Thank you for the confirmation on the price, Fred. We will do our best to expedite the loading. Can you clarify if the lowered demurrage rate applies automatically when loading is expedited, or is this negotiated on a case-by-case basis? Best, Saul

email_chain.subject: Request for Voyage Cost Calculation from Singapore to China
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bae,

I have a 28,000MT cargo order from Singapore to China. I am unsure about the best schedule. Could you calculate the voyage cost under FOB terms? We need to select a suitable port in Singapore for loading and plan for a 10-day sailing. Your advice on this would be appreciated.

Best regards,
Ken

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Voyage Cost Calculation from Singapore to China
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your message, Ken.

We can arrange for the vessel to sail from Singapore to China. Our schedule is flexible, so we can accommodate the cargo on your preferred dates. The rates are competitive, and if the cargo is located in South Singapore, we can prepare the vessel to sail on the same day. Please confirm your port choices and any other specifics so we can proceed.

Best regards,
Mr. Bae

email_chain.subject: Request for Transportation Quote from Singapore to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Mr. Bae,

Our customer now requires a quote for transporting 2,400MT of cargo from Singapore to Amsterdam. They wish to depart from Singapore in two weeks and arrive in Amsterdam within a month. Could you please provide an estimate for the transportation costs?

Thanks,
Ken

email_chain.subject: Advice from shipmates
email_chain.body: Dear friends, I urgently require your advice on a recent request to transport 7,700MT of coal from New York to Sydney. My vessel is a 1998-built LNG carrier. Considering the complexity of the markets, could you advise which market would be better - Santos or Gogoro? Warm regards, Roberto

email_chain.subject: Re: Advice from shipmates
email_chain.body: Dear Roberto, Thank you for your email. Given your situation, I would recommend Santos. My vessel, a 2002-built tanker, can manage approximately 7,000MT of cargo. I've just obtained permission to begin loading at Santos, which is conveniently close to my current location. Kind regards, Francisco

email_chain.subject: Advice from Gogoro
email_chain.body: Dear Francisco, Thanks for your recent advice. After evaluating, I realized that Santos would actually be a more suitable option for handling a similar 7,000MT cargo request from my end, due to its proximity to my ship's current location. Warm regards, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Ro/Ro Carriers
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,
We have a last-minute project starting in two weeks. Could you arrange the charter of two 6,000MT roll-on/roll-off carriers? Please let me know your availability and pricing.
Kind regards,
Deirdre

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Requirement for Ro/Ro Carriers
email_chain.body:
Hi Deirdre,
Good news! I have two carriers available, though they are still loaded with their last cargo. They will be ready in Los Angeles. Could you provide details on your budget to cover operational expenses and any potential costs of delay?
Regards,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Requirement for Ro/Ro Carriers
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,
Following my co-chairman’s return from China, I’ve received further details about our requirements. This is a critical project, so I’d like to discuss this directly with you. John is away for the next two days; could we possibly meet to expedite the process? Please suggest a convenient time and place.
Regards,
Deirdre

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Steel from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We have a load of steel that needs to be shipped from Rotterdam to Dalian. Could you please provide your earliest available laycan dates for loading? Let us know if you need any further information.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Urgent Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
John,

Apologies, we realized that our previous message was overlooked last week. We are currently on the west coast and do not have a representative near you. Would you mind contacting me directly at the telephone number provided below? I am available to discuss any queries related to the ship crew and more.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Update: Steel Shipping from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your call yesterday. I've forwarded your details to our contact on the east coast. We are currently awaiting an offer for your steel shipment from an east coast mill. I will update you once a final decision is made.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Personal Condolences
email_chain.body:
John,

I was sorry to hear about your brother's condition during our call. I hope he recovers swiftly. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further assistance during this time.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability - New Orleans to Kuwait
email_chain.body: Dear Andrea, This is Ashley from Lewis Commodities. We are looking to arrange a vessel from New Orleans to Kuwait by the end of this month to transport a cargo of copra and beans. Could you please let me know your availability for this shipment? Many thanks, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability - New Orleans to Kuwait
email_chain.body: Dear Ashley, Thank you for reaching out. My ship is available to sail on the 31st of this month from New Orleans to Kuwait. Please confirm with your principal, and I will proceed with the booking of your cargo. Looking forward to your confirmation. Regards, Andrea

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability - New Orleans to Kuwait
email_chain.body: Hi Andrea, Thank you for your prompt response. We are currently finalizing the load with our principal and will confirm the booking with you shortly. I will also send you the list and quantity of copra and beans for the cargo. Thank you, Ashley

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Soybean Supply
email_chain.body: Hello, Could you please provide a quote for supplying 12,500MT of soybean from Jeddah to Tripoli? Thank you! Best regards, Tamara

email_chain.subject: Reply to Your Inquiry for Soybean Supply
email_chain.body: Dear Tamara, We can offer you 12,500MT of soybean under FOB Jeddah terms on 10th April at a rate of $545 per ton. Best regards, The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Request for Soybean Quotation
email_chain.body: Hello, I need a quotation for 50,000MT of soybean with C&F from Jeddah to Tripoli for a shipment scheduled on 25/05/2022. Thank you for your offer! Regards, Sofiane

email_chain.subject: Response to Your Soybean Quotation Request
email_chain.body: Dear Sofiane, We regret that we cannot provide you with a quote for the requested 50,000MT of soybean at this time, as this cargo will not be available until after May. Best regards, The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Update on Your Soybean Quotation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Tamara, We regret to inform you that due to current market instabilities, we are unable to provide a quote for the 12,500MT of soybean at this time. Best regards, The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Request for Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Could you issue me a purchase order for 4,000MT of methanol from Grimsby to Ulsan? Additionally, are you able to arrange the shipment of 1,800MT of xylene from Piraeus to Halifax this weekend?

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Management
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Please reply ASAP.

email_chain.subject: Cancellation and Reissuance of Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

I am writing to confirm the cancellation of the purchase order issued on December 1st for 4,000MT of methanol, which was originally scheduled for delivery on or before January 5th, 2018. Please issue a new purchase order within the next two weeks as discussed.

I am looking forward to doing business with you again in the near future.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Management
Ace Publishing, Inc.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Purchase Order for Xylene
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Thank you for the purchase order you issued on December 10th for 2,000MT of xylene. My team has begun preparing the delivery contract. Please send your preferred form of contract via email by December 16th.

I appreciate your prompt attention to this matter and look forward to continuing our business relations.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Management
Ace Publishing, Inc.

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Order and Shipping Arrangements
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Thank you for sending us the purchase order for 1,200MT of xylene from Piraeus. We will provide you with the shipment details by email as soon as the cargo reaches our warehouse in Halifax.

Looking forward to further collaboration.

Sincerely,
Mr. Talbert
Management
Ace Publishing, Inc.

email_chain.subject: Gratitude and Affection
email_chain.body: Hi, I just wanted to express my gratitude and remind you how wonderful you are. Please don't change! Sincerely, [Your Name]

email_chain.subject: Re: Gratitude and Affection
email_chain.body: Hello! Your kindness has reached all of us here. Your help has been incredibly appreciated by many. Warm regards, [Friend's Name]

email_chain.subject: Thanks for Your Support
email_chain.body: I am writing to thank you for your assistance. Your efforts and hard work greatly benefited me. I truly appreciate everything you have done. Thanks again! Best, [Your Name]

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement
email_chain.body: You are doing an excellent job in your endeavors. Thanks to you, this project has achieved significant success. Keep up the great work! Cheers, [Friend's Name]

email_chain.subject: Small Talk
email_chain.body: By the way, the weather is quite cold here today. Hope you're staying warm! Your friend, [Friend's Name]

email_chain.subject: Request for Updated Quote on Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Zimmermann,
We are planning to send 2,000MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo. Could you please provide me with an updated quote for this shipment?
Many thanks,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Updated Quote on Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,
I would recommend shipping 1,000MT instead of 2,000MT from London to Sao Paulo, as it is easier to manage and can save you around 10,000 British Pounds based on the current offer. Please let me know if this adjustment works for you.
Best regards,
Erik Zimmermann

email_chain.subject: Re: Suggested Adjustment to Cargo Size
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,
Thank you for the suggestion. However, could you clarify if this new price you mentioned is the best offer you can give?
Best regards,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Suggested Adjustment to Cargo Size
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,
Yes, the price offered is the best we can provide under current market conditions for the 1,000MT shipment. Additionally, I recommend stating that we cannot send 2,000MT from London to Sao Paulo as initially planned.
Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Email Deletion
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,
Could you guide me on how to delete an email from the inbox? I want to remove a previous message I sent by mistake.
Best regards,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed on Email Deletion
email_chain.body:
Hi Shelly,
Typically, you can delete an email by opening the message and selecting the delete option. However, remember that once deleted, it cannot be recovered.
Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Price Agreement and Next Steps
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,
Thank you for the explanation. Regarding our transaction, can we finalize the agreement at the price quoted for the 1,000MT shipment?
Best regards,
Shelly

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Price Agreement
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,
The first offer is acceptable. Let me know if you have any more questions or if we can proceed with finalizing the deal.
Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vessel Capacity and Pilotage Fee Breakdown
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Jones,

Could you confirm whether your vessel can carry 6,500MT of steel from Tokyo to Cleveland? Also, I noticed you've been quoted a $2,500 pilotage fee from Tsukaji to Tokyo. This is below the usual charge of $2,750. Could I get a breakdown of these charges for Tsukaji so I can be sure?

Thanks, 
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Vessel Capacity and Pilotage Fee Breakdown
email_chain.body:
Hello Susan,

Unfortunately, our vessels cannot carry 6,500MT. Regarding the pilotage fee, I can confirm that the $2,500 quote is correct as per the port of Tsukaji's statement. Sadly, I cannot assist much with a detailed breakdown at this moment. Also, for the load, shifting the cargo from Osaka could incur additional costs, affecting the overall quote you were given. The title of the biggest port in Japan usually goes to Osaka, but not necessarily for all cargo types.

Best regards, 
Mr. Jones

email_chain.subject: Further Clarification Needed on Vessel Capacity and Pilotage Fees
email_chain.body:
Mr. Jones,

As you previously indicated, if the vessel cannot carry 6,500MT, could there be alternative arrangements? Also, could you liaise with the authorities at Tsukaji for a more detailed breakdown of the pilotage fees?

Regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Discharge Port and Port Congestion Information
email_chain.body:
Good morning Susan,

Could you please update on the vessel's ultimate port of discharge and the port congestion situation in Osaka? It seems that operators have been overloaded with cargo this year. Any insights you can provide would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Details and Rate Confirmation - Philadelphia to Vado
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark, 
Could you please confirm your available slots for shipment from Philadelphia to Vado? Also, can you confirm the rate considering any draft restrictions? 
Thank you, 
Tony

email_chain.subject: Shipment Details and Rate Information - Response
email_chain.body:
Hello Tony, 
Please refer to the attached document for rate details. If you need any further assistance with this shipment, please do not hesitate to contact me. 
Thank you, 
Thomas Jan 
On behalf of ALLEGHENY FREIGHT CORPORATION

email_chain.subject: Selection of Rate Options for Philadelphia to Vado Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Tony, 
Below is a list of rate options which we have attached. Please provide me with the option which best meets your needs. 
If you have any questions about the options, please feel free to contact me. 
Thank you, 
Mark 
On behalf of TAHRIR SHIPPING

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Inquiry on Shipment Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark, 
Thank you for providing the rate options. I confirm that the rates are agreeable. Could you please verify the following specifications: 
1) Your confirmed rate. 
2) Draft restrictions potentially impacting our shipment. 
Looking forward to your prompt response. 
Best Regards, 
Tony

email_chain.subject: Container Load Request at Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Jones,

My name is Phil Gellman and I am the shipping manager at Nuvista Logistics. We are interested in loading the following containers at Gothenburg:
- 5 x 40HC dry containers
- 3 x 40HC dry containers
- 10 x 20GP dry containers

Please let me know if there are any slot issues and how soon we could proceed with the loading.

Many thanks,
Phil Gellman
Shipping Manager, Nuvista Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Container Load Request at Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Phil,

Regarding your request for container cargo, it is not possible for us to accept your offer at this time due to prior bookings with another supplier. We will contact you when suitable slots are available.

We appreciate your understanding.

Best regards,
Ralph Jones

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of 5 x 40HCs Booking at Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Ralph,

This is a reminder regarding the cargo of 5 x 40HC containers previously discussed to be loaded at Gothenburg. The shipment has been canceled. Please confirm receipt, and let me know if we can assist further with an alternative booking.

Best regards,
Paul Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Cancellation of 5 x 40HCs Booking at Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Can you confirm that the shipment of the 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg has been canceled? We would appreciate your quick confirmation.

Many thanks,
Phil Gellman

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of 5 x 40HCs Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Hi Phil,

I confirm that the booking of the 5 x 40HCs loaded at Gothenburg has been canceled. Thank you for your understanding and support.

Best regards,
Paul Smith

email_chain.subject: Booking Request and Demurrage Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

We are scheduling to load 7,000MT of vegetables in Dar es Salaam for Addis Ababa this Monday. Concurrently, could you help with booking a vessel for 500MT of steel from Hamburg to Yokohama to free up capacity? Could you also update us on the current demurrage terms at the destination?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Request and Demurrage Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your message. I'll check the destination demurrage rates and get back to you shortly. Currently, the Hamburg to East Africa route is facing high demand, and we are trying to maximize vessel employment. Unfortunately, we do not have any steel mill slots available at the moment.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Request and Demurrage Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Good news! We've managed to secure a slot for 500MT of steel on a vessel scheduled from Hamburg, stopping in Malaga with possible unloading in Mombasa next Monday. We have reserved the necessary vessel for this transport.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Thank you
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

Sorry for any confusion earlier as my colleague had inquired about this en route to a meeting. Thanks for your assistance!

Cheers,
Mika

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Port and Craneage Services in Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

I would like to request a quote for port and craneage services for 100m3 of petrochemicals in Antwerp.

Best,
Justin

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request for Port and Craneage Services in Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,

Our standard freight rate for a 10m3 container from Noyers to Antwerp is EUR 145. Given the volume of your shipment, totaling 100 m3, the estimated freight will amount to EUR 17,500.
Please let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Shale Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,
Any chance you can do a charter of 4,200MT of shale to Venice from Rotterdam next Thursday?
Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Good morning,
Following up on our earlier conversation, could you please confirm if the M/V Lucie is available for transportation? Additionally, do we have the option to use M/V Jane next week, either Tuesday or Thursday, for an estimated 4,200MT of diesel load?
Thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Vessel Capacities
email_chain.body:
Good morning,
The Lucie operational capacity is about 5,000MT, but can it actually load 4,200MT of diesel? Given that M/V Phyllis only carries 4,000MT and Phoenix is larger, I'm concerned about the feasibility of our requirements.
Many thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability and Load Concerns
email_chain.body:
Good morning,
I understand your concerns. Unfortunately, it seems we might struggle to fulfill the 4,200MT requirement with the vessels currently available. Let's explore other alternatives or possibly adjust the quantity.
Best regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Seeking Solutions for Shipping Constraints
email_chain.body:
Good morning,
Please don't misunderstand; I appreciate your insights into our logistical constraints. I'm actively seeking a shipping solution that meets the 4,200MT diesel requirement for the buyer. Let's keep the communication open for any feasible options.
Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipment of corrugated sheets
email_chain.body: Hi Boris, We’re planning a shipment of 50,000MT of corrugated sheets from Qingdao to New York. Can you confirm if you accept the order as stated, or if there's room to adjust the delivery dates? Yours, Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about shipment of corrugated sheets
email_chain.body: Hi Mikaela, I'm sorry for any confusion. We currently don't accept EFT payments and need to adhere to our usual payment methods. Also, please remember that our handling fee has already been deducted from the transaction. Regards, Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about shipment of corrugated sheets
email_chain.body: Hi Boris, This is surprising; in our previous discussions, EFT was considered acceptable. Could you please double-check this and provide our bank details for the EFT transfer upon confirmation? Regards, Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about EFT Payments
email_chain.body: Hi Mikaela, Our bank will indeed impose a penalty for premature payment via EFT under the current conditions. We appreciate your understanding. Regards, Boris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about EFT Payments and Order Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Boris, Thank you for the clarification; I appreciate your prompt response. When can I expect the final confirmation for our shipping order with the updated payment method? Regards, Mikaela

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation and Payment Method
email_chain.body: Hi Mikaela, Apologies for the delays in responding. I will forward our bank details for an EFT transfer by Monday and ensure everything is set for your shipment. Thank you for your patience and help with this order. Regards, Boris

email_chain.subject: Requesting Shipping Slot for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,
Can I reserve a slot to ship 8,400MT of methanol from India to Chile? We prefer the shipment to start on Sunday, noon, with a laycan by the following Friday. Could you confirm the details and send a proforma invoice? Thanks, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Requesting Shipping Slot for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,
Thanks for your enquiry. We can carry your cargo with a 7-day laycan from India to Chile. Initially, we will send a proforma invoice for 1 MT as a sample. If this arrangement works for you, please reply with your bank details and I will proceed with the proforma. Thanks, Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Requesting Shipping Slot for Methanol from India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,
Our bank is IndusInd Bank, Mumbai. Please send the proforma with the relevant info. Thanks, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment and Shipping Details
email_chain.body:
Hi David,
Sorry, IndusInd does not handle USD transfers. The FOB price of $350 quoted is based on the current exchange rate of INR 72 per USD. Our full requirement totals 8,400 MT, amounting to $3.2 million at current rates. We can ship 300 MT every two weeks for five months. I’ll convert these prices to rupees and send the updated proforma invoice. Best, Rahul

email_chain.subject: Updated Proforma Invoice and Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi David,
Please find the attached proforma invoice for 300 MT of methanol at INR 71,249 per MT. We will ship your first load on 14th November 2018. Your subsequent shipments will follow on 28th November, 12th December, and 26th December 2018. The total requirement is 8,400 MT, valued at approximately $3.2 million at our current rates. Also attached is your credit application form; please sign and return it for us to process the letter of credit (LC). Best regards, Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Updated Proforma Invoice and Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,
Thanks for your detailed reply. We need to finalize the contract before the weekend. Can you ensure that everything is in order? Thanks, David

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for flight D3/DD2 from Paris to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Wang,
Could you let me know if you have a D3/DD2 flight from Paris to Naples next week? Thank you.
Regards,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for flights to Naples on June 8
email_chain.body:
Sir,
I have confirmed my reservation for the flight on June 8 from Paris to Rome, but I was unable to find any D3/DD2 flights from Rome to Naples for that day. Could you check any available alternatives for me?
Thanks,
Marc

Hi Marc,
I have discussed this with my colleague, and unfortunately, there are no D3/DD2 flights available from Rome to Naples on June 8. However, an alternative flight from Florence to Naples is available. Could you let me know if you are flexible with your original plans?
Thank you,
Patricia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for alternate D3/DD2 flights to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Patricia,
Unfortunately, I am not flexible with the destination. Could you check to see if there are any other D3/DD2 flights from either Rome or Florence to Naples around the same dates?
Thanks,
Marc

Hi Marc,
I’m sorry for the inconvenience. Upon further review with my team, there are still no D3/DD2 flights available from Rome or Florence to Naples on those dates. Let’s explore other possible solutions together.

Regards,
Patricia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipment from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You mentioned considering a voyage from Singapore to Phuket on our services. Could you confirm if this mirrors your recent shipment activity, where you've carried a similar quantity from Vigo to La Rochelle? Would these requirements fit for the first week in October?

Thanks,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Shipment from Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Sorry for the delayed response; I did not initially see your email. I need more clarity. Could you specify:
- the exact number of containers?
- the total weight of the cargo?
- the exact route (does it start at Vigo and end at Phuket)?

Please provide this information as soon as possible. Thanks,
Janet

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Capacity for 20-foot Container
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You inquired about our capacity for handling a 20-foot container; specifically concerning its possibility from Vigo to Phuket. I can confirm we are fully capable of accommodating this shipment with total satisfaction for you and your customer in Phuket.

Please call me at 555-555-1212 with the weight of your cargo, so we can finalize the details.

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Needed for Vigo to Phuket Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

Do you remember our phone conversation last week about setting up the shipment between Vigo and La Rochelle? We now require a similar service but from Vigo to Phuket. I do not have much time and need to confirm if this service is available in the next 24 hours.

Please call me at 555-555-1212.

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Scheduling Kerosene Shipment from Daesan to Sikka
email_chain.body:
Dear Capt. Bailey,

Can we schedule 10,000MT of kerosene from Daesan to Sikka on April 20? I'm open to a laycan as late as April 22. Also, will it be possible to adjust freight if loading completes ahead of schedule?

Very best,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Request for Estimate on Kerosene Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Caplan,

We previously moved 10,000 MT of kerosene from Daesan to Palembang. Our agent reported a light discharge of 6,000MT and applied a C/I discount of $500 per MT. Can you provide an estimate for similar future operations?

With best regards,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Estimate on Kerosene Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Norma,

Yes, I can certainly provide another estimate based on your specifications. Please let me know any additional requirements you might have.

Very best,
Mr. Caplan

email_chain.subject: Further Scheduling and Estimates
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Caplan,

Thank you for your prompt response. We will schedule the cargo from Daesan to Palembang and seek to advance the shipment before April 20. Additionally, I’d like to inquire about scheduling another load of 10,000 MT of kerosene from Daesan to destinations like Timor Leste or Belawan, avoiding the Far East. Could you adjust the freight and laycan accordingly?

Very best,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Request to Go Back to Daesan for Reloading
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Caplan,

Following our recent operation, we wish to return to Daesan to load an additional 10,000MT of kerosene on April 27. Could you accommodate this schedule?

With best regards,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Go Back to Daesan for Reloading
email_chain.body:
Dear Norma,

Yes, we can arrange to go back to Daesan for loading on the requested date. Additionally, we can send a lighter from Port Said to Crewe as our largest tanker's gross weight exceeds 80,000 MT.

Best regards,
Mr. Caplan

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Additional Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Caplan,

Thank you for your assistance. I'm relieved that we can manage our light load of 4,000 MT efficiently. We are planning to return to Daesan on April 28 to load an additional 10,000MT. Your support is invaluable.

Best regards,
Norma

email_chain.subject: Quote for Gasoil Transportation from Durban to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnnie,

Here is our quote for the transportation of 30,000MT of gasoil from Durban to Busan. I understand that this inquiry may fall slightly outside our usual area of expertise. If you are working with any other agents in that region, kindly let us know so we can forward the inquiry accordingly. Thank you for considering our services.

Best regards,
Alois Mike

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Required: Inquiry ABCCME-Z01-223-003-20201125-1523-56679-66
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnnie,

Could you please confirm the following for your recent inquiry:
1. Does your reference: ABCCME-Z01-223-003-20201125-1523-56679-66 relate to the gasoil transportation quote?
2. Was this inquiry sent on 25th November 2020, as mentioned in the attached document?
3. Are you interested in purchasing from us on a CIF basis to Busan, South Korea?
4. Are you looking for a CIF price quote solely in USD for Busan, South Korea?

Please acknowledge the receipt of this email.

Thank you,
ABCCME

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation Required: Inquiry ABCCME-Z01-223-003-20201125-1523-56679-66
email_chain.body:
Dear Colleague,

As you are aware, the project involves procuring approximately 20,000MT of LPG from North African suppliers. Our clients have requested a proposal to connect with potential suppliers and assess market pricing.

Best,
Mr. Johnnie

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipment Booking Inquiry from Tunisia to San Diego
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Coolidge,

I have an urgent shipment of bottled water that needs to be transported from Tunisia to San Diego, CA this Friday. I am offering a 10% bonus on your rate for timely booking. Could you please call me at your earliest convenience to confirm this arrangement?

Thanks,
Rachel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Oil Storage Tank Shipment from UAE to Dammam
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Coolidge,

Following a disappointing experience with another shipping company in UAE, I am seeking a new partner for my shipping needs. Could you provide me with a quote for transporting an oil storage tank from Ras al Khaimah to Dammam? Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,
Rachel

email_chain.subject: Enquiry Regarding Shipping Container Fee for Salt Shipment from Mumbai to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Lachance,

We're arranging to ship 500 metric tons of salt from Mumbai to Halifax. Could you confirm if the shipping container fee will remain as quoted, given that we are including refrigeration? Your insights would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Steven

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Salt Shipment to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Steven,

I’m currently organizing the shipment of 500 metric tons of salt from Halifax to Mumbai. Are we still on schedule for the delivery times previously discussed?

Best regards,
Pauline Lachance

email_chain.subject: Available Space on DP2 Supply Vessel from US Gulf to Eastern Caribbean
email_chain.body: Hey Jane, It looks like we might have available space on a DP2 supply vessel from the US Gulf to the Eastern Caribbean from early September, capable of transporting 13,500MTs of propylene. Do you have any need for transportation in this region? Please let me know as soon as possible. Thanks, Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Available Space on DP2 Supply Vessel from US Gulf to Eastern Caribbean
email_chain.body: Dear Lucas, Thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, we currently have no need for transportation in the Eastern Caribbean area. Best regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Additional Opportunities in West Africa
email_chain.body: Dear Lucas, Following up on our previous conversation, I have checked with the sales manager at our Bahamas office, and they confirmed that we do have some projects in West Africa that could match your vessel's capacity. We need transportation for propylene to Angola (16,000MTD required), Equatorial Guinea (24,000MTD required), and Gabon (40,000MTD required). If you are interested, please let me know. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Transportation Request for West Africa
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, Thank you for the information regarding possible projects in West Africa. I would be grateful if you could provide a quote for transporting 16,000 MTD of propylene to Angola, 24,000 MTD to Equatorial Guinea, and 40,000 MTD to Gabon. Best regards, Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation Request for West Africa
email_chain.body: Dear Lucas, Thank you for your inquiry. Currently, we do not have available space on any supply vessels that meet those specifications. We can only confirm availability for other upcoming supplies. Regards, Jane

labels.discharge_port: Eastern Caribbean, Angola, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Marco! I'm looking to book a quick shipment of 6000MT of methanol for ASAP loading, destined for Singapore. Could you let me know if you have any suitable options available for us? Thanks! Dave

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Your Support
email_chain.body: I just wanted to express my gratitude for your assistance this afternoon. Your dedication was impressive, and I will certainly recommend your service to all of my suppliers. Do let me know if there's anything else you might need from me. Regards, Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Software Integration
email_chain.body: Hello! I've recently started using SalesSilver and am trying to understand how it integrates with external systems. Could you explain how the software creates links to customers? Looking forward to your insights. Thanks in advance! Leo

email_chain.subject: Request for Automating Sales Reports
email_chain.body: Hi Marco! Thanks for your support; everything is working perfectly! However, I need to maintain regular checks on my sales reports. Is there a way to automate this process, as I'm already pulling leads from my website's contact form? Looking forward to your advice. Cheers, Jake

email_chain.subject: Requirement Check for Pico Interlink Test Equipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Romain,

Can you please check the recent forwarded details for the required test equipment for installation at the Pico Interlink? Please also consult with the assigned engineer to verify if any changes in the requirements are needed.

Thanks,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Requirement Check for Pico Interlink Test Equipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Rob,

I checked with our supplier M/s VIRES, INC. The SF-15 photo tester requires a software license, which will cost approximately $18,000 to $20,000 (USD). This license needs to be purchased to utilize the photo tester. Please consider checking with M/s VIRES, INC. regarding the lease agreement for using the photo tester. We must finalize the requirements for the Pico Interlink and determine if any additional accessories are needed for the SF-15 Photo tester. We are prepared to provide all the equipment necessary but you are welcome to supply your own equipment if preferred. In that scenario, we would not need to manage billing or logistics. Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Ms. Romain

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel with Offshore Capabilities
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We have a cargo load of 11,000MT of heavy hydrocarbons which requires special handling, and we are in need of an X-BULK vessel or semi-submersible that has offshore expertise. Additionally, it is essential for the vessel to feature DP2 capabilities. We are looking forward to hearing from you soon to discuss this requirement in detail.

Best regards,
Eunice

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vessel Availability for Heavy Hydrocarbons
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am following up on an earlier message concerning our requirement for a specialized vessel for transporting 11,000MT of heavy hydrocarbons. We prefer an X-BULK vessel or a semi-submersible with proven offshore capabilities and equipped with DP2 features. We would appreciate a prompt response regarding your fleet availability and other relevant details.

Kind regards,
Frans

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Special Handling Requirement for Heavy Hydrocarbon Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am urgently requesting information on the availability and specifications of vessels that can handle 11,000MT of heavy hydrocarbons. Our transport needs include an X-BULK vessel or a semi-submersible with offshore expertise and DP2 capabilities. Please let us know the earliest available options.

Thank you,
Sophie

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Heavy Hydrocarbons Special Handling Vessel Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Further to my colleagues' previous messages, I wish to reiterate our need for a specialized vessel able to carry 11,000MT of heavy hydrocarbons. We require a X-BULK vessel or semi-submersible with offshore expertise and DP2 capabilities. Could you please provide an update on your capacity to meet our requirements?

Warm regards,
Catherine

email_chain.subject: Exclusive Supplier Offer for Oat Groats
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Pratima,

I am pleased to present our exclusive offer to become your sole supplier of oat groats from New Zealand to Bandar Abbas. As part of our proposal, we are offering a complimentary sample of these high-quality groats to support your export strategy. Additionally, we are providing a 20% discount on the best pricing we can acquire for you.

To facilitate your dealings with a Canadian trading company, we have included email templates that can be easily copied into your email body by clicking the provided buttons.

We look forward to the possibility of serving your needs.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Sales Manager

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Oat Groats Import Proposal
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Pratima,

I wanted to follow up on our recent proposal regarding importing oat groats into Iran. One of our experts is ready to visit you to discuss this offer in detail, which we believe could be beneficial for your business. We understand that your representatives have also explored export opportunities in Canada, which adds value to our proposal.

We continue to offer assistance with contracting via the use of our email templates for your convenience.

Please let us know a suitable time for a meeting, if you are interested.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Sales Manager

email_chain.subject: Request to Supply Special Black Oat Varieties to Iran
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Pratima,

I hope this message finds you well. We are reaching out to extend an offer for our special Black Oat varieties, among other types available for export to Iran. We are fully prepared to meet the required quantity as per your needs.

If this interests you, please feel free to discuss further details with us.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Sales Manager

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About ARAMCO Charter for US Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Freeman,

I understand that you are seeking to book an ARAMCO charter for your shipment of 22,000mt of refined fuel to the US. Could you please send me your freight terms and what you are looking to offer? Additionally, please include any other pertinent details.

Kind regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About ARAMCO Charter for US Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for reaching out with your offer regarding the US shipment for our company, Greendriver. I will get back to you by June 4, 2006, with our freight terms and your requested details.

Regards,
Ms. Freeman

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Freeman,

It's good to hear from you. As discussed, I will provide our freight terms and an offer by June 4, 2006. Could you please send me some more details, such as your P/L statement, financial details, and any other information that would be necessary?

Thank you for giving us the opportunity to collaborate with you.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Fertilizer Sale
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. David,

Our company has 30,000 tons of liquid fertilizer available. Could you please inform us of your selling price per ton?

Best regards,
Ms. Freeman

email_chain.subject: Details on Fertilizer Acquisition
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Freeman,

Thank you for your inquiry about purchasing fertilizer. Here are the details needed:

- Shipper name: World International Fertilizer Company
- Importer name: 1st International from Egypt
- Commodity Description: Calcium Ammonium Nitrate 80%
- Quantity: 3,000 tons
- Booking date: Before June 20, 2006
- Payment terms: 100% advance payment
- Sales price: FOB or CFR
- Transportation method: By Container
- Port of loading: Aden, Yemen
- Vessel name: (To be decided, looking for the biggest and fastest available)

Please send us your offer as soon as possible and let us know your price.

Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about RHA Straw Pricing for 7,000MT
email_chain.body: I have a sale for 7,000MT of RHA straw. Can you offer a competitive rate or is your current pricing final? This is an initial inquiry; a lower offer would be appreciated. Best, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about RHA Straw Pricing for 7,000MT
email_chain.body: Hello Zoe, It's Lance from Cork. I've reviewed your inquiry - we've recently reduced our prices on both RHA and oat straw. You can check our new rates here: <Pricing link here>. We can supply 7,000MT with doorstep delivery. Please let me know the price you're considering, and we’ll see how we can assist. Best, Lance

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about RHA Straw Pricing for 7,000MT
email_chain.body: Lance, upon reviewing our needs, we actually require 15,000MT of straw. Can you extend your pricing adjustments to this larger amount? I need your best bid for 15,000MT. Thanks for your attention, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Revised Requirement of 15,000MT of Straw
email_chain.body: Lance, just a reminder, I've adjusted our requirement to 15,000MT of straw. I've attached a document detailing our needs and looking forward to your competitive bid. Thanks, Zoe

email_chain.subject: Proposal for 15,000MT of Straw
email_chain.body: Hi Zoe, We can accommodate your 15,000MT straw requirement. I've worked out a special rate, and attached the revised proposal. Please review and let me know if we can finalize this deal. Best, Lance

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Supply of Steel Coils from China to Spain
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Smith,

I am a Senior Purchaser at Superkoala Steel, and we are currently seeking a reliable supplier who can provide us with steel coils, to be shipped from China to Spain in bulk. Could you please let me know if your company can handle this requirement and, if so, provide a quote for this service?

Best regards,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Supply of Steel Coils from China to Spain
email_chain.body:
Dear Aaron,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can definitely meet your requirement for steel coils, given our extensive experience in exports to European markets. Our company, registered under the Indian Company Act, operates a modern facility with a 100-tonne capacity meltshop and a quality control laboratory. We also have a high-efficiency submerged arc furnace, hot and cold rolling plants, and coil/coke drive services. Annually, we produce up to 3,000 tonnes of Hot Rolled Coils for the international market, and we commit to supplying only top-quality, 100% Made in India products.

Please let us know more about your specific requirements so we can provide you with a detailed quote.

Warm regards,
Representative at Indian Exports

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Supply of Steel Coils from China to Spain
email_chain.body:
Dear Representative,

Thank you for your detailed response. I am glad to hear about your capabilities and am looking forward to receiving your detailed quotation soon.

Best regards,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Shipping Rate and Schedule Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. and Mrs. Ramsey,

We are preparing to ship 3,000MT of cardboard boxes from Lakeland to Adelaide. Could you please confirm your shipping rate and the schedule within the next 48 hours?

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Rate Confirmation for Lakeland to Adelaide Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Thank you for your prompt response. The rate for shipping and packing from Lakeland to Adelaide is approximately AUD $1,300. The consignment will be ready for collection in 4 days.

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Document Request for Shipment Inspection
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We look forward to utilizing your services. Please forward the necessary documents for our inspection at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Submission of Shipping Bid
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We appreciate the opportunity to serve you. We will submit our bid by next Tuesday and kindly request your feedback before that date.

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Shipment Order Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We appreciate your prompt response. Your company will receive our business for this shipment order.

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation - Lakeland to Adelaide Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Your company has been booked for the order of shipping 3,000MT of cardboard boxes from Lakeland to Adelaide.

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Join Us for Our Exciting Christmas Party on December 20th!
email_chain.body:

Be the best version of yourself.

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Don't Miss Our Annual Christmas Party!
email_chain.body:
