We hope to see you there!

Regards,
Mr. Bigger

P.S. Using MailTracker Pro, we've set up this reminder to be sent automatically 24 hours after our last email. How convenient is that for staying connected?

email_chain.subject: Request for Bulk Sugar Shipment Booking
email_chain.body:
Hello Sr. Melendez,

I’d like to engage your services for the shipment of bulk sugar from Zeebrugge to Genoa next week. Could you please confirm your earliest availability?

Best regards,
Santiago

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bulk Sugar Shipment Booking
email_chain.body:
Dear Santiago,

I’m sorry but I’m already fully booked until early next month. Could we possibly schedule for a later date?

Best regards,
Sr. Melendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bulk Sugar Shipment Booking
email_chain.body:
Sr. Melendez,

Our ship is currently delayed in Zeebrugge, however, we will be able to manage the shipment next week. Could you please check for any possibility to fit us into your schedule?

Best regards,
Santiago

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bulk Sugar Shipment Booking
email_chain.body:
Dear Santiago,

Unfortunately, our latest bookings are already filled. The earliest possible availability for your shipment would be the first week of the following month. Please let me know if this works for you or if there's anything else I can assist with.

Best regards,
Sr. Melendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bulk Sugar Shipment Booking
email_chain.body:
Sr. Melendez,

Given our schedule constraints, could you please confirm the first available date in the next month for the shipment of sugar from Zeebrugge to Genoa?

Best regards,
Santiago

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bulk Sugar Shipment Booking
email_chain.body:
Dear Santiago,

I’m deeply sorry but as per the current bookings, I am unable to confirm a spot before the stated period.  Please do reach out nearer to the date or if there are any cancellations I will immediately inform you.

Best regards,
Sr. Melendez

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Loading Schedule and Freight Rate Next Month
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, Could you advise on available dates for shipping between Singapore and Surabaya next month? We are looking to load 5,000MT of styrene. Please let me know the possible dates along with your approximate freight rate. Best, Taylor

email_chain.subject: Booking Request for Bulk Cargo of Styrene This Month
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, On behalf of our buyer in Singapore, I wish to book a bulk cargo load of 3,000MT of styrene from your terminal in Jakarta to be discharged in Singapore. Please confirm the available schedule for this month, and provide any available dates that can accommodate 5,000MT of styrene alongside your freight rate. Best regards, Taylor

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Request for Bulk Cargo of Styrene This Month
email_chain.body: Dear Taylor, We received your inquiry about the 3,000MT of styrene loading from Jakarta to Singapore. The available dates this month are October 3rd, 10th, 11th, and 14th. Please confirm as soon as possible if you need any of these dates to arrange for 5,000MT of styrene loading. Best regards, Shipping Department

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Styrene Loading Schedule and Surveyor Arrangement
email_chain.body: Dear Taylor, We confirm that your buyer in Singapore requires 3,000MT of styrene for loading from our terminal in Jakarta with scheduled dates between October 3rd and 14th for loading up to 5,000MT of styrene. We are pleased to offer our surveyor services to check the container's condition. Please provide us with a checklist for our surveyor's inspection and confirmation. Best regards, Shipping Department

email_chain.subject: Surveyor Service Confirmation and Appointment Scheduling
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, We acknowledge the arrangement for the surveyor to check our container's condition. We will send the checklist promptly and await your surveyor’s contact for an appointment. Best regards, Taylor

email_chain.subject: Incident Involving a New Intern
email_chain.body:
Dear Management Team,

I am writing to inform you about an incident that occurred today involving a new female intern. She arrived late, complained about not having a designated team, and continually voiced dissatisfaction with the arrangements. After discussing with her that the teams were already assigned, she claimed she could solve the existing issues due to her intelligence. Despite my suggestion to take the day off and reconsider her stance, she insisted on her capability to manage on her own. Eventually, she decided to leave for the day. 

Kind Regards,
Lina

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Methanol and Naphtha Purchase
email_chain.body:
Hi Mukai-san,

We want to order 7,000MT of methanol from Japan this month and would also like to request one load (3,200MT) of Naphtha as a sample to be taken to our refinery for analysis. Could you please provide the cost details to buy, ship, and test the Naphtha?

Thanks in advance,
Adam

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Methanol and Naphtha Purchase
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,

Thank you for your email. The cost for shipping the 3,200MT of Naphtha sample will be the same as one batch of methanol. Please note that the sample testing will be conducted in Rikon and the product will arrive in Japan in April.

Is there anything else I can help you with?

Kind regards,
Koji Furukawa
Tel: +81-25-225-0610 Ext. 401
Fax: +81-25-225-0612
email: koji.furukawa@jxnet.co.jp
JX Nippon Oil & Energy Corp.
JX Japan Methanol Co. Ltd.
http://www.jxnet.co.jp/english/

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Further Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Koji,

Thanks for your previous response. I'm available any day before I depart on Sunday for a phone call. Could you specify a convenient time for you?

Looking forward to our discussion.
Thank you.
Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Further Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Adam,

Thank you for your email. Today is 4/3, and I will be available on Monday the 7th. Due to a high volume of requests, my available time is limited. I apologize for the inconvenience.

Best regards,
Koji

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Shipping Inquiry to Lagos
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Ghosh,

I need to ship 1,600MT of 36% urea to Lagos at the earliest. Could you suggest the quickest route? I would prefer if it’s possible to utilize one of your DP2 vessels, although I am open to considering a DP1 vessel as well. Additionally, could you inform me if there are any CMA CGM ships heading towards Lagos this weekend?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Narun

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Shipping Inquiry to Lagos
email_chain.body:
Dear Narun,

Thank you for reaching out with your shipping inquiry. The route options and availability for Lagos can be quite varied, given the different schedules of ports in Africa. The choice of vessel and the shipment's origination in India might affect the availability of a suitable connection to Lagos. I recommend checking the arrival times for Lagos through our Port Schedule Search Tool, which you can find here: https://cma-cgmschedules.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/

Moreover, to explore different shipping services we offer in Lagos, please use our Schedule Explorer: https://www.schec-cma-cgm.com/schec/node/en/lagos

Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.

Best regards,
Mr. Ghosh

email_chain.subject: Availability Inquiry for Vessel to Transport Ethylene
email_chain.body: Good morning, Ms. Harper. One of our competitors from Europe is looking to transport a cargo of ethylene from Hamburg to Mexico. Could you please let me know if you have any vessel available at this moment? Best regards, Mohammad

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Inquiry for Vessel to Transport Ethylene
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Hamza, We apologize for the delay in responding; we have been facing some operational challenges at the office. Currently, we are arranging a shipment of 300MT of polystyrene from China to Rotterdam, scheduled to load on May 15th, 2021 with an arrival date of May 4th. Best regards, Hanly

email_chain.subject: Update on Previous Queries
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Hanly, I apologize for the delayed response due to a hectic schedule in our department. Our sales representative contacted you yesterday to address his inquiries. Please feel free to reach out to him for any further details. Best regards, Manager

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about 40ft Container Shipping Availability
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Manager, Could you please confirm your availability for a 40ft container (HH class) on April 5th for shipping 300MT of antifreeze from Rotterdam to Indonesia? The FOB price is pegged at $500,000, plus container fees. Please let me know at your earliest convenience. Best regards, Pete

email_chain.subject: Charter Request for 3000MT Containership between Piraeus and Hamburg

Are you available on Tuesday to charter a 3,000MT containership for 300 days? The vessel will depart on Saturday from Piraeus and is expected to arrive in Hamburg on Thursday. Please confirm as soon as possible.

Yours truly,
The Sales and Chartering Team

email_chain.subject: Updated Program for Containership Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Madame Gasparian,

Hello! I have sent you the updated program for the 300 day container ship voyage between Piraeus and Hamburg via WhatsApp. I am looking forward to working with you in close cooperation and dialogue on this and other projects.

Sincerely,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Office Closure Notification
email_chain.body:
Dear Madame Gasparian,

I apologize for the absence of appointments on our calendar for next week. This week we will be closing on Monday so that all our colleagues can take the week off. We look forward to being in contact with you soon.

Thanks,
Eric

email_chain.body:

I am writing to inform you that Mr Andrei Pop will no longer be leading the charter project due to unforeseen circumstances. We will update you soon on the new project leader. We appreciate your understanding.

ShippingCo Team

Additionally, I noted that 2,000MT of rice has been sold from Vietnam paired with coir yarn. It surprises me, given our proximity to major yarn production. On another note, it seems you've sold the berths we were looking at previously. Can you suggest alternative carriers? Best regards, Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Confirmation of Paddy Shipment Booking and Inquiry on Other Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Kim, yes, the correct booking is for 18,000MT of paddy. As for shipping alternatives, I will send you the details of available carriers soon. Thank you, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Re: Documents Request for 18,000MT Paddy Booking
email_chain.body: Thank you for your reply. I need the shipment documents to finalize internally. Could you send them as soon as they're ready? Regards, Kim

email_chain.subject: Shipment Documents Attached for 18,000MT Paddy
email_chain.body: Hi Kim, please find attached the invoice and other relevant documents for your 18,000MT booking. Let me know if everything is in order or if there are any issues. Best, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Documents Attached for 18,000MT Paddy
email_chain.body: Thank you for the documents, Natalie. Just to confirm, is the selling price for the 18,000 MT of paddy still the same as previously discussed? Best, Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Price Confirmation for 18,000MT Paddy
email_chain.body: Dear Kim, yes, the price remains as initially quoted. Thank you. Best regards, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Request for Re-Sending Documents on Monday
email_chain.body: Can you please resend the same documents again on Monday? I will be out of the office till then. Thanks, Kim

email_chain.subject: Re-Sending Documents Next Monday for 18,000MT Paddy
email_chain.body: Hi Kim, I will resend the documents for the 18,000MT of paddy on Monday as requested. Have a good day. Regards, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Final Shipment Documents for 18,000MT Paddy
email_chain.body: Hi Kim, I wanted to confirm that the documents have been sent. Please check your attachment. Thank you, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Logistics and Costs
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Benson,

I'm interested in shipping 20,000MT of road salt from Narita Airport to Buffalo. Could you let me know if there's a fee for storing the cargo before it's picked up? Additionally, I'd like to understand the insurance costs per container and per mile, as well as the premium for 1,200 MT of salt.

email_chain.subject: Communication Issues
email_chain.body:
Dr. Benson,

I've been trying to reach you regarding my earlier email. I called your office yesterday but didn't receive a response. Are our email systems properly synchronized? It may be beneficial to ensure we can efficiently connect via either email or phone to avoid communication delays.

Sincerely,
Lloyd

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Lack of Response
email_chain.body:
Dr. Benson,

I've been trying to contact you multiple times about the road salt shipment without a reply. This morning, I called again and left a message. I must express my frustration due to the lack of communication from your end. Timely responses are crucial for our operational planning.

Please advise regarding my previous questions at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
Lloyd

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Additional Methyl Alcohol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Martinez,

We are looking to add an additional 4,000MT of methyl alcohol to our upcoming shipment from Nanjing to New York in two weeks. Could you please confirm if this amount can be accommodated? Additionally, could you provide the sea transport cost for a larger shipment of 10,000MT expected in the same timeframe?

Kind regards,
Chris Green

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Additional Methyl Alcohol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Green,

Please find attached the invoice for the 4,000MT of methyl alcohol as discussed. Kindly review and confirm if the details are satisfactory. Should you wish to adjust the amount, please inform us as soon as possible. Additionally, the cost for transporting 10,000MT is currently being calculated and will be sent to you shortly.

Best regards,
Ms. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Shipping Options for Automotive Oils
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Carter, I am looking to arrange a shipment of 20,000MT of automotive oils from Lianyungang to Ras al-Khaimah. I am considering two routing options: Option A: A sailing duration of 45 days from Weihai to Jebel Ali via Singapore with three containers, each holding six units of 400MT. Option B: A sailing duration of 45 days from Qingdao to Fujairah via Algeciras, Cartagena, and Singapore with one 45′ container, comprising five units of 500MT each. Could you please provide details on the available options for both sailings and the expected total demurrage at the destination? Regards, Amanda

email_chain.subject: Request for New Shipping Options and Demurrage Estimation
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Carter, I currently source supplies from Singapore and Amman but am seeking an alternative port closer to the client to reduce delivery time. I am evaluating the following logistics: - Two 40′ containers each carrying 200MT from Singapore to Ras Al Khaimah via Jebel Ali and Doha. - One 40′ container carrying 200MT from Amman to Fujairah via Jebel Ali and Doha. Could you please provide options for altering these routes along with an estimate of the total demurrage at the destination? Regards, Patrick

labels.discharge_port: Jebel Ali, Fujairah, Ras Al Khaimah, Doha

email_chain.subject: Update on arrangements for Qinhuangdao trip

I'm now trying to gather three people for the Qinhuangdao trip tomorrow. I'm waiting to receive confirmation from the third person. Talk soon!

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Demurrage Clause for Silicate Powder Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Jones,

I am planning to ship 5,600MT of silicate powder from Rotterdam to Sharjah. We are looking to expedite the process and would appreciate it if you could provide details of your standard demurrage clause.

Thank you,
Donnie

email_chain.subject: Request for Detention Fees Information for Silicate Powder Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jones,

I am currently working with Mr. Della Croce of Silcows Logistics on transporting 4,500MT of silicate powder from Foshan to Rotterdam. As we are keen to initiate this business with your assistance, please let us know your standard detention fees for this route.

Regards,
Donnie

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipping Capacity Inquiry from Qingdao to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Qiu,

Do you still have capacity for this shipment of 4,200MT of epoxy from Qingdao to Hong Kong? We need to firm up the rate within three days. Looking forward to your prompt response.

Thank you,
Gerald

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Shipping Capacity Inquiry from Qingdao to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Hi Gerald,

Last week, we discussed another freight which also had a China export CFR to Hong Kong at $700 per metric ton totaling to an overall rate. However, could you please confirm if the weight calculations have deducted the two bales of garbage bags and four empty pallets? Please check the total weight for the other 4,180MT. The revised total price should then amount to $682/MT. Could you kindly confirm this adjusted final price?

Thank you,
Qiu

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Shipping Capacity Inquiry from Qingdao to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Hi Qiu,

I'll review the weights and update the calculations accordingly. Expect my confirmation on the adjusted pricing soon.

Best regards,
Gerald

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Importing Commodities from China
email_chain.body:
Good evening Mr. Galloway,

I know you are currently working in China, and I am seeking your advice regarding importing commodities from this region. Could you help me understand where I can obtain reliable information about prices, delivery dates, and duty implications for these imports?

With best wishes,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Importing Commodities from China
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Michael,

It's great to hear from you. Meeting you was indeed a pleasure. I hope your visit to China was fruitful and that you are planning your next visit. I would be delighted to assist you further during your next trip. For now, I am attaching the contact details of our current clients; it might provide you with insights into the trade environment here. Please visit us again for a deeper understanding of our business practices.

Feel free to reach out for more information or any support you need concerning trade in China.

Best regards,
Mr. Galloway

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Importing Commodities from China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Galloway,

Thank you for the swift response and for the list of contacts. Your offer to support on my next visit is much appreciated. I will reach out to arrange more details as my plans develop.

Thank you again,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Urgent Response Needed: Vessel Availability and Quote for Oil Cargo
email_chain.body: I’m trying to reach you regarding your request for a quote on an oil shipment from Los Angeles to Singapore. We understand the tight deadlines, so we are working to provide a quote as swiftly as possible. We believe we can have a competitive offer ready in the next 48 hours, but it heavily relies on the availability and timing of a suitable vessel. Our current option, the container ship M/V Santa Rosalia, is projected for an undefined arrival time in Los Angeles. We are finalizing the ETA and will update you promptly. Your timely feedback on the vessel ETA will be appreciated to move forward seamlessly. Apologies for the urgency, and thank you for your cooperation.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Response Needed: Vessel Availability and Quote for Oil Cargo
email_chain.body: Thank you for the update. It's crucial for us to adhere to our schedule as the final delivery to our customers in Singapore is due by mid-June. We only received this order last Friday, making our timeline extremely tight. Could you confirm if the M/V Santa Rosalia is still available for this shipment? Currently, it is docked in Shanghai, and we've noted that arrangements are being made for its departure to Los Angeles. If you have a confirmed ETA for the vessel, it would be greatly helpful for our planning.

email_chain.subject: Contract Price for Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Attached is the contract price for the transportation of your bulk oil cargo from Los Angeles to Singapore. While it’s our best current offer, we remain hopeful for a more favorable market response and will keep an eye out for an improved bid. We’ve been actively monitoring the market, which has shown increased fluctuations recently. We appreciate your patience and understanding, and will notify you immediately if a better offer emerges.

email_chain.subject: Financing Inquiry for Freight Shipping
email_chain.body: I am inquiring about your department's willingness to offer financing options for our upcoming crude oil shipment from the U.S. West Coast to China. Could you provide details on your current interest rates and payment terms, while ensuring that they are more favorable compared to traditional financial institutions? We are seeking terms that will provide us with greater flexibility in our operations.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Rates to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Adi,

We received your inquiry regarding shipping 20,000 tons to Houston CFR. You have provided us two vessels under your 'Vessel Options'. Can you please supply the complete rate sheet from the company for these options? We appreciate your prompt response.

Best Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Rates to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

Thank you for your message. We have reviewed the details of the vessels you provided. Unfortunately, your current quote appears higher than expected and not very competitive. Could you please send us a more competitive rate sheet? Feel free to reach out if further details are needed.

Best Regards,
Adi

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Rates to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Adi,

We received your email regarding the rate sheet. We would like to add two vessels to our charters, specifically a Bulk Carrier and a Heavy Lift Vessel, for which we require the estimated annual spot rate. Please send us the estimated rate sheet based on yearly runs.

If you need any more details, please let us know.

Best Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Additional Vessel Rates
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

We have noted your request to add two new vessels with an annual rate inquiry. Could you please provide the rates on an annual basis for these new vessels? We look forward to your quick response.

Best Regards,
Adi

email_chain.subject: Arrival of Kerosene Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark,
The 700MT of kerosene you’re shipping is expected to arrive in Las Palmas. Could you please inform me of the anticipated arrival date of the cargo?
Sincerely,
George

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up on Kerosene Order
email_chain.body:
Dear George,
I am following up on our current order of 700MT of kerosene. Should there be any issues with the shipment, please do not hesitate to notify me. Feel free to ask if you have any questions regarding the shipment.
Regards,
Kyle

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Your Recent Email Communication
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark,
In my capacity as an executive, I recognize the importance of composing clear, well-structured emails. Your recent communication regarding the shipment was a good example. The content was straightforward and easy to understand. The only oversight was addressing George by his first name instead of using a formal title. Your informal approach was noted, although addressing him as “Mr. George” might have been preferable. Nevertheless, your message was clear and effectively addressed the main points.
Regards,
Eko

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Transportation from Aqaba to Eilat
email_chain.body:
Dear Hennessey,
Would your ship be able to carry 30,000MT of iron ore from Aqaba to Eilat, and are you familiar with the route? If so, please send us an offer.
Regards,
Ramon

email_chain.subject: Request for Updated Price List and Proposal
email_chain.body:
Dear Hennessey,
Many thanks for your response. We would like to see an updated price list and a proposal for a three-month agreement.
Regards,
Ramon

email_chain.subject: Sending Business Profile
email_chain.body:
Dear Hennessey,
We will send you our complete business profile for your better understanding of our operations.
Regards,
Ramon

email_chain.subject: Query about Soft Drum Rates Drop
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Lewis, I noticed a recent change in the 'soft drum rates' listed on your website. Could you please explain the reason for this change? Best regards, Geoffrey

email_chain.subject: RE: Query about Soft Drum Rates Drop
email_chain.body: Hi Geoffrey, The change in the soft drum rates to -50% was due to an error in our previous listings, where these rates were mistakenly included. They have now been corrected. If you require the current personal rate of -50%, please respond with your personal ID number and I will apply it to your account. Additionally, if you wish to support us, consider adding your personal rate as a donation. Best regards, Howard F. Lewis

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote: Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello, Max! Could you please provide me with a quote for 10,000MT of soybean oil from Paranaguá to Abu Dhabi? Regards, Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Grace, Thank you for your inquiry. Soybean oil is currently in very high demand, and we are working hard to secure the supplies for our clients. Unfortunately, due to the current market conditions, we are not able to provide a quote at this time. Please let me know if there is anything else we can do for you. Sincerely, Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Jack, Thank you for your response. I am very sorry to hear that you are currently unable to provide a quote. We appreciate your understanding and your efforts to find a solution. Please keep me updated should the situation change. I am looking forward to your reply. Best Regards, Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Grace, Thank you for your patience. Unfortunately, we still have not received any updates from our suppliers regarding the availability of soybean oil. We will keep you informed as soon as we receive new information. Best Regards, Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Grace, Unfortunately, we are still not able to provide a quote for soybean oil. We are continuing our discussions with our suppliers, and I will keep you updated as soon as we receive any updates. Best Regards, Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote: Soybean Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Grace, We have received updates from our suppliers, and we can now provide a quote for soybean oil. The estimated delivery time is 60-90 days, and the price per ton is $400. I will send you the contract and payment details shortly. Best Regards, Jack

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Rice Shipment in June
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Santos, We are coordinating a shipment of rice from Yawata, Japan to Benin that requires your immediate attention. Could you confirm if a laycan for June is possible? Additionally, could you provide the cost estimate considering the short lead time? Yours, April

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Rice Shipment in June
email_chain.body: Dear April, Thanks for reaching out. We've confirmed the vessel for a June 25 departure to Benin. The total cost is $____, including ocean freight from U.S. port to Japanese port, customs clearance in Benin, and transportation from Japanese port to the Beninese warehouse, as agreed. We have completed all required payments and will issue your invoice shortly. Are you representing your client in this transaction, or is this shipment from your own stock? Regards, Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Rice Shipment in June
email_chain.body: Thank you for your message of May 19. We will import the rice on our own behalf, as is standard for our food imports. We intend to purchase a few trucks for inland transportation from local sources in Benin. We will also handle port clearance and any potential legal issues independently. Does this clarify your query? Regards, April

email_chain.subject: Regarding Advance Payment for Rice Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Santos, Glad to hear the arrangements are on track. We have made an advance payment for the rice shipment. Could you verify the precise routing of the shipment from your end? Sincerely, T. Watkins

email_chain.subject: Update on Rice Shipment Routing
email_chain.body: Dear Watkins, Thanks for your message. The shipment of rice has now left Yawata for Manila. It is expected to take 4-6 weeks from Manila to Benin. We anticipate no delays and have informed our supplier about this change in routing. Yours, Matsuo

email_chain.subject: Urgent Need for Shipping Soybeans
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Bravo,

I need a ship ASAP for a 5,000MT soybean shipment from Ningbo. Do you accept Letters of Advance (LADs) on barrel transactions, and do you have an open laycan for Zeebrugge that’s ideal for this load?

Thanks,
Desmond

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Need for Shipping Soybeans
email_chain.body:
Dear Desmond,

I’m delighted to assist with your soybean shipment. We have available space on our 1999-built, 48,000 DWT clean diesel carrier, scheduled to depart from Ningbo on November 20 and arrive in Zeebrugge after a 16-day journey. We can accommodate up to 4,400MT. Here’s the proposed rate:

- RoRo transfer: $1.00/FT + $4.00/MT discharge charge
- Boarding & stow: $0.00/FT + $0.00/MT
- Gross Toll: $25.00/FT + $1.00/MT
- NAVFAC Tolls: $30.00/FT

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Additional Ship Availability for Soybeans
email_chain.body:
Dear Desmond,

Further to my earlier email, I have also secured an option for a barge via Shiraichi Shipping lines, capable of carrying the full 5,000MT. The rates for this option are as follows:

- Boarding & stow: $0.00/FT + $0.00/MT
- Cargo toll: $0.00/FT + $0.00/MT
- NAVFAC Tolls: $0.00/FT
- Charter Fee: $8.00/FT
- Tramp Charges: $0.00/FT
- Gross Toll: $0.00/FT

Please let me know which option you prefer.

Best regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Brokerage Fees Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Cris,

You recently shipped 7,000MT of coal from Port Sudan to Qatar. Your invoice for $900,000 is accurate. Please prepare and send us the 2% brokerage or lien fees statement.

Thank you,
Devi

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice and Brokerage Fees Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Devi,

Thank you for your email. Regarding the 2% brokerage fee, please note that your account number 5011234 is still in arrears. Kindly wire the amount of $18,000 to settle this.

Accounts Payable: Please pay the sum of $18,000 as the lien fees for the $900,000 invoice for shipping of 7,000MT coal from Port Sudan to Qatar.

Kind regards,
Your Computer Programmer
Cris

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Cris,

We have processed the payment of $18,000 for the brokerage fee as per your instructions.

Best regards,
Accounts Department

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Contract Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response to our previous correspondence. Please confirm the following details of our deal:

- Booking number: nnnn
- Cargo weight: tons
- Delivery date: dd/mmm/yyyy
- Cargo origin: Port
- Destination port: Port
- Booking class: AA / BW / VL / VH
- Please quote only the carriage charges, fees, and other charges
- Price per ton in soft currency
- Specify if FOB (Free on Board) or CIF (Cost, Insurance and Freight)
- Refer to our contract clause number (if any)
- Confirm back-to-back clearance for no. of days

Looking forward to your confirmation.

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Contract Details
email_chain.body:
Hello,

We are pleased to confirm the contract details as below:

1. Booking number: specified
2. Cargo weight: specified (tons)
3. Delivery date: specified (dd/mmm/yyyy)
4. Cargo origin: specified (Port)
5. Destination port: specified (Port)
6. Booking class: specified (AA / BW / VL / VH)
7. Carriage charges: as quoted
8. Fees: as quoted
9. Other charges: as quoted
10. Price per ton: specified (soft currency)
11. Terms: specified (FOB or CIF)
12. Our contract clause number: specified (if any)
13. Clearance for back-to-back: confirmed for specified days

Please review and let us know if everything is in order.

email_chain.subject: Final Contract Agreement and Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Please find attached the complete contract document ready to be signed by both parties. The terms are as agreed:

1. Agreement and acceptance of all terms and conditions in the contract. Kindly notarize and legalize the document at your office.
2. Commitment to abide by all international laws and regulations.
3. Our company will handle any claims imposed by local laws in a foreign country beyond our insurance coverage limits, making necessary efforts to cover these expenses.
4. Assignment of a local representative for the delivery of our goods at your nominated location.
5. Provision of $100,000 worth of insurance coverage per the agreement.

Please confirm by signing the attached document.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Chemical Tanker Transportation from Los Angeles to Ulsan

Kind regards,

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Chemical Tanker Transportation from Los Angeles to Ulsan
email_chain.body:

AOE Ops

email_chain.subject: Additional Details for Chemical Tanker Requirement
email_chain.body:
Hey!

Following up on our earlier communication, our client needs a quote for 3 x 12,500 DWT Bunker/Chemical carriers equipped with a double skin system. email_chain.subject: FW: Opportunity for Solution Proposal

AOE Ops
13856 Jones Hollow Road
Suite 1032
Lancaster, OH 43130
United States

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Rate Quote Required for Korea-Singapore-Indonesia Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kim,

Hope you’re well, and thanks for your message. I’ve looked at your vessel itinerary and this would work well. Unfortunately, I’m not seeing any rate quotes for Korea-Singapore-Indonesia. Can you provide a rate for 5,200MT next month, including any surcharge amounts?

Thank you again.

Best regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Additional Costs and Service Speed
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kim,

Thank you for the quote you provided. I have a few questions before proceeding:
1. What is the service speed on the route?
2. What are the cruising conditions?
3. Are there fees for consumption? If so, please specify the cost per unit (e.g., Diesel 100USD per MT, Fresh Water 100USD per MT).
4. Are there any charges for berthing? If so, what are the amounts?
5. Does your price include all charges? Please confirm if additional costs for port dues, anchorage fees, or other are applicable.

Looking forward to your timely response.

Best,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Rate Quote for August and September - Singapore to South Korea
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kim,

I understand there is availability in August and September for the 5,200MT capacity from Singapore to South Korea and back to Singapore. Could you please provide a rate quote including all associated costs for these months? We are considering an extension into September.

Your quote should encompass:
A) Consumption of bunker fuel, crew wages, and all related costs.
B) All other costs, including port charges, mooring costs, and fuel.
C) Miscellaneous fees, including any additional charges not previously discussed.

Please confirm if this is feasible on your end.

Thank you,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for 2-Year Period in Singapore, Korea, Indonesia
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kim,

I have sent you a charter inquiry for a 2-year period for operations across Singapore, Korea, and Indonesia. The vessel requirements are as follows:
- Maximum capacity of 5000 DWT with 100% of cargo well stowed.
- At least 35% of cargo space available for storage.
- Accommodation for 70-75 crew members.
- A clean deck and hold.

Please also confirm if there is a fuel surcharge. We aim to ensure clarity on all terms before proceeding.

Warm regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Offer for Molasses Cargo from Sanganeb to Angola
email_chain.body: Hi Amit, We have 2,500 MT of molasses ready in Sanganeb bound for Angola. We are quoting you $75/MT CFR, but would like to drop the laytime requirement down to 30 hours to encourage fast turnaround. Could you provide your best offer, and is there any discount if the laytime is under 36 hours? Kind regards, Lisa

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Large Molasses Order
email_chain.body: Hi Amit, Could you please advise your best quote for a molasses purchase? Your last tender was at $60/MT. We are ready to load 25,000 MT but are considering an order up to 100,000 MT. Could we discuss possible discounts for this volume? Kind regards, Sandhya

email_chain.subject: Request to Avoid Araiqi for Loading due to Vessel Specifications
email_chain.body: Could we avoid using Araiqi to load as our vessels have a 10m beam and require facilities compatible with a Fast Anchor Light (FAL) to manage this width? We are open to last-minute changes in loading points if necessary. Could you also offer a discount considering these specific requirements? Regards, Amit

email_chain.subject: Molasses Purchase Inquiry for Algeciras
email_chain.body: Amit, Please provide your best offer for 30,000 MT of molasses C&F to Algeciras. I'm looking for a compelling deal. Kind regards, Ralf

labels.vessel: 10m beam vessel with Fast Anchor Light

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for consolidated cargo from Xiamen
email_chain.body:
Dear Yang,

Are you able to offer us a consolidated cargo shipment of around 3,200MT of pumice aggregate from Xiamen? We would need the vessel by the 23rd of this month. Also, could you inform us about your average freight rate from Xiamen port to Macau? 

Cheers,
Rania

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for consolidated cargo from Xiamen
email_chain.body:
Dear Rania,

Thank you for reaching out. Currently, we are engaged with other producers in Xiamen and cannot offer a consolidated shipment from there at this time. However, our current freight rate stands at 7% per ton for shipments from Xiamen to Macau, which is very competitive compared to other suppliers.

Regards,
Yang

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Capacity Inquiry for Beef Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Ryan,

Thank you for your commitment to ship 14,000MT of beef from Japan to Durban. Can you please confirm the receipt of this order? Additionally, could you inform me if you have any extra capacity available?

I look forward to receiving your updated schedule.

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Additional Costs and Timeline
email_chain.body:
Hello Ryan,

Please confirm the receipt of my letter dated June 7? I am currently coordinating with our Durban contact to discuss the procurement of South African meat in larger quantities via your agency. Could you provide details on the costs associated with customs clearance at Durban port and any other potential extra costs?

Additionally, what would the initial costs be for us, the importer, if I ship the meat under the invoice but ensure payment is guaranteed?

Do you have extra availability? Please also provide the lead time for the shipments.

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Follow-up and Concern Regarding Shipment Issues
email_chain.body:
Hello Ryan,

I am concerned as I have not yet received a reply from you. Additionally, the Shoutzu representative in Durban had several unfortunate experiences with my previous shipment of frozen beef. I am wary of sending further containers via your agents without understanding what went wrong.

Could you please provide some insights or suggestions on how we can proceed with future shipments?

Kind regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Re: Your Recent Concerns and Shipment Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Gloria,

I have received your emails. Regarding the tender in Japan, we had some discussions with Mr. Nakano at Asahi Kasei, and we hope to resolve the matters soon. I will keep you updated accordingly.

Please refer to my invoice #461664 from Durban for your records. I have included an estimate for getting your vessel through customs. Upon my return from overseas next week, I will provide a formal quote. In the meantime, please arrange the payment for the terminal charges as we have rectified the delays with container discharge and the documentation is in process.

Best regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Ingram,

We need 32,500MT of sugar shipped from Australia to Hong Kong within the next two weeks. Could you please provide us with a freight estimate for this order?

Thanks,
Raymond

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Raymond,

Thank you for your inquiry. The price for shipping 32,500MT of sugar from Australia to Hong Kong is $650,000, plus $1,200 per container. Would you like to proceed with this order?

Thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Sugar Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ingram,

We have decided to go ahead with the order for 32,500MT of sugar as per your quoted price. Please send us a proforma invoice and the shipping instructions.

Looking forward to doing business with you.
Regards,
Raymond

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Shipping Instructions
email_chain.body:
Dear Raymond,

We have received your confirmation for the sugar order. Attached is the proforma invoice along with the shipping details. Please review and let us know if everything is in order.

Thank you for placing your order with us.
Regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Availability of Plywood Cargo for Freight
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Do, We have 1,000 MT of plywood ready in Indonesia. If next week is available for transport, please confirm with all necessary details. Sincerely, Hector

email_chain.subject: Visit Invitation to Guangzhou Office
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Do, You are welcome to visit our facility in Guangzhou. Our manager will meet you at the port. Our contact details are: Name: Yang Yang, Location: Mochou Mountain, Phone: +86 13570183633, Email: yangyang@ehborders.com. We would like to introduce our logistics company, which has been in operation for 18 years. Thanks, Yang.

email_chain.subject: Arrangement for Visit to Guangzhou
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Do, We look forward to your visit to our company. Mr. Yang will pick you up from your hotel and guide you to our office. We will enjoy lunch together followed by a brief tour of our office. Our office is located in South China, and you may choose any airport in Guangzhou for your arrival. Thanks a lot, Yang.

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement of Visit Organisation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Yang, Thank you for your efforts and the detailed introduction to your company. I am looking forward to collaborating in the future. Best Regards, Asana Anchari

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Visit and Further Cooperation
email_chain.body: Dear Asana, Thank you for visiting us and bringing such positive energy. It was a pleasure meeting you for the first time. You are always welcome at our company, which has a long history of excellent performance, and I look forward to our long-term business development. Best Regards, Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Chartering Vessel from Sidoarjo to Jakarta
email_chain.body: Hello Eddie, We’d like to charter your vessel for a shipment from Sidoarjo to Jakarta. Could you provide us with a freight estimate? Additionally, would you be able to accommodate an early delivery date? Cheers, Ben

email_chain.subject: Re: Chartering Vessel from Sidoarjo to Jakarta
email_chain.body: Hi Ben, Your shipment is confirmed for early delivery. I will include our initial freight estimate for your review along with an invoice. Feel free to let me know if you have any questions. Regards, Eddie

email_chain.subject: Re: Chartering Vessel from Sidoarjo to Jakarta - Meeting Reschedule
email_chain.body: Hi Eddie, Thanks for the information. I’d like to reschedule our meeting to discuss the delivery details of our shipments. Please allow us a few days to make the necessary arrangements. All the best, Ben

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Rescheduling Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello Ben, I am happy to reschedule our meeting to review the delivery details. Could you please provide at least two days' notice so we can confirm the time? Regards, Eddie

email_chain.subject: Re: Chartering Vessel from Sidoarjo to Jakarta - Meeting Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Eddie, I am really looking forward to our meeting tomorrow. Could you confirm the time and location, just in case I have any difficulty finding the place? Best, Ben

email_chain.subject: Re: Tomorrow's Meeting Details
email_chain.body: Hi Ben, Our meeting is set for tomorrow at 2pm. I look forward to seeing you then. Regards, Eddie

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Liquid Chlorine from China to Sharjah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ahmadi,
Could you advise if you have a suitable vessel for transporting 1,000MT of liquid chlorine from China to Sharjah in the next two weeks? What would be your approximate freight quote for this route?
Best regards,
Luisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Liquid Chlorine from China to Sharjah
email_chain.body:
Dear Luisa,
We have excellent relations with key partners in the UAE, including S.Ashraf Oil Trading Co. Ltd, and facilitate shipments of LPG, NGL, and FSO to and from regions including China/Qatar. We are looking forward to assisting you with your requirements. Kindly share any further details about your needs so we can serve you better.
Regards,
Y. S. Sonalaa

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Y. S. Sonalaa,
Thank you for your prompt response. Aside from the transportation of liquid chlorine, I am interested in exploring further options in bulk chemicals transportation. I am available for a call to discuss in detail.
Best,
Luisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Logistics Services
email_chain.body:
Dear Luisa,
We offer comprehensive logistics services, including sea, land, air, and door-to-door logistics. We aim to expand our offerings and would be more than happy to discuss how we can specifically tailor our services for your business needs.
Kind regards and a happy new year,
Y. S. Sonalaa

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Further Cooperation
email_chain.body:
Hi,
It's great to hear about your extensive services. We are keen to expand our cooperation beyond just shipping. Could we perhaps schedule a meeting next week to discuss our logistic needs and potential partnership expansions?
Regards,
Luisa

email_chain.subject: Space Reservation Request for DAP Shipment
email_chain.body: Hey Bev, I have 800MT of feed-grade DAP in Kemner that needs to ship out this week. Would you be able to reserve space for me? Thanks, Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Space Reservation Request for DAP Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul, Thanks for reaching out. I can reserve the space for this shipment. Please send me the following documents:
- VGM
- Certificate of Insurance
- Third-party bill of lading
Once received, I will finalize the bill of lading for the shipment. ~Bev

email_chain.subject: Document Submission for DAP Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Bev, I have sent the following documents for your account # XXXX:
- Insurance
- Bill of Lading
Please arrange shipment to: Panama Canal Zone, Colon, Royal Caribbean, Puerto Cabezas, Nicaragua. Expect all materials to be processed in 2 days. Thanks, Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Document Submission for DAP Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Paul, Thanks for sending the documents. I've instructed our contractor to proceed with the shipment. Additionally, would you like to add this shipment details to my company's contact list for future transactions? ~Bev

email_chain.subject: Approval to Add Details to Contact List
email_chain.body: Hi Bev, Yes, please add my account to your contacts. Thanks for the service you provided. Paul

email_chain.subject: Bill of Lading Sent
email_chain.body: Hi Paul, I have just sent the bill of lading for your goods in PDF format. Please check your email for the attachment. Thanks, Bev

email_chain.subject: Receipt Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Bev, I've received the goods successfully. Thank you for shipping them efficiently. Paul

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Shipment Request
email_chain.body: Hi, I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to touch base regarding an opportunity to ship 3,000 MTs of cargo from Algeciras. It's a time-sensitive shipment, and I'm reaching out to see if you can facilitate this transfer within the next 2 days. Thanks for your assistance!

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Shipment Request
email_chain.body: Apologies for the delay in my response, but I am currently running some logistical tests. Please keep me informed if there are updates or changes needed on my end. We will work things out soon. Thank you!

email_chain.subject: Shipping Plan and Cost Estimate
email_chain.body: I've identified a feasible plan to ship the 3,000 MTs of cargo from Algeciras to Vostochny. The estimated cost is $27,000, which appears to be more economical than alternative methods. Shall we proceed with this shipment plan? I hope all is well with you. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Enquiry from Sydney to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hey Cap'n Ju,

We have a shipment of 13,000 MT of iron ore from Sydney to Shanghai. Could you inform us if you are able to load on the 24th, and clarify your demurrage policy? Also, may I have your permission to forward this email to your team?

Regards,
Rui

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipping Enquiry for 5,000 MT of Iron Ore to Guangzhou
email_chain.body:
Hi Cap'n Ju,

I am the Senior Buyer at Haitian Steel. We have an urgent requirement to ship 5,000 MT of 65% iron ore from Brisbane, aiming for a loading date of March 2nd. Can this cargo be delivered to Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Ningbo or Guangzhou Port? Your swift response would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Rui

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for 10,000 MT Iron Ore Shipment in Early February
email_chain.body:
Hello Cap'n Ju,

We are looking to ship 10,000 MT of iron ore from Sydney to Shanghai, and we need to know if you have containers ready for packing and available to load by the 5th of February. Your assistance in this matter will help us greatly.

Regards,
Rui

email_chain.subject: Shipment of Yellow Chalk Powder from Suzhou to Tokyo
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Chang, We have 300MT of yellow chalk powder ready for shipment from Suzhou to Tokyo. Could you confirm if your office is open this afternoon for further discussion? Sincerely, Kim

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Previous Email
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Chang, I noticed a typo in my last email regarding the use of 'We' in the last sentence. My apologies for any confusion. Sincerely, Kim

email_chain.subject: Meeting Location Change
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Chang, Due to unforeseen circumstances, I suggest we meet at the coffee shop instead of the park. Is noon ok for you? Sincerely, Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Location Change
email_chain.body: Dear Kim, I received your message about the change in location. Noon at the coffee shop works for me. See you then. Regards, Mr. Chang

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding the Expression 'Out'
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Chang, How is the expression 'out' commonly used? Is it appropriate to say a venue is 'out' if we plan to meet in the afternoon? Kind regards, Kim

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed on Appointment Expression
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Chang, Could you share your thoughts on the difference between saying 'We had an appointment' versus 'We meet at 2:00'? Thank you, Kim

email_chain.subject: Request for Language Advice
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Chang, Could you check these versions of asking for someone's name and advise which is the best choice? 1. Could you tell me your name? 2. Could I ask you your name? 3. May I ask you your name? Thank you, Kim

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Lane, Ship Availability and FIO Quotes for GOM Iron Ore Transport
email_chain.body: Hello! I am interested in shipping 40,000MT of GOM Iron Ore from West Africa to Singapore. Could you provide information on available lanes, reliable ships, and fast FIO quotes? Looking forward to your suggestions. Thanks! Josué

email_chain.subject: Request for Open Time-Charter for Wheat Cargoes
email_chain.body: Hi there! Following up on my inquiry about contracting 5-10 vessel open time charters for wheat cargoes from West Africa to Europe and the Gulf States. Although demand is currently low, I believe this strategic move will capture the market well. Please keep me informed about any availability or connection with vessel operators. Your recommendations are greatly appreciated. Sincerely, Brian

email_chain.subject: Current Market Focus
email_chain.body: Hi Charles, Thanks for reaching out. Currently, the market is primarily focusing on spot trades with contracts lasting between 3-6 months. Looking forward to future collaboration. Best regards, Tony

email_chain.subject: General Inquiry Response
email_chain.body: You have located my contact on a shippers website. Thank you for your inquiry, however, I'm currently seeking different services.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Trade Costs and Fees
email_chain.body: Hi! I require information regarding the costs involved for vessel chartering services. Could you elaborate on the respective fees? Thank you! James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Space on November 11 for Coffee Transport from Singapore to Pusan
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Ms. Park,

We are looking to transport 4,500MT of dry coffee from Singapore to Pusan and are seeking a vessel departing on November 11th. Could you please let me know if you have availability on this date? Your assistance is much appreciated.

Many thanks,
Vincent

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Vessel Space on November 11 for Coffee Transport from Singapore to Pusan
email_chain.body:
Hi Vincent,

Unfortunately, our vessel for the requested date has already been booked. Our next available shipment is not until November 14th. Please let me know if this can work for you or if there is anything else I can assist with.

Best regards,
Park

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Vessel Space on November 11 for Coffee Transport from Singapore to Pusan
email_chain.body:
Hi Vincent,

I regret to inform you that we cannot accommodate your shipment on November 11th as our vessel is fully booked. If the date of November 14th does not suit your schedule, please let me know how else I might assist.

Cheers,
Park

email_chain.subject: Further Assistance Required?
email_chain.body:
Hi Vincent,

I understand your disappointment with the unavailability on November 11th. I apologize for not being able to fulfill your initial request. If there's anything else I can help with, possibly arranging shipment on a different date or other logistics, please let me know.

Best regards,
Park

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Yoon, Could you provide a freight estimate for 1,250 MT of crude palm oil from Tanjung Priok to Yangon in early October? Are there any expected port draft limitations that we should be aware of? Best regards, Mandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Mandy, We have three vessels scheduled to begin operations in Yangon this week. There could be port draft restrictions due to operational limitations. We are prepared to handle your cargo in increments of 25,000 MT and can finalize a shipment for you in early October. Kind regards, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi David, Thank you for your response. Could you please provide the estimated minimum draft requirement for each vessel? We are comparing your draft with other carriers. Thanks, Mandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Mandy, The exact minimum draft will vary but generally cannot accommodate shallow draft ports. Once we've determined the specific capabilities of each vessel that comes into Yangon, we'll provide you with a more accurate quote. Feel free to reach out with any more questions. Best regards, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Estimate Request for Crude Palm Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi David, Thanks for the update! We'll await the detailed quotes. Best regards, Mandy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Crude Oil Purchase from Rotterdam to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Good morning Mr. Sanchez, We are interested in purchasing 25,000MT of crude oil to be shipped from Rotterdam to Qingdao. Could you please provide your best offer soon? Thank you, George

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Crude Oil Purchase from Rotterdam to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Dear George, Thanks for reaching out. Please send us your offer by the 28th as we aim to finalize all arrangements by then. Regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Offer for Crude Oil Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Sanchez, We are offering USD42.3M for the purchase of 25,000MTs of crude oil from Rotterdam to Qingdao. For confirmation, please reply with the buyer's and shipping company's details, specify whether you're providing HFO or MGO, and provide the vessel name and estimated times of arrival. Our deadline for final approval is 5 PM Beijing time on the 29th. Thank you, Chris

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Crude Oil Purchase Deal
email_chain.body: Dear Chris, We are pleased to award you the spot for our latest crude oil deal. The contract will be signed by our legal department, and you will shortly receive the required documents (VOSTRO or IOU). Please refer to this in our attachment A. Best, Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Crude Oil Purchase Deal
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Henry, We are currently experiencing minor paperwork delays at our end but hope to have the deal finalized before the end of the month. Regards, George

email_chain.subject: Update on IOU Document and Payment
email_chain.body: Dear George, We have received our IOU documents from Mr. Wang and have made the payment to the seller. We hope the deal will be finalized shortly. Regards, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on IOU Document and Payment
email_chain.body: Dear Chris, Thank you so much for updating us. Could you please send us an updated timeline so that we can ensure all our other work is finished on time? Regards, George

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Finalization Needed for P20 Alloy Steel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Wang,

Thank you for your quote on the 22,500MT shipment of P20 alloy steel from Wuhan to the UK. I need to clarify a few additional details before we proceed. Will the ship directly transport our goods to our warehouse in the UK, or is this endpoint the port only? Could you also specify the laycan period for this shipment? Additionally, please confirm whether this quote includes insurance and all container handling and stowage fees.

Looking forward to your prompt response so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the Letter of Intent this week.

Best regards,
Joyce

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification and Finalization Needed for P20 Alloy Steel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Joyce,

Thank you for your intentions to finalize the Letter of Intent for the 22,500MT P20 shipment from China to England. The ship is scheduled to arrive at the UK port in 40 days. We can arrange full insurance for the metal shipment at an approximate cost of US$5,000; I will send you the policy details before the delivery.

Please let me know if there is anything else you need.

Best regards,
Wang

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Voyage from US Gulf to Qatar (20th April)
email_chain.body:
Hello Matheiu,

How are you? I'm reaching out to discuss our upcoming vessel sailing from the US Gulf to Qatar on the 20th of April. The vessel can accommodate up to 35,000MT of bitumen. Do you have any cargo you'd like to transport on this voyage?

Best regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: New Voyage Dates Available: Saudi Arabia to LA
email_chain.body:
Dear Clients,

We are excited to announce new available voyage dates from Saudi Arabia to Los Angeles, USA.
The available dates are between April 20, 2021 and April 25, 2021. Please review the attached charter parties for more details. If you are interested in booking any of these voyages, please contact us with your booking request, cargo details, and charter party reference number.

Best regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: New Voyage Dates Available: Oman to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Dear Clients,

We are pleased to inform you about our new voyage dates from Oman to Philadelphia, USA. The available dates are April 24, 2021 to April 29, 2021. Attached are the charter parties concerning these voyages. If interested, please send us your booking request along with the necessary cargo details and the charter party reference number.

Best regards,
Caroline

email_chain.subject: New Voyage Dates Available: Red Sea to LA
email_chain.body:
Dear Clients,

We have new dates available for voyages from the Red Sea to Los Angeles, USA. The dates are from May 4, 2021 to May 9, 2021. Please see the attached charter parties for further details. If you're interested in booking these voyages, please reach out with your booking request, cargo specifics, and the reference number of the charter party.

Best regards,
Caroline

labels.load_port: US Gulf, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Red Sea

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Costs from Panama to Cherbourg and Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hello Mrs. Tohrington,
We are shipping a 40-foot container from Panama to Cherbourg. Could you please advise the total cost of shipping, warehousing, and freight clearance from the 21st to the 30th of March? Thank you for your assistance.
Kind regards,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Shipping Costs from Panama to Cherbourg and Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hello Brenda,
I don’t understand why the client would want to send the container to Cherbourg when Antwerp could be a viable alternative, considering the two ports listed in the project description are Cherbourg and Antwerp. Can you confirm if these are the only two options?
Regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Shipping Costs from Panama to Cherbourg and Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hi Ana,
Yes, that's correct. Cherbourg and Antwerp are the only options listed in the project description. Could you provide the costs for both, as the client has requested to use the cheapest option available?
Thanks,
Brenda

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Shipping Costs from Panama to Cherbourg and Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hi Brenda,
Thank you for the confirmation. I will prepare a quote for both options, including cost of shipping, storage, and freight clearance from the 21st to the 30th of March and send it over as soon as possible.
Regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fertilizer Transportation from Livorno to Kavala
email_chain.body:
Hi Johan,
We’re interested in transporting 700MT of fertilizers from Livorno to Kavala. Could you provide your rate ideas, and are you flexible regarding the partial loading windows?
Sincerely,
Alexis

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Transportation from Livorno to Kavala
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexis,
Yes, we can handle the entire quantity of 700MT. For Livorno, your cargo could be loaded and berth between March 8-10. For Kavala, the cargo unloading could begin between April 1-5 with the rest of the ship's operations potentially scheduled for April 5-7 or any other day in April suited to your needs. I will confirm with our Chief Technical Officer regarding the vessel's ability to meet these loading windows and get back to you shortly.
Best regards,
Johan

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability for Livorno-Kavala Route
email_chain.body:
Hello Johan,
Regarding your question on the Livorno-Kavala route, our vessels can indeed accommodate the partial loading windows as discussed. However, we are restricted to no more than 50 tonnes per month due to current overloading limitations. Please adjust the agreements accordingly.
Best,
Chief Technical Officer

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Loading Window and Capacity Limitation
email_chain.body:
Hello Alexis,
I have consulted with our Chief Technical Officer and can confirm that while our vessels can manage the discussed partial loading windows for the Livorno-Kavala route, there is a maximum loading limitation of 50 tonnes per month. Please let me know how you wish to proceed under these constraints.
Regards,
Johan

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Delivery and Freight Negotiation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

We have successfully shipped over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products in Nigeria via Ms. Prudence and DHL Express, as per the DTEPCO orders. The shipment was completed yesterday, and the customers have already received the goods. Could we initiate negotiations concerning the freight terms?

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Delivery and Freight Negotiation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

We have successfully shipped over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products in Nigeria via Ms. Prudence and DHL Express, as per the DTEPCO orders. The shipment was completed yesterday, and the customers have already received the goods. Could we initiate negotiations concerning the freight terms?

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Delivery and Freight Negotiation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

We have successfully shipped over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products in Nigeria via Ms. Prudence and DHL Express, as per the DTEPCO orders. The shipment was completed yesterday, and the customers have already received the goods. Could we initiate negotiations concerning the freight terms?

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Delivery and Freight Negotiation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wiegardt,

We have successfully shipped over 20,000 pieces of storage and packaging products in Nigeria via Ms. Prudence and DHL Express, as per the DTEPCO orders. The shipment was completed yesterday, and the customers have already received the goods. Could we initiate negotiations concerning the freight terms?

Sincerely,
Jamie O'Malley

email_chain.subject: Request for Current Market Rate for Ethanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sean,

We need 500MT of ethanol from Jebel Ali to Fujairah. Can you give me your current market rate for this?

Regards,
Davide

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Ethanol Shipping Cost
email_chain.body:
Dear Sean,

Can you give me the latest offer for 1000MT of ethanol to Jebel Ali port? Thanks,

Miao

email_chain.subject: Ethanol Import Rate Enquiry from Jebel Ali to China
email_chain.body:
Hi Sean,

I’m looking to import ethanol from Jebel Ali to China. What is your current market rate?

Many thanks,
Tina

email_chain.subject: Current Market Rate Inquiry for Ethanol from Dubai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sean,

I am looking to import ethanol from Dubai. Could you please give me your current market rate?

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Request for Market Rate on Ethanol Shipment from Dubai to India
email_chain.body:
Hi Sean,

I would like to import 1000MT of ethanol from Dubai to India. Can you give me your current market rate?

Thanks,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Latest Ethanol Market Rate Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Sean,

I am looking for the latest ethanol market price from Dubai. Can you please give me your current market rate?

Thanks,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Action Required for Cargo Release
email_chain.body: Dear Valued Customer, A bale with a gross weight of 70,000 kg is currently awaiting delivery at a pier in the port of Genoa. This cargo was imported on board your vessel 'JCM SCANDALING', under bill of lading #59751. The freight forwarder now requires payment before releasing the cargo and urges you to take immediate action to settle the dues and complete the necessary procedures. We also noticed a miscalculation in the previously calculated off-hire time, which appears to have resulted in an underpayment for days in port and days at sea. It is crucial that this issue is addressed immediately to prevent further complications. Kindly ensure the proceedings are completed promptly. Regards

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Payment Confirmation Needed for Bill of Lading
email_chain.body: Dear Valued Customer, Following our previous communication on February 14, 2017, we are set to prepare and send a bill of lading for the 560,000 metric tonnes received. This document will be sent to our office at ENEA GmbH, Sennestringer Str. 17, 29522 Drensteinfurt, Deutschland within the next 7 days. Please note, the bill of lading will only be issued upon confirmed payment. We encourage you to complete the transaction via internet banking promptly. Should you need any further assistance, do not hesitate to contact us. Regards

email_chain.subject: Re: Procedure for Bill of Lading and Payment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Schanzenböck, I have received your email dated February 17th, and would like to clarify that the procedure for the issuance of the bill of lading, as well as payment terms, are unclear. Can you please provide more detailed information on how to proceed? Sincerely

email_chain.subject: Request for Detailed Pricing Information
email_chain.body: Hi Elaine, Thanks for the offers. However, we would like to focus on a single option. Can you please provide the price of daily fixtures on all 3 vessels? Warm regards, Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Required for Decision
email_chain.body: Hi Elaine, Thanks for your prompt reply. Unfortunately, the departures on June 17th and 18th are outside of our acceptable timeframe. Additionally, the Island Escape seems a bit confined. Could I ask the duration of the morning and evening sailings? The afternoon sailing does not seem significantly longer - could you clarify what time the boat returns? Also, could you detail the dining arrangements? How many meals are provided, and what are the serving times for breakfast, lunch, and dinner? Thanks again for your assistance. Warm regards, Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Cruise Duration and Pricing
email_chain.body: Hi Elaine, Upon thorough consideration of your proposals, we have decided that a half-day cruise suits our needs best. The 3-hour excursions appear to be excessive for what we are looking for. Here are the rates for potential selections, as requested: Aji $11, Cape Whale $39, Chaya $39, Cruise One $12, Chatham $35. As you can see, these rates are quite reasonable. Warm regards, Jeanette

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Trinidad Salt to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Adams,
We need your ex-Trinidad salt, 1,600MT, to be shipped to Port Sudan next week. Do you have this facility available? Kindly let us know your competitive rate for this request.

email_chain.subject: Request for Trinidad Salt Pricing for Congo Project
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,
We are interested in purchasing your Trinidad salt for our project in Congo. Could you please provide us with your price quotation? We appreciate your best offer for this.

Regards,
Company Name

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Follow-up on Trinidad Salt Inquiry for Congo
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,
Following up on our previous email, we are keen to proceed with the purchase of Trinidad salt for our Congo project. Could you kindly update us with your pricing at your earliest convenience?

Best regards,
Company Name

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Pricing Request for Trinidad Salt
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,
We have not yet received a response regarding our inquiry for the Trinidad salt needed for our Congo project. Your prompt reply with the pricing details would greatly assist us in moving forward with the procurement process.

Warm regards,
Company Name

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on Trinidad Salt Purchase
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,
I wish to remind you of our interest in purchasing Trinidad salt for our project in Congo. A quick response with your pricing would be appreciated, as we are ready to finalize the purchase.

Thank you,
Company Name

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipment from Skaw to Plymouth
email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to touch base regarding our previous discussion about the shipment of 5,000 MT of potassium ferrate from Skaw to Plymouth scheduled for late July. I haven't received any feedback yet, and I am particularly concerned about whether our 37,000DWT vessel can meet the draft restrictions at Plymouth. Your insights or update on this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Atul

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Shipment Details and Supplier Info
email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

Following up on my previous email, we are keen to confirm the arrangements for shipping 5,000 MT of potassium ferrate via a 37,000DWT ship from Skaw to Plymouth towards the end of July. Could you also provide any recommendations for reliable suppliers of top-quality product? Your assistance in this matter would be invaluable as we aim to finalize the logistics.

Thanks once again,
Atul

email_chain.subject: Request for Supplier Info and Pricing - Potassium Ferrate 50% Solutions
email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

I hope you are well. Given the tight schedule in July, we are currently sourcing a supplier for potassium ferrate 50% solutions, intended for shipment from Rotterdam to Newcastle. The shipping company restricts us to a 37,000DWT vessel with strict draft limits. Additionally, the prices have seen a substantial increase recently. Could you assist us with possible solutions and updated pricing?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipment Constraints and Supplier Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Eve,

As a follow-up to my previous message, understanding the time constraints, we are indeed in urgent need of identifying a supplier who can accommodate our requirements under the mentioned draft restrictions for a shipment from Rotterdam to Newcastle. Any further assistance you can provide would be sincerely appreciated.

Best,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote - Istanbul to Los Angeles

Our client is looking to ship 15,000MT of rubbers from Istanbul to Los Angeles. Could you advise a competitive freight rate for a FOB door quote, as well as a landed price for an Ex-Ship quote?
Thanks,
Xiao

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Istanbul to Los Angeles

Thanks for your inquiry, Xiao.

Paul Pindell

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Istanbul to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Greg

As discussed, we're hoping to schedule a conference call on Friday at 8:30AM Pacific time. Unfortunately, I will be out of the office for the next few days on business and won't be checking emails. You can reach me via phone at this number during that time if needed.
Thank you,
Sincerely,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Re: Schedule Conference Call
email_chain.body:

Thank you for confirming the conference call. I am on the West Coast, so I will be attending the call. Looking forward to discussing our details further.

Greg

Could you recommend the best route or method for this shipment? Also, could you provide the current spot rate for palletized cargo? Thanks, Jaskaran

The spot rate for palletized cargo is currently at [Insert Rate] per tonne. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need more information. Cheers, Sohail
