email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Marseille to Casablanca
email_chain.body: Hey Eddy, We are looking to ship 2,700MT of specialty chemicals from Marseille to Casablanca. Could you please provide a preliminary quote and confirm if your services cover port dues under FOB terms? We hope to hear from you soon! Warmly, Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Marseille to Casablanca
email_chain.body: Thanks Melissa, I'll have our team look into this for you. Could you please provide the following details: -Order type: 1. Forward-to-Shore, 2. Lift-On/Lift-Off, 3. Shore-to-Shore, -Cargo Volume/Weight, -Route, Origin, Destination, and Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA), -Preferred Carrier Names for each shipper and carrier per lane. We look forward to working with you! Kind regards, John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Terminal Procedures at Fos, Marseille
email_chain.body: Dear Eddy, I'd like to know more about the entry/exit procedures at your terminal in Fos, Marseille. Specifically, do you have a free zone? Also, could you provide the dimensions for a 20 foot container? Thanks! Regards, Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Terminal Procedures at Fos, Marseille
email_chain.body: Thanks Sam, we have two terminals in Fos, Marseille. The Fos-Port Express Terminal is ideally situated at the maritime Port of Fos. It is a perfect distribution base for many European countries, offering both sea and air access points. This terminal has facilities for 40' and 20' containers and accepts high cube containers. The second, Fos-Port International Terminal, is also easily accessible. Regards, Eddy

email_chain.subject: Customs Documentation for Freight from Morocco to Germany
email_chain.body: Dear Eddy, We're transporting freight from Morocco to Germany, and I'm unsure about the type of customs documentation needed. Can you advise if this information is included in the customs paperwork, or if additional documentation is necessary? Regards, Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment Coordination
email_chain.body: Thanks for your update, Jon. I confirm our interest in the 5,500MT urea shipment and acknowledge the godown receipt. Could you please advise on the loading port? Once confirmed, I will coordinate with our representative in Damietta. We also welcome suggestions for a transit agent. Please note that loading and offloading operations are restricted on Saturdays. Could you also provide the freight rate and advised laytime for this shipment, particularly if processed on a CNF basis? Additionally, details on the demurrage free period would be appreciated. Thank you for your cooperation. Best regards, Yusuf

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipment Cancellation at Damietta
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. El-Maghraby, Regrettably, the previous arrangement for urea loading at Damietta was unsuccessful, and we must consider it cancelled. Kindly advise us to proceed with a full list of cancellations. We are eager to proceed with the shipment to avoid losses and secure alternative freight opportunities. Please ensure payment is made prior to the next scheduled loading to maintain the booking. Thank you. Best regards, Jon

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipment Update
email_chain.body: Dear Jon, Thank you for the update. I have informed the vessel owner about the cancellation and will endeavor to keep this consignment on track. I appreciate your continued assistance and cooperation during this process. Warm regards, Ahmed

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Urea Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Sirs, Please find attached the complete invoice for the urea shipment: Invoice Number: CUS6/12/2001 Serial: 1/6 Cargo Line: 27, Container No.: 23397/1, Order: 1, Description: UREA, Quantity: 5000 MT, Port of Loading: Damietta, Port of Discharge: Alexandria, Delivery: Damietta, Master Bill of Lading: MAB#0227-20(24)/01, Cartonize Quantity: 10, Pallet No: 20001011053, Quantity: 3. Billed to: IDT Trading Est., c/o SUEZ SHIPPING, SAE.

email_chain.subject: Receipt Acknowledgment
email_chain.body: Dear Billing Department, We hereby acknowledge the receipt of the urea shipment invoice you sent and confirm the details are correct. Shipping to Maastricht, Netherlands will proceed under the existing arrangements. Please note the details for our Netherlands office: AGP Plc, VLOORTPOORT AED, PO Box 20, 2010 Maastricht, Netherlands, Phone: +31 43 3370431, Fax: +31 43 3370433, Email: k.hubbregts@vloortpr.com. Regards, Suez Shipping

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Vegetable Oil under FOB Terms
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Ting,

We’re looking to ship 2,500MT of vegetable oil from Busan to Port Klang. Can you handle this under FOB terms? Please let us know if your vessel is available next week.

Sincerely,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Ting,

Could you please provide your best quote for shipping 2,000MT of vegetable oil from Busan? Additionally, could you confirm your vessel’s availability for the upcoming weeks? Our company is keen on establishing a partnership with reliable suppliers who maintain quality standards.

Best regards,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Attached Quote and Vessel Availability for Your Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Ting,

I'm contacting you on behalf of Nanyang Trading. We've attached a quote for your consideration regarding the 2,000 MT of vegetable oil. We have also attached Excel files detailing the availability of your preferred vessel and port.

Could you please inform us of your pricing and how you plan to handle this transaction? Thank you, and I look forward to your prompt reply.

Best regards,
Sheryl

email_chain.subject: Re: Attached Quote and Vessel Availability for Your Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Sheryl,

I have received your email and will have my colleagues check on the details immediately. I will revert back as soon as we have reviewed the proposed terms and conditions.

Sincerely,
Mr. Ting

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargo Shipping Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Evans, I'd like to inquire about your availability for a bulk cargo shipment from Yokohama to Rotterdam on the 5th of next month. The cargo includes 50,000MT of urea and 20,000MT of ethylene, with a target price of 50 USD/ton. Could you let me know if any of your vessels are available to accommodate this? Thank you, Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargo Shipping Availability
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Rodriguez, Thank you for your query. We can accommodate your cargo on the 10th of July from Yokohama to Rotterdam. However, our current rates are 15 USD/ton for both urea and ethylene. If it interests you, we can send the terms and conditions of carriage and a pro-forma invoice for your review. Looking forward to further discussions. Best regards, Ms. Evans

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargo Shipping Availability
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Evans, Thank you for your prompt response. I would like to review the pro-forma invoice as well as discuss the terms and conditions you mentioned. Let’s schedule a discussion tomorrow morning to finalize the details. Best, Robert

email_chain.subject: Pro-forma Invoice and Terms of Carriage
email_chain.body: Dear Robert, Thank you for your response. Attached are the terms and conditions of carriage for your review. We can proceed with issuing a bill of lading once the pro-forma invoice is formally accepted. Kind regards, Ms. Evans

email_chain.subject: Counter Offer for Cargo Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Evans, Upon reviewing the initial proposal, I'd like to offer 55 USD/ton for urea and 25 USD/ton for ethylene. Moreover, I request that the cargo be loaded using a forklift. Please let me know if this offer can be considered for further discussion. Best regards, Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Counter Offer for Cargo Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Robert, We appreciate your counter offer and the specifics you've outlined. Before we can proceed, we need to confirm the terms and perform the necessary due diligence. Please send over the required documents at your earliest convenience. Once the terms are confirmed, we will proceed with drafting the formal contract. Best, Ms. Evans

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Naphtha Shipment from Singapore to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Hello, Mr. Wong. I am writing to follow up on our pending deal for the shipment of 5,000MT of naphtha from Singapore to Yokohama. This was agreed as a no-risk deal for me, over a transit period of 30 days. Could you please confirm if you are willing to proceed under the terms previously proposed? Best regards, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Naphtha Shipment from Singapore to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Dear Yasmine, Thank you for your email. I apologize for the delay in my response, as I have been preoccupied with an upcoming engineering project. I acknowledge our discussion regarding the naphtha shipment as a no-risk deal for you. I am open to discussing further and adjusting our meeting schedules to suit your availability. Please let me know your preferred dates and times. Best regards, Stanley Wong

email_chain.subject: Meeting Arrangement
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Wong, I apologize for my delayed response; I was on leave due to a family emergency. I'm now available to meet at your convenience next week. Could you please propose a suitable time and place? Thank you, Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Arrangement
email_chain.body: Dear Paul, Thanks for your response. The timing works well for me. I'm flexible with the location—would your office be a suitable meeting place? Please let me know. Thank you, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Scheduled Meeting Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Stanley, As per our previous discussions, I have scheduled our meeting for the 8th of July at 8:00 PM at Kakinoki Station. Please confirm your availability. Best, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Presentation and Future Discussions
email_chain.body: Dear Stanley, Thank you for the detailed presentation yesterday. I am keen on continuing our discussions regarding the deal, believing it can foster a lasting partnership between our companies. Let’s arrange a follow-up meeting once I've evaluated our options further. Best regards, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up on Presentation and Future Discussions
email_chain.body: Dear Yasmine, I'm pleased to hear that the presentation met your expectations. I will reach out later this week to schedule our next meeting. Thanks again for your engagement. Best, Stanley

email_chain.subject: Request for LNG Shipment Quotation from Singapore to Myanmar
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wong,

Could you please provide a quotation for shipping 4,500 MT of LNG from Singapore to Myanmar? I would appreciate your prompt response.

Thanks,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LNG Shipment Quotation from Singapore to Myanmar
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer you a shipment of 4500 MT of LNG for $22,000 per MT, totaling $99,000,000. We look forward to the possibility of working together. Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Best regards,
Super

email_chain.subject: Regarding Shipment Weight Issue
email_chain.body:
Hello,

According to the contract, we will incur an extra cost of $1 per MT if the weight of the ship exceeds 1,000 MT. Do you have any suggestions for minimizing the ship's weight?

Thank you very much!
 Maria

email_chain.subject: Cargo Delivery Delay Due to Mechanical Issue
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wong,

We regret to inform you that the delivery of the cargo has been delayed due to a mechanical problem with the ship. We expect a delay of an additional 3 days to resolve the issue. Please send us the invoice for the cargo according to the contract. We appreciate your understanding.

Best regards,
Super

email_chain.subject: Shipping Container Booking Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. West, We need to ship cargo from the port of origin to the destination port. Can you accommodate the shipment of a single container of products on the desired sailing date of March 15? Best, Emilie

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Requirement
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. West, I'm reaching out again to confirm if you can book a spot for one container of our products. We are struggling to find suitable transportation, and the desired date of departure remains March 15. Your assistance would be greatly appreciated. Best, Emilie

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Loading on Your Vessel
email_chain.body: Mr. West, To further specify our requirements, we need to send 20 units of our product to be loaded onto your ship on the sailing date of March 15, from the designated place of origin. Can your vessel accommodate this shipment? Best, Emilie

email_chain.subject: Freight quote for Vegetable Oil Transport from Limbe to Beirut
email_chain.body: Hey David, I'm looking to move 5,000 metric tons of vegetable oil from Limbe to Beirut. Could you provide me with an indication of the freight costs? Additionally, is there a possibility to negotiate laytime beyond 42 hours? Cheers, Priscilla

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight quote for Vegetable Oil Transport from Limbe to Beirut
email_chain.body: Hello Priscilla, The Port Authority charges a fee of $1,000 for Limbe and allows 60 hours of laytime. If you could agree to reduce the laytime, we might be able to decrease the fee somewhat. Please let me know if I can assist you further. Best regards, David

email_chain.subject: Contract Negotiation for Upcoming Transaction
email_chain.body: Hello Makoto, The contract negotiation process is crucial for the success of your upcoming transaction. Could you please let us know the appropriate contact person on your side for future contract drafting? Best regards, Mateo

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract Negotiation for Upcoming Transaction - Recommendations Needed
email_chain.body: Hey Mateo, Following up on the contract drafting recommendations, we've identified several potential candidates for leading the negotiations from our end. The list includes Jose, Marta, Daniela, Liliana, and Marko. Please review this list and let us know your thoughts. Thank you for your help, Brian Johnson, CEO Signature: Brian Johnson Title: Chief Executive Officer Signature: Marko Title: Chief Operating Officer

email_chain.subject: Input Request on Contract Drafting Candidates

email_chain.subject: Request for Coal Shipment Quote

email_chain.subject: Request for Project Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Jorge, Could you please send me an offer based on the project details I previously emailed you? Best, Oscar

email_chain.subject: Urgent Vessel Requirement for Dye Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Monica,

We urgently require a vessel for shipping 5,000MT of various dyes from Corpus Christi to Rotterdam. Please inform us about the freight rates and whether there will be any bunker surcharges.

With best regards,
Amado

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Vessel Requirement for Dye Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Amado,

Thank you for reaching out. To provide an accurate freight quote, we need details about the shipping date, shipping port, vessel name, gross tonnage, vessel type, draft, cargo contents, bunker rate, and port of discharge. Please confirm these details at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Monica

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Vessel Requirement for Dye Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Monica,

Here are the details of the dyes: 200 MT of Yellow Dye, 1500 MT of Black Dye, 2000 MT of Purple Dye, 1000 MT of Green Dye, and 1000 MT of Pink Dye. The intended vessel is the TS 786. It's a Capesize vessel, with a capacity of 65,000MT and a draft of 18M. It's scheduled to arrive at Corpus Christi on June 2nd and will depart shortly after. Given the urgency, could you offer the most competitive rate?

Best regards,
Amado

email_chain.subject: Offer of Butane Cargo from Mangalore to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Good morning Ms. Bell,

We are pleased to offer you 1,750MT of butane from Mangalore to Antwerp. We have received the port to port data of the cargo as follows:

- CPT Odisha Panamax: 45,000 CBM, 1,750 MT
- Atchison Oshima Panamax: 45,000 CBM, 1,750 MT
- Beirut RoRo: 35,000 CBM, 1,750 MT

Could you advise if this is the type of cargo you're looking for, and provide us with your port to port and FOB prices? Please note that for your customers we offer a 3% discount. We would also like to know your IRR from the vessel.

Best regards,
Harman

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer of Butane Cargo from Mangalore to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mohan,

Thank you for your email and the details provided. We agree on a price of $990 USD per ton for the butane. We would like to proceed with the initial shipment and request the port to port price for the items listed:

- Itajaí STP
- Achilleas Exige
- Beirut RoRo
- Irving Santorini
- Mak. UMM

Additionally, we would like to order 25,000 MT of butane. Please send a draft of the sample contract to our email for review.

Best regards,
Ms. Bell

email_chain.subject: Shipment Date Confirmation and Draft Contract
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Bell,

Thank you for your response. Please confirm the shipment dates as per the following options feasible for us:

- 19.08.19 - 31.08.19
- 19.08.19 - 30.08.19
- 18.08.19 - 25.08.19
- 18.08.19 - 24.08.19

Our IRR for this transaction will be 4.9%. I have attached a draft of the contract for your review. Please confirm the dates at your earliest convenience.

Kind regards,
Harman

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Date Confirmation and Draft Contract
email_chain.body:
Dear Harman,

Thank you for the draft contract and the date options. We have reviewed and signed the contract, and a 30% deposit has been transferred. Attached is the signed contract. Please confirm receipt and advise on the remaining payment schedule.

Best regards,
Ms. Bell

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Contract and Payment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Bell,

Thank you for the signed contract and the 30% advance deposit. The contract is acknowledged, and we confirm the receipt. Please send the remaining payment within 10 working days.

Best regards,
Harman

email_chain.subject: Improvement in New York Harbor Rail Switch
email_chain.body: Hello, Thank you for partnering with us. We have successfully made an improvement to the New York Harbor rail switch which is a vital part of the grain transportation infrastructure. With these enhancements, we anticipate a reduction in service interruptions. For detailed insights, you may check out the article here: https://beta.usace.army.mil/

email_chain.subject: Re: Improvement in New York Harbor Rail Switch
email_chain.body: Thank you for the update and for the enhancements made at the New York Harbor rail switch. This will indeed contribute to a more efficient grain transportation process. We will review the linked article and monitor the impact of the improvements. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Improvement in New York Harbor Rail Switch
email_chain.body: We appreciate your collaboration. If you encounter any issues or if there are more details required, please don't hesitate to reach out. Enjoy reading the article! Regards.

email_chain.subject: Steel Shipping Inquiry from St. Petersburg to Riyadh
email_chain.body:
Hello Carl,

We have 1,800MT of steel from St. Petersburg to Riyadh. I would like to hear your thoughts on how we can arrange the logistics for this order.

Regards,
Vincent

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipping Inquiry from St. Petersburg to Riyadh

Thank you for your email. We will have sufficient transport capacity available next week to handle your shipment. Please let me know if you need any more information or if there's anything specific you require.

Carl

email_chain.body:
Hello Vincent,

Thanks once again. I've prepared an Excel file with details of the stocks available in Aland for the upcoming Q2 schedule. You can access it via the shared link: [Insert Link Here]. Please review it at your convenience.

Carl

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Shipment Inquiry: Arzew to Nekaass
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Zahn,

We are urgently planning to ship 2,000MT of aluminum from Arzew to Nekaass. Could you please confirm the availability of laycan slots within this week? Additionally, could you detail any additional fees applicable if we fail to meet the tight laycan schedule?

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Shipment Inquiry: Arzew to Nekaass
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Galavan,

We can accommodate your shipment of 2,000 MT of aluminum from Arzew to Nekaass. Please note that there will be a charge of $5 per ton per day for each day the laycan is exceeded. We're ready to accept the shipment as soon as possible, preferably within a week.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Regards, 
James Zahn

email_chain.subject: Cargo Loading Scheduled: Arzew to Nekaass
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Turner,

Following our recent agreement, I confirm that the loading of 2,000 MT of aluminum will commence at 9 AM EST on Thursday, September 30 at Arzew, destined for Nekaass.

Regards,
Karen Smith

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transport of Oil Products in July

Cheers,

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Oil Product Delivery to Kavala in July
email_chain.body:

I wish to discuss further with you regarding the delivery of oil products to Kavala in July. How can we arrange a meeting or a call for further discussions?

Regards,

email_chain.body:

I’m interested in doing business with your company. Could you please inform me about your leading products and the best way to contact you for further dialog?

email_chain.subject: Response to Business Inquiry
email_chain.body:

It is a great pleasure to know that you are interested in my company. Our leading products include cement, powder paint, and water treatment agents. For more detailed inquiries, you can visit our website at http://www.crane.chem/. I look forward to establishing business cooperation with you!

My best regards,
Fiona

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about the MS High Hope Oil Spillage
email_chain.body:
Good morning Dina,

Have you heard about the oil spill incident involving MS High Hope last week in the Gulf of Mexico? Any details you can share would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about the MS High Hope Oil Spillage
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Adjustments Required on Shipping Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Nelson,

Upon reviewing your offer, the following changes are necessary: 
- Reduction of per ton container rates to $500
- Preferred delivery days to be every Monday and Thursday
- Reduction of demurrage fee to $20 per day after 30 days of non-use
- Use of the $40 per ton rate offered last week

Please provide the FCA receipt for the containers accordingly.

I trust we can agree on these terms.

Kind regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Parsing email sequence
email_chain.body: I have a sequence of emails tagged with the same date. How should I parse these emails to ensure that if there are multiple emails with the same timestamp, only the first one is kept and others are ignored? I need to streamline processing hundreds of these.

email_chain.subject: Re: Parsing email sequence
email_chain.body: You can use regular expressions to match each date and ensure the first occurrence is selected. This would involve splitting the email contents by newline, then checking each line with a regex pattern to extract and compare the timestamp.

email_chain.subject: Further clarification needed
email_chain.body: Thank you for the suggestion. Could you provide an example of how this regex might look?

email_chain.subject: Re: Further clarification needed
email_chain.body: Certainly! You might start with a regex pattern like this: r"\[.+\]" to capture each date. Split the emails string on newline, loop through each line, and use a Python script to keep only the first unique date you encounter.

email_chain.body: Hi Helen, The vessel details are as follows: DWT of 30,000 and LOA of 190 meters. The load port will be Vancouver, and discharge port is Shenzen. The laytime starts from September 20th to October 5th. Kind regards, Jonathan

email_chain.subject: Detailed Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Rhys, Following up on our earlier conversation, the detailed quote including vessel specifications and laytime terms is ready. The final freight quote is fixed at $220,000 USD. Please confirm at your earliest convenience. Kind regards, Helen

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Charter from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body: Hi Nellie, Is there any chance you can arrange a vessel this Friday for transporting 3,300 MT of lubricants from Genoa to Haifa? Also, how soon do you need the charter party to be signed? Kind regards, Giulia

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Charter from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body: Hi Giulia, Thanks for reaching out. A vessel is available to transport the 3,300 MT of lubricants this Friday. You can sign the charter party whenever you're ready. Best, Nellie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Charter from Genoa to Haifa
email_chain.body: Hi Nellie, Thank you so much for completing this charter party! Giulia

email_chain.subject: Future Charter Plans
email_chain.body: Hi Nellie, Thank you for the charter party for our recent vessel trip from Genoa to Haifa. As promised, we will be chartering this vessel again soon for another transport of 7,000 MT of lubricants from Genoa to Haifa. Thanks so much, Giulia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping 200MT Wheat from Constanza to Calais
email_chain.body:
Hi Helena,

I plan to move 200MT of wheat from Constanza to Calais. Could you specify if there will be any dock delays, and do you offer in-depot storage?

With regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 200MT Wheat from Constanza to Calais
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

With the usual 5 days at Constanza, there will be no major issues at Calais. We are also extending a 7-day storage at our Med terminal to reduce the backlog from the above mentioned issues.

With regards,
Helena

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 200MT Wheat from Constanza to Calais
email_chain.body:
Hi Helena,

Thank you for the update. Is the storage part of the service?

With regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 200MT Wheat from Constanza to Calais
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

As usual, the storage charge is applied separately to the line fee from the warehouse.

Regards,
Helena

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 200MT Wheat from Constanza to Calais
email_chain.body:
Hi Helena,

OK, thank you very much.

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Coordination on Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Luke,
We could have the order documents ready within the next 2 days. However, the buyer will also need some confirmation of the payment terms from us.
If it is okay with you, I could call you shortly and discuss those points.
Best regards,
Abubakar Al-Abdu

email_chain.subject: Re: Coordination on Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Abubakar,
Thanks for the email. I will send you the documents and also confirm the payment terms to you this afternoon.
Best regards,
Luke

email_chain.subject: Update on Payment Terms Document
email_chain.body:
Hi Abubakar,
Thanks for the call earlier. I was out of the office yesterday and so was unable to reply to your earlier email. However, I will send you the payment terms documents this afternoon.
Best regards,
Luke

email_chain.subject: Payment Terms Options
email_chain.body:
Hi Luke,
I could not reach you yesterday, however, I will forward you the payment terms document right away. I would prefer the full payment, but if that is not an option, we could also opt for an installment payment plan. I would be glad to have your expert advice on this.
Best regards,
Abubakar Al-Abdu

email_chain.subject: Choosing Payment Plan
email_chain.body:
Hi Abubakar,
Thank you for the emails. We can do full payment or installment payment plan. We will send the payment terms documents for you to review.
Regards,
Luke

email_chain.subject: Final Decision on Payment Plan
email_chain.body:
Hi Luke,
I prefer the installment payment plan. I could receive 5% of the total contract amount, as the first installment. Additionally, I will send you the payment schedule after you forward me the contract documents. The total contract amount for this project is 25,000,000,000 (twenty-five billion naira).
Best regards,
Abubakar Al-Abdu

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry: Malta to Piraeus for Chemical Products
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

We need to arrange a charter from Malta to Piraeus for 2,500MT of chemical products on a 30-day time charter basis. Could you please confirm your earliest available sail date?

Regards,
Greg

email_chain.subject: Request for Iron Ore Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sanjay,

We received your email dated 6th March and are quite impressed with your rate. Please confirm if you can provide transport for 3,500MT of iron ore. We propose a 25-day time charter for an 8000DWT vessel at $16.5 per metric ton, on an AF & F basis to Goa.

Kind regards,
Fernando

email_chain.subject: 24-Month Charter Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Raj,

We received your email dated 8th March. Please confirm that you can provide a container ship for a 24-month charter.

Kind regards,
Fernando

email_chain.subject: 24-Month Charter Request - Follow-Up
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Raj,

We are following up on our previous request. Please let us know if you have the availability of a container ship for a 24-month charter.

Kind regards,
Fernando

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Details for Quotation
email_chain.body: Hi Matt, You mentioned during our last call that you're interested in switching from plastic resin to steel coils for the shipment from Taiwan to Hamburg, with loading expected by the end of this week. Could you please provide us with the details of your cargo so we can offer you a precise quote? Thanks, Jeffrey

email_chain.subject: Follow-Up: Cargo Details Needed for Your Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Matt, I sent you an earlier email today regarding the cargo details needed for your quotation. If you haven't received it, please let us know, and I'll resend it. Regards, Jeffrey

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Email Account Setup
email_chain.body: Hey Matt, We understand that you're currently without an email account. Our IT department is in the process of setting up an account for you, and it should be ready for use within the next few days. In the meantime, feel free to directly contact any of our staff using the provided email addresses. Please let us know if you need any further assistance. Regards, Support Team

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Email Receipt and Account Reopening
email_chain.body: Hi Matt, Thanks for your update; I received your email yesterday at 2pm. It's great to hear that you're in the process of reopening your email account. I'll ensure all your future communications are routed correctly once your new account is set up. Regards, Jeffrey

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for transporting ISO containers from Singapore to Zaragoza
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kim,

Would you consider a 5,000mt voyage of 20-ft. ISO containers loaded with electronics, toys, and arts from Singapore to Zaragoza?

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for transporting ISO containers from Singapore to Zaragoza
email_chain.body:
Hi Frank,

Thank you for your email. We are happy to assist with transporting your goods via sea freight. Please provide the full details of your shipment.

Sincerely,
Stella

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for transporting ISO containers from Singapore to Zaragoza
email_chain.body:
Dear Stella,

Thank you for your swift response. I have attached the shipment details for our cargo.

Looking forward to your feedback.
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Details for transport from Singapore to Zaragoza
email_chain.body:
Hi Frank,

I have reviewed your shipment details. Everything looks good. Could you please provide the Certificate of Origin (CoO)? We plan to ship your commodities to Spain on August 12.

Have a great day!
Stella

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Details for transport from Singapore to Zaragoza
email_chain.body:
Hi Stella,

I've just sent over the Certificate of Origin for our exports from Singapore to Spain. Additionally, I wish to confirm if it's possible to transport other commodities including consumer goods, toys, electronics, industrial components, metal products, fabricated metals, automotive parts, ores, and agricultural products.

Please advise at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Commodities for Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

We received your email and the Certificate of Origin. Unfortunately, due to the current trade restrictions between the US and the EU, we are unable to transport the additional commodities to Spain at this time.

Sincerely,
Stella

labels.commodity: Electronics, Toys, Arts, and other items

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about cargo rates from Mombasa to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Franco,

How much are you charging for cargo from Mombasa to Jakarta? Do you apply any extra charges?

Best regards,
Susana

email_chain.subject: Spelling Clarification

email_chain.subject: Question Regarding Nationality

email_chain.subject: Nationality Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Are you Kenyan?

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Quick Question
email_chain.body:

Are you Kenyan?

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Rates - Mombasa to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I am inquiring about the Mombasa to Jakarta cargo prices. Could you kindly send me details about your cargo rates?

Sincerely yours,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Request for Transit Time and Freight Rate Info
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tyler,

We are planning to move 4,500MT of metal scrap from Manila to Port Kelang. Could you please provide us with the basic transit time and a freight rate based on FIO terms?

Kind regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Transit Time and Freight Rate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tyler,

I am following up on the email I sent last week regarding the transit time and freight rate from Manila to Port Kelang. Could you please advise on the status of this request?

Thank you.
Best regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Request for Shipping Quote Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tyler,

Can you please update me on the status of the shipping quote I requested? We need to finalize our logistics planning soon.

Regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Shipping Preparation and Additional Costs
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tyler,

Thank you for your earlier response. Could you inform us when your designated receiver can sign for the shipment? Following your advice, we arranged a crane to transfer the scrap to the container and it has been held for the past 10 days. Could you please send the cost incurred for the crane via email as it is due for payment today?

Thank you for your patience. I look forward to your prompt response.

Kind regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Charter Proposal Request for Tanker from Kuwait to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Charter Department,

Could you please provide me with a proposal for chartering one of your tankers for a journey from Kuwait to Singapore? We are looking to schedule this charter sometime between May 23 and June 1. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Research Paper on E-commerce and Poverty
email_chain.body:
Dear Research Assistance Team,

Would you be able to assist me in writing a research paper about the effects of electronic commerce on poverty? Your guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you so much,
Jimmy

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Inquiry About Payment Method
email_chain.body:
Dear Billing Department,

I would like to know if it is possible to make a payment using a credit card? Your prompt response would greatly help.

Sincerely,
Jimmy

email_chain.subject: Job Application Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear HR Manager,

I am eager to join your company and have studied the job description closely. Could you please contact me to arrange an interview at your earliest convenience?

Yours sincerely,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Workstation Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Please could you send me the details of your available workstations? I am interested in understanding the specifications and features.

Regards,
Matthew

email_chain.subject: Job Alert Subscription Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Careers Department,

Please keep me informed about new job openings on board your vessels. I am keenly interested in upcoming opportunities.

Yours truly,
Jose

email_chain.subject: Petrol Transport Request: Rotterdam to Marseille
email_chain.body: We are looking to transport 50MT of petrol from Rotterdam to Marseille. The shipment is planned for three weeks from today. Please confirm the availability of a suitable vessel for this operation. Additionally, we require the relevant freight quote and terms for this transport. Ensure compliance with standard shipping protocols and safety measures. Looking forward to your prompt response.

email_chain.subject: Petrol Transport Inquiry: Marseille to Berlin
email_chain.body: Following the previous request, we also need transport for 40MT of petrol from Marseille to Berlin. This shipment needs to be arranged in two weeks. Could you provide us with the vessel details and freight quote for this route? It's crucial that the terms meet our shipment and safety criteria. We anticipate a swift and favorable reply. Thank you in advance.

email_chain.subject: Merger Discussion
email_chain.body: We need to discuss a potential merger between our companies. I have attached the details of the merger proposal for your consideration. The merger proposal suggests specific conditions which need to be considered, notably the staffing requirements. It is essential for the merger to meet these criteria, including maintaining a staffing ratio. Your insights and decisions on this proposal are eagerly awaited. Let's aim for a mutually beneficial agreement.

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Rates for Scrap Metal Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

We are planning to load 10,000MT of scrap metal from Stettin to Gent. Could you please send us your freight rates for this shipment?

Kind regards,
Dominik

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Rates - 10,000MT of Scrap Metal from Gent to Stettin
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

Following up on our previous request, we would also like to inquire about the transport of 10,000MT of scrap metal but this time from Gent to Stettin. Please share the applicable rates for this route as well.

Kind regards,
Dominik

email_chain.subject: Request for Rates - 5,000MT of Scrap Metal from Stettin to Gent
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

I am interested in shipping a smaller quantity of 5,000MT of scrap metal from Stettin to Gent. Could you please provide us with your rates for this volume?

Best regards,
Dominik

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Needed for 2,000MT Scrap Metal from Gent to Stettin
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

We are also considering a smaller shipment of 2,000MT of scrap metal from Gent to Stettin. Please let us know your rates for this cargo size.

Best regards,
Dominik

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on 2,000MT Scrap Metal Transportation from Gent to Stettin
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

As we are finalizing our transport needs, I would appreciate receiving the freight rates for an additional smaller quantity of 2,000MT of scrap metal from Gent to Stettin at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Dominik

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Milk Powder from Beirut to San Francisco
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Norland, We are interested in shipping 6,000MT of milk powder from Beirut to San Francisco and have received a preliminary quote from Yazaki. Could we discuss potential shipping arrangements and compare these with current market rates?

email_chain.subject: Seeking Advice on Shipping Process Improvement
email_chain.body: Hi Maria! Thanks for your response. I'm currently preparing the TMA1 report and am gathering ideas on improving our shipping process. I mainly communicate with Yazaki via email for orders and scheduling, but I'm aware that competitors like Yasakawa use different methods. Could we discuss this more thoroughly as part of my assignment? I value your suggestions. Thank you! Regards, Evie

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Potential Collaboration and Shipping Innovations
email_chain.body: Hello Yousef, Following our recent discussions about a potential collaboration, you expressed interest in our shipping processes. I've investigated recent changes and innovations in shipping logistics and would like to share these insights with you to explore how we can apply them in our potential collaboration. Let's discuss this at your convenience. Best regards, Evie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargo Transport from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bader, We’d like to confirm our order of 120,000MT of Avi base oil from Rotterdam to Dalian. Could you inform us of any sailings available next week? Regards, Marc

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargo Transport from Rotterdam to Dalian
email_chain.body: Dear Marc, Currently, we have 2 Avi X-Mor vessels available next week in Rotterdam. One departs for Felixstowe, arriving Monday, March 10th, and the other for Hamburg, arriving on Tuesday, March 11th. Unfortunately, there are no direct sailings to Dalian next week. Regards, Jerome

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry: Freight and Transit Time
email_chain.body: Hello Jerome, Thank you for your quick response. Can you please provide the anticipated freight charges and the transit time for these options? Regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Inquiry: Freight and Transit Time
email_chain.body: Hi Tom, The charter cost is €3100 per MTCF. With a 12m tank and 2m cargo hold, the voyage duration would be approximately 10 days from Rotterdam to either Felixstowe or Hamburg. However, we need a different vessel for Dalian which could have different terms. Regards, Jerome

email_chain.subject: Preparation for Cargo Purchase Offer
email_chain.body: Thank you, Jerome. Our team has started to prepare the offer for the cargo purchase. We will present the charter back to you soon. Regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Attaching Charter for Review
email_chain.body: Jerome, I’m attaching the finalized charter as requested. Could you please ensure your offer is ready for our review next week? Regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Contract Agreement by Client
email_chain.body: Hi Tom, Our client has agreed to sign the contract. Regards, Jerome

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Weekend Loading Fees and Dock Delays
email_chain.body: Hi Lucia, We are planning to move 2,900MT of wheat from Victoria to Portland. Could you let me know if weekend loadings incur an extra fee, and if you anticipate any dock delays? Warmly, Helena

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Weekend Loading Fees and Dock Delays
email_chain.body: Hi Helena, As we plan to ship several loads to this terminal in a short period of time, we will have at least one vessel to keep both lanes operating smoothly. For this week, we will keep lane 1 busy from Monday to Friday using WL5 on Thursday and Friday. WL7 is booked from Friday to Monday. For Monday and Tuesday we will use WL5 and WL6. WL6 will be used for Wednesday and Thursday. This should keep the two lanes open for 100%. Sorry for any inconvenience but it’s our best solution. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Best regards, Lucia

email_chain.subject: Update on Invoice Details
email_chain.body: Hi Lucia, Based on your updated response, I've changed the TO and FW of our invoice to indicate [Portland OR Inbound] along with [Terminal Docking Bay] – thanks! Kind regards, Cheryl

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Styrene from Singapore to Manila
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

Could you provide a ballpark freight rate for 9,100MT of styrene from Singapore to Manila as soon as possible? Also, is a partial load option feasible?

Best regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Follow Up: Styrene Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

Thank you for your prompt response. I would like to add a new enquiry: Can we consider a shipment of 1,050MT of styrene at FOB Zeebrugge, to be ready in 40 days? Please let me know if this will pose any issues.

Best regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Request for LOI and Commercial Invoice
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

Thank you for the offer. To proceed, could you please send me the Letter of Intent (LOI) and the commercial invoice for our discussed transactions? I want to ensure all our previous communications are aligned.

Best regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Document Handling Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

We will manage all the necessary documents from our end. Please let us know if you have any further queries regarding this matter.

Best regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation for Venus
email_chain.body: Good afternoon Mrs. Perkins, I’d like to confirm the booking for the shipment of 10,000 tonnes of sugar from Shanghai to Vancouver. According to your schedule, the Venus is available around 11 February. Could you please confirm this booking, or otherwise recommend another suitable vessel? Many thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Confirmation for Venus
email_chain.body: Good morning John, Your booking for the Venus is confirmed. The vessel will sail from Shanghai on 6 February and is expected to arrive in Vancouver on 12 February. Please ensure that the invoices are forwarded to me once sorted, and I will handle the remaining paperwork to ensure a smooth process. Regards, Mrs. Perkins

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Berth for Mars
email_chain.body: Good morning Mrs. Perkins, Could you please confirm if the berth for the Mars is ready? The shipment is scheduled from Elephant River to Durban on Saturday, 23 February. Many thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Berth for Mars
email_chain.body: Hello John, Yes, the Mars is scheduled to arrive on time and the Maasai will be ready at the south end of the harbour to accommodate your shipment. The Maasai has plenty of room for storage, so you should not face any issues regarding space. Regards, Mrs. Perkins

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Port Said to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Chris, We’re looking to arrange a 1,000MT cargo of brake fluid from Port Said to Mombasa. What’s the latest turnaround time for this route, and does your daily service schedule align with our estimated arrival date? Regards, Kelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Port Said to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Hi Kelly, Thanks for reaching out. As mentioned in our previous correspondence, our typical turnaround time for this route is around 4-5 days. However, it can vary due to logistics, customs clearance, and terminal delays. Note that our service runs twice a week, but adjustments can be made if needed. I've attached our latest price list for your reference. Kind regards, Bobby

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Handling Shipment
email_chain.body: Chris, Thank you for the prompt response. Our vessel will be arriving on 15 April, and we need a prompt shipment. Is it possible to expedite the turnaround time? We have a pressing deadline, and every day counts. Could you also inform us of any additional charges for this expedited service? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgency in Handling Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello John, Yes, we can expedite the turnaround time for your shipment. We will arrange for the cargo to be loaded as soon as possible to reduce the turnaround time. We will also prioritize your shipment to ensure a smooth process for customs and logistics. Please note that there will be additional charges for these expedited services. Let me know if you have any further questions or need more information. Thanks again for your business. Janelle

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Details and Availability
email_chain.body: Simon, could you please suggest the name of a vessel that can transport 4,000MT of poisons from Shanghai to Sri Lanka. I would like to know if your vessel is available for early May or if mid-June would be better. Please advise. Best regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Details and Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Mike, our vessel, capable of holding 5,000 MT and currently operating at 60% capacity, travels at a sailing speed of 11-12 knots. It will arrive in Hong Kong on June 1st and reach Sri Lanka by the morning of June 9th. Please confirm if this schedule suits your needs. Best regards, Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal from CIQM
email_chain.body: Simon, I agree with the solution proposed. Could you send more details such as the name of the vessel arriving in mid-June and the expected arrival time in Sri Lanka? Are there other details I should be aware of regarding the port or vessel? Regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal from CIQM
email_chain.body: Hello Mike, understanding your urgency, I must highlight that the details provided so far are insufficient for making final arrangements, particularly within a 48-hour decision window. Immediate and detailed responses will help facilitate the process. Regards, Simon

email_chain.subject: Clarification Required
email_chain.body: Mike, I need more precise information to proceed. Specifically, the name of the vessel arriving in Sri Lanka in mid-June and its exact capacity for transporting 4,000 MT. Regards, Simon

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Tin Ore Shipment from Cyprus to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hello Mrs. Blake,

We are planning a shipment of 3,000MT of tin ore from Mousa, Cyprus to Istanbul. Could you confirm your demurrage rate, and let us know if there are any restrictions on berthing during weekends?

Sincerely,
Rose

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry Regarding Tin Ore Shipment from Cyprus to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hello Rose,

I am available over the weekends. I will check the specifics and provide you details on the demurrage rate and any weekend berth restrictions shortly.

Yours,
Tushar

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry Regarding Tin Ore Shipment from Cyprus to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hi Tushar,

Thank you for your confirmation. We can proceed with the shipment under your terms. Could you please send the details of the demurrage charges?

Regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry Regarding Tin Ore Shipment from Cyprus to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hi Helen,

Our terms include Trade Conditions (T/C) with 100% Letter of Credit (L/C). Could you please specify what further detail you need regarding demurrage?

Regards,
Tushar

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry Regarding Tin Ore Shipment from Cyprus to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hi Tushar,

Thank you for detailing the terms. Regarding the Demurrage, it would be best to keep the conditions clear. Shall I send you a formal request for issuing the Letter of Credit?

Regards,
Helen

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry Regarding Tin Ore Shipment from Cyprus to Istanbul
email_chain.body:
Hello Helen,

Thanks for your reply. Please proceed with sending the details of your requirements for the Letter of Credit.

Regards,
Tushar

email_chain.subject: Transportation Request for 10,000 Tons of Liquids from Aruba to Panama
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Adams,

Could you please confirm if your vessel is available to transport 10,000 tons of seagoing liquids from Aruba to Panama? Additionally, could you advise if there are any additional security charges expected in Aruba?

Sincerely,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Rescheduling to Aruba
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,

I would like to reschedule our planned movement to Aruba. I am currently awaiting approval from management based on a recent request for proposal. I have secured an alternative vessel that could be available to call at Aruba within the upcoming week. Could you please check the feasibility of rescheduling the vessel to call at Aruba on the 22nd of this month?

Thank you,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Request for On-Site Vessel Inspection and Additional Dry Dock in Panama
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,

Could you please arrange for an on-site security officer to conduct a random vessel inspection as per my earlier request? Also, could you arrange for a second dry dock slot in Panama, as I have already utilized the first one allocated to us?

Kind regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Questionnaire
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. and Mrs. Kelly,

You have successfully booked a cruise from Canada to New Zealand for the month of July 2010. This will indeed be a special journey. We kindly request that you fill out the attached questionnaire to help us ensure your utmost comfort and address any special requests you might have.

Many thanks,
Melinda

email_chain.subject: Cruise Itinerary and Special Requests
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. and Mrs. Kelly,

I have attached the cruise itinerary, along with the questionnaire and other relevant information. Please review and let me know if you have any special requests. Otherwise, kindly sign and return the attached form at your earliest convenience.

It will be my pleasure to attend to your needs during your journey,
Melinda

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Documents
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. and Mrs. Kelly,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to confirm whether you received the booking form, itinerary, and other documents sent previously. If not, please inform me immediately so I can resend them to you.

All the best,
Melinda

email_chain.subject: Receipt of Questionnaires
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. and Mrs. Kelly,

We apologize for the delay in responding to your email. Unfortunately, due to a server issue, we did not initially receive your completed questionnaires. We have now received them and will process them promptly.

Many thanks for your patience,
Melinda
P.S. Sorry for the delayed reply; there was an email server issue.

email_chain.subject: Transportation of Refined Oil from Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body: Hey Mom! We are planning to move 5,000MT of refined oil products from Tianjin to Colombo. Do you think we should negotiate this on an FIO basis? I want to ensure that our pricing terms are aligned. Love, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation of Refined Oil from Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body: Hi Maria! It sounds like a good plan. You should contact Alex to discuss the FIO pricing further. In the meantime, I'll prepare my bid proposal and will update you soon. Love, Mom

email_chain.subject: Update: Discussion with Alex about FIO Pricing
email_chain.body: Hey Mom! I spoke with Alex, and he’s open to discussing the FIO pricing. He mentioned that he follows a strict evaluation process, so it might take a while. He will reach out directly to discuss this further. Additionally, I have finalized my bid and will share the details with you. Love, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Update: Discussion with Alex about FIO Pricing
email_chain.body: Hi Maria! Just checking if you received my latest emails. It’s been a hectic week, and I wanted to ensure nothing was missed. Please feel free to ask if you have any questions or need further clarification. By the way, have you heard back from Alex yet? Love, Mom

email_chain.subject: Scheduled Meeting with Alex
email_chain.body: Hi Mom! Yes, I've received your emails. I have a meeting scheduled with Alex tomorrow at 10 AM to finalize the FIO pricing. I’ll send you the meeting details later to ensure it works with your schedule. Love, Maria

email_chain.subject: Request for Sea Freight Quote: Shanghai to Leixoes

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sea Freight Quote: Shanghai to Leixoes

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Freight Quote Needed for Boots and Shoes from Kandahar to UK
email_chain.body: Hi Rachel, I need a quote for shipping a small cargo of boots and shoes from Kandahar to the UK. I would appreciate it if you could reply within a few hours. Thanks, Marianne

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Freight Quote Needed for Boots and Shoes from Kandahar to UK

Hello Marianne, We do not handle sea freight; however, if you are interested in air cargo, please provide the details such as the estimated weight and dimensions. Here is what I need:

a. From city/airport: Kandahar, Afghanistan
b. To city/airport: London, UK
c. Estimated weight: 100 kg
d. Estimated dimensions: 20x15x10 cm

Thanks, Rachel

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request for Apple Shipment from Mumbai to Venice

email_chain.subject: Cargo Clearance Issue in Greece
email_chain.body: Hi Rob, I understand there are some issues with getting our cargo through Greek Customs. Can you update me on the situation and let me know your plans to ensure delivery to Broker Inc? Thank you! Best, Max

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipping Container Held at Thessaloniki Port
email_chain.body: Hi Rob, Since our cargo was unloaded in Thessaloniki, Greece, it has been stuck at the port for three weeks awaiting Customs clearance. I'm in daily contact with our local representative but have no updates yet. Can you provide an estimated timeline for clearance? Our clients are concerned about the delay. Thanks, Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Clearance Issue in Greece
email_chain.body: Hi Max, Unfortunately, I was not aware of the situation with the Customs. I will immediately get in touch with our local representative to determine the status and resolve any issues as quickly as possible. I will keep you updated with any progress. Best regards, Rob

email_chain.subject: Update: Cargo Situation in Thessaloniki
email_chain.body: Hi Max, I've been in discussions with our local representative. There has been extensive dialogue between the shipper, the Greek agent, and Customs. Incurred fines have been settled by the shipper. The container is now waiting for a revised bill of lading. Once received and approved, it will be cleared and forwarded to Broker Inc. I've attached a few photos showing the current status. I will inform you when the bill of lading is processed. Regards, Rob

email_chain.subject: Progress: Cargo Clearing through Customs
email_chain.body: Hi Max, Attached is a photo documenting the container as it clears through Greek Customs. We are awaiting the bill of lading and will dispatch further updates, including images of the container being loaded for transport. We anticipate having the container ready at the shipper's warehouse within two weeks. Best, Rob

email_chain.subject: Final Update: Container Now in California Warehouse
email_chain.body: Hi Max, The container has reached the shipper's warehouse in California. However, there's a hiccup with forwarding it to the San Francisco agent due to an invoicing miscommunication. The forwarding agent was instructed to resolve this directly with the broker. Upon investigation, it seems there was a duplicated issue in the bill of lading by the broker. Next steps are being arranged to rectify this. Regards, Rob

email_chain.subject: Discrepancy in Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body: The shipping schedule and tank size details mentioned in your latest quote differ from your previous information. Could you confirm if the changes are acceptable for both the tank size and the schedule? Thanks, Leanne

email_chain.subject: Re: Discrepancy in Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email from 24 February. It appears there has been a mix-up in our records. The incorrect details under quote #201232-171028 are for a 50K tank size destined for Stony Creek, VIC. However, please find the details of the new job below as requested:

Tank size: 40K
45 tonne/hectolitre - HPMC precast pile driving concrete
No. of tanks: 1
Destination: Australia/ VIC/ Stony Creek
Address: 159 Stony Creek Rd, Stony Creek VIC 3971

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Discrepancy in Shipping Quote and Schedule
email_chain.body: I can't find the costings for the new 40k tank size delivery. If you can forward the associated costs then I will approve these orders. Regards, Leanne

email_chain.subject: Finalized Invoice Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Leanne,

Please review the attached invoice with the following details:

Customer: Stony Creek Earthmoving
Invoice number: K31.3204.0408155
Due Date: 13.9.2018
Supplier: Muirchaidh Gisari
Invoice value: $7205.00 + GST
Price excluding GST: $5532.50
GST amount: $1272.50
Invoice amount including GST: $6805.00
Quantity: 1
GCS Number: 1417231
GCS Name: 45 tonne/hour

Kind regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Delivery Schedule Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Amanda,

Please find attached the delivery schedules for Stony Creek Earthmoving:

- 45 tonne precast HPMC concrete for 16 September 2018
- Same for 24 September 2018

Please confirm if these dates are acceptable. Regards, Bob

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bitumen Vessel Slots
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Santos,
Can you please inform me if you are scheduling any new bitumen vessel slots soon? I need details on the available vessels, laycan, and rates for a potential shipment. Specifically, I'm looking to book up to 6,000MT of liquid bitumen for a voyage from Corpus Christi to China.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Inquiry on Voyage Duration
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Santos,
Thank you for your prompt response. I am also considering a shorter voyage, about 7-10 days, to the northwest coast of South America. Could you please let me know if there are any available slots for bitumen shipments on this route? I'm open to offering a higher bid if necessary.

Betty

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Bitumen Slots Availability

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for RFQ and FOB Pricing - Marseille to Genoa cargo

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about handling and shipment of concrete blocks
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I’m writing to you on behalf of Mr. Rudolf Acers from Frankfurt, seeking information on shipping 30 x 2" square concrete blocks from Denmark to Zurich. Can you confirm whether you can handle this cargo, and what your minimum booking quantities are?

Thank you for your time,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about handling and shipment of concrete blocks
email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,

Thank you for reaching out to us. Blue Oar Maritime Ltd. can indeed handle the shipment of the concrete blocks you specified. We can manage as few as 1 block per shipment.

Please let us know when Mr. Acers would like to proceed with the booking, and if possible, provide the estimated delivery dates to Zurich. Should you have any further inquiries, feel free to contact us.

Best regards,
Blue Oar Maritime Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about handling and shipment of concrete blocks
email_chain.body:
Dear Sales Team,

Thank you for your prompt response. Mr. Acers would like to know:
1. If the blocks are packed in individual crates or in a common crate?
2. How many crates per shipment can be handled?

We value your cooperation and look forward to your answers.
Best regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about handling and shipment of concrete blocks
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Acers,

In response to your questions:
1. Each block will be packed in its own crate, with 30 x 2" square concrete blocks per crate.
2. We can manage up to 30 crates per shipment.

We are ready to assist with your shipment from Denmark to Zurich as soon as you are ready to proceed.

Best regards,
Blue Oar Maritime Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Container Availability

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Container Availability

It can leave Shenzhen in early June, with loading available from May 14th. Expected delivery to Iran will be on June 29th. Let me know if this works for you. Kind regards, Janine

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Container Availability

email_chain.subject: Packing List for Ammonium Nitrate Shipment

email_chain.body:

The 5,000MT of caustic soda shipment from Qingdao is confirmed. The delivery date is set for March 16. We would like to inquire if it is possible to consider a partial load and a potential stopover in Manila?
Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Caustic Soda Shipment and Query on Partial Load
email_chain.body:

Can you please send the shipping schedule for the 5,000MT caustic soda shipment? Currently, I don’t see a Manila stopover in our schedule.
Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Linda,
Could you please fax back the shipping schedule for the 5,000MT caustic soda shipment at your earliest convenience? I am currently available at the office.
Thank you,

email_chain.subject: Estimate Inquiry for Caustic Soda Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,
Management is requesting the best estimate for the 5,000MT caustic soda shipment and wishes to know if it can be split between two ships. Let’s ensure our estimates are as accurate as possible.
Regards,

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Charter Rate for MS Irene
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Amrita Gomes,

Thank you for your prompt response regarding the vessel MS Irene. We are interested in utilizing your shipping services for coal transport and are seeking the earliest possible loading window. Could you please provide your best offer? Currently, the charter rate stands at $33,000/day with an additional $4,500/day for owner’s hire.

Kind regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Charter Rate for MS Irene
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

Greetings to you and your team! We appreciate your interest in our shipping services. We are currently preparing for IMO 2020 compliance by loading approximately 300,000 tons of cargo with 1.5% MGO content, and indeed intend to include FSO arrangements. Our operations are coast-to-coast, and we will add 500,000 MT of GHT on each leg of the journey.

We anticipate the loading operation to commence in 20 days. It would be beneficial to arrange a call to discuss the shipment details and delivery preparations to your facilities. Additionally, I would like to establish a more formal partnership, and would appreciate an introduction to your chartering manager or a relevant contact within your organization.

Warm regards,
Lars Petter Berge

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Heavy Rainforest Wood from Paramaribo to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Hope,

We are looking to ship 8,000MT of heavy rainforest wood from Paramaribo to Hamburg next month. Could you please provide your initial freight quote for this shipment?

Kind regards,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote: Heavy Rainforest Wood from Paramaribo to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Charlie,

Thank you for getting in touch. We can certainly help with your requirement. I will check the availability for the shipment size and route specified and get back to you with an initial quote as soon as possible. 

Best regards,
Ms. Hope

email_chain.subject: Stock Replenishment Update
email_chain.body: Hi Linda, I'm reaching out to update you on our product stock. Currently, the quantity is zero. We are hoping to replenish soon and will provide you with a new ETA once confirmed. Kind Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Stock Replenishment Update
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your email. I am currently checking our inventory. Please allow us 48 hours to provide an accurate update on our stock availability and a revised ETA. Regards, Linda

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Charges
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Crabtree,

We are arranging a shipment of 2,400MT of out-of-season strawberries from France, with an initial loading in Rotterdam next week, destined for Medellin, Mexico. We appreciate if you could provide the availability of a suitable vessel and your standard waiting charges. We also prefer to include the on-truck coordination service at the destination.

Best regards,
Sharon

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Charges
email_chain.body:
Hi Sharon,

Thank you for your message. I’ve sent an A-List rate for your service and included my waiting charges. I have space available on a suitable vessel during the week of August 21-25. If you can secure a berth within this timeframe, that would be great.

Please let me know if you can.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Change in Routing Plan
email_chain.body:
Hello Alex,

Thank you for your offer. Unfortunately, we will not send the cargo to Medellin by the proposed path. Instead, we plan to reroute our shipment to Dublin, Ireland, via Rotterdam. We will be chartering a different vessel for this new plan.

Best regards,
Sharon

email_chain.subject: Schedule Confirmation for Paperwork
email_chain.body:
Hi Sharon,

Great to hear from you. Please let me know when you will need to complete your paperwork. We are available from Monday, August 21 to Friday, August 25. Our schedule is flexible, and we can prepare the necessary documentation within this period.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Request for Service Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I have finalized the commitment for Dublin. Could you please send me a quote for the services and coordination needed for this change in destination? I appreciate your assistance.

Best regards,
Sharon

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for White Spirit Shipment from Riga to Dublin
email_chain.body: Hi Neal, We need 2,200MT of white spirit from Riga to Dublin. Could you confirm your earliest berth availability, and do you typically quote under FOB? Best, Wayne

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for White Spirit Shipment from Riga to Dublin
email_chain.body: Hi Wayne, Thank you for your inquiry. I will send the quotation details shortly. Best, Neal

email_chain.subject: Quotation Details for White Spirit Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Wayne, Thank you for your patience. Please find attached the quotation for 2,200MT of white spirit from Riga to Dublin. Let me know if you have any other requests. Best, Neal

email_chain.subject: Re: Quotation Details for White Spirit Shipment
email_chain.body: Neal, Thanks for your quote. I am reviewing it and might get back with a few adjustments. By the way, do you have any agent in Dublin? Best, Wayne

email_chain.subject: Re: Agent in Dublin
email_chain.body: Hi Wayne, We do not have an agent directly in Dublin, but we can coordinate with local partners if necessary. Let me know how you would like to proceed. Best, Neal

email_chain.subject: Proceeding without Local Agent - Request for Proforma Invoice
email_chain.body: Neal, I can coordinate the local logistics directly. Can you provide the Proforma Invoice based on our agreed terms? Thanks, Wayne

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice for White Spirit Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Wayne, Please find attached our Proforma Invoice for the shipment. If there are no further adjustments needed, please confirm so we can proceed with the booking. Best, Neal

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Final Quote Request
email_chain.body: Hi Neal, I've reviewed the Proforma Invoice and everything looks good. However, could you send me the final quotation reflecting all the latest agreements? Thanks, Wayne

email_chain.subject: Final Quotation for White Spirit Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Wayne, I have attached the updated final quote. Please review it and confirm at your earliest convenience so we can finalize the shipment details. Best, Neal

email_chain.subject: Availability of Shipping Slot for Coal Transport from Richards Bay to Maputo
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Neko,

We’re planning to import a 6,600MT cargo of coal from Richards Bay to Maputo next week. Could you please let us know if you have any available slots during this period? Your assistance in this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Capacity for Timber Import from Brazil to Southern Africa
email_chain.body:
Olá Adrian,

Over the past six years, I have been importing timber to Southern Africa, and the market shift has been significant. While previously dominated by Canadian and Australian products, Brazilian timber has started making an impressive impact. However, we are currently facing transportation challenges. Given that Rio de Janeiro is significantly closer to Maputo compared to starting from Salvador, and with the Panama Canal currently unusable due to weather disruptions, do you have any available shipping capacity for timber from Brazil to Southern Africa?

Best regards,
Neko

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Capacity for Timber Import from Brazil to Southern Africa
email_chain.body:
Hello Neko,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear about your endeavors with timber. I currently only handle grain and boat shipments with partners in Zimbabwe and Rwanda. Fortunately, our grain shipments are uninterrupted as the Atlantic channels remain open. We have a unique opening in Rwanda and had hoped to extend our route to Southern Africa, but the issues with the Panama Canal in 2019/2020 have made us cautious. Thankfully, we're able to safely navigate the Atlantic. Please let me know if this information helps or if you have other inquiries regarding our shipping capabilities.

Best,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Expanding Portfolio: Introduction of Fertilizers and Vehicles
email_chain.body:
Hello Adrian,

Following a shift in our business strategy from bulk grains, today our main focus is on dry and soft fertilizers and rocks. Additionally, we have started private imports of 4x4 vehicles, including Mercedes Benz and Toyota Landcruiser models. Recently, we’ve handled over a million MTs of various fertilizers and are currently looking to stabilize our supply due to reduced stock. Let me know if there's a way we can collaborate on these commodities.

Best regards,
Neko

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Food and Nut Products Import
email_chain.body:
Hi Neko,

I'm looking to diversify my imports to include spices, fruits, meat, dry goods, and cashew nuts. Could you advise on how I can set up an account with your company for these products? Additionally, is there availability for a barge berth in Mozambique? Your guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on Dry and Soft Goods Trade
email_chain.body:
Hey Neko!

I'm conducting research on trade routes and would like to learn more about the market for dry goods and soft goods in Mozambique, particularly focusing on coal and other dried products. Please email me at your earliest convenience.
Best,
Adrian

labels.commodity: coal, timber, grains, fertilizers, vehicles, spices, fruits, meat, dry goods, cashew nuts

email_chain.subject: Request for Laycan Dates and Iron Ore Shipment

Sincerely,
Darren
