email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wu,

Following up on my earlier request, could you also let us know if it's possible to adjust the shipment size from 2,500MT to up to 5,000MT per shipment? We are considering scaling up our operations and would appreciate your feedback on this.

Regards,
Darren

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wu,

I regret to inform you that we are no longer interested in the shipment and therefore cancelling our inquiry for the iron ore from Vigo to Kaohsiung. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Best regards,
Darren

email_chain.subject: Thank You and Update on Our Shipping Partners
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Davis,

We want to express our gratitude for the exceptional work you have done with our shipping needs over the past year. Your enhancements in process efficiency and accuracy have not gone unnoticed, and we deeply appreciate it. As a company that prioritizes safe, efficient, and reliable transportation, we recognize and value your commitment to these principles.

We would like to inform you that we have started exploring partnerships with other carriers who offer competitive rates. However, you remain our trusted provider, and we are open to discussions should you have concerns about your pricing structure versus newer offers.

Please note, this does not affect our ongoing projects and commitment to your services. We are keen to maintain a productive relationship and are here to assist you in any capacity.

Looking forward to your thoughts.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Shipper's Name

email_chain.subject: Job Opportunity as a [Position] at Our Company
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Davis,

I hope this message finds you well. I am pleased to inform you that we have a position available that may align with your expertise. We currently have your resume on file, which highlights your qualifications that are ideal for the role of [Position] we are offering.

Attached to this email, you will find more details about the position, along with other similar opportunities. These positions provide comparable benefits and present an excellent working environment.

Please feel free to apply or reach out with any questions you might have. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you aboard. 

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Company Name]

email_chain.subject: Exciting New Product Launch - Involvement Opportunity
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Davis,

We are thrilled to announce the launch of a groundbreaking product that we believe will transform [industry or field]. As we prepare for this exciting new phase, we are on the lookout for passionate individuals who can contribute to and drive our vision forward.

This position relates directly to the new product, focusing on [specific role details]. We believe someone with your passion and expertise could be the perfect fit. For more details and to apply, please follow the link provided here: [Link].

We are eager to hear from you and hope you will consider joining our innovative team.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Innovative Products, Inc.

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Crude Palm Oil Shipment from Port Klang to Chennai
email_chain.body:
Hello Allibert Team,

We’d like to inquire about shipping 9,000MT of crude palm oil from Port Klang to Chennai. Could you please confirm your earliest availability and provide a ballpark lumpsum freight quote?

Kind regards,
Raj

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Crude Palm Oil Shipment from Port Klang to Chennai
email_chain.body:
Dear Raj,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can schedule your shipment to depart as early as 15th February 2019. We can offer a lumpsum freight rate of USD 20,000. Would you like us to deliver the shipment on board?

Additionally, could you specify the required freight space and any logistic capabilities needed?

Kind regards,
The Allibert Team

(06 04 2019)

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Crude Soybean Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Yoram,

I am looking to ship 1,200MT of crude soybean oil from Cuxhaven to Aracaju. Can your team handle it by the 25th of this month? I look forward to your prompt response.

Kind regards,
Alphonse

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Crude Soybean Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Alphonse,

Great to hear from you! Could you please inform us of your availability to begin the shipment process? We want to ensure we can meet your timeline efficiently.

Kind regards,
Yoram

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Crude Soybean Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Alphonse,

Thank you for your query. I've forwarded your shipping details to our operations team, and they will be in touch soon to discuss the specifics and next steps.

Kind regards,
Tammy

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Crude Soybean Oil Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Alphonse,

Thanks for considering our services. However, after reviewing our current capacities and schedules, we regret to inform you that we cannot meet the requirements for your shipment by the 25th.

Kind regards,
Ravi

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Crude Soybean Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Alphonse,

I regret to inform you that due to recent changes in legal regulations, we cannot proceed with shipping crude soybean oil to Aracaju at this time. Please let us know if we may assist you with any alternative destinations or solutions.

Kind regards,
Joan

email_chain.subject: Unable to Process Your Shipping Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Alphonse,

Thank you for reaching out to us. Unfortunately, we do not handle shipments to the destinations you mentioned. I hope you find a suitable provider to fulfill your requirements.

Kind regards,
Anett

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Shipment of Polyethylene Sheeting to Vietnam
email_chain.body: Hey Ashley, We’re sending 14k MT of polyethylene sheeting from China to Vietnam. Could you work out the details and get back to us as soon as possible? Best regards, Barry

email_chain.subject: Request for Pricing on Polyethylene Sheeting
email_chain.body: Hi, I sent you an email yesterday at 2:58pm asking you to quote on the polyethylene sheeting. Please get back to me with the pricing so we can lock in our spot to avoid the possibility of a cancelled order and costly delays. Thanks, Alison

email_chain.subject: Delayed Container Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Barry, The container was supposed to ship on Thursday. What happened? Did you receive my email? Thanks, Jasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Delayed Container Shipment
email_chain.body: Jasmine, Yes I did receive the email. I was going to call you this morning. Can you give me a call back when you get a chance? Thanks, Barry

email_chain.subject: Invoice Discrepancy and Refund Request
email_chain.body: Hi Barry, We got the invoices this morning and you didn’t send them to me. We paid you $3000. Please refund $2500 for labor and materials to the following account: [...] Thanks, Allyson

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice Discrepancy and Refund Request
email_chain.body: Allyson, Sorry about that. I have sent you the invoices and will refund your money. Thanks for understanding. Barry

email_chain.subject: Container Load Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Barry, Thanks for the refund! Is this container fully loaded? Let me know. Allison

email_chain.subject: Re: Container Load Confirmation
email_chain.body: Allison, Yes the container is fully loaded. Thanks, Barry

email_chain.subject: Assistance Required for Cargo and Settlement
email_chain.body:
Hello Dr. Iverson,

I will start loading 6,000MT of methanol from Sikka to Daesan next week. Could you assist by contributing your residual cargo to settle the pending $53,000 demurrage?

Regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Assistance Required for Cargo and Settlement
email_chain.body:
Dr. Iverson,

Please let me know as soon as possible!

Thanks for your help!
Jon

email_chain.subject: Request for Update
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Iverson,

I was wondering about the current situation. May I call your office to discuss further?

Best,
Dave

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Dave,

What's up? Things have been a bit hectic here with the Ike-related issues.

Regards,
Mr. Iverson

email_chain.subject: Request for Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chou,

Please fax your revised offer to Suezmar by 5pm today.

Sincerely,
The Suezmar Marketing Department

email_chain.subject: Response to Your Fax
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chou,

Please consider this email as our response to your fax sent at 10:35am today. We have received and are currently reviewing your proposal. We will be happy to provide our detailed response within 24 hours.

Regards,
The Suezmar Marketing Department

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Iron Ore Transportation
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Timber Shipping Rates and Prices
email_chain.body:
Hi Hassan,
We are a Swedish family and have a requirement of high-quality timber. We would be grateful if you could let us know the prices and current freight rates of timber from Japan to the UK.
Thanks,
<NAME>

email_chain.subject: Request for LCL Shipping Quote from Aqaba to the UK
email_chain.body:
Hello Hassan,
We’re looking to ship automotive parts to the UK from the port of Aqaba in Jordan. Could you provide us with a quote for a LCL (less than container load) shipment?

email_chain.subject: Need for Reliable Shipping Solution from Japan to Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Hassan,
We are looking for a vessel from Japan to Vietnam. We need a reliable shipping line and good quality service. Could you provide us with some options?
Thanks,

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity and Demurrage Clause
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hardy,

I am arranging to ship 3,200MT of green coffee from Sousse to Glasgow. Can you confirm if you would be able to accommodate this shipment in early October and provide details on your standard demurrage clause?

Best regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity and Demurrage Clause
email_chain.body:
Dear Ana,

We can schedule the shipment to leave the port at the end of September. Our standard condition includes a demurrage period of 28 days, as preferred by other suppliers for early clearance.

Best regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Timing and Market Concerns for Coffee Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ana,

Thank you for the details of the shipment. However, I must mention that the container's availability in early October might be too late for timely market distribution.

Best regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Timing and Market Concerns for Coffee Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hardy,

A big thank you for your assistance! We have managed to book the necessary arrangements for the coffee shipment.

Best regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Copper Cathode Shipment
email_chain.body: We have a 12,000MT copper cathode shipment ready from Fujian to Rotterdam, ready in 6 days. Could you advise your best freight rate and let me know if weekend loadings are acceptable? Thank you, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Copper Cathode Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, Thank you for your request. I can offer the below FOB quotation to Rotterdam Port. Please let me know if you have any questions. Distance: 2750km, Volume: 6MT, FOB Rotterdam at USD 2611/MT. Please kindly check if this price fits your requirement. Note that the customer needs to pay all handling costs at the spot of origin. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Acceptance of Quotation & Inquiry About Further Consignments
email_chain.body: Dear Transporter, Thank you for your prompt reply. We will definitely accept your FCA price for the current consignment. Additionally, we will have two more consignments to Shanghai in about 10-20 days, and we hope you could assist with these as well. Could you please provide more information about the freight market for a delivery from Suzhou to Rotterdam port? Best regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Acceptance of Quotation & Inquiry About Further Consignments
email_chain.body: Dear Alex, Thanks for your message. The Port of Rotterdam will continue to be a good receiving point for your cargo. Regarding your question, we have not opened up a new forwarder in China yet. If no other consignments are planned until next year, perhaps you could consider some beneficial options we might offer. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Cement Shipment from Vancouver to Malmo
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Stone,

Would you be able to assist me with transporting 800MT of cement from Vancouver to Malmo next week? Could you provide your best freight estimate, and could you confirm if weekend loading is possible?

Regards,
Wally

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Cement Shipment from Vancouver to Malmo
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Wally,

I have received your request for shipping 800MT of cement to Malmo. We can indeed handle this shipment, however, this will be our first time sending such a shipment by air to Sweden. I am currently coordinating with our supply chain. A preliminary shipment of 8MT as a sample will precede the remaining 792MT.

We will confirm the loading dates and further details shortly.

Best Regards,
Mr. Stone

email_chain.subject: Update: Cement Shipment from Vancouver to Malmo
email_chain.body:
Dear Wally,

I am pleased to inform you that the initial sample shipment has been arranged. The remaining 792MT will follow, and we expect to finalize dates and logistics within the next few hours. I’ll keep you updated.

Kind Regards,
Mr. Stone

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cement Shipment Receipt at Malmo
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Stone,

We have successfully received the cement shipment at Malmo on the 5th of September. Thank you for your coordination.

Best Regards,
Johannes

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Chemical Transport from Hamburg to Gdansk
email_chain.body:

We're interested in transporting 7,500MT of chemicals from Hamburg to Gdansk. Could you please send your rate ideas? Additionally, is your vessel flexible on partial loading windows?

Sincerely,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Shipping Request: Hamriyah to Mumbai
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Lithium Cargo on August 30 from Shanghai to Hamburg
email_chain.body:

Nicole

email_chain.subject: Query about Bauxite Supply from Delmas to Donges
email_chain.body:
Dear Linda,

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Port Charges and Reefer Fee Rates for Vietnam
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Port Charges and Reefer Fee Rates for Vietnam
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Francesco

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Port Charges and Reefer Fee Rates for Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Please let me know the shipping schedule and any updated details so that we can proceed accordingly.

Thanks,
Francesco

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Port Charges and Reefer Fee Rates for Vietnam
email_chain.body:
We are happy to accept your quotation. We are awaiting your updated Purchase Order as soon as possible to proceed with the booking.

Regards,
Francesco

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Diesel Fuel Shipment from Kolkata to Mumbai
email_chain.body: Hi K, We would like to confirm the shipment of 2,800 MT of diesel fuel from Kolkata to Mumbai. Could you let us know your latest prices and your desired payment terms? Best, Tomas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Diesel Fuel Shipment from Kolkata to Mumbai
email_chain.body: Dear Tomas, We will be in touch with you as soon as possible. Regards, K

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Diesel Fuel Shipment from Kolkata to Mumbai
email_chain.body: Tomas, We have received your inquiry and confirm that we have space available for your cargo. Can you please clarify your latest offer prices and preferred payment terms so we can proceed? Thank you, K

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Diesel Fuel Shipment from Kolkata to Mumbai
email_chain.body: K, Thank you for the prompt reply. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Could you please inform us about your latest rates and the preferred payment terms? Best, Tomas

email_chain.subject: Final Rate Confirmation for Diesel Fuel Shipment
email_chain.body: Tomas, We can confirm the shipment on our vessel CMA CGM Antwerp. The freight rate from Kolkata to Mumbai will be INR 4 per MT. Please let us know if this is acceptable so we can finalize the arrangements. Best regards, K

email_chain.subject: LNG Cargo Loading Inquiry for Next Week
email_chain.body:
Hi Jennifer,

We have 3,200 MTs of LNG cargoes to load next week. Could you kindly confirm your quotations, and do you see any charter rate impact in the market?

Regards,
Niklas

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Loading Inquiry for Next Week
email_chain.body:
Hi Niklas,

Thank you for your inquiry. Our latest LPG FOB loading rates are as follows:
- $250/MT on 60% validity cargoes
- $210/MT on 90% validity cargoes
- $180/MT on 100% validity cargoes

The rates shown above are applicable for Spot FOB cargoes loading next week. We are also actively looking for medium-term FOB deals, please kindly contact me for any opportunities.

Regards,
Ehsan

email_chain.subject: Request for Q2 2020 Delivery Rate Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Ehsan,

Thank you for the FOB quote. We would really appreciate if you could quote any medium-term deals as well. Could you please provide the rates for Q2 2020 delivery?

Regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Q2 2020 Delivery Rate Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

Thank you for the request. I would be happy to discuss the rates for Q2 2020 in further detail. Could we arrange a meeting or a call to explore our options?

Regards,
Ehsan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Charter from Busan to Baltimore
email_chain.body:

We need to arrange a shipment of 3,000MT of petroleum products from Busan to Baltimore. Could you please provide us with a price offer? Also, do you currently have a vessel available for charter?

Warm regards,
Jenna

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Barley Shipment Rate
email_chain.body: Mr. Takemura, I am finalizing a shipment of 5,400MT of barley from Constanța to Beirut. Could we finalize the freight rate within the next two days? Best regards, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Payment Method Query
email_chain.body: Hello Yasmine, The seller has indicated that the transfer of money can only be done via Western Union. He is not allowed to receive payments through bank transfer or Paypal in Romania. Please let me know your thoughts. Yours, Takemura

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment Method Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Takemura, That should be fine. I will send you the sender's information tomorrow so that you can proceed with the Western Union transfer. Best regards, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Transaction Details
email_chain.body: Hi Yasmine, Could you please send me the payment receipt once the transfer is completed? Best regards, Takemura

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Payment
email_chain.body: Hello Takemura, I met with the seller and he confirmed the receipt of the payment via Western Union. Everything should be finalized within two days. Best regards, Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed
email_chain.body: Hi Yasmine, Is there anything else that we need to do at this stage? Best regards, Takemura

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity for Sugar
email_chain.body:
Hi Monsieur Bourque,

I'm considering a contract for shipping 10,000MT of sugar from Veracruz to Tarragona in October. Could you please confirm if you have shipping capacity available around mid-October?

Best regards,
Armando

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity for Sugar
email_chain.body:
Hi Armando,

Thanks for reaching out. Yes, we can accommodate a shipment of 10,000 MT of sugar in October. Specifically, we can schedule the shipment for October 15th. Please confirm if this date works for you, or if there are any other specific requirements you may need.

Looking forward to your reply.
Best regards,
Simon Bourque

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Maize Shipment from Chicago to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

We’d like to send 12,500MT of maize from Chicago to Chile. Can you please provide the current market rate for this shipment?

Cheers,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Maize Shipment from Chicago to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Antonia,

The market rate has generally been around $20 per ton, but due to weather fluctuations, a more accurate estimate is currently about $23 per ton.

Best regards,
Marat

email_chain.subject: Request to Discuss Quote Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

Thank you for the quotation. My boss was impressed with the competitive rates and comprehensive support. Could we arrange a meeting to discuss the specifics of securing this quote permanently?

Regards,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Future Collaboration and Discount Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

It’s great to know you are in our client book for 2016. Due to your competitive rates, I'm interested in knowing if there are additional discounts or added value services you can offer for future shipments. Looking forward to your detailed response.

Regards,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Your Support
email_chain.body:
Hi Marat,

Just wanted to drop a quick thanks for all your help with our shipping needs!

Best, Antonia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Service Availability in August
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Mercer, We are looking to ship 3,000MT of nonferrous metals from Hakata to New York in early August. Could you let me know if you have availability during this period and provide details on your standard demurrage clause? Regards, Stephane

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Service Availability in August
email_chain.body: Mr. Mercer, I spoke with our Customs broker who confirmed that your company is highly recommended for this type of service. Please confirm your ability to handle this volume in August and elaborate on your demurrage terms. Feel free to contact me with any questions. Best regards, Stephane

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Service Availability in August
email_chain.body: Hi Stephane, Regarding your request for shipping service to Hakata in early August, we can manage the transport of 3,000MT nonferrous metals. The demurrage would be charged at $4.00 per day plus $1.50 per hour. We can ship to Pier 84 in New York City. Let me know if this meets your needs. Best regards, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Service Availability in August
email_chain.body: Thank you for the prompt response, Mr. Mercer. The conditions sound acceptable. We’d like to confirm a shipment from August 1 to August 14. Can you provide the earliest available departure date? Additionally, there's a possibility our client might want to change the origin to California; how would this impact our arrangement? Regards, Stephane

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Your Service
email_chain.body: Hi David, I just want to express my gratitude for the excellent service provided on our recent import. It was a great experience overall, and your effective communication and cooperation with our customs broker were invaluable. We will surely utilize your services again. Best regards, Stephane

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Jet Fuel from Korea to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Au,

I am seeking a vessel for the transportation of 20,000MT of BP500 jet fuel from Korea to Hong Kong. Could you please confirm if a mid-June laycan is feasible for you? Additionally, are the port dues included in your quote?

Many thanks,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Jet Fuel from Korea to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms Precious,

Thank you for your inquiry. I confirm that a mid-June laycan works for our scheduling. Could you please confirm your availability so we can proceed to identify a suitable vessel?

I appreciate your professionalism in handling this request.

Regards,
Mr Au

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Jet Fuel from Korea to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Au,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am available to proceed with securing the vessel. It's great to hear that there appears to be ample shipping capacity, though I understand the slots can be competitive. We can start the rate discussions once a vessel is identified.

Regards,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quotation Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms Precious,

We have identified two potential vessels and are currently negotiating rates with the carriers for both. I will update you as soon as we finalize the terms.

Thank you for all your efforts.

Regards,
Mr Au

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Quotation Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr Au,

Thank you for the update. I am pleased to hear that we have secured both slots. Could you please confirm that the final cost of shipping will be less than S$20,000 as previously anticipated?

Many thanks,
Precious

email_chain.subject: Potential for Increased Coordination on Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body:
Dear Gomes,

We recently reviewed the order details for FREYSSINET and wanted to inquire about any additional future shipments. Our team is well-equipped to provide a highly efficient supply chain ensuring strict adherence to your required ETAs. With vast experience in managing projects for large organizations, we can ensure timely delivery of your goods. Please let us know your upcoming logistics needs.

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential for Increased Coordination on Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your thoughtful analysis regarding our recent order. In placing this order, I opted not to use a consultant, and your expertise has provided valuable insights that might lead to more cost-effective solutions through other sourcing channels or agents. I'm considering revisiting our strategy for contract negotiations based on your suggestions.

I'm impressed with your detailed approach and am open to further discussions on how we might improve our procurement process.

Best regards,
Gomes

email_chain.subject: Further Thoughts on Utilizing Agents and Consultants
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Following up on our previous emails, I appreciate your insights into using agents and consultants in our orders. A preliminary look into historical data suggests that leveraging these professionals in about 10% of our orders has proven beneficial. This strategy could potentially save us significantly on fees.

Please let me know if we can set up a time to explore this further and possibly integrate more extensively into our operations.

Sincerely,
Gomes

email_chain.subject: Regarding John Green's Departure and Next Steps
email_chain.body:
Mr. Lewis,

Regarding your recent contact with John Green, I'm glad to inform you that he's leaving our firm. Could you possibly find a contact in your area for further discussions? I would like to speak to you by next week.

Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Educational Concerns in Your Region
email_chain.body:
Mr. Lewis,

I'm glad we had the opportunity to speak recently. My main focus in your area is on educational efforts for your students. Can you confirm whether you teach them 4-5 days a week, or do you have an alternate schedule on Fridays?

Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body: Hello Dave, We require shipping for 3,000MT of transformers from Tianjin to Colombo within the next couple of months. Please provide your lead times and rates for this shipment. Sincerely, Sue

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hi Sue, Thank you for considering us for your shipping needs. We specialize in marine logistics and offer a range of services including door-to-door, pick-up, and direct cargo delivery. Our crew is experienced and customer-focused. Custom clearance and cargo receipt at the destination port are also part of our services.
If you have further questions or specific requirements, please let us know. We appreciate your interest in our services. Yours faithfully, Dave

email_chain.subject: Booking and Pickup Arrangements
email_chain.body: Dave, I'd like to proceed with booking the shipment and request a pickup from my address. Please provide the address of your warehouse. Regards, Sue

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking and Pickup Arrangements
email_chain.body: Hi Sue, Thank you for deciding to book with us. Please send your package to our main office on the east side of the town: [Warehouse Address, City, State, ZIP]. I will follow up with details on the shipping rates and any additional information required. Yours sincerely, Dave

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Cargo Space
email_chain.body: Dear Captain Smith, We find ourselves short by 200 MT from the promised 8,800MT of base chemicals. May we reserve the same space originally discussed for the increased quantity? We regret any inconvenience caused by this oversight. Thanks, Mike

email_chain.subject: Shipping Confirmation and Inquiry about Departure
email_chain.body: Dear Miss Sinclair, I'm pleased to confirm that the original 8,800MT of base chemicals is now on board your vessel, though please note, as per my previous message, we are trying to accommodate an additional 200 MT. I appreciate your efficiency during this process. Could you please confirm if the vessel can depart by Wednesday? Thanks again for the smooth operation. Regards, Mike

email_chain.subject: Cargo Insurance Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, On behalf of Cox Management Inc, I'd like to acknowledge receipt of your inquiry dated October 24, 2018, regarding our cargo insurance. This is to confirm that we have reviewed and updated our policy accordingly. You may proceed with the payment as discussed. Thank you, Cox Management Insurance Department

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Chartering 6500MT Capacity, Fuel Oil from Malaysia to Cairns
email_chain.body: We’re looking for a charter capable of carrying 6,500MT of fuel oil from Malaysia to Cairns. The earliest laycan available is this Thursday, 1st November. Expected time of delivery is 2nd December. Could you please inform me of your usual demurrage rate? It would be appreciated if you can confirm your availability as soon as possible. Many thanks, Kyle

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chartering 6500MT Capacity, Fuel Oil from Malaysia to Cairns
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry, Kyle. We will forward the information to our freight forwarder for confirmation and get back to you with a proposal. Once you receive it, please reach out so we can proceed with the tender. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chartering 6500MT Capacity, Fuel Oil from Malaysia to Cairns
email_chain.body: Thank you for the swift response. I look forward to receiving the proposal and will get back to you as soon as I review it. Regards, Kyle

email_chain.subject: Request for Agricultural Produce Transportation Quotes
email_chain.body:
We are requesting quotes for the transportation of the following agricultural products:
1. 4000MT from Pune to Telangana on 11th April and 13th April.
2. 1300MT from Chennai to Kerala on 20th April and 27th April.
3. 1500MT from Coimbatore to Pondicherry on 22nd April and 26th April.
Please revert with your pricing details at your earliest convenience. Thanks and regards, Srikar

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Pinto,

Could you please suggest the best way to ship 9,800MT of palm oil from Mataro to Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Palm Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

Thanks for your email. We will be happy to get back to you in one business day with our suggestions.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Shipping Method
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

We really appreciate your prompt response. Could you please suggest which method will be the fastest to ship the oil to Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgency in Shipping Method
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

You have made a very good decision choosing us as your preferred carrier. For quick delivery, we will be using the "Fast Liner" shipping method. Please note that the "Fast Liner" service does not include any delays caused by Customs.

If you want to expedite your cargo through customs in Dar es Salaam, it would be helpful to send us your credit application to speed up the payment and import clearance process.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Credit Application and Passport Copy
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Attached are the credit application and a copy of my passport for your information. I am looking forward to receiving your assistance in shipping the cargo soon.

Best regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Credit Application and Passport Copy
email_chain.body:
Hello Victor,

Thanks for sending us your documents. We have received them and have started to process your cargo. It will take us approximately five days to get the shipment ready. Please keep in mind that this is just an estimate.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Big Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning John!

How about some big orders? Would you be able to clear the next big shipment on time?

Sincerely,
Marion

email_chain.subject: Issue with Shipment to Las Vegas
email_chain.body:
Hey boss!

How have you been? Last week, I encountered a serious problem with a shipment to Las Vegas. They initially wanted the order on Saturday, but I had to inform them it would not be possible, which led to significant trouble.

Sincerely,
Alberto

email_chain.subject: Query About On-Time Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hello!

I have a question for you. How do you ensure that deliveries arrive on time as scheduled? I have been working with the shipping department for 3 years now, and I still find the predictability of on-time delivery elusive.

Sincerely,
Sonia

email_chain.subject: Request for Workshop on Timely Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hello again!

Considering my years of experience with the shipping department and persistent uncertainties about scheduling, I'm working with my client to organize a seminar focused on ensuring scheduled and timely deliveries. Your insights would be invaluable.

Best regards,
Sonia

email_chain.subject: Space Availability Request for 3,000MT Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Adel,

I have a load of 3,000MT. Do you have space for it? Please confirm, and let me know by 7pm BST on the 10th.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Space Availability Request for 3,000MT Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Anna,

Thank you for your inquiry. We would be happy to accommodate your shipment. Please find attached the loading details and the shipping schedule for the first leg of your shipment. We look forward to welcoming your consignment aboard.

Best regards,
Shipping Division
MTS Group

email_chain.subject: Cargo Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Anna,

We confirm the booking of your cargo that was dispatched from Port Klang. The courier was scheduled to arrive on Thursday, August 16, 2018. Please confirm it has been delivered to the intended address.

Best Regards,
Shipping Division
MTS Group

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Thank you for the shipping details. We are ready to proceed with the loading of the shipment. Please let me know what documents are specifically required for this process.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Cargo Reception Confirmation at Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Arfa,

We confirm the receipt of the load from Port Klang. Please proceed with the necessary checks and preparations for further transport.

Best regards,
Shipping Division
MTS Group

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment from Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Haugland, How's business? I'm in the market for 4,000 MT of fertilizers from Durban to Farquhar. What’s your best rate? Regards, Gunnar

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment from Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body: Good Morning Gunnar, We can offer a bulk shipment of 5,000 MT of fertilizer from Durban, with a vessel departing on February 20th. The price is $35.00 per MT. Would this suit your needs? Regards, Richard.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment from Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body: Hi Richard, Our vessel is on schedule. We can load your shipment. Fertigo 18-26-0 is available at a competitive price of $33.50 per MT from our warehouse. Are there any specific requirements for the shipment, or may we proceed with standard product specifications? Regards, Gunnar.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment from Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body: Mr. Haugland, I'm ready to load the shipment between next Thursday and Friday. We'd like to distribute as follows: 1,500 MT for the first customer, 2,000 MT for the second, and 500 MT for the third. Do you have any questions? We could discuss the load strategy further on Thursday. Please advise as the vessel space is limited. Regards, Richard.

email_chain.subject: Final Decision on Fertilizer Order
email_chain.body: Mr. Haugland, We appreciate your prompt responses. We confirm the purchase of 2,500 MT of Fertigo 18-26-0 and the revised offering of 4,000 MT at $33.00 per MT. Please confirm these terms so we can proceed promptly. We aim to ensure a balanced distribution on the vessel for a safe journey, limiting cargo deck load to 30%. Kindly confirm the details of our previous discussion, including customer allocations. Regards, Richard.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for Jewelry from Mexico to Japan
email_chain.body: Hello, I would like advice on importing a pallet of jewelry from Mexico to Japan. Thank you for your assistance. Best, Hiroyuki

email_chain.subject: Direct Shipping Query for Fabric to Germany
email_chain.body: Hello, I need to ship 10m of fabric directly to a customer in Germany without intermediate handling in Hamburg to avoid taxes. Is this possible? Thanks, Nicole

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Incense Sticks Shipment from Kenya to Belgium
email_chain.body: Dear Support, Could you please provide a quote for shipping 200 pallets of incense sticks from Kenya to Belgium at your earliest convenience? Thank you, Daniel

email_chain.subject: German Shipping Cost Inquiry for Hot Sauce
email_chain.body: Dear Sir/Madam, I am interested in shipping 50 tubs of hot sauce to a German customer. Could you please give me a cost estimate for shipping 10 tubs? I intend to pay upon delivery. Thanks, Lionel

email_chain.subject: Offer to Sell Paper and Request for Future Purchases
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, I am offering to sell a container of paper and am looking to establish a long-term relationship. If shipped directly to you, could you provide a competitive price? I also anticipate purchasing at least 3 pallets of paper from you in the near future. Please respond with your pricing information. Thank you, Sophie

email_chain.subject: Request for Mazut Supply Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Jamie,

Did you receive Esposito’s shipment request from yesterday? I need to confirm a shipment of 1,500MT of Mazut from Libya to Jebel Ali next week. Please let me know if it's possible to accommodate the extension of the laycan period as well.

Best wishes,
Jackson

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Mazut Supply Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Jackson,

Unfortunately, we are not able to accommodate your request for a 1,500MT shipment. However, we are confident that we can find another solution for your needs. Please provide us with your request number, desired shipment date, and your preferred laycan details by the end of business day on Friday, March 26.

Thanks in advance for your cooperation.
Nicole

email_chain.subject: Request to Hold Ethanol Cargo in Riyadh
email_chain.body: Good day Mr. Yamaguchi, Our client has recently transferred some ethanol to the storage tank in Riyadh. Unfortunately, they are unable to receive the shipper's Importer Record Book (IRB) until next week. Could you please assist by holding the cargo for 48 hours under Delivered At Frontier terms without charge while we await the permit? Best regards, Paddy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Hold Ethanol Cargo in Riyadh
email_chain.body: Dear Paddy, The client has now obtained the IRB from Saudi customs, and the transportation to the port is underway. However, the shipper is facing delays at the port due to a shortage of manpower, as reported by our Saudi agent. The cargo is expected to arrive in Riyadh in 48 hours. Could you ensure the cargo remains in the storage tank under Delivered At Frontier terms for an additional 48 hours? I must mention that extending this period without charge is not feasible. Thank you. Best regards, Jon

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Thanks
email_chain.body: I would like to confirm that your client's shipment of ethanol has been transferred to the tank in Riyadh. The unloading was successfully completed despite the manpower shortage. We are looking forward to future collaborations. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Laptop Delivery from Surat to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Pritchard,
May I speak with the manager regarding the freight for the delivery of laptops from Surat to Mumbai? Looking forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Needed for Laptop Consignment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sir,
Kindly confirm the consignment as discussed in my previous email about the laptop delivery from Surat to Mumbai. It is urgent.
Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Immediate Assistance Required
email_chain.body:
Hello Sir,
I urgently need your assistance with the matter discussed previously. It is quite urgent.
Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quotation: Hebei to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

We are looking for a vessel to pick up 1,500MT of steel from Hebei Port and transport it to Jeddah. Could you advise your earliest laycan dates and available rates?

Thanks for your time,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quotation: Hebei to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Thank you for your query. Currently, our vessels are booked, and we are unable to accommodate new cargo from Hebei to Jeddah at this period. We would be able to discuss future available openings or alternative solutions if you wish.

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry: Shipping Requirements for Saudi
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thanks for your email. Would it be possible to discuss alternatives? We are also considering transporting 1,000MT using 40'-HC containers to Saudi. Could you check availability and rates for this specification, as well as the earliest laycan dates?

Thank you,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Inquiry: Shipping Requirements for Saudi
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Thank you for the clarification. We can offer shipping of 1,000MT in 40'-HC containers to Saudi. Could you please confirm if this meets your requirements so we can proceed to book and prepare the necessary documentation?

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Request for Proforma Invoice
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

That sounds good. We would like to confirm our booking for the shipment of 1,000MT to Saudi in 40'-HC containers. Please forward us the proforma invoice to complete our booking.

Regards,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Further Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Attached is the proforma invoice for the shipment of 1,000MT to Saudi in 40'-HC containers. Once the invoice is settled, please notify us so we can send you the Bill of Lading and additional details regarding the vessel's estimated date of arrival in Dammam.

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Request for ETA of Vessel at Dammam
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

We have settled the invoice. Could you provide the estimated date of arrival of the vessel at Dammam, so we can make the necessary cargo arrangements?

Regards,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for ETA of Vessel at Dammam
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Thank you for settling the invoice. The vessel is scheduled to arrive at Dammam on March 20, 2023. We will send the Bill of Lading by next week.

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Request for Voyage Charter Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Kettles,

We would like to request you to quote and execute a voyage charter for the carriage of chemical cargo from Rotterdam to Boston. Could you kindly send us your Terms & Conditions for evaluation?

Kind regards,
Soto

email_chain.subject: Invitation for Service Feedback
email_chain.body:
Dear Soto,

Our team would like to invite you to discuss the service we have performed. We are also eager to hear any insights you have on our team's performance.

Best regards,
Team Kettles

email_chain.subject: Reminder: No Quotation Received for Rotterdam-Philadelphia Route
email_chain.body:
Hello Soto,

We would like to inform you that we have not received your quotation regarding the freight transportation of raw steel between Rotterdam and Philadelphia. Please let us know a suitable time to discuss our concerns regarding the quotation. Be informed that you will be rewarded based on the quality of the quotations provided.

Kind regards,
Kettles

email_chain.subject: Cargo Details for Won Bid
email_chain.body:
Hello Kettles,

As you may know, we have won the bid, and according to our contract, we have provided full details regarding the cargo we will be transporting. We await your prompt response and will be happy to discuss further.

Best regards,
Soto

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Pulp Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Kevin,

We have 8,500MT of pulp that needs to be shipped from Newcastle to Antwerp. Could you please provide me with a ballpark freight rate as soon as possible? Also, is a partial load feasible?

Best regards,
Ayush

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for FOB Price for September Loading
email_chain.body:
Hi Kevin,

I hope this message finds you well. Could you provide us with the FOB price for shipping 6,500MT from Bondi to Shanghai with September loading?

Thanks,
Christopher

email_chain.subject: Request for MDF Shipment FOB Price
email_chain.body:
Hi Kevin,

Could you provide us with the FOB price for shipping MDF with September loading to China?

Best regards,
Anson

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Kevin,

We require a freight quote for transporting 6,000MT of wood chips from New Zealand to China. Could you provide us with a sample quote as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Shipment from Al-Dwad to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Dear John Robert, Could you please arrange a shipment of 12,000MT of PET resin from Al-Dwad, Iran to Alexandria, Egypt? If this is not possible, please let me know if we can include our cargo in your next voyage. Best regards, Siam

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Plastic Resin Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Siam, Attached is our quotation for a plastics resin shipment from Antwerp to Alexandria. Please confirm if this is of interest to you. Best regards, Commercial Team

email_chain.subject: Offering Logistics & Clearing Services in Egypt
email_chain.body: Dear John Robert, I am ready to assist with the placement of cargoes for your route from Antwerp to Egypt. Our company specializes in export and import of products and provides comprehensive maritime services including shipping agency functions, customs brokerage, and import/export administration in Egypt. Best regards, Siam Noveis Director, International Trading and Logistics Division Oman Logistic Group

email_chain.subject: Re: Offering Logistics & Clearing Services in Egypt
email_chain.body: Hello Siam, Thank you for your detailed introduction to your services. I have a client interested in learning more about your capabilities and rates for carrier services between Antwerp and Egypt. Could you please forward this information along with your best rates? Thank you, John

email_chain.subject: Shipping Coffee Beans from Durban to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Teo,
I am looking to ship 4,000MT of coffee beans from Durban to Singapore. Can you please provide your earliest laycan for mid-May? Also, do you offer any flexibility on demurrage terms?
Regards,
Han

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Coffee Beans from Durban to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Han,
Your request for shipping from Durban to Singapore has been received. We are currently reviewing available bookings and will get back to you with details shortly.
Regards,
GS1

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Coffee Beans from Durban to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear GS1,
Thank you for the prompt response. I am looking forward to the booking details. Additionally, please confirm if you can accommodate the shipment order and let me know any preferred carrier options you might suggest.
Regards,
Han

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation - Coffee Beans Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Han,
We have confirmed a tentative booking for the shipment of 4,000MT of coffee beans from Durban to Singapore. More details will follow upon final confirmation. Thank you for choosing our service.
Regards,
GS

email_chain.subject: Final Booking Details - Coffee Beans Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Han,
Please find attached a copy of our booking confirmation regarding the shipment of 4,000MT of coffee beans from Durban to Singapore. Our earliest laycan for this shipment is 25 June 2018. We are pleased to handle your shipment and look forward to further instructions.
Regards,
GS

email_chain.subject: Request for Laycan Slots and Freight Charges
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

We’re planning to ship 6,000MT of raw material from Rotterdam to Algeciras. Could you please advise of any available laycan slots, as well as any additional freight charges?

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Loading Capacity at Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

We’ve been receiving bids from the following vessels: Exxpresser, Futura, Goya, Super Valiant, Tyra, and Valspar. Could you please confirm that your vessel is able to load 6,000MT at Rotterdam?

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Vessel Arrival and Operational Queries
email_chain.body:
Good Afternoon Ryan,

Our vessel, the Exxpresser, will be arriving in Rotterdam at 13:30 on July 1st. We are looking at offloading at a spot in Algeciras. Please advise on communication methods with our ship once ready to load the cargo, pilot payment, weekly rate for piloting, and confirm the presence of safety systems on board.

Regards,
Captain Schuppe

email_chain.subject: Pilot Availability and Safety Procedures
email_chain.body:
Hello Captain Schuppe,

Your offer to pilot our vessel, as well as the safety systems, checklist, and your safety instructions were all well received and have been passed on to our client. However, it appears our regular pilot cannot make it to the port on July 1st. Could you be available to pilot our vessel then?

With respect,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Pilot Issue and Planning Update
email_chain.body:
Hello Captain Schuppe,

On June 30th, our port pilot was unable to go to Rotterdam. We are currently assessing how this will affect our plans. More details will be provided once we have further information from the cargo owners and our client. Please keep us updated on any developments on your end without delay.

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Vegetable Oil to Korea
email_chain.body: Good afternoon. I would like to inquire if you can handle a shipment of 450MT of vegetable oil from Dublin to Hankook, Korea for next Thursday. Do you have the capacity for this shipment? I am hoping to finalize the agreement by this Friday to schedule the dispatch on the following Monday. Could you please provide an indicative C&F price? Looking forward to your advice. Thank you. Regards, Maria

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Shipping Vegetable Oil to Korea
email_chain.body: Dear Maria, Thank you for reaching out. We can indeed accommodate your shipment on the specified dates. As a member of ShippyPro, we can access competitive quotes for international sea freight. We will get back to you within 24 hours with a preliminary cost estimate. Best regards, Sam

email_chain.subject: Feedback on ShippyPro Software
email_chain.body: Dear Sam, I just wanted to share some feedback on the ShippyPro software. I have used it for over 2,000 deals. It is incredibly effective and definitely the best tool I've used for finding carriers. Thanks, Eddie

email_chain.subject: Potential Collaboration Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi, I'm writing on behalf of ShippyPro. As we continuously seek to expand our services and capabilities, we're interested in exploring a potential collaboration with International Transport Management Services (ITMS). With your established experience and wide network in Asia, there could be considerable synergies. We would appreciate learning more about your services and discussing possible collaborations. Best, Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Potential Collaboration Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Sam, Thank you for reaching out. We are pleased to hear about your interest in collaboration. ITMS has over 20 years of experience in the logistics industry with extensive reliance on shipping products to major Asian destinations. We would be thrilled to discuss how we can work together. We look forward to setting up a meeting soon. Regards, International Transport Management Services Team

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request: Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. White,

We have 4,500MT of cargo needing transport as FCL from Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam. Could you accommodate our shipping window between 9:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. on April 28th? Please send me your best rate.

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request: Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

I can accommodate the shipment for the window specified. The current rate is $225/MT. Additionally, there is a 1.5% NVOCC charge, which would amount to $950.85 for 4.5 tonnes. After deducting $5 USD for loading and unloading expenses, the total comes to $9,450.85. We can move your cargo on April 28th, ensuring same-day shipment.

Kind regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Response Needed Regarding Election Support
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,
We are still waiting for your response regarding the U.S. Presidential elections. Please advise by Monday.
Thanks,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Response Needed Regarding Election Support
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,
Thank you for your email. It is nice to have a two-way communication about this matter. As requested, I am sending you the details and contact information for the Party Unity Coalition, which I will be sure to follow up with and keep you in the loop.
Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Details of Financial Arrangements with Party Unity Coalition
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,
Thank you for your ongoing support. An exciting update - our party won the most number of seats in the recent U.S. elections and has been asked to form the government. This is all thanks to our collective efforts!
In line with our plans and your inquiry, we intend to use the initial $100,000 from the Party Unity Coalition to fund the initial payrolls for the newly formed government. Furthermore, the Coalition has agreed to contribute $50,000 monthly for an additional 4 months to support our transition. My boss has also committed to raising and contributing $500,000, which will all be made tax-deductible.
Thanks again for your support,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Details of Financial Arrangements with Party Unity Coalition
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,
Thanks for getting back to me. I have forwarded your updated financial plans to my manager, Inga, for further review. We are pleased to confirm that our company will contribute $500,000 to support your campaign as previously discussed. This contribution will also be made tax-deductible.
Best regards,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Party Unity Coalition's Contributions
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,
To confirm our earlier discussions, your team has indeed raised $220,000 from the Party Unity Coalition. I will be sending an invoice to the Coalition to confirm this arrangement. Looking forward to further collaboration.
Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Party Unity Coalition's Contributions
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,
Thanks for confirming. Please find attached the invoice for $220,000, which includes the detailed contributions for the next several months as discussed.
Best,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Scrap Metal Shipment Flexibility
email_chain.body:
Dear Wojtek,

We have 20,000MT of scrap metal for transport from Gdansk to Hamburg. Can you confirm if your vessel's schedule allows flexibility for a later unloading date?

Sincerely,
Stefan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Scrap Metal Shipment Flexibility
email_chain.body:
Hi Stefan,

Our vessel can arrive for the last time on the 3rd of June, hence we can commence unloading at your convenience from that date. Could you also provide some details regarding the quality of this material, including the weight per crate of steel scraps?

Best regards,
Wojtek

email_chain.subject: Inclusion of Aluminum in Steel Scrap Consignment
email_chain.body:
Hello Wojtek,

Regarding the steel scraps, we have the possibility to include a certain quantity of aluminum in this consignment. Would that be acceptable?

Apologies for my late response; I was occupied with some paperwork.

Best regards,
Urszula

email_chain.subject: Re: Inclusion of Aluminum in Steel Scrap Consignment
email_chain.body:
Dear Urszula,

Thank you for the update. Including aluminum in the consignment will not be a problem. Please proceed as per your plans and inform us of any further requirements.

Best regards,
Wojtek

email_chain.subject: 20' FCL Container Inquiry for China-Gdansk Route
email_chain.body:
Hi Stefan,

We have an enquiry for a 20' FCL container. Do you have any suggestions or can you provide an offer for the China-Gdansk route?

Best regards,
Urszula

email_chain.subject: Request for a Meeting
email_chain.body: Hello! I have a few questions and would like to discuss them with you. Could we schedule a time this week for a chat? Do you have any open slots in your calendar? Thank you, Keith

email_chain.subject: Availability for a Call
email_chain.body: Hello! Are you available for a call this week? I have several important questions to discuss. If so, could you please contact me at your earliest convenience at my office number? (555)-555-1234 Thanks, Keith

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Request for Call
email_chain.body: Hello! Just a reminder, I'm hoping we can find some time this week for a call as I have urgent questions. My office number is (555)-555-1234. I will be available and waiting by the phone. Thank you for your attention. Keith

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hello Bill,

We have 12,150MT of NGLs ready for transport to Houston. Could you please provide your latest freight quote for this cargo?

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Required for Next Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Bill,

Thank you for your prompt response with the freight quote. Unfortunately, our inventory capacity is currently full. Could you please issue a new freight quote for our next shipment instead?

Best,
Carla

email_chain.subject: NGL Business and Routing Guide Request
email_chain.body:
Hey Bill,

Regrettably, we'll be exiting the NGL market. Could you send us the new routing guides reflecting this change? We appreciate your assistance during our transition.

Thanks,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Receipt of Dry Fruits Shipment and Documentation
email_chain.body: Dear Mrs. Mawby, I am writing to inform you that I have received the shipment of dry fruits from Alexandria to Gioia Tauro. Could you please accept the documents and make sure the transaction is properly documented? Thank you, Abdul

email_chain.subject: Re: Receipt of Dry Fruits Shipment and Documentation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Dafesh, Thank you for your email. I have attached the invoice for approval, which accounts for 200 kilos of raisins shipped from Alexandria to Gioia Tauro, totaling $1280. Please confirm these details and approve. Thank you, Mrs. Mawby

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment and Update on Supplier
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Mawby, Thank you for accepting the documents. I apologize for the delay in my responses; my contract with the previous supplier of dry fruits expired, and I had some delays in re-establishing it. However, I have re-engaged with the same supplier and already ordered another 200 kilos of raisins. Please confirm when you receive the invoice and the shipment. Thank you, Abdul

email_chain.subject: Shipment Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Mrs. Mawby, I have received the shipment of 200 kilos of raisins. The shipment has been delivered and processed. Please let me know if you have any questions or issues regarding this shipment. Thank you, Abdul

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Monthly Inventory Report
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Mawby, I appreciate your earlier response. I have received the latest shipment and added this to my monthly inventory report. I have also completed payment to the supplier and everything is fully accounted for. Thank you, Abdul

email_chain.subject: Biodiesel Shipment Enquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Xander, I am interested in shipping 7,200MT of biodiesel from Singapore to Yangon. Do you handle bunkers on owners’ account, and can you accommodate a 3-day laycan extension? Thank you, Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment Enquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Elise, Thanks for reaching out. Yes, we handle bunkers on owners' account. Regarding the 3-day laycan extension, I will discuss with our operations team and confirm shortly. Regards, Xander

email_chain.subject: Update on Terms and Conditions
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Xander, As promised, here’s the full terms and conditions from the producers. We will need to discuss with the freight forwarder if this is fine with them or if we need to update the contract for them to sign. I’ll see you soon. Regards, Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Terms and Conditions
email_chain.body: Hi Elise, Thanks for sending over the terms and conditions from the producers. They are acceptable, and we can proceed with the current contract. However, we’ll need to wait until next week to discuss with the freight forwarder. I’ll let you know what they say. We’ll talk soon. Regards, Xander

email_chain.subject: Request for Change in Delivery and Payment Terms
email_chain.body: Hi Xander, I have some updates from the freight forwarder. We would like to discuss with the producer about changing the delivery date to June 28th and altering the payment terms to 30 days. Additionally, we would like the terms and conditions updated with their freight forwarder to match ours since they handle the entire cargo from production until shipment. I would be happy to send over a draft for your approval. Please let me know if you have any questions. Regards, Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Change in Delivery and Payment Terms
email_chain.body: Hi Elise, We have agreed to move the delivery date to the 28th of June and to increase the payment terms to 30 days. We will draft a new contract with the freight forwarder and send it to you for your review. I'll see you soon. Regards, Xander

email_chain.subject: Updated Contract for Review
email_chain.body: Hi Elise, The updated contract with the freight forwarder is ready. Could you please review the attached document and let me know if we can proceed with it? Regards, Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Updated Contract for Review
email_chain.body: Hi Xander, I reviewed the contract and it looks good to me. We can proceed with this version. Thanks for accommodating the changes. I’ll see you soon. Regards, Elise

email_chain.subject: Signature Request for Contract
email_chain.body: Hi Elise, Thank you for your agreement on the contract. We will now send this to the producer and freight forwarder to sign. Please let me know if you have any further queries. Regards, Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Signature Request for Contract
email_chain.body: Hi Xander, Thanks for sending over the signed contracts. I have forwarded them to the producer as well. Looking forward to a successful shipment. Regards, Elise

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Elise, The producer has received the signed contracts and confirmed that everything is set for shipment. They will contact you directly to finalize the details. Please let me know if there is anything else you require. Regards, Xander

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Biodiesel Shipment from Gothenburg to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Good morning, Can you offer us a shipment of 4,500MT of biodiesel from Gothenburg to Rotterdam? Kind regards, Dhananjay

email_chain.subject: Request for 87 RON blended with B5 in Gothenburg
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, We are looking for 1000 tons (550CBM) of 87 RON blended with B5 at your Gothenburg port. Do you think we can reach an agreement on this? Best regards, Dhananjay

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for 87 RON blended with B5 in Gothenburg
email_chain.body: Dear Dhananjay, Thank you very much for your inquiry on 27 July. As you know, we are a B2B company and are actively seeking genuine buyers. I'm writing in hopes of establishing a good business relationship. Kind regards, Rakesh Disclaimer: Information on our trade platform is provided by our members. We make no guarantee of its accuracy. It is the buyer and seller's sole responsibility to conduct due diligence on suppliers, and to conduct trades in a safe and ethical manner. Furthermore, we make no guarantee that the buyer or seller will be able to resolve any problems that may arise with respect to the transaction.

email_chain.subject: Issue with Car Transport to Copenhagen
email_chain.body: I have just received a confirmation regarding the car transporter for Copenhagen. Unfortunately, we are unable to transport the car from Rotterdam. The lead time is too short, and the shipper needs it transported by next week. Could you suggest an alternative carrier?

email_chain.subject: Re: Issue with Car Transport to Copenhagen
email_chain.body: I was surprised to learn about the transport issue. Please let me know if there are any possible alternatives for transporting the vehicle from Rotterdam to Copenhagen next week.

email_chain.subject: Update: Car Transportation Status
email_chain.body: Bill, I have contacted our local contacts in Rotterdam to check for any immediate possibilities to send the car to Copenhagen. Unfortunately, the regular van has already left. I will inform you as soon as I get an update.

email_chain.subject: Export and Storage Options Available
email_chain.body: We are currently holding the car at our facility in Rotterdam. I can offer some storage options or proceed with exporting the car to Denmark, which would take approximately one week. Would any of these options interest you?

email_chain.subject: Final Update: Car Shipment
email_chain.body: I am pleased to inform you that we have secured a transportation option, and the car is now en route to Denmark. It is expected to arrive at the port of Copenhagen at about 11:00 AM next Tuesday.

email_chain.subject: Car Arrival Confirmation
email_chain.body: Your car arrived this morning at the port in Copenhagen as scheduled. A driver has taken the car to your specified address and is awaiting your arrival. I've also sent you a text message to confirm its delivery.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Polymer Shipment Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Ziad,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am working under a tight deadline, but I am able to manage a 2-3 day turnaround for the shipment of polymer. We have a load capacity of five MT and can facilitate loading via crane. Could you please confirm when your facilities will be available for bulk product discharge? Also, I can recommend a supplier in Aqaba if needed.

I look forward to your prompt reply.

Regards,
Marvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Polymer Shipment Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Ziad,

Thank you for the details on the polymer shipment. I am coordinating with my team to reduce the purchase cost by $5/MT. Could you provide a detailed cost analysis of the delivered cost? This information is crucial for my internal negotiations.

I've attached an image of the facility layout for your review. Please let me know if you need any further information. I will stay in touch.

Regards,
Harvey

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Quote on Acid Anhydride Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kamhi,

We are currently working on a 6,000MT cargo of acid anhydride from New Orleans to Saudi Arabia. Could you provide a standard rate if we finalize on Tuesday? Thank you.

Best regards,
Bobby

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Quote on Acid Anhydride Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Bobby,

The cost is $25 per MT, FOB New Orleans. The freight for a 40' FP container would approximately be $1400. Ocean freight can be spread over 16 weeks; hence, expect the cargo approximately 16 weeks from now unless an early payment for the freight is made. 

Typically, buyers can opt for a spot rate, which is generally 28% higher than our quoted price. Although the seller hopes for the spot rate, it cannot be guaranteed.

Please call me on Tuesday to confirm and get the standard price. Let me know if you require further details.

Best regards,
Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Quote on Acid Anhydride Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Ron,

Thanks for your email. I will forward this information to the client and look forward to our discussion on Tuesday.

Best regards,
Bobby

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Handling of Tapioca Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Prof. Philpot,

I have a shipment of 5,000MT of tapioca oil from Salalah to Yokohama scheduled for delivery in mid-January. Could you please handle the pickup from Salalah? Thanks for your assistance.

Regards,
Xavier

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Palm Oil Shipment Pickup
email_chain.body:
Dear Xavier,

Would you mind handling the pickup of a shipment consisting of 1,000MT of palm oil from Tanjung Pelepas, Malaysia, set for delivery in mid-December? I appreciate your help.

Best regards,
Nina

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vegetable Oil Purchase Order
email_chain.body:
Hi Nina,

Thank you for sending me the purchase order for the 2,000MT of refined vegetable oil. The shipment will be ready for pickup from our facility in mid-November. Please make arrangements to collect it when it is ready.

Regards,
Eduardo

email_chain.subject: Order Placement for Virgin Coconut Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Professor Philpot,

I wish to place an order for 5,000MT of virgin coconut oil from the Philippines, expecting the shipment to arrive in mid-June. Would you be able to handle the pickup?

Thanks,
Dennis

email_chain.subject: Finalization of Kiwi Fruit Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

Just wanted to confirm that the landing of 8000 tonnes of kiwi fruit has been finalized. I'll arrange for cargo release at the port in 30 days' time.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Cargo Release Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

Just to re-confirm, you should be able to get your cargo release in 30 days' time. I will send you a confirmation of cargo release today.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Successful Cargo Release
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

Just to confirm, your cargo release at the port was successful, and you have now received the 8000 tonnes of kiwi fruit.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Notifications for Kiwi Fruit Consignment
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

In the upcoming days and months, you will receive further notifications regarding the inspection, export processing, and shipping of your kiwi fruit consignment. These communications are crucial for the timely shipment of your goods.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Inventory Count Error
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

Due to some unknown circumstances, there was an error in the kiwi fruit inventory count at your port. We have received correspondence from the importer who is in the process of getting your cargo released. We are investigating the root cause of the error which has disrupted the inventory count.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Transport Arrangements for Kiwi Fruit
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

I've liaised with our Transport department. As you know, the critical part of your kiwi fruit consignment is set to move next week. Our Transport department has already begun arranging suitable air service for the shipment.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request for 500 Metric Tons of Sugar
email_chain.body: Hi Jane, I am your regular client from Belarus. I am reaching out to confirm if your factory can handle a shipment of 500 metric tons of sugar. We need to send it as soon as possible. Please confirm. Yours truly, Perry Jones

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transporting 1500 Metric Tons of Sugar
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, As your company is a leader in transporting sugar internationally, we are considering your services for shipping 1500 metric tons of sugar to our factory. Please let us know your terms. Yours truly, Janice Brown

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote for 150 Metric Tons of Coffee Beans
email_chain.body: Dear Jane, My name is Michelle Austin from California. I am seeking a transportation provider to ship 150 metric tons of coffee beans from Brazil to LA. Having previously reached out via your website, I found the experience straightforward. Could you please provide a quote for this shipment? Yours truly, Michelle Austin

email_chain.subject: Request for Bill of Lading & Steerage Fare
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Adarsh,

Could you please provide the steerage bill of lading from Chicago to the port of London? Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Roger

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Bill of Lading & Steerage Fare
email_chain.body:
Hello Roger,

Attached is the bill of lading. Please review, sign, and initial. The charge for the steerage fare is $1000, for which I will reimburse you. As an aside, I hope you won't be bringing those pies and pastries from San Francisco for Christmas; the ones I received recently were very disappointing.

Warm regards,
Your son

email_chain.subject: Re: Bill of Lading Signed
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Adarsh,

Thanks for the bill of lading. I’ve noted the charge and appreciate your offer to reimburse the $1000. Don't worry about the pies; I’m actually working on a new recipe myself. 

Best,
Roger

email_chain.subject: Re: Review Required Before Christmas
email_chain.body:
Hello Roger,

Just a reminder that you should mail anything needed before Christmas Eve. We need to ensure all paperwork, including the bill of lading, is processed to avoid any penalties. Regarding your pie, I look forward to trying your new recipe.

Regards,
Your son

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Gomes,

I’m considering shipping 6000MT of dry goods from Nantong to Luanda in the next three weeks. What would be the FOB price?

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

For shipping 6000 MT FOB to Angola within three weeks, the price will be $385 per MT. I am comfortable with this arrangement.

Best regards,
Mr. Gomes

email_chain.subject: Container Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Gomes,

The three containers (FCL) are prepared and ready. I need them loaded by June 24 for departure on the 26th. The destination is Luanda, Angola.

Looking forward to working with you.

Yours,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Container Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

I have received the FCLs for your shipment. They have been arranged into four 40’ HC containers. They will be ready for loading on the 24th and will be delivered to the port for your vessel, Lina, on the 27th of June.

Regards,
Mr. Gomes

email_chain.subject: Loading Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

Hope you are doing well. I’m 100% ready for loading and just waiting for you to arrive at the port. We can load the containers tomorrow morning.

Best,
Mr. Gomes

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Bulk Soil and Sand Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Dima,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inquire about rates and available volumes for a shipment of bulk soil and sand. Could we possibly discuss the per tonne rate and finalize the volume confirmation by Monday? I would appreciate your prompt response.

Thank you,
Evan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bulk Soil and Sand Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Evan,

Thank you for reaching out. We can definitely discuss the volumes on Monday. I will also send you some photos of our recent shipments to give you a better idea of what we’ve been dispatching. Usually, our shipments are enough to fill a standard dump truck.

Thanks,
Chuck

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Bulk Soil and Sand Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hey Chuck,

That sounds great. Could you please send me those photos of the recent loads? I would like to include them in our request for a comprehensive review on Monday.

Thanks,
Evan

labels.cargo_size: enough to fill a standard dump truck

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vessel Availability for Paper Shipment from Shanghai to Mexico
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. McDermott,

Do you have an available vessel to transport 12,000MT of paper from Shanghai to Mexico? Could you please confirm your day rates and the available stuffing ports?

Regards,
Oliver

email_chain.subject: Query on Vessel Schedule and Freight Costs
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. McDermott,

I heard you might have an available vessel. Could you provide details on your current vessel schedule and day rates? Additionally, could you advise whether it costs less to load at Nanjing or Yangzhou port?

Regards,
Walter

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Need Vessel for Newsprint Shipment from Tokyo to Canada
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. McDermott,

Are you still available? I need to transport 20,000MT of newsprint from Tokyo to Canada as soon as possible. Can you assist with this?

Regards,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Arrival Notification and Steel Coil Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Adam,

Please let me know when you arrive at the office so we can discuss the shipment of 2,300 MT of steel coil from Shanghai to Qingdao under CIF terms. I appreciate your prompt response on your estimated time of arrival, ideally by 6 am tomorrow.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Shipping Instructions and Preparation for Loading at Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hello Adam,
