I am enclosing the shipping instructions for the shipment you've been coordinating. The truck will be waiting at Qingdao port for loading tomorrow. Our representative has been arranged to be there as well. We will update you with the complete loading report once the truck is prepared to depart.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Container Loading Completed at Qingdao Port
email_chain.body:
Hello Adam,

I'm pleased to inform you that the truck has reached Qingdao port and is ready to load the 2,300 MT of steel coils. We will notify you as soon as the loading is complete and the container is set to leave the port.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Polypropylene Powder Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Christopher,

Could you expedite the shipping of 1,000MT of polypropylene powder from Antwerp to Abu Dhabi within the next 72 hours? Additionally, could you also provide the export rates from Antwerp?

Warm regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Polypropylene Powder Specifications
email_chain.body:
Hi,

We noticed that the initial response was vague and we need more specific information before placing an order. Here are the detailed specifications required for the polypropylene powder:
1. Product: Polypropylene Powder
2. Test Method: ICP-OES
3. Temperature Range: 50C - 100C
4. Vacuum: A vacuum of < 10^–4 Torr is required during analysis.
5. Heating: Specific time and temperature needed for the calcination process.

Please confirm if these specifications are manageable and communicate with your team accordingly.

Kind regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Request for Polypropylene Powder Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your response.

Unfortunately, we do not have suppliers available at present to meet these specific requirements. Our current distribution centers will be able to supply it by the required date if we can resolve the specifications you indicated.

Best regards,
Christopher

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for CIF Shipment to Busan
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Lee,

Could you arrange a shipment of 2,500MT of our new date order to Busan under CIF terms? We need it by the 15th of this month. Additionally, could you provide a direct discount if we make an advance payment? We appreciate any assistance you can provide.

All the best,
Violet

email_chain.subject: Order Confirmation Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

Could you please locate our order submitted by Mr. Thompson? Our contact phone number is +82-10-2861-3560, and our email is office@korea.pearson.com.

Thank you.
All the best,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Additional Quantity Request for Order No. 123456
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Lee,

We would like to add an additional 5,000kg of new date to our existing order No. 123456. This will require shipping in two containers. Could you please send a copy of the Full Container Load (FCL) documentation to our account department?

We appreciate any help you can provide.
Regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote in December
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Lee,

Could you please arrange a quote for our shipment that needs to be delivered in the first week of December?

Best regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: New PO for Client's Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

I have attached a new Purchase Order for our client's requirements. Could you please arrange a quote based on this new order?

Regards,
Tania

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Dave, 
Are you working with a shipping liner that you could recommend? We're seeking a US-based company to transport corn from Freeport to Montreal. 
Kind regards, 
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael, 
Unfortunately, I have no liner companies to recommend in this market. Could you confirm if 120,000 bushels of #1 corn are available for shipment in September? 
Kind regards, 
Dave

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Dave, 
Have you come across any alternative shipping options for the 120,000 bushels? 
Regards, 
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael, 
No, I have not found any alternatives, and there are no relevant listings on the boards currently. 
Regards, 
Dave

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Dave, 
I'm checking again, do you have any updates about the availability of 120,000 bushels for shipment? 
Regards, 
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael, 
The 120,000 bushels are no longer available. 
Regards, 
Dave

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Company for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Dave, 
Is the cargo still listed on any boards for potential shippers? 
Regards, 
Michael

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Transport Request: Changchun to Qingdao
email_chain.body: I have a cargo of scrap that needs to be moved from Changchun to Qingdao as soon as possible. Please respond promptly with your quote. Thank you, Becky.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Cargo Transport Request: Changchun to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Thank you for your request. We are currently processing your requirement and will send the bills of lading once they are ready today. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Invoice Submission Confirmation
email_chain.body: Please find attached the invoices related to the transport order from Changchun to Qingdao. Ensure you receive them via email or check your FTP account for download. Attachments: Invoice 1, Invoice 2, Invoice 3, Invoice 4, Invoice 5

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice Submission Confirmation
email_chain.body: Thank you for sending over the invoices. We have noted the receipt of the first three invoices. Unfortunately, there was a mix-up at our end involving the fax but it has been resolved and all documents are now in order. Please confirm the correction of the address on the recent invoices. Sincerely.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Invoice Details Update
email_chain.body: We confirm the correction of the address details on the recent invoices and appreciate your quick handling of the situation. Thank you for your cooperation.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for COG Shipment from Veracruz to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Yuliya,

We need a 1,300MT shipment of COG as soon as possible from Veracruz to Santos. Are you able to meet a laycan next week? Could you also let us know the standard dispatch rate as well?

Thanks,
Yana

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Requirement for COG Shipment from Veracruz to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Yana,

The vessel initially allocated for the 1,300MT COG shipment was diverted due to Hurricane Paula. We have another vessel approaching the port, but it may take 2-3 weeks before discharge is completed. The preliminary laycan could be around December 8-11. I will confirm the exact dates after coordinating with our counterparts in Santos.

Please inform me of any additional requirements.

Thanks,
Yuliya

email_chain.subject: RE: RE: Urgent Requirement for COG Shipment from Veracruz to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Yuliya,

Thank you for your response. We have been in direct communication with the shipping company to expedite the coordination with the port for the discharge. Currently, the shipment delay means it's scheduled to arrive in Santos between December 13-17. As the situation may change, please keep me updated with any developments.

Thank you,
Yana

email_chain.subject: Update on Laycan and Discharge Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Yana,

Please find the details regarding the revised laycan for the COG shipment from Veracruz to Santos. We expect the vessel, Maersk Salt Lake City, to handle the discharge. I've attached the discharge information for your reference.

Regards,
Yuliya

email_chain.subject: Tracking Details for Vessel Maersk Salt Lake City
email_chain.body:
Dear Yuliya,

Thank you for the updated information on the COG shipment. Could you please share the tracking number for the vessel Maersk Salt Lake City so we can monitor its progress?

Thanks,
Yana

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Full Vessel Requirements for Urea Shipment
email_chain.body: Good morning Patrick, We are planning to transport 12,500MT of urea from Dubai to Jakarta next month. Could you provide guidance on whether we need a full vessel for this shipment? Best regards, Penny

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Full Vessel Requirements for Urea Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Penny, For a shipment of 12,500MT, several factors will determine if a full vessel is necessary: 1) The maximum weight capacity of the vessel, 2) Density and type of the urea being transported, 3) The configuration and available space in the vessel. Each vessel type has specific loading guidelines and capacity limits. Best regards, Patrick

email_chain.subject: Cost Inquiry for Pallet Shipment from China to North America
email_chain.body: Good morning Patrick, I'm looking into shipping pallets from China to North America and would appreciate a cost estimate before proceeding with the order. Thank you, Mika

email_chain.subject: Re: Cost Inquiry for Pallet Shipment from China to North America
email_chain.body: Thanks Mika for reaching out. The cost of shipping pallets from China to North America varies by route and specific destination. A common route involves maritime travel through the Panama Canal to a North American port like Los Angeles. A rough estimate for a 4m2 pallet would be approximately US$200 per shipment, which equals about US$80 per cubic metre. Feel free to contact me for more detailed information. Regards, Patrick

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Costs
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Could you please provide me with the cost estimate for transporting 60 crates of baby shoes from Shenzhen to Shanghai? There is no urgency for this shipment.

Thank you,
Adriana

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Costs
email_chain.body:
Hi Adriana,

The cost for shipping the 60 crates from Shenzhen to Shanghai will be $900. Could you please visit my office to complete the payment arrangement? We can also discuss further details in person.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Diego, can you please provide a quote for a vessel to transport a cargo of 24,000MT of polyethylene from Mobile to Baltimore? We need a vessel with a laycan period starting after July 5th. Thanks, Miranda.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Quote
email_chain.body: Hello Miranda, about your query, vessels with a laycan period after July 5th are indeed available to load in Mobile. I will need to confirm the availability further and check our Memorandum of Understanding. Could you also confirm the original Bill of Lading number and the FOB city? Regards, Andres

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Quote
email_chain.body: Andres, Thank you for the update. Yes, the shipment's B/L number is B/L NO. 1, and the FOB city is Mobile, issued on 7th May. Please advise on the next steps. Regards, Miranda.

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request - Antwerp to Beirut
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Patel,

We are planning to load 2,500MT of monomer in Antwerp for delivery to Beirut. Could you please provide us with a quote based on your best rate? We would appreciate it if we could have three days to make a decision.

Best regards,
Piers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - Antwerp to Beirut
email_chain.body:
Hello Piers,

Thank you for your inquiry received on June 20. Below is our best freight quote for shipping 2,500MT of monomer from Antwerp to Beirut. We currently have space available on our vessels, but will require a letter of credit for cargo release. Could you please provide the details of the letter of credit and confirm the desired delivery terms?

Best regards,
Melanie Patel

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - Antwerp to Beirut
email_chain.body:
Hello Melanie,

Thank you for your quote dated June 21. Based on your proposed rate and the delivery terms of 10 days, I am prepared to issue a letter of credit for the cargo. Please contact me at your convenience by phone or email to finalize the details.

Best regards,
Piers

email_chain.subject: Issue with Receiving Your Letter
email_chain.body: Hi Margaret, we're having problems accepting your letter. Can you re-send it? Thanks, Alfreda

email_chain.subject: Lost Correspondence
email_chain.body: Dear Margaret, it seems Alfreda's letter must have been lost. If you would like to get in touch again, please email the new address. Yours sincerely, Marie

email_chain.subject: Incorrect Address
email_chain.body: Dear Margaret, thanks for your letter, but you have the wrong address. Please email us on this address if you want to get in touch again. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Privacy Policy
email_chain.body: Hi Margaret, I've sent you an email about our privacy policy. Can you get back to me as soon as possible? Thanks, Ben

email_chain.subject: Issue with Your Query
email_chain.body: Dear Margaret, we've received your email but unfortunately, we haven't been able to fix the problem yet. I'm really sorry. Please accept my apologies. Ben

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Straw Transport from Netherlands to Panama
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

We are seeking a freight quote to transport 6,500MT of straw from the Netherlands to Panama. Could you please provide us with a single bill of lading rate based on your terms? Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Luis

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Quote: Rubberwood Planks from Thailand to Panama
email_chain.body:
Dear Team,

We would like to request a quote for shipping 12,000MT of Rubberwood planks (26mm x 190mm x 3800mm) from Thailand to Panama. Please let us know your Bill of Lading terms and conditions. A proforma invoice will be provided for your records.

Yours sincerely,
Edward

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request: Steel Wool Scrap from Belgium to Argentina
email_chain.body:
Hello,

We need a single invoice quote for transporting 10,000 tons of steel wool scrap (16mm diameter) from Belgium to Argentina. The goods will be stored at the supplier’s premises and transported on our pallets. Please provide your terms and conditions for the shipping contract and include your warehouse address and phone number. A proforma invoice will be sent for your records.

Thank you,
Pablo

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Sea Transportation of Wood Pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Team,

On behalf of ABC Company, I am requesting a quote for a freight forwarder to transport 60,000 tons of wood pellets from South Africa to the United States. We require sea transportation and would appreciate it if you could provide your Bill of Lading terms and conditions. A proforma invoice will be provided for your records.

Kind regards,
Nathalie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Scheduling and Detention Charges
email_chain.body: Hey Mr. Lucero, Can we schedule 8,000MT of steel scrap for shipment from Xiamen to Ningbo in early April? I would also like to know if you usually apply any detention charges for early deliveries. Regards, Jose.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Scheduling and Detention Charges
email_chain.body: Hi Jose, Thanks for your inquiry. Generally, we do not add any detention charges for early deliveries to Ningbo, especially since availability of vessels is tight. I hope this information assists with your planning. Yours sincerely, Cheryl

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Booking Requirement for Liquefied Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Kit,

We need to ship 6,000MT of liquefied gas from Fujairah to Dar es Salaam. Can you provide us with the earliest booking window, and the quickest possible turnaround?

Thanks,
Tammy

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Booking Requirement for Liquefied Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Tammy,

Apologies for the delayed response. The earliest booking window currently available is in 3 months. Could you please confirm if this timeframe works for you?

Thanks,
Kit

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Booking Requirement for Liquefied Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Kit,

We need the gas as soon as possible, so let's proceed with the booking for 3 months from now, and we can re-evaluate closer to the date.

Thanks,
Tammy

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Booking Requirement for Liquefied Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Tammy,

Understood. I can secure a booking for you starting in 3 months. Would you like to finalize it for the earliest possible delivery date within that window?

Thanks,
Kit

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Booking Requirement for Liquefied Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Kit,

Thank you for the update. Please schedule the delivery at a time that best fits the shipping schedule, no rush.

Thanks,
Tammy

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Booking Requirement for Liquefied Gas Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Tammy,

Thank you for your flexibility. I will update our schedule accordingly and confirm the details with you within 1 day.

Thanks,
Kit

email_chain.subject: Change of Plans: Cancel and Rebook
email_chain.body:
Hi Kit,

Sorry for the late notice, but we would like to cancel our current booking and schedule a new one for after 4 months. Please update the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Tammy

email_chain.subject: RE: Change of Plans: Cancel and Rebook
email_chain.body:
Hi Tammy,

Okay, I will update the booking details as requested and confirm the new schedule shortly.

Thanks,
Kit

email_chain.subject: Annual Bulk Shipping Forecast for 2022
email_chain.body:
Dear Client,

Please find attached our annual bulk shipping forecast for 2022, along with details on various types of cargoes. We would appreciate any last-minute feedback you might have.

Thank you,
Your friends at Guntertex

email_chain.subject: Re: Annual Bulk Shipping Forecast for 2022
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Regarding your recent email containing the shipping forecast, here are the details I have noted:
- Availability as of 2022 starts Q1 for Nordic, Germany, Sweden, UK, Irish Sea and English transportation.
- For specific port availability, I found:
  -- 11 MGN at Eastern Port
  -- 2 MGN at FRS/SVLW Port
  -- Availability at EEM Port is not clear (0 MGN)
  -- 20 MGN at Cornish Port
  -- 5 MGN at English Port
  -- 2 MGN at Estuary
  -- 5 MGN at IRLIHR/London

Please confirm if these details are correct. Also, it seems there's missing information on cargo size and specific dates.

Best regards,

labels.load_port: Eastern Port, FRS/SVLW Port, EEM Port, Cornish Port, English Port, Estuary
labels.discharge_port: Cornish Port, English Port, Estuary, IRLIHR/London

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fuel Oil Shipment from Rotterdam to Fujairah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mms. Nanda,

We require 1,000MT of refined fuel oil to be shipped from Rotterdam to Fujairah. Could you let us know if you have availability by the 17th of this month?

Regards,
Luin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fuel Oil Shipment from Rotterdam to Fujairah
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Luin,

We have availability for 1,000MT of refined fuel oil and can ensure delivery to Fujairah by the 16th. Can you provide me confirmation?

Regards,
Nanda

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Confirmation and Contract Registration
email_chain.body:
Dear Mms. Nanda,

Thanks for your confirmation. Could you please arrange to have a contract registered on the MICS portal, either to reference USO1728 or a new number you designate? Kindly send the contract to us as soon as possible.

Your cooperation is highly appreciated.

Regards,
Luin

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Confirmation and Contract Registration
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Luin,

I am glad to inform you that we have successfully registered the reference USO1728 on the MICS portal.

Regards,
Nanda

email_chain.subject: Re: Contract Registration Acknowledgement
email_chain.body:
Hi Mms. Nanda,

We are awaiting your company to issue the Declaration/Form for USO1728 to enable the MICS system to generate the contract. This will allow your company to receive the invoices subsequent to the contract's activation.

Regards,
Luin

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Cattle Feed Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Adam,

Are you familiar with shipping 10,000MT of cattle feed to Phnom Penh? There’s a short lead time, and can you accept FOB terms at the port in Ho Chi Minh City? Please advise.

Best regards,
Stephanie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Cattle Feed Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Stephanie,

I think I can handle the shipment. When would you like to start the order? Is a 30-day timeframe acceptable for this?

Regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Cattle Feed Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Adam,

Apologies for the delay. You can start the order right away. I will arrange for a single bill of lading to be issued. I am also interested in potential bulk order discounts you may offer for future orders.

Thank you.
Stephanie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Cattle Feed Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your confirmation, Stephanie.

I’ve scheduled shipments to commence with 6 truckloads of feed weekly, starting the first week of September. I would like to issue the initial invoice after the last truckload in September. Concerning bulk purchasing, while I appreciate the inquiry, I prefer to maintain the FOB terms so I can directly manage retail sales.

Regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Cattle Feed Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Adam,

It's my pleasure to begin this new relationship. I’ll call you tomorrow to arrange payment details for the order, and the bill of lading will be ready in the next two days.

Thank you.
Stephanie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Cattle Feed Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Great job, Stephanie! I’ll expect the initial shipment next week. I also appreciate the quick follow-up regarding my terms for bulk buying.

Best,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: Shipment of D2 Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Caroline,

We are interested in obtaining a quote for the shipment of 5000MT of D2 diesel oil from Lagos to Antwerp. We would like to know if it is possible to proceed without Cash on Delivery (COD). Could you kindly advise on this matter?

With warm regards,
Ronana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Shipment of D2 Diesel
email_chain.body:
Dear Ronana,

Thank you for your inquiry. We will prepare and send the quotation for the specified shipment by the 12th of this month. Additionally, you can check preliminary pricing on our website at www.oilexchange.com, which you might find convenient.

If you require further assistance, please feel free to reply to this email.

Regards,
Marian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Confirmation and Request for Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Smith,

I just wanted to confirm that you've received my initial inquiry. Also, could we have a few minutes to chat on the phone? I have some specific information to share with you that might require your assistance.

Best regards,
Beth

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Confirmation and Request for Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hello Beth,

Thank you for reaching out. We have reviewed your initial application but need the following details to further process your request:
1. Please provide your PAYE reference.
2. Provide an assessment of your position.
3. A signed employment contract is required.
4. A signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement is needed.

Once you provide these documents, we will be able to assist you immediately.

Regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details Required
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Smith,

Thank you for the details. I will provide the necessary documents promptly. Meanwhile, is there anything else you need from me at this stage?

Best regards,
Beth

email_chain.subject: Request for ETA Update - 17th Vessel from Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane, 

Could you please provide us with the latest information regarding the ETA of the 17th vessel departing from Antwerp? 

Have a nice day,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Vessel ETA Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Jane, 

Just following up on Maria's recent communication regarding the ETA of the 17th vessel out of Antwerp. We were hoping to receive an update from you on this before proceeding with our logistical planning. 

Kind regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Update Required on Cargo ETA
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane, 

I hope this email finds you well. We are expecting a cargo shipment aboard the vessel from Antwerp and urgently require an ETA. Despite previous queries, we have yet to receive this information. 

Please provide us with an update on the current status of the 17th vessel from Antwerp at your earliest convenience. Thank you for your time. 

Kind regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Update Required on Cargo ETA
email_chain.body:
Hello Alex, 

Thank you for reaching out. I've checked with our carrier regarding the 17th vessel out of Antwerp. According to the latest information, the vessel left Antwerp on March 12th and is currently en route. We expect the vessel to arrive at our port on April 2nd, 2023. 

I'll make sure to keep you posted if there are any changes. 

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability & Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Stevenson,

We need a vessel for 8,000MT of solvents from the US Gulf to Petronella. Do you have any available? We would like to see a fixed demurrage rate as this is being invoiced in USD.

Thank you,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability & Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

Please forward your Purchase Order to our logistics manager, David. He will get back to you on this within 24 hours.

Thanks,
Adrian Stevenson

email_chain.subject: Urgent Booking: DNV Sparrow
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

Thank you for your proposal. It is favorable for us but unfortunately, this shipment is very urgent. There are no other vessels available at the moment. So I have booked this shipment on DNV Sparrow. We have to pay 3000USD demurrage which will be added to your invoice.

Please provide the FFO, draft, and deadweight of Sparrow.

Thank you,
Denis

email_chain.subject: Details of DNV Sparrow
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thanks for your response. DNV Sparrow is en route from the Gulf to Petronella and will be arriving in two days. The information we have received is as follows:

FFO is 24,192 cubic feet
Draft is 16.5 feet
Deadweight is 2,000MT

Thank you for your help!
Kind regards,
Denis

email_chain.subject: FFA Information Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

Thank you for your quotation. Please forward your FFA to my attention.

Thank you,
Denis

email_chain.subject: Vessel Update - DNV Sparrow
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

Thanks for your help! Our FFO is 48,000 cubic feet, and deadweight is 47.8MT. I have already made the payment to DNV Sparrow. We are expecting this vessel in a week. Please add 1,000USD demurrage to our final invoice.

Regards,
Denis

email_chain.subject: Urgent Delivery Required
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

We have 24,000 cubic feet of FFO that needs urgent delivery. We would like to secure a fixed demurrage rate for this shipment.

Regards,
Denis

email_chain.subject: Heatshielding Inquiry for Graphite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Jim,

We will be sending 2,000MT of graphite from Dalian to Nakhon. Considering the recent weather variations, could you please confirm if this material needs additional heatshielding? Thank you for your guidance on this matter.

Best regards,
Ju

email_chain.subject: Re: Heatshielding Inquiry for Graphite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Ju,

Thank you for reaching out. The graphite shipments from the loading port are already 100% heat shielded and this setup is sufficient. Please continue with the current heatshielding practices, and rest assured, we will handle everything accordingly.

Best regards,
Jim

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Charter from Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body: Hello, We are looking for a vessel capable of transporting 10,000MT of gasoline from Houston to the Canary Islands. Could you please provide details on preferred laycan periods, demurrage conditions, and your lumpsum freight rate? Thank you, Amber

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter from Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body: Dear Amber, Thank you for your inquiry. As per your request, here are the details from Car Trader’s proposal for the vessel: The offer includes port to port delivery with limited insurance covering theft or damages at port. Please confirm if you would like to include additional services such as passenger or extra cargo arrangements. The fuel consumption is projected at 3 l/100 km with a LCOE of $15.36. Looking forward to your response. Best regards, Car Trader Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter from Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body: Dear Car Trader Sales Team, Thank you for your prompt reply. We will review the proposal and contact you once we have the customer's confirmation. Best, Amber

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter from Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body: Dear Amber, We are pleased to hear from you. Our client has expressed interest in the offer. We will notify you as soon as we receive the customer’s final confirmation. Regards, Car Trader

email_chain.subject: Preliminary Freight Indication for Bulk Corn Starch Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Zara,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the potential shipment of bulk corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong. Here is a preliminary freight indication:

Based on the current market rates and port-to-port tonnage (440 mt/unit), our standard bulk shipping rates for corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong are estimated to be $115 USD/mt. This includes inland delivery in both Thailand and Vietnam.

We hope this information is helpful. If you have any other questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Bulk Corn Starch Shipment from Bangkok to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. David,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the purchase of bulk corn starch from Thailand. I would like to provide you with the following detailed freight quote for your shipment from the Port of Bangkok to Haiphong:

Inland delivery from our terminal in Bangkok to the specified destination, including any applicable duties and taxes: $550 USD/mt
Port-to-port shipping charges: $77 USD/mt
Customs clearance and handling fees: $8 USD/mt
Total freight rate for 440 MT of bulk corn starch: $115 USD/mt

Please note that this rate is based on current market conditions and can be adjusted to meet the specific requirements of your shipment.

Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please feel free to contact us.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Revised Freight Quote for Bulk Corn Starch Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello David,

Please accept our apologies for the delay in responding to your initial inquiry. We appreciate your patience as we worked to address your concerns and provide you with a reliable freight quote.

Due to the significant rise in the cost of fuel and other related expenses, we have revised our freight rate for bulk corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong. The new rate is now $125 USD/mt, effective immediately. This adjustment is necessary to continue providing our clients with a reliable and cost-effective transportation solution.

We understand this increase may be concerning, but we believe it to be necessary under the current market conditions.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Acceptance of Revised Freight Quote for Corn Starch Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Thank you for your prompt reply regarding the shipment of bulk corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong. We appreciate your understanding and are pleased to accept the revised freight quote of $125 USD/mt, including inland delivery in both Thailand and Vietnam.

We hope this updated rate will suit our needs well. Please let us know if there is any further information required or assistance we might need.

We look forward to working with you on this important project.

Kind regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Request for Reroute and Availability Confirmation for Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body: Dear Mendoza, I request a reroute for 2,000MT of gasoline from Montego Bay to Tangier. Additionally, could you confirm the availability and laycan slots for the following port-to-port shipments: 1,000MT from Charleston to Houston, and 3,000MT from Jacksonville to New York? Best regards, Kelvin.

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Reroute and Availability Confirmation for Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body: Dear Mendoza, Many thanks for your prompt response. I appreciate the coordination of the reroute of 2,000MT of gasoline from Montego Bay to Tangier with the supplier within two days. I am also pleased to confirm the availability and laycan slots for the shipments of 1,000MT from Charleston to Houston, and 3,000MT from Jacksonville to New York, marked for delivery on the 29th of June. Thank you, again, for your assistance. Best regards, Kelvin.

email_chain.subject: Feedback on Recent Logistics Performance
email_chain.body: Dear Mendoza, I am writing to express my satisfaction with your firm’s performance in executing the logistics for the gasoline shipments this May. It was a smooth process, and I anticipate further cooperation in the future. Many thanks for your hard work. Best regards, Kelvin.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Shipment Request - 9000MT Rubidium
email_chain.body:
Hi Manu,

I need to find a cargo vessel for an urgent shipment of 9,000MT of rubidium from New York to Port Klang. Please quote for a very fast vessel, with a preferred laycan date of the 21st.

Thank you,
Vera

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Nick,

We are looking to transport an urgent cargo of 9,000MT of rubidium from New York to Port Klang, ideally by the 21st. Our budget is $120,000. Can the vessel 'SR MAXIMUS' accommodate this request?

Best regards,
Manu

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Manu,

The vessel 'SR MAXIMUS' can indeed transport your cargo on the 21st. The laycan date is also the 21st as requested.

Best regards,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Signing of BL
email_chain.body:
Hi Nick,

Thank you for the prompt response. We are pleased with the terms. Please confirm the slot on the 'SR MAXIMUS', and we would like to proceed with signing an online Bill of Lading as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Manu

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Invoice
email_chain.body:
Hi Manu,

This is confirmed. I will proceed with the booking on 'SR MAXIMUS' for your cargo. Expect an email with the invoice shortly.

Have a nice day,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Capacity: Fats and Oils to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Morrow, I will require 2,800MT of fats and oils transported to Mombasa. Could you offer 2 refrigerated ships available in 25 days for the route from Colombo to Dar es Salaam? Sincerely, Heather

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Capacity: Fats and Oils to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Dear Heather, I do have 2 vessels available from Dar es Salaam on the mentioned date. Can you provide additional cargo to fill up the remaining space? Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Capacity: Fats and Oils to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Dear Peter, We can only offer you 2,500MT of fats and oils at this time. We accept your earlier offer for the vessels. Regards, Heather

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Capacity: Confirmation of Cargo and Discussion on Transit Times
email_chain.body: Dear Heather, Thanks for confirming the cargo. Let's discuss optimizing the transit time to minimize potential demurrage fees at Dar es Salaam port. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Optimization of Transit Time
email_chain.body: Dear Peter, Please ensure the vessels can berth and discharge at Dar es Salaam within the agreed 25 days to avoid demurrage issues. Regards, Heather

email_chain.subject: Re: Optimization of Transit Time - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Heather, We agree to your conditions for berthing and discharging at Dar es Salaam within the given timeline. Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Transportation Request and Cost Estimate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Doyle,

How are you? Our client requires the import of 3,800MT of coal from London to Newport News. Could you provide us with a cost estimate? Additionally, we've just secured a shipment of 3,000MT of salt from Le Havre to Galveston. Our agent suggested that combining the salt cargo with the coal could be more economical. Could you provide your insights on this?

Best regards,
Donald

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation Request and Cost Estimate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

My son mentioned he's managing a similar shipment from Le Havre scheduled for next month; coal shipments are indeed more expensive currently. By the way, how is your daughter doing?

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation Request and Cost Estimate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Gloria,

Thank you for the update. After a consultation this morning, our second party agreed to a more favorable rate. However, my boss decided against additional coal shipments next month. Please keep the new rate confidential from him. Also, I got a promotion which will help with a gift for my daughter, thinking of a bracelet for her—it's been a while.

Have a lovely weekend,
Donald

email_chain.subject: Re: Transportation Request and Cost Estimate Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

Keeping the quote confidential, don't worry. That sounds wonderful for your daughter! Let me know if she likes the bracelet; I recently saw one that would make a perfect gift.

Warm regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Weekend Plans and Various Updates
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

Your daughter and I might be going to the mall this Saturday. Also, are you acquainted with the new manager at the local car rental agency?

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

It was delightful seeing you and your daughter last night. She's truly lovely. Are you still planning on attending the concert this weekend with your wife?

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Request for Bitumen Transportation Quote
email_chain.body: Hello, could you please provide a quotation for the transportation of 5,300MT of bitumen from Tanger Med to Jeddah by road? Thank you, Robert

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement of Transportation Request
email_chain.body: Dear Robert, We acknowledge receipt of your request for transporting 5,300MT of bitumen from Tanger Med to Jeddah. We are pleased to handle your request and will provide you with the best rates shortly. If you have any questions about our services, please do not hesitate to ask. Regards, General Manager, Tonson Transport Services, Dubai, UAE

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Bitumen Supply
email_chain.body: Hello, Thank you for your email. I am writing to inquire about your offer regarding the supply of bitumen. At this time, our organization is not looking to proceed further with this transaction. Yours faithfully, Alex Li

email_chain.subject: Update on Bitumen Availability
email_chain.body: Hello, Thank you for your recent inquiry. We have secured the required bitumen and it is available for shipment from Jeddah between June 15 to June 25, 2016. For detailed documentation, you can click here: http://www.freelancefinder.net/documents/1/view. For more company information, visit: http://www.freelancefinder.net/company/36155/index.html. Please let us know if we can assist you further. Regards, Manager, A Trading Company in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Order for Bitumen Supply
email_chain.body: Dear Manager, We have successfully placed an order for the supply of bitumen as per your availability schedule. We look forward to receiving the shipment details and finalizing the transportation arrangements. Thank you, General Manager, Tonson Transport Services

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Current Market Prices for CFCL Grades
email_chain.body: Good day, Could you kindly confirm the latest market price for CFCL grades 54, 55, and 56? Thank you for your attention, Liana

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Current Market Prices for CFCL Grades
email_chain.body: Hi Liana, The latest market price for CFCL 54, 55, and 56 is $40.49/bl, updated as of 26th Nov. Please note that we have ceased the import of CFCL grades and now they are only available on request. For further assistance, feel free to contact me. Thank you for your understanding, Antal Khilko

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of CFCL Materials
email_chain.body: Good day Mr. Khilko, I am disappointed that CFCL is not currently available as I was counting on these materials for my project and alternatives are more expensive. If you have any recommendations or know of available sources for CFCL, please let me know. Thank you, Liana

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability of CFCL Materials
email_chain.body: Dear Liana, I apologize for the inconvenience. Due to the limited supply and challenges in securing CFCL, along with no licensed warehouses in the USA for storage, we've halted imports. The growing market for alternative composites also influences pricing. However, do let us know your specific requirements and we will help find the best alternative for your project. Regards, Antal

email_chain.subject: Immediate Order Placement for CFCL Grades
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Tanoov, I am starting a project this Monday and would like to confirm the current pricing and specifications for CFCL grades 54/55/56. Additionally, could you provide the technical data sheets for these materials? I heard that CFCL 55 and 56 are available in different thicknesses; is this correct? Thanks for your assistance, Lucie

email_chain.subject: Re: Immediate Order Placement for CFCL Grades
email_chain.body: Good day Lucie, Thank you for reaching out. The current prices remain unchanged as listed on our website: https://www.canamyte.com/pages/carbon-fiber-composite-materials. As for the technical data sheets and specific thicknesses of CFCL 54/55 and 56, I will provide them shortly. Thank you for your attention. Antal

email_chain.subject: Thank You and Further Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Tanoov, Thank you for the prompt response. For planning future projects, could you confirm that the thickness options for CFCL 54/55 are 5mm, 7mm, and 10mm, and for CFCL 56 are 10mm and 12mm? Additionally, could you send the technical data sheets since I may need to switch suppliers in future? I have attached images of the product. Best regards, Lucie

email_chain.subject: Cargo Load Request: 5000MT Soybean Meal to New York
email_chain.body: Your freighter Phoenix has been assigned to load up 5,000MT of soybean meal from Montevideo. Can you take this cargo with a May 7 arrival in New York? Thanks for looking, Kyle

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Load Request: 5000MT Soybean Meal to New York
email_chain.body: Hello Kyle, I cannot accept this cargo as we have a full load. Let me know if you have anything else. Thanks, Vince

email_chain.subject: Current Cargo Load Status
email_chain.body: Hi Kyle, I have a full load for the next trip. Please let me know if you have any other loads. Thanks for looking, Chuck

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Requirement for Buyer
email_chain.body: Hi Kyle, I urgently need to secure transport for a buyer's cargo that must be moved as soon as possible. Any leads on available freight would be appreciated. Thanks, Chris

email_chain.subject: Available Cargo Space Announcement
email_chain.body: Hi Kyle, I have a few slots available. I can depart for New York in the morning and can load your cargo in addition to a full load for next month. Thanks, Rodney

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Robertson, we are loading a 6,600MT cargo for Maputo next week. Do you have a ship to move a 15,000MT cargo from London (LON) to Newark (NEW), next week? Regards, Gert

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity
email_chain.body: Hi Gert, yes, we have availability for a 6,000MT load on a 16,000MT ship moving from London. If you are still interested in shipping in 2-3 weeks, we have a vessel available. What date are you considering for shipping? Regards, Wade

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Capacity
email_chain.body: Hi Wade, I think 30 June is best for the shipment. I will let the company know and get back to you on 29 June. Regards, Gert

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Date Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Gert, just to follow up on your request for the 6,000MT move from London to Newark. You are still okay with 30 June for the shipment? We also have an option for a 5,000MT move available that day, and on 7 July for a 6,000MT move. Your initial message indicated a need for 15,000MT, but currently, our vessel does not have space for such a large cargo. Please let me know if the 6,000MT move on 30 June will work for you. Regards, Wade

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Date Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Wade, Thanks for the update. Unfortunately, they are not flexible with the amount; 15,000MT is required. Regards, Gert

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Slot
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Green,
We require 15,000MT of asphalt to be shipped from Antwerp to Rotterdam next week. Could you please confirm if you have any vessel availability during that period? 
Regards,
Ray Allen

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Slot
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Allen,
We are currently experiencing delays in London with tanker unloading operations, and struggling with the limited port space availability. Our departure to Antwerp is now expected to be delayed until next Wednesday. Could you please provide us with the ETA for the asphalt's arrival in Antwerp?
Regards,
Karen

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Timing and Delays
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Allen,
Based on our current situation, the delay in London in unloading our tankers could affect our scheduled operations for Antwerp. We will keep you updated as the situation develops.
Best regards,
Mr. Green

email_chain.subject: Impact of Delays on Transshipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Green,
Given the updates on the delays in London, can we expect any impact on the timing for the transshipment from Rotterdam to Antwerp?
Thanks,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Request for Lump Sum Freight Quote for Slabs Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi, We have a shipment of 16,600MT of slabs from China to Colombia. Could you please provide a lump sum price for this? We are comparing quotes from different providers. Sincerely, Dave

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Lump Sum Freight Quote for Slabs Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Dave, We actually have a similar requirement. We are looking to ship 14,500MT of slabs from Vietnam to Germany. Could you please also provide a lump sum price for this cargo? We're in the process of collecting quotes. Sincerely, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Request for Lump Sum Freight Quote for Slabs Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Joe, Similarly, we have a shipment need for 12,400MT of slabs from Thailand to the UK. Could we also receive a lump sum freight quote for our comparison? Thank you, Tom

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Required for Slabs Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Sir/Madam, We have a requirement to ship 9,500MT of slabs from India to Malaysia. Could you kindly provide us with a lump sum quote for this shipment? We are evaluating several options. Sincerely, Mary

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Quote for Cacao Import
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nihles,

Thank you for contacting our company. I am happy to assist you with your needs regarding importing cacao. We estimate the price to be $x per ton for 300 tons of product in the upcoming months. Your options for freight forwarding are as follows:
* Fuel Charge
* Off Dock: $6500
* Truck Shipping
* Container: $8300
* Air Freight: $13000
You can ship using our associate carriers if you select any of the above options. Should you choose to ship by air, we will collaborate with our partners to secure the best deal. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information on our services.

Sincerely,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Detailed Freight Quote for 300 tons of Cacao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nihles,

Following up on your request for a more detailed estimate, here is the pricing breakdown for shipping 300 tons (450,000 lbs.) of Cacao at $3 per ton, totaling $1350,000. Costs of carriers are as follows:
* Dry Vans: $6500.00
* Refrigerated Vans: $7100.00
* Vans: $7000.00
* Open Top Vans: $7700.00
* Barge: $5900.00
* Pallet Caine: $9500.00
* Air: $13000.00
Additional Costs include:
* Marine Insurance: $5200.00
* Warehouse / Storage: $3250.00
* New Packaging: $2250.00
* Testing & Certification
Please review and respond with any adjustments or approval.

Regards,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Additional Services and Freight Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nihles,

I've reviewed your pricing information and our team is working to finalize the costs to better assist you. Meanwhile, I'd like to highlight some additional services that might improve your shipping experience:
* Consular documentation assistance for export paperwork.
* Coordination with your sales team for better rates.
* Truck pickup of cargo from your warehouse for bulk shipments.
Your feedback on these services or additional requirements would be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Final Freight Quote Confirmation for Cacao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nihles,

I can now confirm our final freight quote for the 300 tons of Cacao. The overall cost positioning is as previously detailed, including 300 tons (450,000 lbs.) at $3 per ton, totaling $1350,000. The carrier and additional costs remain the same as provided in our recent communication.
* Total Freight Quote: See recent communication for breakdown
* Marine Insurance: Included
* Warehouse / Storage: Included
* New Packaging: Included
Kindly confirm your acceptance of this quote or discuss any further adjustments needed.

Thank you,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Wheat from Tangier to Guangzhou
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Porter,

Could you assist us with arranging the shipment of 2,200MT of wheat from Tangier to Guangzhou? We are eager to understand if there are any current congestions at the port and when you plan to clear your storage.

Best Regards,
Larry

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Mr. Porter,

We apologize for the delayed response, we were traveling. We hope the recent weather conditions haven't affected you and your family too adversely. We appreciate your acceptance of our order and look forward to a smooth transaction. Could you assist us in preparing the necessary shipping documents according to your company's terms?

Best Regards,
[Name removed] [CEO]

email_chain.subject: Cargo Status and Special Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Porter,

Thank you for the recent update on the cargo status. We value your prompt assistance. We are expecting to receive the shipment by Saturday, March 19. Regarding unloading, we kindly ask to facilitate access to your warehouse using a forklift to handle the cargo. Post-handling, you may close the warehouse for spring. We are aware the steamroller is currently operational, and we are prepared to cover any additional costs incurred.

With great appreciation,
Mr. Zhang
[VP Sales]

email_chain.subject: Discussion on Future Shipment of Tanks
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Porter,

Following our recent B2B conference call, we are pleased to discuss the potential shipment of 3,000 tanks requiring ocean freight. The cargo must be shipped by no later than August 1st. We are prepared to adhere to your standard terms and conditions. Should you require additional information, we are ready to send the relevant documents at your convenience.

Thank you very much for your time, and we hope to initiate this partnership soon!

Sincerely,
Kobe

email_chain.subject: Update on Equipment Availability in Tangier
email_chain.body:
Hey Ken,

I hope this message finds you well. We've received confirmation from our contact in Tangier that there are no issues with equipment availability. The lead time is approximately 7 days. We need to confirm cargo availability with [Party removed] and then proceed with the payment.

Please let me know if you'd like to review the email communication with the concerned party.

Thank you,
Ram

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Response Delay
email_chain.body:
Good evening,

We received your message. The owner is currently out of the office. We will get back to you once we receive a response from him.

Thank you,
Office Support Team

email_chain.subject: Request for Assistance with Email Practice
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthieu,

This is my first time drafting a professional email, and I'm hoping it will become easier with some practice. Could you please provide some guidance and tips on how to improve my writing? I want to ensure that I’m prepared for future tasks where effective communication will be essential.

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance with Email Practice
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

I've received your first attempt. Thank you for practicing. Writing in a professional manner is crucial as it reflects on our team's professionalism. Even though we’re just in week 2 and still forming our routine, it’s important that we start strong. I suggest spending some time revising the material before sending it out, as well-prepared content will save us time in future interactions.

Keep at it and let's discuss your next steps soon.

Best regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Request for Re-evaluation of Recent Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthieu,

Thanks for your feedback. I’ve tried to write a few more emails to apply your tips and improve. Could you please review emails 3 and 4 to ensure I’m on the right track?

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up: Request for Re-evaluation of Recent Emails
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

The later emails (3 and 4) are much improved! I see that you are incorporating the suggestions and your writing is getting more concise and effective. Keep practicing like this, and don’t hesitate to mimic professional styles you observe—it's often a great way to learn. Feel free to draft the next email and compare it with my previous ones for consistency.

I appreciate your efforts and look forward to your progress.

Best regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Cargo Loading in Early September
email_chain.body: Hi Seamus, The earliest loading slots we have available are from 4th to 7th of October. Unfortunately, our dry bulk department has no space available in September. Kind regards, Sally

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Cargo Loading in Early September
email_chain.body: Hi Sally, Thank you very much. I am seeking additional cargo for my vessel, and it seems that we might miss the first half of October by just a few days. Please let me know if there are any possible alternatives. Best, Seamus

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Cargo Loading in Early September
email_chain.body: Seamus, Hi! There are some loads available from the first of November. Best, Sally

email_chain.subject: November Loading Schedule

email_chain.subject: Tanker Specification Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Seamus, Can you advise which tanker you would like the cargo on? Best, Sally

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Vessel Sourcing for FWA Transport to Cadiz
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Castillo,

Our 1,600MT of FWA are currently enroute to Manzanillo. I need to source a vessel that can transport the cargo to Cadiz. Could you please advise on the earliest possible laycan and the latest allowable arrival time at Cadiz port? Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Roberto

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Vessel Sourcing for FWA Transport to Cadiz
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Upon reviewing the schedules, I found that the AIS shipping services do not call directly at Cadiz. I have also checked the London shipping routes, which similarly do not include Cadiz. Nonetheless, there is a possibility of arranging transportation via Vigo, Spain. The AIS has an available departure to Vigo on August 20th. From there, we can organize road transport for your cargo. Please let me know if this alternative route meets your requirements. Additionally, I will prepare all necessary documentation and advise on the terms accordingly.

Thank you for considering this alternative.

Best regards,
Eileen

email_chain.subject: Request for Barge Transport of Hydrochloric Acid from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body:

Do you have any openings for transporting 14,000 gallons of hydrochloric acid from Rotterdam to Hamburg? We prefer barge transportation. Ideally, we need the transport to start as early as May 17, ending no later than May 30. Thanks,
Amanda

email_chain.body:

The cost for air freighting this FCL pallet amounts to approximately $120,000.
Best regards,
John

John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Diesel Shipping Costs from Riyadh to Mogadishu
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Simba,

Could you please let me know how much your company charges for shipping 19,000MT of diesel from Riyadh to Mogadishu next week? Additionally, if I request delivery on a 24-hour notice, would there be any demurrage charges?

Many thanks,
Ariel Illeus

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Diesel Shipping Costs from Riyadh to Mogadishu
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Illeus,

Thank you for your email. Our charge for shipping is $20 per metric ton. Regrettably, we cannot accommodate a 24-hour notice for delivery. If enforced, the demurrage charge would be $100 per metric ton per day.

Best Regards,
Ms. Simba

Kind regards,
Ms. Simba

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Increasing Client Email Engagement

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sugar Shipment from Mangalore to Newark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sugar Shipment from Mangalore to Newark
email_chain.body: Hi Alejandro, Currently, we do not have any available slots. We will need at least 15-20 days to confirm a slot. We could also explore a sub-voyage via Hamburg/Gdansk, but this would require manual confirmation due to potential delays compared to a direct service. Please confirm if your intended shipping departure is from Mormugao, Bangalore, or Chennai. Best regards, Seema Pansuriya Operation Manager DAILY INTERNATIONAL Tel. +91 8200 65666 Fax. +91 8200 66899

email_chain.subject: [Helpdesk] Request for New Email Setup for Unibe
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Ajit, I urgently need to set up a new email for Unibe, but I have not received the link to change the password. Could you please assist? Thank you. Regards.

email_chain.subject: Update on Bill of Lading and Cargo Condition Post-Storm
email_chain.body: We regret to inform you about the delay in the bill of lading we anticipated initially. As you may recall, the cargo was housed in our warehouse at the onset of the storm. Our local teams surveyed for water damage and confirmed that all goods were safe and no damage was recorded. It's puzzling to hear reports of damage post-storm, especially when the same teams assured the site remained clean and clear of mud and debris. We suspect that the damage might have been caused by pests, possibly driven by the proximity of the warehouse to the sea and the storm surge. Regards, Logistics Solutions Support Team
