email_chain.body: Dear Tan, I have checked our company's email, but I did not find the CP you mentioned. Could you please resend it? We need to review and confirm the shipment details. Many thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Party Document for Potassium Nitrate Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, My apologies for the inconvenience. A package containing the CP has been dispatched to your office and should arrive by 23 April. Please note that the CP includes a 5-day laycan period. Regards, Tan

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Reissue of Charter Party Document
email_chain.body: Dear Tan, I regret to inform you that the CP has still not arrived via email as expected. Could you please resend it electronically at your earliest convenience? This will help us expedite the process. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Reissue of Charter Party Document
email_chain.body: Hi John, I've just noticed the oversight. I will forward your request to our documentation team for an immediate electronic dispatch. Please check your email tomorrow morning and let me know if there are any issues. Regards, Tan

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Received: Charter Party Document
email_chain.body: Dear Tan, I have checked and finally received the CP electronically. Thank you for addressing this issue promptly. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about shipment of cocoa beans from Abidjan to Nantes
email_chain.body: I am currently conducting business with a cocoa plantation in Ivory Coast and am interested in shipping approximately 6,700MT of cocoa beans from Abidjan to Nantes. Could you please provide further details regarding dispatch rates and other relevant conditions? Thank you. Best regards, Sabine

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about shipment of cocoa beans from Abidjan to Nantes
email_chain.body: Dear Sabine, Thank you for your inquiry. We can supply the 6700 MT of cocoa beans from Abidjan to Nantes as you requested. Enclosed is the quotation and terms for your review. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer and if there is additional information you require. We are looking forward to your feedback. Kind regards, Sandy Sandy C. Sent by iTranscript for Intrinsik

email_chain.subject: Awaiting response on cocoa beans shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Sabine, We have sent you the quotation for the shipment of cocoa beans from Abidjan to Nantes and are awaiting your comments on the same. We look forward to your prompt reply. Best regards, Sandy Sent by iTranscript for Intrinsik

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Booking Tonnage and Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body: Hello Min, I have a couple of inquiries that I need assistance with. Firstly, could you elaborate on the procedure for booking tonnage with ACI? Additionally, I am seeking vessel capacity from Singapore to Qeshm. I understand that availability is currently limited, and I have heard that ACI is highly recommended for handling such shipments. Could you please inform me about your plans for this route and how you might assist us? I look forward to your response. Regards, Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Booking Tonnage and Vessel Capacity
email_chain.body: Dear Rebecca, Thank you for your email. I am pleased to hear of your interest in our services for the Singapore to Qeshm route. I would be glad to assist with your container requirements. There are currently no issues with routes at ACI. I will call you to discuss the specific details of the cargo you need, and to explore how we can best meet your needs. Could you also let me know your nearest port, and whether you require TEU or FEU sizing for your containers? Sincerely, Min

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability from Brisbane to London
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Taylor,

We are looking to ship 5,000MT of wheat from Brisbane to London. Could you please let me know if you have any available vessels that could transport this shipment within the next one to two weeks? Your immediate response will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel information for 5000MT Grain Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hey Bill,

My company is seeking to arrange a shipment of 5000MT of grain from Australia. Since you handled our first transaction efficiently, I was hoping you could recommend a few vessels with ETA information over the next week. Our previous ship has just departed Sydney and we require additional support.

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Requirement for Shipping 3000MT of Wheat to Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hello Bill,

We urgently need to arrange a shipment of 3000MT of wheat from Australia to Brazil for one of our clients. Your immediate feedback on any available vessels would be invaluable.

Regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Offer to Assist with Grain Shipping Inquiries
email_chain.body:
Hi Bill,

I represent the Shipping Department at our trading company, with 15 years of experience in the industry. We specialize in commodities like Wheat, Rice, Corn, Soybean, and Sugar. Given your current inquiries from potentially interested buyers, we are ready to offer our expertise and historical transaction data to help. Please reach out if you are interested in collaborating or need to discuss further with any potential clients.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for LPG Cargo Booking
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bravo, I am looking to book a cargo of 16,000MT of LPG to be loaded from Mina Al Ahmadi to Karachi next month. Could you please let me know your next available laycan? Warm regards, Tiana

email_chain.subject: Forwarding of Cargo File to Fueco SA
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bravo, I have forwarded your cargo file to Fueco SA as per our earlier communications concerning the cargo booking from Mina Al Ahmadi. I haven't yet received a confirmation from you; could you please send an availability letter at your earliest convenience? Thanks! Tiana

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Availability Letter Request
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bravo, I just sent a booking request to Fueco SA. Could you please respond with the required availability letter? Thank you for your attention to this matter. Best, Tiana

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Booking - LPG Cargo
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bravo and Sumeer, I would like to confirm my booking for 16,000MT of LPG cargo from Mina Al Ahmadi to Karachi next month. I will send you the cargo file at your convenience. Thank you, Tiana

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Quote
email_chain.body: How soon could your vessel load 15,000MT of coke from Chittagong to Al Khobar? By when do you need an agreement for this voyage? Best, Oscar

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Quote
email_chain.body: Thanks for getting back to us. I have already discussed this with my partners in Al Khobar, and they require the vessel 45 days from now. The rate is $22,500 per day, and payment needs to be made in advance. We will also deduct a brokerage of $1,500 per day. Please let me know if this rate is acceptable and by when you need an agreement for this voyage. Best, Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Quote
email_chain.body: We have reviewed the details you provided and are agreeable with the proposed rate. We would like to have the confirmation by 5th June at the latest. Could you please inform us if additional documents are needed to finalize the shipping agreement? Best, Oscar

email_chain.subject: Shipping Agreement and Advance Payment Details
email_chain.body: Dear Oscar, Please find the completed copy of the formal agreement attached along with our payment details. We request you to process the advance payment and revert once the signed contract copy is available at your end. Best, Susan

email_chain.subject: Signed Agreement and Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Susan, Attached are the scanned documents including the signed agreement. Please review them and confirm everything is in order. Best, Oscar

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Byrne,
We’re seeking to ship 1,700 tons of apples from Auckland to Melbourne this weekend. Could you confirm your carrier availability? Additionally, can you provide a quote and add this load to your shipping line’s service list?
Thanks,
Stephen Mulhern

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mulhern,
The Apple Group, a leading New Zealand exporter, is pleased to address your request for shipping 1,700 tons of apples to Melbourne. We can provide safe and reliable transport, with our customer service team ready to assist you further. Please confirm if you would like to proceed, or you may fill out our online shipping quote form.
Yours truly,
Stephen Byrne
The Apple Group, Inc.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Details and Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mulhern,
Your shipment can be transported via air and truck combination, ensuring arrival in Melbourne within 12 hours of departure from Auckland. This service includes a chartered 747 jumbo jet from Auckland to Melbourne, followed by two truckloads from the Melbourne airport to your facility, scheduled to arrive by 2:00 pm on Friday. Please review the schedule below and confirm at your earliest convenience:

- Local Time in Auckland (UTC+12:00): Wednesday 1:00 pm
- Local Time in Melbourne (UTC+11:00): Thursday 8:00 am

We await your confirmation to finalize the arrangements.
Best regards,
Stephen Byrne

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Slot Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Smith,

Can you confirm a slot to move 2,500MT of compound from Los Angeles to Genoa?

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Slot Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Could you please confirm that the request to move the 2,500MT from Los Angeles to Genoa has been accepted? I will proceed once confirmed.

Regards,
Diana

email_chain.subject: Request for Wheat Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Parks,
May I have a quote for 4,000MT of wheat from Paranaguá to Malaga? You've got my contact details in your database.
Sincerely,
Jarrod

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Wheat Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Jarrod,
Thank you for your enquiry. We can offer a lower price if you agree to collect the goods from Antwerp instead of Malaga. Please let me know how you would like to proceed.
Sincerely,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Wheat Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Ashley,
Thank you for the alternative option. I would prefer delivery to Malaga as originally requested. Please send the quote for this arrangement.
Best regards,
Jarrod

email_chain.subject: Final Wheat Shipment Quote to Malaga
email_chain.body:
Hello Jarrod,
I'm pleased to forward the final quote for shipping 4,000MT of wheat from Paranaguá to Malaga. We look forward to working with you.
Sincerely,
Terry

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Wheat Shipment Quote to Malaga
email_chain.body:
Hello Terry,
Thank you for the quote. I am happy with the details and agree to proceed with this arrangement.
Best regards,
Jarrod

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Wheat Shipment Order
email_chain.body:
Jarrod,
Thank you for your business. We will be preparing the shipping and insurance documents shortly.
Sincerely,
Ida

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation and Thank You
email_chain.body:
Jarrod,
Your shipment order is confirmed. We look forward to working with you.
Sincerely,
Ida

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Qingdao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Oliver, We are currently evaluating a potential offer to transport 3,600MT of steel coils from Qingdao to Rotterdam. We would greatly appreciate if you could provide us with a rough shipping quote for this carriage. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: DDP Shipping Estimate – Qingdao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Sir/Madam, Thank you for your inquiry regarding the transport of 3,600MT of steel coils from Qingdao to Rotterdam. We are available for the shipment by 27th March 2023. Could you please confirm if you require the delivery terms to be DDP Rotterdam or CPT Qingdao? This information will help us provide a more accurate quote and ensure the smooth processing of your booking. Should you need further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Oliver

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm writing with a request for a cargo estimate for 4,600MT of corn from Chicago to Oslo. The cargo is scheduled to depart on the 6th of September with an ETA of 20 days. I'm interested in receiving prices for a consolidated letter of credit (L/C).

Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

Thank you for your interest in ABC Freight. Unfortunately, our office does not handle consolidated letters of credit (L/Cs) as our service quotations do not require them.

Attached, please find the cargo price estimate based on your request:

- Cargo Price Estimate: $18,234

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please feel free to contact us.

Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Rachman,
The 16,200MT of light aviation gasoline we require to ship from Antwerp to Lisbon by early June is fast approaching. I'm confident in your ability to handle this load, but could you please confirm the rates for me?
Best regards,
Faith

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Faith,
I am happy to confirm that we can ship the 16,200MT of Light Aviation Gasoline to Lisbon by June 4th. I am providing you with two pricing options:
A. Brackman Shipping: $0.18 per liter. Transit charges are $19,558 for Antwerp and $40,920 for Lisbon.
B. Teunissen Logistic: $0.12 per liter. Shipping charges are $12,368 for Antwerp and $26,727 for Lisbon.
I look forward to your confirmation on the preferred rate and further details for the trip.
Best regards,
Rachman

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Option B and Shipping Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Rachman,
Thank you for the detailed options. We would like to proceed with Option B (Teunissen Logistic). Please confirm the shipping details from Antwerp to Lisbon, including rates as stated: $12,368 for Antwerp and $26,727 for Lisbon.
Looking forward to your confirmation.
Best regards,
Faith

email_chain.subject: Discharge Schedule Confirmation for Rapeseed Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Yohana,

Your 22,000MT rapeseed shipment from Poland is scheduled to be discharged in Antwerp next Monday. Please let us know how we can further assist you with the discharging process or any other arrangements you might need.

Thank you,
Hugo

email_chain.subject: Customs Clearance Requirement at Anchorage
email_chain.body:
Hi Yohana,

Your cargo currently at Anchorage has been put on hold pending customs clearance. To facilitate the clearance, the cargo needs to be unloaded, which can only occur on Tuesday. Please confirm if this schedule is acceptable to you.

Kind regards,
Conrad
N.V. Velsheda Shipping

email_chain.subject: Exclusive Shipping Offer for Your Antarctica Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hey Yohana,

You are lucky! We have a fantastic deal for you on your upcoming 20,000MT shipment to Antarctica. If you accept our offered shipping rate and sign an extended contract, you will receive a bonus of $10,000. Additionally, we will ensure the vessel remains at berth for three days to provide ample time for loading.

Is this arrangement suitable for you?

Regards,
Justin

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping 10,000MT of Wool from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Cui, I'd like to ship 10,000MT of wool from Melbourne to Khoula. Could your vessel make a port-to-port delivery by the end of May? Thanks, Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping 10,000MT of Wool from Melbourne to Khoula
email_chain.body: Dear Leon, Thank you for your email. Our vessel XH88 is available for your shipment. It departs Melbourne on 29th May and is expected to arrive in Khoula on 20th June. Please coordinate with our agent Mr. Johnson to finalize the booking. Best regards, Jake

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Vessel XH88 and Additional Shipping Request
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Cui, Thank you for your prompt reply. Could you please provide further details of the vessel XH88, including its ETA in Khoula, port of loading, and departure date? Also, is it possible to arrange a smaller vessel for an additional 3,000MT from Canningvale to Khoula? Thanks, Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Vessel XH88 and Additional Shipping Request
email_chain.body: Hi Leon, The ETA of XH88 in Khoula is 20th June. The port of loading is Melbourne, and it departs on 29th May. We will discuss the logistics for the remaining 3,000MT from Canningvale to Khoula and get back to you. Regards, Jake

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Details for Charter of Additional Smaller Vessel
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Cui, Please confirm the details of XH88 with your office. Also, kindly update me regarding the possibility of chartering a smaller vessel from Canningvale to Khoula by the end of this month. Thanks, Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation and Details for Charter of Additional Smaller Vessel
email_chain.body: Dear Leon, I have confirmed the following details for XH88: Ship Name: XH88, Port of Loading: Melbourne, ETA in Khoula: 20th June, with Captain Shaun Bailey commanding. Unfortunately, we cannot arrange a smaller vessel from Canningvale to Khoula for the last 3,000MT. Regards, Jake

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Inquiry
email_chain.body: Jonas, could you provide a freight quote for 6,400MT of bitumen from Bahrain to Mombasa in late July? Also, could you let me know if there is any risk of port congestion on your end? Many thanks, Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Noah, Yes, it should be no problem. I apologize for the late response, I just got the supply confirmation this week. I will provide you with the correct rates by tomorrow afternoon. Best regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry - Update
email_chain.body: Noah, all routes were reviewed by the client. It turns out that we can offer a discount if you follow one of our suggested routes. Best, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Payment Order Finalization
email_chain.body: Hello Jonas, I really appreciate your help, but it's urgent, I have to finalize my payment order by this weekend. Regards, Noah

email_chain.subject: Check Final Destination Port
email_chain.body: Dear Jonas, please ask your sales manager Akbar to contact me. I need to double-check with my client the final destination port. Regards, Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Check Final Destination Port
email_chain.body: Noah, Hello, I have passed the message to Akbar. I will also discuss with him the final destination. Best, Jonas

email_chain.subject: All Documentation Sent
email_chain.body: Jonas, it's all set and ready to go. I have emailed all the supporting documentation to you. Have a nice day! Noah

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Requirement for Quick Shipment of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Hi James,
We are urgently looking for a supplier who can quickly ship a large amount of sugar. We need your immediate offer for such an order. Please respond at your earliest convenience.
Many thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent: Requirement for Quick Shipment of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Hi David,
You can contact us directly at order@hsit.com for a quicker processing of your order. Thank you!
Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Negotiation Request: Prices on Fast Shipment of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear James,
We would like to negotiate the prices regarding an express shipment. Please see the shipping quantities below:
- Cane Sugar 5,000mt; High quality raw cane sugar; 60.0% - 65.0%; Free sifting; Special use; Neutrally packed; 25kg/5.5m packs; 1 mts/20pads per carton; 20MT/PL; Shipment requirements consist of 1MT/ 10Tons/20tons in a 30ton container with 4-8 boxes, each box containing 30 packs. (Total 400 boxes/20tons).
Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: RE: Negotiation Request: Prices on Fast Shipment of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear David,
We are ready to discuss your requirements and open to negotiating the terms. Please provide your contact numbers for a more direct discussion.
Best Regards,
Zhang Hong & Johnson Hu
Shenzhen Hou Shan International Trading Co., Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Coffee Beans
email_chain.body:
Hello William,

Could you tell me the freight for 5,000 bags of coffee beans from Mombasa to Rotterdam?

Best Regards,
Ron

email_chain.subject: Meeting and Freight Inquiry Update
email_chain.body:
Hi William,

Thanks for your email. How are you? I would like to provide more detailed information about our coffee bean export from Mombasa to the Netherlands. Is it possible to meet up in London or Amsterdam in the coming weeks when I'm back in London? Please let me know your availability.

Best,
Ron

email_chain.subject: Further Details on Shipping Quote and Meeting Arrangement
email_chain.body:
Hi William,

Looking forward to our meeting in London. Can you provide me with the shipping quote for 5,000 bags of coffee beans from Mombasa to Rotterdam? Also, when would you need to receive the payment? Please confirm the best time for our meeting in London.

Best,
Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Details on Shipping Quote and Meeting Arrangement
email_chain.body:
Hi Ron,

Thanks for your messages. It's great to hear from you! I'm well, thanks for asking. I will get back to you with the shipping quote shortly. Regarding the meeting, I am available to meet in London next week. Let's finalize the details once the shipping quote is ready.

Best regards,
William

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Capacity and Demurrage Policy
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Hill,

We need to transport 1,200MT of iron ore from Rotterdam to Nansha. Could you please let us know if you have any available slots that could handle this requirement? Additionally, could you provide details on your demurrage policy?

Thanks,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Shipping Steel to Tangshan - Clarification Needed
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hill,

As per our previous correspondence, we're interested in shipping steel to Tangshan. I have included a copy of your quotation along with our requirements. Could you confirm if the suitable vessel is currently available? Does it accommodate barge side loading, and what are the demurrage terms for this trip?

Many thanks,
Molly

Attachment: Quotation.pdf

email_chain.subject: Further Queries on Shipping Arrangement
email_chain.body:
Dear Jason,

Thank you for your prompt reply. I have a couple more questions if it's not a problem.
1. We have decided to use VW's printer for the shipping documents instead of yours. You are comfortable holding the shipment until we deliver the printed documents to you, correct?
2. How should we proceed with payment for your services?

Thanks,
Nancy

P.S. Please update the cc: to the new address provided below.

Attachments:
1. Handwritten map
2. Equipment list inspected by Dr. Feng and Mr. Tang

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Mumbai to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Chen,

We have a shipment of 32,000MT cement from Mumbai to Vladivostok. Do you have capacity available for the transport? Looking forward to your response.

Sincerely,
Gabrielle

email_chain.subject: Request for Service Information on ECDL0332/ECDL0333
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Chen,

Could you please inform if the ECDL0332/ECDL0333 service includes Chongqing as a port of call? Is it possible to use Chongqing as a blanking port? Additionally, could you provide the operational schedule and confirm the capacity available on your vessel?

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Issue with Email Communication
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Chen,

Thank you for your response. I am currently facing an email communication issue with GAC, and I cannot send emails to your address. Are you aware of this issue?

Sincerely,
Salih

email_chain.subject: Re: Issue with Email Communication
email_chain.body:
Dear Salih,

We are aware of this problem and are currently working to resolve it.

Best regards,
Mr. Chen

email_chain.subject: Berthage Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We are pleased to inform you that the necessary arrangements for 12 hours of berthage at the Port of Singapore have been made in advance.

Best regards,
GAC Team

email_chain.subject: Status Inquiry: Chartered Vessel MOL Victory
email_chain.body:
Mr. Chen,

We would like to inquire about the current status of the chartered vessel MOL Victory, identifier M1EJ / SBBE1623401. We attempted to contact Agent GAC, but were unable to reach them.

Looking forward to your feedback,
Salih

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping 7000MT of Gasoline from Al Jubail to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Ford,

I’m inquiring about a possible fixture for 7,000MT of gasoline from Al Jubail to Karachi. Could you please provide your approximate freight rate? Also, can you accommodate a mid-April laycan?

Best regards,
Zara

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: 50 Million Liters of Gas Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ford,

I would like to inquire about the freight rates and conditions for shipping 50 million liters of gas oil from Al Jubail to Karachi. Looking forward to your detailed response.

Regards,
Salah

email_chain.subject: Price Inquiry for Diesel and Gasoline to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ford,

Could you please provide the price per ton for shipping diesel and gasoline from Al Jubail to China? I would appreciate a prompt response.

Best,
Sadie

email_chain.subject: Availability and Price Request: 30,000 MT of Heavy Diesel Fuel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ford,

I am interested in the availability and price for 30,000 MT of heavy diesel fuel in Al Jubail. Could you please confirm if it's available and share the shipping price?

Regards,
Shakeer

email_chain.subject: Price and Availability: 50,000 MT of Gasoline
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ford,

I’m looking to find out if 50,000 MT of gasoline is available in Al Jubail, and if so, what would be the shipping rate for this quantity?

Best,
Ronit

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Price for 60,000MT Diesel Oil from Al Jubail to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ford,

Could you please provide the freight rate for shipping 60,000MT of diesel oil from Al Jubail to Karachi? Your timely response would be highly appreciated.

Best,
Shreya

labels.commodity: Gasoline, Gas Oil, Diesel, Heavy Diesel Fuel

email_chain.subject: Transport Inquiry for Used Machinery from Antwerp to Kocaeli
email_chain.body: Hi Jonah, We have some pallets of used machinery available for transport from Antwerp to Kocaeli. Could you please provide your best dispatch rate for this load? Regards, Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Inquiry for Used Machinery from Antwerp to Kocaeli
email_chain.body: Hello Max, We have received your query. Unfortunately, 24/7 Cargo Service specializes in live cargo and does not handle shipments of used machinery. However, you may want to check out http://www.truckplanet.com, which lists companies that could assist in your specific transport needs. We are here to help with any other transportation inquiries. Kind Regards, Nick

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Estimate from Incheon to Selcuk
email_chain.body: Please help! I have a heavy load, approximately 50000 kg, that I need to ship. The cargo details are as follows: General cargo, weight: 50,000 kg, length: 25 meters, width: 2.3 meters. Originating from Incheon, South Korea with the destination in Selcuk, Turkey. Could you please provide me with a shipment estimate? Thank you! Regards, Kim

email_chain.subject: Transport Inquiry for Used Printing Machines
email_chain.body: Hi Jonah, We are planning to move our used printing machines and would like to inquire if 24/7 Cargo Service can handle the job for us. Regards, Johny

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Inquiry for Used Printing Machines
email_chain.body: Hi Jonah, Thank you very much for your response. I don't have all the required documents at the moment but I will procure them shortly and pass them on to you. Thanks again for your time. Regards, Johny

email_chain.subject: Final Document Submission and Job Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Jonah, We have now obtained all necessary documents and are prepping the cargo for dispatch. Please confirm if your schedule still allows you to handle this shipment for us. Kind regards, Johny

email_chain.subject: Arrival and Loading Details Needed for Fish Feed Shipment
email_chain.body: Mr. Potter, your order for 1,500MT of fish feed has arrived, and we are preparing for loading at Shah Deniz. Please release an opening POI to load an ocean vessel for Tanjung Priok by 2 PM today, with an estimated loading time of June 5. Kindly send the details of the POI and the loading schedule as soon as possible. Thank you, Frank.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: POI Required for Fish Feed Loading
email_chain.body: Dear Frank, I was expecting the POI details from you by now for our fish feed shipment. We're on a tight schedule. Please send the POI and confirm the estimated loading time by 10 PM today. If we do not receive it, we will have to opt for our backup option and proceed with loading at South Changjiang. Thank you, Yan

email_chain.subject: Change of Loading Arrangement Due to Freight Rates
email_chain.body: Dear Frank, We appreciate your patience while we worked on securing a suitable vessel. Due to elevated ocean freight rates, it is now more cost-effective to send the fish feed by LCL. Can you accommodate a pickup of the 1,500 MT of fish feed at your warehouse tomorrow? Please release the opening POI to our driver no later than 2 PM tomorrow and advise on an estimated loading time. Should this not be feasible, we'll revert to loading at South Changjiang. Thank you, Yan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Bitumen Transport from Sohar to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Gray,

We are planning to ship 7,500MT of bitumen from Sohar to Dar es Salaam. Could you please share your earliest available loading window? Additionally, do you offer any incentives for early dispatch?

Regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Transport from Sohar to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Adam,

Thank you for your inquiry. The earliest available loading date we can offer is Sunday, July 17th. Please confirm if this date works for you or if you have any specific preferences regarding the departure. We can discuss potential discounts once we finalize the logistics details.

Regards,
Ms. Gray

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Bitumen Transport from Sohar to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Good evening Ms. Gray,

Thank you for your prompt response. We are quite flexible regarding the departure date, but I am curious about how your team handles unforeseen circumstances especially once the shipment reaches Dar es Salaam. Could you provide information on this?

Kind regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Availability Confirmation Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Chris,

Please confirm: is your vessel available to lift 5,000MT of jet fuel from Panama to Sao Paulo in early July?

Yours sincerely,
Joanne

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Charter and Coordination Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Joanne,

Thank you for your swift response. My charter is finalized and now I need to make some arrangements. Could you please send me the name, office number, and email address of the person responsible for coordinating this job? Also, please confirm that these dates are available and can be held.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Yours sincerely,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Waiting for Response
email_chain.body:
Hello Joanne,

I am still awaiting your response to my previous request. My charter was confirmed, and I am in a position to book a lift and send a USD$1,000,000 Letter of Credit. Could you kindly confirm when you can reply and provide your contact details so I may reach your office?

Yours sincerely,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Action on Charter Party
email_chain.body:
Hello Chris,

Thank you for reaching out. I must clarify that as the vessel coordinator at Clever Cargo, I only manage cargo bookings. Please send the Charter Party notice for lifting 5,000MT of jet fuel as per your earlier request. The vessel assigned will be the U5 Okaloosa.

Yours sincerely,
Joanne

email_chain.subject: Charterer's Notice Sent and Inquiry About the Lifting Process
email_chain.body:
Hello Joanne,

Thank you for your prompt response. I have sent the Charterer's Notice for the five thousand tons of jet fuel. Could you confirm whether the lifting process is already underway and if your company will deliver it to the bunkering terminal in Bahia?

Yours sincerely,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel and Cargo Handling
email_chain.body:
Hello Chris,

Thank you for your email. The vessel U5 Okaloosa is currently in Trinidad but is being rerouted to Brazil as soon as possible to manage your cargo of jet fuel. You will be updated accordingly regarding the details of the lifting process.

Yours sincerely,
Joanne

email_chain.subject: Order Placement - 5,000MT of Grapes from Trieste to Panama
email_chain.body: Hi John, The deal was for 5,000MT of grapes from Trieste to Panama. We would like to place the order ASAP. Could you let me know if you can accommodate it? Sincerely, Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Order Placement - 5,000MT of Grapes from Trieste to Panama
email_chain.body: Hi Victor, I apologize for the delay in replying. I received your message several days ago but misplaced it. Regarding your question about pricing, is 3,000MT the best price we've discussed? Please confirm so we can proceed with the payment modes and other details. Looking forward to your prompt response. Sincerely, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment and Delivery Details
email_chain.body: John, I am in New York now and able to make the payment through a bank transfer. If you can arrange for the delivery of the grapes within 10 days of receiving the funds, we can finalize the deal. Also, to clarify, do you mean whether the quantity should be 3,000MT as discussed or the originally stated 5,000MT? Please let me know so we can proceed. Victor

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: Cargo Shipping from Kuala Lumpur to Batumi
email_chain.body:
Hello Douglas, 

Please arrange for a carrier to contact me concerning a quote for round-trip steamship cargo transport from Kuala Lumpur to Batumi. It is crucial to complete and finalize the booking by Friday to prevent incurring demurrage charges.

Regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Cargo Shipping from Kuala Lumpur to Batumi
email_chain.body:
Dear Matt, 

Thank you for reaching out with your shipping requirement. To provide you with an accurate quote, could you please provide further details about the shipment? We would need to know the commodity type, quantity, dimensions, type of container required, the loading port details, your preferred delivery port, and estimated time of arrival in Batumi.

Once we receive this information, we will proceed to offer a detailed quote. Expect our response within the next 1-2 working days.

Regards,
Douglas

email_chain.subject: Shipments Details for Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hi Douglas, 

Thank you for your prompt response. Please confirm that the commodities we wish to transport meet all regulatory requirements for sea transport. We are aware of certain restrictions related to items like firearms and animal-based products. I will await your advice on this matter and expect the respective proforma invoice for further processing.

Kind regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Approval and Proforma Invoice Preparation
email_chain.body:
Dear Matt,

We have reviewed your commodities and can confirm that they are permissible for sea transportation. Our representative is currently working on finalizing the booking details. We will send you a proforma invoice shortly. Please note that this invoice does not represent the final confirmation of your shipment and will require a signed confirmation to proceed.

Looking forward to your swift response.

Kind regards,
Douglas

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Fertilizer Shipment from Adana to Damascus
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Day, Thank you for your time today. We are excited to inform you that we are ready to purchase 2,000MT of fertilizer for shipment from Adana to Damascus. We need these goods shipped by May 20th. Could you please confirm this arrangement and let us know if you have available space on this route? We would like to begin preparing the customs paperwork tomorrow. My boss has mentioned your outstanding reputation for timely deliveries. You can contact us via email at operations@example.com or call our booking office at 01-456-234. Your assistance is greatly appreciated. Regards, [Signature]

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping from Adana to Damascus - Port Clarification Needed
email_chain.body: Hello, I need clarification regarding the port of discharge; are we using Homs as previously discussed? Utilising Tarsus will incur additional expenses and require subcontracting. The subcontractor at Tarsus is awaiting your confirmation to proceed, as they already hold necessary paperwork. Please confirm as soon as possible. Thank you. Best, Mr. Day

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Smaller Purchase of Fertilizer Through Adana
email_chain.body: Hey Mr. Day, I'm looking to purchase 50MT of fertilizer to be sent from Adana to Damascus. Can you confirm if the transaction could still proceed through your office in Adana, given that all the FCA warehouses are reportedly closed? Thank you, [Signature]

email_chain.subject: Daily Order Finalization and Confirmation Required
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Day, As part of my daily order finalization, I need to confirm the status of an upcoming shipment. We have planned for 5,000MT of fertilizer to be delivered from our local warehouse to our designated warehouse in Adana during the next 10 days. Could you please confirm if such arrangements are in place? Regards, [Signature]

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Status Request for 10,000 MT Daily Order Through Adana
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Day, We urgently require the current status for the 10,000 MT of fertilizer order we recently placed through Adana. Your prompt response would be much appreciated to facilitate our planning. Sincerely, [Signature]

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Required for Fertilizer Delivery from Local Warehouse
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Day, Could you please confirm the receipt and correct delivery of 5,000 MT of fertilizer that was supposed to be dispatched from a local warehouse to Adana as per our recent arrangement? Looking forward to your confirmation. Regards, [Signature]

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

How are you doing? I would appreciate your assistance with arranging freight from Taiwan to Chennai. Please let me know the necessary steps or details required to proceed.

Kind regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I apologize for the inconvenience caused. I acknowledge the issues in my previous response and understand the frustration it must have caused. It seems there was a misunderstanding regarding the requirements and account status, which led to delays. Moving forward, I will ensure a more prompt and precise handling of your requests. Thank you for your patience, and I look forward to resolving this efficiently.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rate Estimate – Anhydrous Ammonia
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moreau,

Please provide me with a rate estimate for shipping 3,700MT of anhydrous ammonia from Galveston to Seville, with a delivery target by the end of August. Could you also include your standard demurrage charge in the quote? Thank you.

Best regards,
Darren Walters

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rate Estimate – Anhydrous Ammonia
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Walters,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can arrange for the cargo to be transported by air from Galveston to Seville. The next available service departs on the 1st of September. Our standard demurrage charge for the shipment of 3,700MT is $1,950.00. Could you please confirm if this is within your budget?

Best regards,
Joshua Moreau

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rate Estimate – Anhydrous Ammonia
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moreau,

Thank you for your rate estimation. My budget is slightly tighter at $2,200.00, and thus, your quote is just over. I may need to explore other options to find a better fit within my financial limits.

Regards,
Darren

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on FOB Basis for Die Cast Tooling Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Taylor, Could you provide your insights on whether an FOB basis would be suitable for shipping 3,000MT of die cast tooling from Shenzhen to Yangon? Best, Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on FOB Basis for Die Cast Tooling Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Andrew, Thank you for your email. Given the high shipping costs from Shenzhen, I would recommend another option however, I'm open to discussion. Could we schedule a call to discuss this further? Best, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on FOB Basis for Die Cast Tooling Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, I appreciate your quick response. Could we possibly have a conference call today to go over the details? Regards, Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on FOB Basis for Die Cast Tooling Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Andrew, Apologies, but I am unable to have a call today. However, I can arrange for my team to assist you. Do you have any specific questions that they could address in the meantime? Best, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on FOB Basis for Die Cast Tooling Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Laura, Could someone from your team help me understand the implications of using FOB for my project? Regards, Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on FOB Basis for Die Cast Tooling Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Andrew, Regrettably, I'm tied up this week but I'd be glad to connect you with someone in our accounting department who can provide detailed assistance on your enquiry. Best, Laura

email_chain.subject: Invoice Clarification and Payment Terms Extension
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, I have a specific question about the invoice I sent you. Specifically, I would like to confirm the possibility of extending the payment terms and request the required bank details for the transaction. Regards, Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice Clarification and Payment Terms Extension
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Andrew, Thanks for your note, and I'm happy to assist you. The current payment terms are standard practice between Shenzhen and Yangon; however, terms are typically not extended as most of our clients remit payment upon delivery. Enclosed are our bank details for your reference. Best, Laura

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Quote Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear John, I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out to discuss the shipping requirements for your new cargo from Tacoma to Singapore. Could you please confirm the cargo size and desired shipping dates? Also, please inform if there are specific terms (Incoterms) we should adhere to. Best regards, Sarah Brown

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Sarah, Thanks for your prompt response. We're looking to ship 5000 metric tons under DAP terms, sometime in early April. Please proceed with acquiring the necessary vessel options and an initial freight quote. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Vessel and Freight Quote Details
email_chain.body: Hi John, I've found a suitable vessel, the SS Mercantile, with adequate capacity and a DWT of 10,000 tons. The LOA is 150 meters. The initial freight quote for this undertaking, in USD, is approximately $75,000. Let's discuss this further if needed. Regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Crosby, We’ve been discussing shipping rates for 1,300MT of sprays from Port Sudan to Jebel Ali. Can you please provide a specific quote now? Thank you. Regards, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Freight Booking Inquiry
email_chain.body: Please can you get me a quote for 1,300MT sprays from Port Sudan to Jebel Ali as soon as possible? We are ready to proceed as soon as the rates are confirmed. Thank you, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Booking
email_chain.body: We really do need to get our freight booked now to stay on schedule. Can you please ensure your rates are updated and sent to us as soon as possible? Thanks, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Stainless Steel Delivery Requirement
email_chain.body: Mr. Cai, We have recently received a shipment of 1000 tons of cold rolled stainless steel. Our client requires immediate delivery and has provided a storage location in Wuhan for use by major international operators. We are seeking your assistance, either to accommodate this requirement directly or to refer us to another nearby operator with available capacity. Please advise at your earliest convenience. Many thanks, Lukas August

email_chain.subject: Re: Stainless Steel Delivery Requirement
email_chain.body: Hi Lukas, Thanks for reaching out. We are able to accommodate your client's requirement and can provide a suitable location for the stainless steel near Wuhan. Can you please confirm the details - is it indeed 1000MT of stainless steel? Also, when is it expected to arrive at our terminal? Looking forward to your response. Regards, Zhou Xiao

email_chain.subject: Re: Stainless Steel Delivery Requirement
email_chain.body: Hi Zhou Xiao, Thank you for your swift response. Yes, the cargo is 1000MT of stainless steel. It has just arrived in Shanghai and has been cleared through customs. We are arranging for a crane to transfer it from the port and can store it in our Shanghai warehouse for a week. This will give us some time to prepare for its further transportation to Wuhan. Please let us know if there are any specific requirements or preparations needed on your end. Regards, Lukas August

email_chain.subject: Request for Proforma Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Hello Frank,

We have a shipment of palletised pork meat scheduled for Sri Lanka during the week of July 11-15. Could you please provide us with your bill of lading proforma?

Thank you,
Seema

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Proforma Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Dear Seema,

Thank you for your inquiry. Our goods are ready for pick up by the shipping line. Are you interested in discussing bulk buying options for future transactions?

Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Proforma Bill of Lading
email_chain.body:
Hi Frank,

Thank you for the prompt response. We are indeed interested in bulk buying. Could you please let us know the price per unit?

Regards,
Seema

email_chain.subject: Bulk Purchase Pricing Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Seema,

Thanks for your interest in bulk purchasing. We are delighted to accept your order. Could you please let us know your preferred dispatch date for the goods?

Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Crude Palm Oil Shipment ETA and Charges
email_chain.body:
Dear Capt. Hu,

We are organizing the shipment of 12,300MT of crude palm oil from Tanjung. We plan to initiate loading next week and aim for an ETA in the last week of February at the discharge port. Could you please provide your freight charges for this operation? Additionally, do you impose any fees for late boarding?

Please also provide alternative options in case our desired timing is unfeasible.

Looking forward to your prompt response. If we do not hear back, we will attempt to reach you by phone in 48 hours increments and follow-up with emails.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Operations, ShippingCo

email_chain.subject: Concern for Previous Passenger's Safety
email_chain.body:
Hi Capt. Hu,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm inquiring about the condition of your last passenger to ensure he reached his destination safely and is in good health. If he is well, I would like to assist him financially.

Could you please confirm his conditions and let us know if there is an appropriate way to send financial aid?

We will follow up with additional calls and emails every 48 hours until we receive a confirmation from your side.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Best regards,
[Your Name, Operations, ShippingCo]

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about FOB Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Ken, We were recently contacted by one of your previous customers concerning their past experiences with FOB shipments. We've prepared a short report which is attached to this email. Please review it at your convenience. Should you need more information or have any queries, feel free to contact me. Warm regards, Anja

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about FOB Shipments
email_chain.body: Hello Anja, I've reviewed your email and attachment regarding the FOB shipments. However, I must clarify that we have never been contacted by the customer you mentioned about our past FOB shipments. Thus, I am puzzled by the receipt of the report. While I appreciate your efforts, I recommend clarifying the facts before presenting such reports. Also, our company policy ensures that all cargo, regardless of the shipping method, is fully insured for its full value before leaving our facility. Regards, Ken

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed: FOB Shipments Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Ken, Thanks for your response. I understand your concern about the contact from your past customer; evidently, there seems to be a misunderstanding or miscommunication on our part. I'm trying to verify the sources and will get back to you with precise information. Meanwhile, can you provide any specific details about your policy on insurance for shipments, which might clarify the misunderstanding? Warm regards, Anja

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Needed: FOB Shipments Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Anja, Thank you for looking into the matter. As for the insurance, all our shipments, including FOB, are fully covered for the complete value by our insurers once they are dispatched from our warehouse. This standard policy aids in preventing any potential shipment or transit issues. I hope this information is useful to your report. Best, Ken

email_chain.subject: Final Clarification: FOB Shipments
email_chain.body: Hello Ken, Thank you for your detailed explanation regarding the insurance policy. It definitely clears up a lot of confusion. I will revise our records and ensure our report accurately reflects the information you provided. Please expect an updated version soon. I appreciate your cooperation and patience in this matter. Warm regards, Anja

email_chain.subject: Port Closure Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Emily, I was wondering if you have any updates about the port closures scheduled for Wednesday. Do you know if the schedule will be shifted to Friday? Kind regards, Robin

email_chain.subject: Additional Inquiries
email_chain.body: Additionally, could you provide an update on how the test case with Rojana is progressing? Is it related to funding issues or documentation requirements? Lastly, I noticed a new tag with the title 'What is it?' on the front page. Could you clarify what that entails? Thanks, Robin

email_chain.subject: Meeting Availability Request
email_chain.body: When will you be available for a meeting concerning lab tests? The complexity of these tests necessitates lab runs, which can take extensive hours and occasionally require third-party lab collaborations.

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Availability Request
email_chain.body: I've reviewed your email regarding the lab tests. I've alerted the department heads about the test requirements and timelines. Preparations are underway.

email_chain.subject: Quality Review and Corrective Actions Required
email_chain.body: I reviewed the recent batch from our supplier analyzed last Friday. The quality did not meet our standards, leading to non-approval. Corrective actions by the supplier are expected within a week before resubmission for approval. It's crucial these actions are implemented correctly and results are evident.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Quality Issues with Current Supplier
email_chain.body: Following a quality review, it is evident that ongoing issues with the supplied product have persisted since inception. Historical reviews indicate consistent defects. The supplier lacks documented process controls, which is a critical non-compliance with our standards. This needs immediate rectification, and I urge you to prepare for comprehensive discussions to address these issues.

email_chain.subject: Discharge List for PS Irene
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Taylor,

The list of discharged cargo under PS Irene is attached. As per the instructions, we need the discharge station to clear all imported goods by 5/31/2017. I expect this document will be received on or before 5/28/2017. Please use LOI 1001191957 attached for any necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Mailing List Management
email_chain.body:
To unsubscribe from this list, please send an email to sos_gmail.com with the subject 'unsubscribe-726bdfae37901baa15d8f25c9bf8f11dfece87ad'.

To send a message to the list for all subscribers, email sos-gmail.com.

To start receiving emails from this list, please subscribe here.

You may also visit https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?tab=rm#inbox for options to manage your subscription.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sail Schedule from Guangzhou to Hong Kong
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Zhao,

I am looking for a sailing option from Guangzhou to Hong Kong with a duration of 3-4 weeks. Do you have any departures available before the 22nd that go to Hong Kong? Thank you.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Introduction to Our Company and Projects
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

At our company, we pride ourselves on our values of sincerity, loyalty, honor, hard work, and professionalism. We maintain long-term business relationships with top Fortune 500 companies across America, Europe, China, Asia, and the Middle East, focusing on EPC projects such as Airports, Power Plants, Steel Plants, and Port projects. We also have significant projects concerning Indian real estate and are affiliated with high-profile developers. We would be delighted to have you aboard and earn your trust as a business partner. Please feel free to learn more about us.

Best regards,
Kalavathi Kalvathy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Manufacturer or Supplier Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kang,

Thank you very much for providing the specification sheet for the heat exchangers. It assists us greatly in narrowing the field of potential suppliers for our project. Could you please clarify whether your company acts as the manufacturer or merely the supplier of these units? Additionally, if possible, could you provide further contact details and best times to reach your assistants by phone?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Yours sincerely,
XYZ Project Manager

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Visiting Our Website
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Thank you for visiting our website. Your inquiries via email are welcomed, and we strive to respond as promptly as possible. We are committed to providing competitive prices and top-quality products and services globally, with many years of cooperation with well-known European and American enterprises. Soon, we will update our website with a detailed price list. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or suggestions on how we might improve our business.

Best regards,
XYZ Technical Manager

email_chain.subject: Refrigeration Unit Supply Capabilities
email_chain.body:
Dear Client,

I am pleased to know of your interest in acquiring refrigeration units as seen from your email. As a supplier, we provide a variety of brands, with a capacity to produce over 40,000 units per year tailored for large retail operations. Please feel free to contact me to discuss your requirements or to place an order.

Sincerely yours,
Supplier Representative

email_chain.subject: Offering Comprehensive Printing Solutions
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope this message finds you well. As featured on http://www.globalmarketing.org/, our company provides a complete range of printing solutions, including color printers and personalized business cards, letterheads, and envelopes, suitable for all your sales, marketing, and printing needs. Please contact us to learn more about our products and services.

Best regards,
Service Representative

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Generators and Possible Electrical Work
email_chain.body:
Hey Arjun,

I have a new project where we’re going to need a 4000kVA high-power generator, with a 150kVA low-power generator. Can you provide some ballpark pricing estimates, or refer me to a competent electrician?

Best,
Vlad

email_chain.subject: Appreciation and Further Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Vlad,

Arjun, you are a god among men! Two generators, 4000kVA and 150kVA? And you also built our backyard garden pond – I can’t believe how professional and clean your work is.

May I ask if your company also takes on commercial projects? Can you send me some reference projects? We're interested in the industrial, power, and commercial projects you’ve worked on.

Best,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Request for Detailed Pricing Spreadsheet
email_chain.body:
Hi Arjun,

I need a comprehensive spreadsheet with pricing for various power and industrial projects, with a detailed cost breakdown including materials and labor. I’ll need a completely separate sheet for each project, as we are handling multiple projects separately to avoid the confusion we experienced with our last few projects. Previously, mixing materials and labor costs led to overinflated estimates, and I want to ensure we avoid this moving forward. The prices should be straightforward, just the overall cost for each project.

Best,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Change of Service Provider
email_chain.body:
Sorry, Arjun.

I really appreciate your project work, but the prices for the last two projects were not satisfactory. Therefore, I’ve decided to switch the electrical services provider. It was a difficult decision, but I believe it is necessary. Please understand this is not a reflection on the quality of your work but rather a financial decision.

Best,
Vladimir

email_chain.subject: Apology and Explanation
email_chain.body:
Hi Vladimir,

Sorry for the brief and delayed responses. Our company, ProjectPlex, has been growing rapidly and has faced some personal challenges recently, which made it difficult to keep up. A few years back, I had a complicated dental procedure and some personal financial issues that affected my ability to respond promptly. I’ve done my best to manage these issues, and I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. I hope we can continue our working relationship and that I can rectify the situation with better service and attention moving forward.

Best,
Arjun Singh

email_chain.subject: Offer for Paraffin Wax under FOB Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Tommy,

Please let me know if you can accept this offer for paraffin wax. I am willing to offer this under FOB terms with a freight cost of USD 1700 per TEU. We are prepared to deliver your commodities as soon as possible. Please feel free to share any further comments and I hope to receive your response soon.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Yi Seo

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for API Solvent 70% under CIF Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi,

We have reviewed the CIF terms you offered for API Solvent 70%. We appreciate your support in this inquiry. Our buyer has finalized the purchase order, placing an order for 6,000MTs to be transported via ocean freight to Colombia. The details are as follows:

- Quantity: 6,000MTs
- Shipping Port: Whangodeoku
- Destination Port: Colombia
- Packing: Bags of 210kg (approximately 2 bags per carton)
- Payment: 50% L/C at sight and 50% L/C against B/L

We will soon release a Blanket order to VCI and will send you copies in due course.

Best Regards,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Approval for Supply of Styrene Dimer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Yu,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the supply of 7000MT of Styrene Dimer to South America. I am pleased to inform you that your request has been approved. We have finalized the payment and offer terms for the supply contract. Below are the details:

- Product Type: Styrene Dimer
- Quantity: 7,000MTs
- Destination Port: South America
- Packing: Standard Market Packaging
- We ensure the quality and satisfaction with our product, pricing, freight, and other terms.

Best Regards,
Yi Seo

labels.commodity: Multiple commodities including Styrene Dimer and API Solvent 70%

email_chain.subject: Urgent Freight Quote Needed: Styrene from Mersin to Puerto Rico
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Jones,

I hope this message finds you well. Could you please provide us with an accurate freight quote for transporting 8,000MT of styrene resin from Mersin to Puerto Rico? We need the delivery to be completed this week. If you are unable to handle this schedule, please let us know promptly so we can consider rerouting to Valletta instead.

Many thanks,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Quote Needed: Styrene from Mersin to Puerto Rico
email_chain.body:
Dear Anna,

Thank you for reaching out. I am pleased to confirm that we can manage the shipment of your styrene resin this week as per your requirements for Puerto Rico. To proceed, please let me know if you prefer to consolidate the freight quote into a single invoice for easier electronic transfer, rather than handling cash payments at the port which might delay or complicate the process.

Our schedule is open from this Wednesday onwards; let us know when it is convenient for you. Could you please also provide the necessary documentation required for the shipment?

Looking forward to your prompt response.
Best regards,
Mr. Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Freight Quote Needed: Styrene from Mersin to Puerto Rico
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Jones,

Thanks for your quick response. That sounds great, and yes, we would prefer a consolidated freight quote for an electronic transfer to finalize the order. I'll send over the necessary documents by the end of today. Please let us know the final details so we can arrange the wire transfer accordingly.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Transport Requirement Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Luis, Can your vessel load 30,000MT of sesame oil from Nanjing to Guangzhou by early June? We need two 40-ft reefer containers to go to Hamburg and Lisbon respectively. Please let us know if this is possible, and with what kind of demurrage conditions do you prefer? Thank you, Heike

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Requirement Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Heike, Our vessel sailing schedules are as follows: Shanghai South departs on June 17, Shanghai North on June 19, Nanjing East on June 17, Nanjing West on June 19, Ningbo East on June 17, Ningbo West on June 19, Xiamen on June 17, Fuzhou on June 17. Kind regards, Luis

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Requirement Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Ms Heike, Thank you for your kind reminder. Kindly be advised that the berths you requested are available on June 7. If your plan is still the same, please kindly notify us to proceed with the booking of the two reefer containers. We are expecting your confirmation letter. Yours sincerely, CC Zhang, Marlin

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Requirement Confirmation
email_chain.body: Dear Ms Zhang, Thank you for your confirmation. We are sending the confirmation letter today, and we will make the necessary arrangements. Kind regards, Heike

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Receipt
email_chain.body: Dear Ms Heike, This is to confirm that the confirmation letter has been received. Yours sincerely, CC Zhang

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Molasses Shipment from Shanghai to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Nguyen,

We are planning a charter of 5,400MT of molasses from Shanghai to Rio de Janeiro. Could you please let us know if your available laycan dates are suitable for us, and your daily charter rate? Thank you.

Yours sincerely,
Fabio

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Molasses Shipment from Shanghai to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sousa,

Thank you for your mail. We are indeed able to accommodate your shipment of molasses. For a 12-day transit from Shanghai to Rio de Janeiro, our freight rate is USD 6.00 per MT. Please note this rate is on an FOB basis and does not include additional charges such as loading, discharge, and health certificate fees, among others. We would be happy to discuss these further if you are interested.

Could you please provide your opinion on this? Thank you.

Yours sincerely,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Molasses Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sousa,

Thank you for your message. I would be delighted to assist with your molasses cargo. Could you please provide the contact details of your carrier, along with the shipment date and delivery location? This information will allow us to coordinate effectively.

Yours sincerely,
Siva

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Molasses Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Krishnan,

Thank you for your reply. The vessel we plan to use is the SS Ocean Carrier, owned by Global Shipping Ltd. The estimated shipment date is November 2, and the delivery location is Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. We appreciate your willingness to assist with this shipment.

Yours sincerely,
Fabio

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Molasses Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Sousa,

Thank you for providing the vessel details. SS Ocean Carrier is a Handymax vessel capable of carrying 40,000 DWT of general cargo. It usually completes voyages from Shanghai to Rio de Janeiro in about 30 days. I will confirm the shipment details and see if this vessel meets all our requirements.

Could you confirm if the shipment date and other details are correct? Thank you.

Yours sincerely,
Siva

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Tank Barge Availability for Hazchem Load
email_chain.body:
Hello Patrick,

I was wondering if you had a tank barge available that we could use for a shipment of 4,200MT of hazardous chemicals from Luanda to Loango. It's an unverified ship-to-shore delivery to a beach. If possible, I would also like to receive some progress photos throughout the transit. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Tank Barge Availability for Hazchem Load
email_chain.body:
Hi Scott,

We are currently exploring options for your shipment. We have not yet found a suitable carrier but are actively looking. I will keep you updated as soon as we find an appropriate vessel.

Best,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Scott,

Finding a suitable vessel for your needs is proving challenging. We are still reviewing our available fleet. I found 5 tank barges which I'm currently evaluating. Rest assured, I'll get back to you promptly once I pinpoint a vessel that meets the cargo requirements and is fit for the voyage.

Vessel Specifications (partial):
- Type: Tank/Grabs
- Design: 3x Cargo Tanks - PD 26/24
- Tonnage: 110,000 GRT
- Length: 106.67 m
- Beam: 19.4 m
- Depth: 8.8 m
- Tank Type: Partially Discharge
- Tank Capacity: 750,000 bbl
- Reference No: 13048528

Best regards,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Thanks Patrick,

I appreciate your efforts in finding a feasible option. Please keep me posted as we are keen to finalize this as soon as a suitable barge is identified. Looking to carry on this discussion and settle the finer details once we have a solid plan.

Best,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Tank Barge Charter
email_chain.body:
Hi Scott,

Good news! We have a barge available that matches your requirements. Before we proceed, we need to discuss rates and contractual terms. Could you please prepare and send over the contract with terms and conditions at your earliest convenience?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote [Hamburg to Casablanca]
email_chain.body:
Hi Andre,

I’d like to arrange the shipment of 9,000MT of rapeseed oil from Hamburg to Casablanca. Could you please send me a freight quote? Additionally, the earliest demurrage would be $15k under our usual terms.

Cheers,
Seamus

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote [Hamburg to Casablanca]
email_chain.body:
Hi Seamus,

Thank you for your request. I can extend the demurrage terms as needed. The ship is available to leave in two weeks, please confirm if this works for you.

Thanks,
Andre

email_chain.subject: RE: Request for Freight Quote [Hamburg to Casablanca]
email_chain.body:
Andre,

Thanks for the update. My ship's due in the next two days; we can demur for the full 21 days and ship in 15 days. Please quote this rate.

Best,
Seamus

email_chain.subject: Shipping Confirmation and Document Preparation
email_chain.body:
Hi Seamus,

We can ship your product at the previously discussed rate. Please ensure that the purchase order or other necessary documents are ready by Friday.

Thanks,
Andre

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Documents and Terms
email_chain.body:
Andre,

I've received the docs back from my team. We will proceed with our usual terms and conditions. Please confirm if this works on your end.

Regards,
Seamus

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Cargo Forwarding Agreement with Kenya Airways
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Howell,

Do you have an agreement with Kenya Airways for forwarding cargo between Nairobi and Houston? If so, could you please confirm the terms?

Kind regards,
Petra

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Cargo Forwarding Agreement with Kenya Airways
email_chain.body:
Hi Petra,

We do not have any agreement with Kenya Airways for forwarding cargo between Nairobi and Houston.

Thanks and Regards,
Marjorie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Hot-Rolled Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Fitzgerald,

We’d like to ship 18,000MT of hot-rolled steel coils from Ambarava to Lima. Could you please advise on the best method? We are considering either chartering a ship or containerized shipping, whichever is more feasible.

Best regards,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Hot-Rolled Steel Coils
email_chain.body:
Hello again Ashley,

Thank you for your email. To assist you better, could you confirm whether you are looking to charter a full vessel or you prefer containerized shipping? I can provide options and quotes for both methods once I have this detail.

Best regards,
Ash

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment from Sohar to Khorroq
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Munger, We are looking to move 10,000MT of fertilizer from Sohar to Khorroq in mid-August. Could you please share your earliest available loading window and let us know if you offer any dispatch incentives? Regards, Roxanne

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment from Sohar to Khorroq
email_chain.body: Hi Roxanne, Apologies for the delay. The earliest loading window available would be 17-20 August. Yes, we offer the following incentives: 5% discount for USD Bill of Lading and FOB Document, USD 100/ton Hailine Discount, and Free Rolling. Best Regards, Your AG Partner

email_chain.subject: Request for Fertilizer Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Roxanne, We are looking to purchase the following types of fertilizer: Bulk 800 MT with a 15% physical delay, DAP FOB 320 MT, MAP 160 MT, MOP 200 MT, MKP 120 MT, DAP 200 MT. We are aware of the 5% discount for USD Bill of Lading and FOB Document. Could you please provide us with your offer and available loading windows? Regards, [Manager]

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Fertilizer Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear [Manager], I have forwarded your request to [Email 3]. Below are the details of the offer for your review: Bulk 800 MT with a 15% physical delay, DAP FOB 320 MT, MAP 160 MT, MOP 200 MT, MKP 120 MT, DAP 200 MT, with a 5% discount for USD Bill of Lading and FOB Document. Kindly confirm whether these meet your requirements. Best Regards, Your AG Partner

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Estimate: Antwerp to Beirut
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Rodrigues,

My name is Anton, and I represent a major mining company. We need to move 2,000MT of diamonds from Antwerp to Beirut, aiming for an arrival date of 1st of June and a departure on the 1st of August. Could you please provide us with a shipping estimate and potential schedule?

Regards,
Anton

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Shipping Estimate Request for 2,000MT of Diamonds
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Rodrigues,

I'm following up on my previous email regarding our requirement to ship 2,000MT of diamonds from Antwerp to Beirut. We would appreciate it if you could provide us with the requested shipping estimate and schedule at your earliest convenience.

Thanks,
Anton

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Estimate and Schedule Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Rodrigues,

I am reaching out again to request a shipping estimate and a confirmed schedule for transporting 2,000MT of diamonds. We are targeting the specified dates from Antwerp to Beirut and your assistance in this matter would be highly valued.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Anton

email_chain.subject: Re: interested in 3,700MT of paraffin wax
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,
Thank you for letting us know about the delay. We're in touch with our business partner now.
Regards,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: interested in 3,700MT of paraffin wax
email_chain.body:
Hi Tommy,
I've already asked our Kaohsiung representative to look after it. I'm not sure about the delay, but I'll send you an update after a week.
Regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: interested in 3,700MT of paraffin wax
email_chain.body:
Hi Tommy,
The delay should be resolved. I'll ask our representative in Kaohsiung to follow up on it.
Regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: Re: interested in 3,700MT of paraffin wax
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,
Our Kaohsiung representative has just sent me the news of the cargo; it's 3,600MT.
