Tommy

email_chain.subject: Quotation Request for Pencil Lead Shipment from Bandung to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Dear Madam Manager,

I am requesting a quotation for the shipment of 1,800MT of pencil lead from Bandung to Sao Paulo. Please provide the sea rates, lead times, the value of the cargo for insurance purposes in Brazil, and quote on an FOB basis.

Thank you for your kind consideration,
James

email_chain.subject: Quotation Request for Black Bricks Shipment from São Paulo to Bandung
email_chain.body:
Dear Madam Manager,

I am requesting a quotation for the shipment of 2,000MT of black bricks from São Paulo to Bandung. Please provide the sea rates, lead times, the value of the cargo for insurance purposes in Indonesia, and quote on an FOB basis.

Thank you for your kind consideration,
James

email_chain.subject: Quotation Request for Ropes Shipment from Santos to Guangzhou
email_chain.body:
Dear Madam Manager,

I am requesting a quotation for the shipment of 10,000MT of ropes from Santos to Guangzhou. Please provide the sea rates, lead times, the value of the cargo for insurance purposes in China, and quote on an FOB basis.

Thank you for your kind consideration,
James

email_chain.subject: Proposal to Consolidate Your Account
email_chain.body: I'd like to consolidate your account with Mineshaft Logistics. Do you think we could handle your cargo more efficiently than your current process? Best, Matthew

email_chain.subject: Issue with Received Shipment
email_chain.body: To our valued customer, we've received your shipment and encountered an issue that might impact the handling. I believe we can manage this process more effectively. Could you provide your feedback on this matter? Best, Matthew

email_chain.subject: Cargo, dates and info
email_chain.body: Dear Aula, We are looking to export 250 tons of chemicals from Bremen to Dingle, Ireland. Could you share your freight rates considering flexible arrival dates and a route from Bremen, Germany, rather than from Norway? Please let me know if additional details about the cargo are needed. Thank you for your cooperation. Best regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo, dates and info
email_chain.body: Dear Jonas, Thank you for your inquiry about exporting 250 tons of chemicals. We did not receive any further details about your needs since your last email. Could you please provide information regarding the House of Use (HOU) including the loading port, House Goods Delivered (HGD) for the destination port, and House Cargo Terms (HCT) which include payment terms and the quantity specifics? Looking forward to your response. Best regards, David from ABF Forwarding Limited.

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo, dates and info
email_chain.body: Dear David, Thank you for the clarification request. Regarding the shipping from Bremen to Dingle, I confirm the cargo details as 250 tons of chemicals. The preferred loading point is Bremen and the destination is Dingle, Ireland. I am awaiting your cost estimate and vessel options that could be available by the end of October 2016. Kind regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Cargo shipping details
email_chain.body: Dear Jonas, The cargo can be loaded from Bremen and delivered to Dublin, Ireland, transitioning in Dingle as needed. We can provide a vessel available to sail around the end of November 2016. The initial freight quote is $80 per ton. Please confirm if this arrangement works for you, or if additional adjustments are needed. Regards, David

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipping Arrangements
email_chain.body: Dear David, Thank you for the detailed information. The shipping rate and schedule sound acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary bookings and keep me informed of any developments. Best regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Export Booking Enquiry for Vegetable Oil and Rice
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Newton,

I have 5,200MT of vegetable oil in Quanzhou, ready for export this week, and 9,600MT of rice in Xiamen, scheduled for export next week. I would like to arrange a shipping booking with your company. Could you please confirm the rate and the earliest available loading date?

Thank you,
Ella

email_chain.subject: Re: Export Booking Enquiry for Vegetable Oil and Rice
email_chain.body:
Dear Ella,

Thank you for your enquiry! We are delighted to assist you with your exports. Regarding your shipment of vegetable oil and rice, please visit our website at http://www.newtonshipping.com for the latest rates and booking procedures.

We look forward to handling your commodities and ensure the highest quality service. Should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Warm regards,
Customer Service
Newton Shipping Co.

email_chain.subject: Request for Rice Delivery Quotation to Iraq
email_chain.body:
Hi, good day!

We anticipate the need to deliver rice to Iraq and would be glad to receive your most competitive quotation for this service. Please send us your quote at your earliest convenience to info@smile.com.cn.

Thank you very much,
Smile LTD

email_chain.subject: Urgent Need for Vessel - Asphalt Shipment from Qinhuangdao to Adabiya
email_chain.body: We regret to inform you that we have not secured a shipping partner for your previous request. However, we currently have an 11,000MT shipment of asphalt preparing to load from Qinhuangdao destined for Fremantle. We can provide full details of the port, loading date, and times should you be interested. Please let us know at your earliest convenience. Have a great day.

email_chain.subject: Details for Asphalt Shipment Loading - Qinhuangdao to Adabiya
email_chain.body: Further to our search for a suitable shipment, we have an immediate need to dispatch 11,000MT of asphalt from Qinhuangdao to Adabiya. Your company's active BL PO from Qinhuangdao to Egypt, dated 17-04-2019, ensures you are well-placed to handle this consignment. If interested, we would like to discuss this opportunity in detail. We await your prompt response. Have a great day.

email_chain.subject: Container Specifications for Asphalt Shipment
email_chain.body:
I am currently coordinating an asphalt shipment from Qinhuangdao to Adabiya. I'd like to provide you with the container specifications for your review: 
- Total 330 containers
- Volumes: 285.70CBM, 249.69CBM, 223.00CBM, 197.32CBM, 171.64CBM, 146.00CBM (details per container group provided upon request).

email_chain.subject: Delivery Confirmation of DNP
email_chain.body:
Dear Ahmed,
This is to inform you that we can deliver 1,000 metric tons of IAEA classified DNP in DUM 250# drums, via truck and air. The exact number of drums, either 50 or 100, can be determined based on truck availability. We are planning for only 2-3 deliveries to transport the entire quantity. The offer for the full delivery will be available depending upon our logistical capabilities. The DUM is to be picked up by the customer or a third party, with the customer fully responsible for the quality and shipment of the DUM.

Kind regards,
Manager

email_chain.subject: Final Delivery Agreement
email_chain.body:
Dear Ahmed,
This is to confirm that we will deliver a total of 100 DUM to you within one week for collection from Khartoum International Airport. We require a credit note for 35% of the total value, with the remainder to be settled in cash upon delivery. Please ensure that the payment is prepared accordingly.

Kind regards,
Manager

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Bauxite Transport from Al Mina to El Jadida
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bolanos,

I’m looking to ship 100,000MT of bauxite from Al Mina to El Jadida for a mid-March laycan. Could you please provide a quick quote at your earliest convenience? 

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Vince Kozlowski

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote: Bauxite Transport from Al Mina to El Jadida
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kozlowski,

Thank you for your inquiry about our shipping services. We are currently preparing a detailed proposal including the rates for the transport of bauxite, as you requested. You will receive our proposal via email shortly.

We appreciate the opportunity to collaborate on your project, and we are confident that our extensive international logistics experience will be an asset to you.

Best regards,
Yakiem Koraan
Marketing and Sales Manager

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of FCL Agreement and Meeting Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kozlowski,

Referring to our recent communications, we are pleased to inform you that we have accepted your offer to transport the goods on a Full Container Load (FCL) basis as proposed. Moreover, we look forward to our scheduled meeting on the 24th to finalize the details.

Best regards,
Ishaq and Paul

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Shipping Containers and Equipment in Durban
email_chain.body:
Hi there,

One of your regular customers based in Los Angeles has requested 12 x 40’ high cube containers, including both standard and flat racks, to be ready at the port of Durban by the end of March or early April. They also require loading equipment such as cranes and forklifts. Please provide me with a loading schedule and an estimated time of arrival. Additionally, we need a cargo manifest that includes the type of cargo, container number, and the delivery address.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best regards

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Lead Time for Naphtha Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Daniel,

I would like to inquire about the estimated lead time for 200MT of naphtha we are sourcing from Saipem. Could you please provide an update on this and advise on the earliest possible start date for delivery?

Thank you,
Denis

email_chain.subject: Update on Alkonate Purchase and LOI Submission
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Daniel,

Good morning. I wanted to inform you that we have not yet received any response from Saipem regarding our recent inquiry about purchasing 10% Alkonate, nor about the Letter of Intent submitted via Haulfrecht. I will update our documentation and keep you informed as soon as I receive a response from Saipem.

All the best,
Helene

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Laytime Flexibility for Soybean Meal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mandy,

This is Tetsu O’Donnell reaching out regarding our planned shipment of soybean meal from Busan to Tianjin. Could you please confirm if your vessel is available next week? Additionally, we would appreciate knowing your flexibility concerning laytime extensions.

Many thanks,
Tetsu

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability and Laytime Flexibility for Soybean Meal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Tetsu,

Thank you for your message. Our vessel will arrive in Tianjin on the 19th of September. We are open for loading from the 17th to 20th September inclusive. However, please note that laytime will be limited, and actual loading may need to wait until the vessel’s in-port status is confirmed, potentially after the 20th. Additionally, our next scheduled loading is on the 20th of September, and there seem to be no earlier loading possibilities before the 21st. Could you please let us know if this schedule would be workable for you?

Best regards,
Mandy

email_chain.subject: Request for Tanker Charter Rate Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jason, could you please quote the best rate for carrying 2,000 MT of crude oil from Nigeria to Antwerp. We are looking to discuss the possibility of chartering a vessel with a laycan period beginning no later than May 20th. Regards, Christina

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Rate Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jason, to confirm, are the rates for the tanker UAM ARTHUR indeed Euro 5.00 per day? Please respond with a detailed summary of the terms and conditions based on FOB terms. Regards, Christina

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Awaiting Response on Rate Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Jason, I have yet to receive a response regarding our request for the best rate. Please note that our required laycan period is between May 20th and May 24th. Regards, Christina

email_chain.subject: Update on Vessel Availability - UAM ARTHUR
email_chain.body: Dear Christina, I apologize for the delay in response. The owner has confirmed the availability of our tanker, UAM ARTHUR. She will be available for hire from May 22nd to June 3rd. She is currently on hire but will be available after 8 days of demurrage. Regards, Jason

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Loading Requirements Met
email_chain.body: Dear Christina, we have met the client’s requirements and can perform the loading by Floating, Lighter, Single (FLOS) method at Berth C, Lagos. Note that marine services and an environmental impact assessment are needed. Regards, Jason

email_chain.subject: Freight Cost Inquiry for Alcohol Shipment from Tanjung Kelang (PJ) to Benin (CI)
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

I am looking for a 250 metric ton shipment of Alcohol from Tanjung Kelang (PJ) to Benin (CI). Could you provide an estimation of freight costs? Additionally, is it possible to negotiate laytime beyond 45 days?

Regards,
Jean

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Cost Inquiry for Alcohol Shipment from Tanjung Kelang (PJ) to Benin (CI)
email_chain.body:
Dear Jean,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the shipment of alcohol. To provide you with an accurate quote, please confirm the following details:

- Shipment from: Tanjung Kelang (PJ) to Benin (CI)
- Cargo: 250 tonnes of alcohol
- Tare Weight: 7.5 tonnes
- Laytime Negotiability

We've preliminarily noted your requirement for the cargo to be ready at loading port with all terminal fees paid by the client. The cargo should be placed on 24 hours notice with delivery expected within 1 week of loading.

I will await your confirmation to proceed with the quotation.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Cost Inquiry for Alcohol Shipment from Tanjung Kelang (PJ) to Benin (CI)
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. The details are correct. Please proceed with the quotation.

Best regards,
Jean

email_chain.subject: Final Quotation for Alcohol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Jean,

Based on the details provided, here is the final quote for the shipment:

- Carrier Cost: $6,600
- Insurance: $850
- Terminal Handling: $800

Total: $8,250

This quote includes all transport insurance, inclusive of war and strike risks. Please review and let us know if you have any questions or if we can assist further.

Thank you,
James

email_chain.subject: Project ETA Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Castañeda, Can you please let me know the expected time of arrival for our next project? Thanks! Regards, Katie

email_chain.subject: Re: Project ETA Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Katie, I'm glad to inform we are on track! Let's keep in touch for future projects as we are facing the challenging market in Romania. The continued strength of our business and the new sales of the tools will be a great help to us. Regards, Castañeda

email_chain.subject: Re: Project ETA Inquiry
email_chain.body: Castañeda, That's excellent news! The project's success offers a beneficial push against Romania's tough market. Please ensure the growth rate remains aligned with the new tools' sales milestones. Regards, Katie

email_chain.subject: Health update and delayed review of investment opportunities
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Allen,
I have been examining some promising trading possibilities but am currently hindered by a persistent cold. I will need to delay any decisions until I have fully recovered.
Best regards,
Dr. Larson

email_chain.subject: Re: Health update and delayed review of investment opportunities
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Larson,
I hope you feel better soon! Just to confirm, should we proceed with exploring the small investment opportunities you recently mentioned, despite your health setbacks?
Best regards,
Ms. Allen

email_chain.subject: Re: Health update and delayed review of investment opportunities
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Allen,
Thankfully, my temperature has normalized, but I anticipate at least one more week before I’m back in good health. I will review your suggestions thoroughly once I am capable.
Best regards,
Dr. Larson

email_chain.subject: Investment Evaluation Complete
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Allen,
I’ve reviewed the proposed investments and the stock options appear to hold profitability potential. Looking forward to discussing this in more detail.
Best regards,
Dr. Larson

email_chain.subject: Additional Confirmation on Stock Profitability
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Allen,
Upon further consideration, I confirm that the stock indeed appears to be a profitable venture.
Best regards,
Dr. Larson

email_chain.subject: Virus Concerns Addressed
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Allen,
I’ve scanned the recent emails through our virus scanner as a precaution. Luckily, there appears to be no issue of security concern.
Best regards,
Dr. Larson

email_chain.subject: Arrangements for cargo loading on MV Urania
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Lin, We are preparing to load 100MT of granules onto your vessel, MV Urania. Could you please confirm if you'll require a seawater hose for ballast operations? Best regards, Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Arrangements for cargo loading on MV Urania
email_chain.body: Hello Anthony, Thank you for your email. Currently, the UCRATIS team has opted not to pursue additional environmental safety measures, as communication with local authorities is deemed sufficient. Details of these communications can be accessed via our local website at https://www.comportadecreciente.com/comporta.html. The port authority will continue its regular inspections and will handle reporting. For further details, please refer to the annex provided earlier. As for the responsibility for any damages, this will fall under judicial jurisdiction and not our team at UCRATIS. Best, Mr. Lin

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Grounding of MV Urania in Escombreras Bay
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Lin, In light of recent events including the spill linked to illegal poaching activities and undocumented departure from Malaga port, the owner and charterer have resolved to immediately ground MV Urania in Escombreras Bay, as permissible under our non-arbitral charter agreement. Please advise how soon you can authorize this operation. Best regards, Jonathan Hagan

email_chain.subject: Updated Berthing Requirements in Singapore
email_chain.body: Hi Nick, On Friday, you mentioned needing a firm berth in Singapore between February 1 and March 31. However, you indicated a change in plans yesterday. Could you please update me on your new requirements and the deadline for the booking? Thanks, Bob

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Berthing Needs in Singapore
email_chain.body: Hello Nick, It's good to reconnect. I noticed from Bob's email that you were initially seeking a crew berth in Singapore. Can you confirm if this is still the case? We have not yet received any booking request from you. Cheers, Tom

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Rate Tel-Aviv to Karachi
email_chain.body: Please let me know your freight rate for your available dates on the Tel-Aviv to Karachi service. If this isn't right, please advise your closest alternative port. Regards, Stephen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rate Tel-Aviv to Karachi
email_chain.body: The freight rate is 420 USD per TEU. Please advise your date of arrival at Tel-Aviv and your next port of call after Tel-Aviv. Also, please provide your date of arrival at the recommended alternative port and confirm if your next port of call after this port is available.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rate Tel-Aviv to Karachi
email_chain.body: As per your information, vessel EM-CAL won't be calling at Tel-Aviv in 2016. I need to receive the shipment by the end of the month. Could you please provide alternative dates?

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rate Tel-Aviv to Karachi
email_chain.body: Our available date at Tel-Aviv is 17 May 2016. We agree to this date for the shipment. Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipping Date
email_chain.body: I have received your confirmation for the 17 May 2016 shipment date at Tel-Aviv. Please let me know your suggested arrival time at the port. Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Request for Transportation Services
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

We would like to engage your services to move 3,000 MT of muds from Petropoli to Brazzaville at the earliest possible opportunity. We will provide the LOI once the rate is agreed upon. It would be advantageous if the vessel can load the product with a draft of 15 feet.

Best regards,
Courtney

email_chain.subject: Request for Additional Transportation Services
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

As you may recall, we previously contracted with your company for the Arroyo Valley bridge cleanup, and we found the rates very satisfactory. I now need to transport 30,000 pounds of gravel from Balcomino Port to Paraiso Port. I'm attaching the LOI for your review.

Best regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Contract Finalization and Rate Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

I have good news for you. I finally have the support from the leaders of my country to sign a contract with your company. Please find the updated contract attached for your review of the details and rates.

Regards,
Solano

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Budget Authorization and Contract Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

The budget has been authorized by the vice president. I’m sending you the newest version of the contract. As the official in charge, I need your signature first to ensure that the information is accurate and complete.

Best regards,
Geof

email_chain.subject: Contract Review and Feedback Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

The documents have been uploaded for your review. Please check them and send your feedback. If everything is agreeable, please sign the contract. For any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best regards,
Rainer

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Contract Signature Needed
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

Please ensure to sign the contract as soon as possible. Thank you very much.

Regards,
Dmitriy

email_chain.subject: Query About Payment Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Simmons,

I've reviewed the rate and find it very reasonable. However, there is one issue. The team leader has requested that we pay a 20% deposit. How should I proceed with the deposit payment? If you can't transfer it to me, can you arrange the contract terms so that the customer pays the deposit directly?

Regards,
Alexander

email_chain.subject: Tar Supply Inquiry for Cotonou Deadline
email_chain.body: Mr. Santos, I'm exploring the option of acquiring 2,000MT of tar to be delivered to Cotonou by August 25. Given that you have limited logistics capabilities with just one lane, please confirm if this deadline is achievable. I appreciate your consistent reliability in our past transactions. Best, Rachel PS. If I am back from vacation by then, I can handle the pickup myself. Thank you, Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Tar Supply Inquiry for Cotonou Deadline
email_chain.body: Rachel, I apologize for the potential delay, as I might not be able to return until next week. Can we discuss this over a call? I've located another terminal that promises a 3-day transit. Best, Noah PS. Let's keep this alternative terminal between us for now.

email_chain.subject: Re: Tar Supply Inquiry - Additional Solutions
email_chain.body: Noah, Excellent to hear about the new logistics connection. To support your efforts, I have secured another quote that ensures delivery to your customer next week, and will attempt to dispatch 1,000MT this week as a partial fulfillment. Best, Rachel PS. I appreciate your effort on the deal with CC.

email_chain.subject: Re: Tar Supply - Final Arrangements
email_chain.body: Hi Rachel, The FOB pricing secured today is perfect, and it will definitely impress the boss. Thanks for your outstanding work in closing the Cotonou deal. Best, Noah

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Tar Supply Deal
email_chain.body: Noah, Great job on finalizing the Cotonou deal. The 2,000MT are ready, and I'll require a transfer of $2,000 to finalize it. We have more clients awaiting deliveries. Thanks! Best, Mike

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Your Efforts
email_chain.body: Noah, Thanks for your dedication and hard work in ensuring the completion of the recent transactions. Best, Mike

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Dry Bulk Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Brandon, I am considering your company for a dry bulk cargo shipment of 9,500MT of limestone from South Africa to Indonesia. Could you please confirm if you have available space for these dates and whether you can offer a fixed rate or operate with a cost+3% to P&I? Thank you, Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Dry Bulk Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sam, I can confirm that we have availability for your requested shipment. Currently, we offer this space at 19% above our spot rate. Although you mentioned a preference for a fixed rate, please note that our spot rates are presently high. Should you wish to proceed under these terms, our offer stands valid for the next 48 hours. Please confirm receipt of this proposal. Thanks, Nicolas

email_chain.subject: RE: Proposal Received
email_chain.body: Hi Nicolas, Thank you for the prompt response. I've received your proposal and understand the terms. I will review and revert soon. Regards, Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Proposal Follow-up
email_chain.body: Hi Sam, Follwoing up on my previous emails, we are prepared to offer a fixed rate of $16,125 per metric ton for the shipment. This rate is based on current market conditions and will be valid for 48 hours. Please let us know if this meets your needs. Thanks, Nicolas

email_chain.subject: RE: Proposal Acceptance
email_chain.body: Hi Nicolas and Brandon, We accept the offer of $16,125 per metric ton as proposed. Please proceed with reserving the space and provide the estimated times for loading, departure, and arrival. Thank you, Sam

email_chain.subject: RE: Logistics Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sam and Brandon, Thank you for your acceptance. We have confirmed your booking and our vessel will begin loading limestone on October 18th at the port of Durban, South Africa. We expect departure shortly thereafter and arrival at Tanjung Priok, Indonesia by October 30th. Looking forward to a successful shipment! Thanks, Nicolas

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Dry Bulk Vessel Availability and Price
email_chain.body: Hello Tony, do you have an available dry bulk vessel for transporting 7,800MT of coking coal from Dalian to Gwangyang between September and November? Additionally, could you provide the latest price for this dry bulk shipping route? Looking forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Your Customer Services Manager

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on Grain Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi there! I am interested in arranging a shipment of 15,000MT of grain from Rotterdam to Dallas from October to November. Could you please offer more detailed information about this route and the services you provide? Thank you for your assistance. Best regards, Tasha

email_chain.subject: Booking Inquiry for Fertilizer Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello, I am looking to book a shipment of 5,000MT of fertilizer from the US Gulf to Le Havre. Could you provide information on what your carrier can offer, including any available start dates? I appreciate your help. Regards, Jane

email_chain.subject: Request for FOB Freight Rate from Mumbai to Saldanha Bay
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jones,

Could you provide the FOB freight rate for a shipment from Mumbai to Saldanha Bay? We require a fast response as the cargo, consisting of 500 metric tonnes (MT), needs to be transported promptly.

Thank you,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Materials Shipping and Lead Time
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wang,

My company is engaged in a construction project in the Western Cape, South Africa. We need to transport LMD steel plates and angle shapes from the POLAR brand located at Indo-US Metals to Saldanha Bay. I would appreciate it if you could provide the FOB freight rate from Mumbai to Saldanha Bay for a cargo size of 500MT, along with the expected lead time and available options for shipping.

Given your esteemed reputation, I'm confident in obtaining competitive rates.

Thank you,
Min Huang

labels.commodity: LMD steel plates and angle shapes

email_chain.subject: Request for Transport - 2200MT Propylene from Batam to Manila
email_chain.body:
Dear Ray,

I need transport for 2,200MT of propylene from Batam to Manila. Could you arrange transportation for this cargo?

Regards,
Perry

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transport - 2200MT Propylene from Batam to Manila
email_chain.body:
Dear Perry,

Yes, I can arrange a shipment for you. We have availability to transport 1,800MT of propylene from Batam to Manila. I will send you the details later this morning.

Thanks,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Transport - 2200MT Propylene from Batam to Manila
email_chain.body:
Dear Ray,

I've been awaiting a suitable opportunity for this cargo. Great to hear you have a provision. I look forward to the details and will confirm accordingly.

Best regards,
Perry

email_chain.subject: Additional Information - Transport Proposal
email_chain.body:
Ray,

To clarify my earlier request, I can manage with 2,000MT of propylene. I have two ships, each with a capacity of 1,000MT. I can arrange for either to come to Batam and can wait up to two days for unloading.

Best,
Perry

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Information - Transport Proposal
email_chain.body:
Perry,

That works. We can manage the unloading over two days. Could you arrange for the ships to come next Friday at 4 PM?

Best,
Ray

email_chain.subject: Confirmation - Next Friday Arrival
email_chain.body:
Ray,

Confirmed, we will arrive next Friday at 4 PM.

Regards,
Perry

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Chemicals from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Good day Ms. Spivakova,

Thank you for your inquiry about arranging the transport of a 2,000MT consignment of chemicals from Kavala to Odessa. Please provide your margin for the margin calculation, and could you also provide a quote for groupage charges? Thank you.

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Chemicals from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Hello Jonas,

Thank you for your message. Here are the calculated possible shipping costs:
- Full Container Load (FCL): 400 EUR
- Groupage 24 MT: 210 EUR.

From my margin calculations, FCL shipping appears to be the most cost-effective. Please confirm if there's anything else we might need to consider.

Best regards,
Maria Spivakova

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Chemicals from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for your prompt response. For your margin calculation based on FCL, the margin rate for Kavala to Odessa transport is calculated as follows: (0.4 * 120,000) / 12 = $2,000. We can offer a surcharge of 400 EUR for any container size, not just a 20ft one. Could you please double-check and advise accordingly?

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Chemicals from Kavala to Odessa
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jonas,

Thank you for clarifying the figures. However, the margin from the survey is actually 36%, not 12%. Could you please confirm this revised margin rate?

Kind regards,
Maria Spivakova

email_chain.subject: Day Boat Booking Inquiry for January 15, 2014
email_chain.body: Hi Dominik, We would like to book your day boat for Wednesday, 15th January 2014. We are a small family of 6, with three kids aged 12, 9, and 5. We plan to arrive at the boat at approximately 12:30 PM for a time slot from 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM. However, we would like to keep the timing flexible as it will depend on the tides. Please let me know if there is any availability for this day. Regards

email_chain.subject: Re: Day Boat Booking Inquiry for January 15, 2014
email_chain.body: Hi, Could you please let me know your final decision on this? We are aiming to finalize the booking this week, if possible. Regards, Mr. Harker

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Logistic Arrangements for Oil Shipment to Malta
email_chain.body:

I understand that a third party may be involved in transporting 1,200MT of oil to Valletta, Malta. Can you confirm if you have met them, and if they have a truck and office in Morocco?

All the best,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Oil Shipment Details for Valletta
email_chain.body:
Hey Grant!

I have been trying to track down the details of your shipment to Valletta, but unfortunately, I've only found out that it has been handled through a third party. Do you have any information about this? Please let me know if there are other updates.

All the best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Rice Transportation from Timor to Batam
email_chain.body:
Hello, 

John here. We have 20MT of rice ready in Timor bound for Batam. Could you please provide your price for this shipment? Looking forward to a fruitful business relationship.

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Rice Transportation from Timor to Batam
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Mr. John,

I regret to inform you that our final quote for shipping 20MT of rice from Timor to Batam is 12,500 IDR per metric ton. This price is our most competitive offer, and we believe it will be profitable for both of us. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or need further clarification.

Best regards,
Rachmat, CEO

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about container shipment from Hong Kong to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Wright,

We are planning to ship a 1,000 TEU container from Hong Kong to Shanghai. Could you please provide the earliest possible loading time? Additionally, do you have any peak season surcharges? I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about container shipment from Hong Kong to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wright,

Thank you for your quick response earlier. I need to make a revision to our initial shipment request. Initially, we were under the impression that we had an FCL contract, but it seems you only provide LCL service to Shanghai. Additionally, we have received a new inquiry from Xingjiang for a small freight order. I'll forward the confirmation number to them shortly. I hope we can discuss soon how to manage the shipment from Xingjiang to Shanghai.

Looking forward to our discussion.
Best,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Update on Container Allocation Process
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. van den Heuvel,

Thank you for your email. We will initiate the tender process for your container once we have the main carriers' recommendations. We appreciate your patience in this matter.

Best regards,
4PL Customer Support

email_chain.subject: Container and Reload Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Customer,

We are pleased to inform you that your container has been allocated for our daily reload to ABO 1003, with a total weight of 62.5 Metric Tons. Thank you for your business.

We look forward to receiving your feedback on this arrangement.

Best regards,
4PL Customer Support

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Delivery Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Customers,

For the week beginning 23rd March, kindly note the following deliveries have been successfully arranged according to the planned schedule. We will keep you updated on any critical changes or updates.

Thank you for your continued partnership.
Best regards,
4PL Customer Support

email_chain.subject: Trade Development - LSG
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Ghanem, I just received your inquiry concerning low sulfur diesel from Australia to Iraq. I am interested in handling 30,000MT of your cargo. Please provide information including the preferred loading date and the expected arrival date at your port. We are still not members of any Commodity Exchanges, but this can be arranged if necessary. Kind regards, Armando

email_chain.subject: Re: Trade Development - LSG
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email, Armando. I would be glad to provide all of the information you requested regarding the shipment. We are indeed interested in further discussing this opportunity. Kind regards, Charles Edward Ghanem

email_chain.subject: Re: Trade Development - LSG
email_chain.body: We can be reached at +966 12 628 9913 for further discussions. We are prepared to discuss aspects such as port expansion, pipelines, and foreign investment related to this project. Kind regards, Armando

email_chain.subject: Arrangement for Soybeans Pickup
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lin,

I have 6 units of soybeans to offload and need you to arrange for the earliest possible pickup. Please confirm availability, and I will schedule it accordingly.

Thank you,
Rick Allen

email_chain.subject: Rice Delivery Coordination
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lin,

I have 3 tons of rice to offload. I can drive them to your designated location as soon as you confirm. Could you please let me know your availability so we can arrange it?

Thanks,
Jen Lim

email_chain.subject: Sugar Pickup Request
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I have left some sugar to be picked up from your office. The box is labeled with my contact details. Kindly arrange to collect it, and I will be expecting a call from you to confirm.

Thank you,
Rama Ali

email_chain.subject: Jaggery Sale Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your response. I have 100 kg of jaggery that I wish to sell. I will call you soon to discuss the details. Please let me know if you can come by to pick up the bag. Alternatively, I can provide you with the address for pickup if necessary.

Thanks,
Cindy

email_chain.subject: Tanker Charter Inquiry for Crude Palm Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Sofia, Thank you for your inquiry regarding the chartering of our tanker from Belawan, Indonesia. We currently have capacity to ship 8,800MT of crude palm oil. We will need to load it within the next 10 days. Would a 60-day charter duration be acceptable to you? Regards, Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Re: Tanker Charter Inquiry for Crude Palm Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Jacinta, I can confirm the booking for transporting our crude palm oil from Belawan to Genoa, Italy. Please confirm if this route is possible. Best, Sofia

email_chain.subject: Re: Tanker Charter Confirmation for Crude Palm Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Sofia, We've received your booking for transporting crude palm oil from Belawan, Indonesia, to Genoa, Italy. We'll start preparing your tanker and will be in touch soon regarding payment and further shipment arrangements. Thank you for choosing Latrine Tankers for this voyage! Regards, Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry for April from Lisbon to Southampton
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Price,

I'm coordinating a shipment in April from Lisbon to Southampton. Could you please let me know the earliest possible date we can schedule a ship? Also, are there any special rates available for booking a full ship?

Thanks,
Margot

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Accommodation for a Cruise to the Greek Isles
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Price,

I am looking to book a cabin for six people. Is this something you can accommodate? Additionally, what is the earliest date you have available for a cruise to the Greek Isles?

Thank you,
Hildy

email_chain.subject: Cruise Booking Inquiry for April
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Price,

I've got three full weeks off in April and am interested in exploring somewhere warm and exotic. Would it be possible to schedule a cruise during that period? Furthermore, could you inform me about the duration options for cruises?

Thank you,
Pam

email_chain.subject: Anniversary Cruise in July - Additional Requests
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Price,

We are planning a wedding anniversary cruise in July and would like to host a party onboard. Could you assist us with this arrangement? Also, could you provide the price for your best champagne available on the ship?

Thanks,
Jeff

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry for April from Lisbon to Southampton
email_chain.body:
Dear Margot,

The earliest we can schedule a ship would be November as our vessel is fully booked until then. Regarding full-ship rates, it's quite an expensive endeavor; however, I will check with our travel agents for more precise details. You can expect a quote by next week.

Best regards,
Hilary

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Accommodation for a Cruise to the Greek Isles
email_chain.body:
Hello Hildy,

Unfortunately, accommodating six people in a single cabin is not possible. However, adjacent cabins might be available. The earliest available cruise to the Greek Isles is in May.

Best regards,
Hilary

email_chain.subject: Re: Cruise Booking Inquiry for April
email_chain.body:
Dear Pam,

At present, we do not have any cruises scheduled during the specified dates in April. However, I can explore the possibilities and update you if there are any changes. Typically, cruises to warm and exotic destinations can range from one to three weeks.

Best regards,
Hilary

email_chain.subject: Re: Anniversary Cruise in July - Additional Requests
email_chain.body:
Hi Jeff,

We'd be happy to assist you with the party arrangements for your anniversary cruise in July. As for the champagne, our top-quality option is priced at $100 per bottle. Looking forward to making your celebration exceptional.

Best regards,
Hilary

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Delays and Procedures
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Bernard, I am traveling to Baku and I'm interested in shipping 2,800MT of gasoline to Al Sharqia. I am concerned about potential delays at the port. Could you please clarify how your company handles such delays within the delivery schedule? Thank you, Linda

email_chain.subject: Request for Document Adjustment
email_chain.body: I'm sorry but it is essential that you omit the tank measure numbers from the documents accompanying the gasoline shipment, as our company requires this to correctly assess and examine the delivered quantity. Can you please send the updated copies of your invoice without these details? Thank you, Anna

email_chain.subject: Urgent Order Request for Additional Gasoline
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bernard, we faced a delivery shortfall of 1,200 MT from another supplier, resulting in a fuel shortage. We have an immediate requirement for 1,200 MT of gasoline for our operations. Could you please prioritize this order and arrange for immediate delivery to Tripoli? Thank you for your assistance. Regards, Anna

email_chain.subject: Concerns Over Shipping Delays
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Bernard, the recurring delays in fuel delivery are significantly impacting our business, particularly during seasonal weather changes. Could we discuss possible solutions to mitigate these delays and ensure more timely shipments? Your understanding of our mutual business constraints is appreciated. Best, Anna

email_chain.subject: Availability for Propane Shipping from Newcastle to Hull
email_chain.body:

We have 8,000MT of propane ready to be shipped from Newcastle to Hull, UK. Could you please check if there are any laycan slots available for this shipment and inform me of the expected bunker surcharge?

Best regards,
Ayman

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Propane Shipping from Newcastle to Hull
email_chain.body:
Hi Ayman,

Thank you for your inquiry. I have contacted our scheduling agent regarding your booking for the propane shipment. I will provide you with the details as soon as possible.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Shipping Rates and Slot Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Ayman,

Thank you for your patience. We have a laycan slot available for your requested shipment and I have attached the rate details. Please review them and let us know if everything is in order so we can proceed with the booking.

Kind regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Expedited Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucia,

We have 9,000MT of flour ready for shipment from Maracaibo to Stockton. We've noted that your standard transit time to San Francisco is 27 days. Our schedule is tight, and we urgently need the cargo in Stockton by August 30. Is there any possibility to expedite the shipment to meet this deadline?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Requirement for Expedited Shipping
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I've discussed your request with our operations team, but unfortunately, they confirmed that the fastest available transit time from our port in Maracaibo to San Francisco is 30 days due to our current sailing schedules. We will start loading the flour in the coming week. I'll keep you updated with the exact loading date as soon as it's finalized.

Sincerely,
Lucia

email_chain.subject: Update on Shipment Loading Schedule
email_chain.body:
Lucia,

We've received an update from the shipping company that the loading of the flour has been scheduled for Sunday, June 30. We will await further updates on the expected vessel arrival time in San Francisco.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About LC, Terms & Conditions, and Bank Document

I would also like to review the terms and conditions and the relevant bank document. Awaiting your response. Best regards, Rohan Misswala

email_chain.subject: (SAMPLE) LC Terms and Conditions

The document issued on 03/12/2013, will be valid until the final date on 04/17/2013, with an expiry date of 05/16/2013, and an acceptance deadline of 05/30/2013. Shipper Description: Beel, Quantity: 1 (Units). Feel free to contact us with any further queries. Best regards, Alex Taylor

email_chain.subject: (SAMPLE) Bank Guarantees

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Styrene Shipment Pricing

I am the assistant buyer in the materials department at [Company Name], and yes, we are looking to purchase approximately 4000mt of fertilizer, with shipment scheduled for November 7, 2021. email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for High-Sulfur Bitumen Shipment
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Mr. Phillips

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Shipment from West Africa to North Europe
email_chain.body:

Thank you for your swift response. We are also considering shipping approximately 5,000MT of bitumen from West Africa to North Europe on a FAL basis. Could you please advise on this?

Thank you and best regards,
Barry

email_chain.subject: Graphite Electrode Shipment from China to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Emma,
We will be shipping 10,000 MT of graphite electrode from China to Durban. We can offer a freight cost of USD 30.63 per metric ton. Would you have the capacity to handle this shipment, and can you confirm availability on short notice?
Kind regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Graphite Electrode Shipment from China to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,
My name is Jane. I am interested in your shipment of 10,000 MT of graphite electrode to Durban. We can purchase it at a rate of USD 27.10 per metric ton. Could we discuss this further?
Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Graphite Electrode Shipment from China to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,
Thank you for your interest. Unfortunately, I cannot adjust the freight cost. However, I am offering the graphite electrode at a freight cost of USD 30.63 per metric ton. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
Kind regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Graphite Electrode Shipment from China to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,
I appreciate your response. Unfortunately, my maximum acceptable price would be USD 27.10 per metric ton. Please let me know if circumstances change.
Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Offer for Graphite Electrode from Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Ian,
My name is Peter; we have corresponded previously. I currently have a source of graphite from Vietnam. Are you still in need of graphite electrodes? My price is USD 20.00 per metric ton. Could you please confirm if you wish to proceed with an order?
Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Graphite Electrode from Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,
Yes, I am interested in placing an order for 10,000 MT of graphite from Vietnam at your stated price of USD 20.00 per metric ton. I have potential buyers from Canada and Europe. Please advise on the next steps.
Kind regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Request for Warehouse Quote in London
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Sangwoo,
We’re planning to discharge an LTL container at Rotterdam on the 27th and transit it to London with a FTL 20-footer. Could you provide a quote for a warehouse in London to receive the container on the 30th?
Regards,
Mikhail

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Warehouse Quote in London
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mikhail,
We can handle the request, but please make your booking as soon as possible. As schedules are tight, delaying might lead to handling issues. I'll confirm the price and date once the order is placed.
Regards,
Miki

email_chain.subject: Concern Regarding Cost Implications
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikhail,
I attempted to negotiate this deal, but it seems from feedback that the logistic costs are currently too high. This has been quite disappointing as it impedes our operations.
Regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Need for flexible handling and cost-effective solutions
email_chain.body:
Hello,
I've considered the feedback regarding high costs. It's crucial we explore more flexible and cost-effective logistic options. I encourage you to leverage any opportunity to negotiate better terms that could benefit both our operations.
Regards,
Mikhail

email_chain.subject: Final Decision
email_chain.body:
Hello Mikhail,
Following up on our discussions, it seems challenging to lower the costs as per your expectations due to current logistic constraints. Please let me know if we should proceed with the current terms or explore other alternatives.
Regards,
Miki

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about FCA Price for Commodity Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moore,

I hope this message finds you well. I would like to inquire about the FCA price if we place an order for the commodities by the specified deadline XXXX, given the current FOB prices. The expected delivery is 30 days later. Could you please confirm the agreed upon details?

Kind regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Seafood Shipping from Montreal to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Hey Graciela,

We urgently need to arrange a shipment of 2,500MT refrigerated seafood from Montreal to Vancouver. Could you please let me know the earliest possible loading date? Additionally, are there any discounts available for early completion of this shipment?

Thanks,
Zeynep

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Requirement for Seafood Shipping from Montreal to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Hi Zeynep,

Thank you for reaching out. Currently, we are managing increased demand but can accommodate your request. We can begin loading the seafood cargo in approximately two weeks. Please let me know if this schedule works for you.

Regarding discounts, while our standard policy applies, we can discuss potential adjustments depending on the finalized details of your shipment.

Best regards,
Graciela

email_chain.subject: Update and Confirmation Needed on Seafood Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Zeynep,

I’ve updated the estimate details for your seafood shipment. Would you like me to coordinate with our partners to secure an earlier loading date than discussed? Your prompt response will help us better adjust our schedule to meet your needs.

Thank you for your patience,
Graciela

email_chain.subject: Stranded Vessel and Market Impact Briefing
email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,
A vessel was stranded off the coast of Australia due to mechanical failure, leading to significant transport disruptions and supply shortages in the area. I have compiled relevant information in the attached file that may assist you in preparing for the changing market dynamics. This document could be valuable for your upcoming presentation. I hope you find this information useful.
Best wishes,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Request to Review Presentation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,
I am finalizing my presentation and have some questions. Could we possibly discuss them this afternoon or tomorrow morning? Your insights would be highly valuable.
Thanks,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Final Report on Agricultural Product Quality
email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,
I hope you are well. I am nearing the completion of my final report on agricultural product quality and have included a section on food processing, aligned with my PhD research. I am seeking your feedback on this section, specifically how the key concepts are interlinked and their application to the industry. Your guidance would be immensely appreciated.
I look forward to your response.
Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Al Jubail to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Dear Moe,

I am looking to book a shipment of 7,000MT of gasoline from Al Jubail to Karachi around mid-April. Could you please provide me with the available options and their corresponding costs?

Best regards,
Johny

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Cargo Shipment from Al Jubail to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Dear Johny,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the following flights available for your shipment from Al Jubail to Karachi each week:
- MAH-21 on Tuesdays
- AKL-63 on Thursdays
- AKL-83 on Saturdays
- AKL-103 on Tuesdays
- AKL-123 on Thursdays
Each of these options is priced at $70,000 MRP.

Please let us know your preferred date and we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Moe

email_chain.subject: Urgent capacity enquiry - Dubai to Mauritius
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kuo,

I am a bulk owner and need your help with the provision of space for 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets from Dubai to Mauritius. We have a next laycan 23rd March and need to know ASAP if your containership is available for the voyage.

I am in India now and am unable to finalize rate and booking – can we do so via fax and email?

Kind regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: FYI - Regarding your enquiry about 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Max,

I am answering on behalf of Ms. Kuo. Unfortunately, I am unable to offer you cargo space for this size of quantity on our container ship, SINGAPORE EXPRESS. However, on my insistence, I am doing a full quote of our available space from Singapore to Mauritius (two legs) and will send you the rates as soon as it’s available. Hopefully, I will get the confirmation later this week and let you know.

In the meantime, let’s agree to start with a fixed rate offer. Please send me a proposal, and we can then adjust the rates according to the amounts to be loaded.

Kind regards,
Berdous Weitz

email_chain.subject: RE: Regarding your enquiry about 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Weitz,

Thank you for checking the availability from Singapore to Mauritius. However, if the direct route from Dubai to Mauritius is not feasible, we may need to reconsider our options.

Please let me know as soon as you have the rates from Singapore, and we can proceed accordingly.

Kind regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: RE: Regarding your enquiry about 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Max,

We attempted to find an alternative but were not able to secure the necessary space for the entire shipment. Unfortunately, we cannot accommodate the cargo from Dubai directly to Mauritius at this time.

We appreciate your understanding.

Kind regards,
Berdous

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Steel Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Rahman,

We have prepared a full load of 85,000MT of steel scrap to be shipped from Tianjin to Karachi. Given the current market conditions, could you offer us a competitive tight lumpsum freight quote? Looking forward to your favorable response.

Regards,
Hussein

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Steel Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Hussein,

Thank you for your query. Unfortunately, due to the current high demand and tight margins in the industry, we are only able to propose a slightly increased rate of 1.00 USD/MT over the usual rates. We've received more competitive bids currently, but I've adjusted our offer accordingly and hope it meets your expectations. I am happy to include your trade reference as part of our discussion.

Regards,
Rahman

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Steel Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Rahman,

I appreciate your updated offer considering the market conditions. I accept this new quote and will forward my trade reference shortly. If you could expedite the process on your end, it would greatly benefit our timeline.

Best regards,
Hussein

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about vessel requirements and dispatch rate for castor oil transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Blake,

We plan to transport 2,000MT of castor oil from Cotonou to Hamburg. Could you please provide information on whether your vessel is flexible regarding draft requirements? Also, what is your typical dispatch rate for such a cargo?

Best,
Ali

email_chain.subject: Arrangements and Schedule Confirmation for Castor Oil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Blake,

Thank you for the details on your vessel's capabilities. We aim to use the RORO method for transporting this cargo, tentatively scheduled for May 3rd or 4th. Could you assist in identifying a suitable discharge location in Cotonou? There appears to be a large transit building at the port which might serve as a secure place for the cargo. Additionally, two crane barges will be available during the operation. We also propose arranging the lifting from the roadway to your vessel. Please confirm your availability and any required details.

Best regards,
Rajiv

email_chain.subject: Final Details and Document Submission for Castor Oil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Blake,

As previously discussed, we are scheduled to transport 2,000MT of castor oil on your vessel WANDA between May 17th and 18th. We will shortly be sending the necessary documents to ensure compliance with the embarkation regulations of this cargo.

Best regards,
Rajiv

email_chain.subject: Happy 2025!
email_chain.body:
Hello Eric,

As our customers globally may have observed, we are introducing a new range of wooden Lego. We believe they are going to be very popular among children.

We are offering a special 20% discount for any purchases exceeding 1 million Lego units. This special promotion expires on January 3rd, so hurry!

Best wishes,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Notice
email_chain.body:
Dear Eric,

We have been collaborating with a major partner in China to establish our wood business. In this venture, raw materials are produced in China, then shaped into our high-quality wooden Lego. During our quality assurance phase, we identified the potential risks associated with wooden Lego, such as skin and facial injuries to children. To address this, we initiated extensive testing by sending 500 Lego units to a certified laboratory. The results confirmed that our wooden Lego are safe, non-toxic, non-irritating, and as durable as the plastic alternatives.

Given these positive outcomes, we believe it is the perfect time to launch these products in the market.

Best regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Natural
email_chain.body:
Dear Eric,

Following the successful distribution of wooden Legos in China, we have received numerous requests from European countries, including Germany, France, Austria, and the Netherlands, among others.

We are thrilled by the high demand and are strategizing to expand our distribution of wooden Legos to these new markets. To facilitate this, we plan to introduce agents who can represent our wooden Legos in these regions. These agents, known for influencing markets with similar products, could earn a 20% commission on contracts they secure with us.

Thanks a lot.

Sincerely,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request from Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body: I am urgently shipping several spare parts from Los Angeles to Hamburg. The total weight of the cargo is 2,800MT and the dimensions are 27mm oversized. I would appreciate your best estimate for the shipping at your earliest convenience, with the aim for the earliest arrival next week. Sincerely, Calvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request from Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hello Calvin, Thank you for reaching out with your shipping needs. To proceed further with the quote, could you please provide more specific details regarding your shipment, including: - Number of packages - Weight per package - Size of each package Additionally, please confirm the exact pick-up location in Los Angeles and the arrival port in Hamburg. You can send this information directly to us at this email address. I am currently traveling to California, and I'll be able to return your call in two days. Best regards, Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request from Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Dear Sales Team, Thank you for your prompt response. I have included here the requested details: - Total packages: 10 - Weight per package approximately: 280MT - Size per package: 27mm (oversized) The cargo will be ready for pick-up at our warehouse in Los Angeles and needs to be delivered to Hamburg port. I look forward to receiving your shipping options and quotes. Best, Calvin

email_chain.subject: Shipping Options for Your Cargo
email_chain.body: Dear Calvin, Thank you for sending the detailed information. Based on your requirements, we can offer shipping via two methods: 1. Air Freight (via DHL Air Courier) - Fastest for time-sensitive deliveries - Agent required for pickup; storage available - Exact arrival time not guaranteed with possible delays 2. Sea Freight - Economical option compared to air freight - Longer transit time but higher cargo capacity Please let us know your preference so we can proceed with the precise quote. Regards, Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Diesel Cargo Availability from Fujairah to Berbera
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Lou, I'd like to inquire about the availability of diesel cargo shipments from Fujairah to Berbera. Could you please provide the available dates for discharge and the delivery terms? Thank you, Roxanne

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Diesel Cargo Availability from Fujairah to Berbera
email_chain.body: Mr. Lou, Thanks a lot for your quick response. As we are onboarding new suppliers, we aim to source diesel in March/April for shipment to Berbera. Can you confirm the availability of cargo for these months? Thanks again, Roxanne

email_chain.subject: Additional Details Required for Diesel Cargo Capacity
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Lou, I am seeking confirmation on the availability of different capacities (1000/1500/2000m3) for the diesel cargo from various load ports including Fujairah and Al-Khobar, destined for Berbera. Could you specify the expected dates of availability in Berbera? Thank you, Roxanne

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote for Light Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body: I would like to book a product tanker for the shipping of light crude oil. Can you provide your best freight rate? Warm regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote for Light Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Thanks for your request, Peter. Please provide further details about the shipment, especially the quantity of crude oil and preferred shipping dates. Additionally, we require your confirmation on the proposed transit routes and locations as noted in the attached table. Please review our company information through the links provided and let us know if everything aligns with your expectations. We look forward to your timely response. Best regards, Your Name

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Ethyl Alcohol from Rotterdam to Jebel Ali
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

Please quote your rates for shipping 3,100MT of ethyl alcohol from Rotterdam to Jebel Ali within the next two weeks. Our demurrage policy is 6% daily. Please send your Equipment Work Order (EWO) along with the quote.

Best regards,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Schedule and Rates
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

Thank you for your swift response. We can confirm a shipment scheduled for departure on May 9th, price at USD 450 per MT. We have noted a 7% free of charge policy and the terms FOB. We're flexible to adjust the volume, accepting a minimum of 100MT per lot for full container load.

Please confirm if you accept these conditions and send the EWO and FBL for further processing. Do let us know if additional loads can be discussed.

Best regards,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Shipping Confirmation: 1,000MT Ethyl Alcohol
email_chain.body:
Dear Mateo,

Please accept the attached bill of lading for 1,000MT ethyl alcohol from Rotterdam to Jebel Ali. Kindly notify us of your confirmation by return email.

Regards,
Hong Kong Shipping Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Proforma Invoice Request and Order Placement
email_chain.body:
Dear Hong Kong Shipping Ltd.,

We confirm acceptance of the terms and have attached a Proforma invoice request. Our payment is due 45 days post-arrival in Jebel Ali. Please advise if this setup works for you.

Best regards,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Re: Next Load Inquiry and Proforma Invoice
email_chain.body:
Dear Mateo,

Thank you for your order confirmation. We are finalizing the Proforma Invoice. Could you please confirm if we can schedule the next load of ethyl alcohol on board our vessel as per the agreed terms?

Regards,
Hong Kong Shipping Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Proforma and Additional Loads
email_chain.body:
Dear Hong Kong Shipping Ltd.,

Please find attached the confirmation of the Proforma Invoice. We are interested in discussing additional loads of ethyl alcohol. Kindly inform us about your vessel's availability in the coming months.

Best regards,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about storage and transportation capacity for pump oil
email_chain.body:
Mark,

Do you have space for 1,800MT of pump oil at a later date, and is there an available vessel that can accommodate a ketch container load? Looking forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about storage capacity and ketch container for pump oil
email_chain.body:
Hi all,

To follow up on John's email, how many tonnes of pump oil can we store in the next week, and are there options to assist with a ketch load? Thank you for the updates.

Sincerely,
A.N. Other

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for HDPE from China to Vladivostok
email_chain.body:
Hello Jonas,

Please provide a freight quote for transporting 35,000MT of HDPE from China to Vladivostok within the next three weeks. We've had no issues with the agent handling this cargo previously, and I expect the same level of service to continue.

Best regards,
Luke

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Inquiry: Tianjin to Lulea
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

We have a job involving 35,000MT of HDPE that needs to be delivered from the Port of Tianjin to Lulea, Sweden with an ETA of October 10th. Can you provide a quote for this shipment?

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Pickup Schedule Request: Shanghai to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

I would like to schedule a pickup for 35,000MT of HDPE to be transported from Shanghai to Halifax, Nova Scotia, with a required delivery by October 20th. Do you have capacity available?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: LCL Freight Shipment Quote from Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hello Jonas,

I am looking to book a Less Container Load (LCL) freight shipment for 35,000MT of HDPE from Qingdao to New York, targeting delivery in October. Can you provide an instant quote for this shipment?

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote for DHT Cargo from Dalian to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hello, We have a shipment of 8,000MT of DHT from Dalian to Qingdao scheduled for departure on the 28th of September. Please provide me with a quote, including cargo and freight options. Regards, Victoria

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding the Same DHT Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi, We are interested in the same shipment as described in the previous email regarding the 8,000MT of DHT. It needs to be cost-effective for us. Could you please provide some suggestions on pricing and shipping options? Regards, Anshul

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on DHT Shipment Quote
email_chain.body: Hello, Thanks for the details provided in the previous communications. The lead time is acceptable; however, the current quoted price exceeds our budget. Could you please check alternative cost options with your DHT suppliers in China? Regards, Anshul

email_chain.subject: Review and Preventive Measures for Future Ethanol Deliveries
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Ross,

Do you remember the delivery incident of ethanol from Vigo to Fos sur Mer? To prevent a recurrence, it is crucial that we prepare a detailed load list and establish a rigorous schedule. This will help us in mitigating similar occurrences in the future.

Best regards,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Review and Preventive Measures for Future Ethanol Deliveries
email_chain.body:
Hello Rory,

Yes, I recall the incident quite well. Can you enlighten me on what exactly went wrong and the learnings from this experience? Most importantly, how do we ensure that there is no repeat of such an incident, considering the environmental hazards involved?
I look forward to understanding more about the preventive steps we can take.

Regards,
Ross

email_chain.subject: Re: Review and Preventive Measures for Future Ethanol Deliveries
email_chain.body:
Hi Ross,

My team and I are examining the incident in detail and will report back with our findings. Our primary objective is to minimize risks and achieve an accident-free operation, with a strong commitment towards environmental safety.

I'll keep you updated.

Best,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Review and Preventive Measures for Future Ethanol Deliveries
email_chain.body:
Hello Rory,

Thank you for the update. It is crucial that we not only rely on individual commitments but also reinforce our systems to prevent such errors. Ensuring our employees adhere to safety and operational standards through robust systems will help us avoid future errors.

Looking forward to the findings from your team.

Best,
Ross

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Succinic Acid
email_chain.body: Hello Axel, We are looking to charter approximately 20,000 MT of succinic acid from the Far East to the US East Coast. Could you please advise if your team can handle this? Thanks, Richard

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Succinic Acid Supply
email_chain.body: Hello Team, We are in search of high-quality succinic acid. We require about 25,000 MT. Could you please send me your proposal, minimum order quantity, and the specifications? Regards, Luis

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation for Succinic Acid
email_chain.body: Hello Team, I have a requirement for 25,000 MT of succinic acid for May 2022. I hope you have the availability as per our required specifications. Could you please provide a quotation and your offer? Thanks, Guy

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,
We have a requirement to transport 2,200MT of ammonium sulfate from Damietta to Koper. Could you provide a freight quote for a Cargo and Freight (C&F) basis using your vessel that sails next week? I'm looking forward to doing business with you.
Sincerely,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Truck Freight Cost
email_chain.body:
Hello,
We require transportation for 1,000 kilograms of ammonium sulfate by truck to Copenhagen. Could you please let me know the cost for this service?
Looking forward to our business,
Thomas

email_chain.subject: Market Price Inquiry for Ammonium Sulfate
email_chain.body:
Hi Marianne,
We are interested in purchasing ammonium sulfate from Poland and would appreciate it if you could provide us with the current market price.
Regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Request to Purchase DAP from Serbia
email_chain.body:
Good morning,
In response to your prior communication, we would like to confirm that we can supply 2,000 MT of ammonium sulfate from Poland to India. Please let us know the next steps.
Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Outstanding Payment Reminder
email_chain.body:
Hello Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to remind you that payments for the past three months have not been received. It's crucial for us to settle this overdue account at your earliest convenience. Please let us know of any issues or concerns.

Best wishes,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Outstanding Payment Reminder
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Following up on Anna's email, we urgently require the payment to support ongoing operations. Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Warm regards,
Brad

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Outstanding Payment Reminder
email_chain.body:
Hello Michael,

As discussed by my colleagues Anna and Brad, our office is in desperate need of the funds. We would appreciate if you could process the payment at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Erin

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Outstanding Payment Reminder
email_chain.body:
Hello Michael,

I spoke with Brad regarding the outstanding payment. He mentioned he has already reached out to you. Please let me know if you need any assistance from my end to resolve this matter.

Best wishes,
Dave

email_chain.subject: Request for Charter Rates for Bareboat from Tianjin to Shekou
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Frank,

Thank you for your prompt response to our previous inquiry. We are interested in obtaining a bareboat charter for the transportation of 10,000MT of crude oil from Tianjin to Shekou, with the departure scheduled for the 28th of this month. Could you please provide us with the relevant rates and availability? 

Best regards,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Clarification Required on Crude Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Nick,

We received your request but need some clarification before proceeding. It is unclear whether we are supposed to supply empty tanks for you to fill with crude or if we are to load your provided crude at our port and deliver to your designated port. There was also a mention of supplying 50% of the crude; please confirm if that's accurate.

Furthermore, we have a prior interest from another shipowner for the same route and timing. Please advise us promptly on how you wish to proceed.

Best regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification Required on Crude Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi Frank,

Thanks for your response. To clarify, we are looking to charter an oil tanker, specifically the PCTC FEDRA REY, to transport the crude oil. We do not need ownership or rental beyond this specific shipment. Can your firm arrange a supply of crude for this tanker?

I look forward to your confirmation or any alternatives you might propose. 

Best,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Additional Requirement: Petrochemicals
email_chain.body:
Hi Frank,

Please include an additional request for the transportation of 1,000 MT of petrochemicals at a rate of US $13.50/MT in our upcoming charter. 

Thanks,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Final Proposal for Crude and Petrochemicals Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Nick,

Following our discussions, we are prepared to accommodate the transportation of 50,000 MT of crude and 5,000 MT of soybeans. The charter will be under a daily rate of US $23,000, without any options. 

The loading window is set from 07:00 hrs on January 27th to 22:00 hrs on January 30th. Please confirm if these terms are acceptable so we can proceed with the formal agreement. 

Best regards,
Frank

labels.cargo_size: 50,000 MT of crude, 5,000 MT of soybeans

email_chain.subject: Preparation for Loading on Perla de Panama
email_chain.body: Hi, On May 23, the freighter Perla de Panama will call at Houston for a brief 10-minute loading window. Can you confirm if the shipper is ready for loading and if there are any special requirements we need to be aware of?

email_chain.subject: RE: Preparation for Loading on Perla de Panama
email_chain.body: Hello Jimmy, I just received an update from our supplier indicating an emergency delay in the production of some items. Please ensure that everything is ready for the cargo's arrival when the Perla de Panama docks.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Additional Order of Mosaico Products
email_chain.body: My dear team, We received a new order from our client requiring an extra 15 boxes of the product named Mosaico. Please confirm if this can be accommodated.

email_chain.subject: Emergency Situation at the Yard
email_chain.body: Hi Jimmy, Due to severe rainfall last weekend, our yard is currently in disarray. We need to relocate some cargo to the warehouse to facilitate clearing and continue operations. Specifically, box X45678 must be moved to the warehouse and will then be forwarded to Houston as planned.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Requested for Forwarding Box X45678
email_chain.body: The box named X45678 should be forwarded to its final destination as soon as possible. Please note that the weather is currently clear, with a favorable forecast extending until mid July.

email_chain.subject: Special Discount Offer on Mosaico Products
email_chain.body: Dear Jimmy, We are pleased to offer you a 50% discount on the line items Mosaico X45678 and Mosaico X34567. The new order has been processed and will be ready for loading tomorrow.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Transport Options Delay
email_chain.body: Hi Rory, I've reviewed the transport options and it's challenging to find the perfect solution given our delayed shipment, which significantly impacts our schedule. Could we discuss this over the phone for a quicker resolution? My contact number is 2033xxxxxxxx, and I'm available from 0800 to 1700. Could you please let me know if you have a slot during these hours? Best, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Transport Options Delay
email_chain.body: Thanks, Jonas. I'm currently heading to a meeting and will be unable to discuss this right now. I'll be back in the office next week and will aim to call you on Tuesday or Wednesday. My office hours are 8:30 am to 4:30 pm. Please let me know if there's a specific time that works best within these hours. I'll confirm the exact time I'll be calling. Regards, Rory

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Charter - Pig Iron Transport from Gijon to Antwerp
email_chain.body: Hello, This is Olivia from Gijon Logistics. I am inquiring if you have a suitable vessel available for transporting 6,300MT of pig iron from Gijon to Antwerp next week. Looking forward to your prompt reply. Thank you, Olivia.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Vessel Availability for Bearing Balls Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello, This is Rachel at Sea Star Lines. I am reaching out to inquire about a suitable vessel for transporting GKN Bearing Balls from Puducherry, India to Hull, United Kingdom in the first half of May.
