email_chain.subject: Detailed Arrival Time Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Karina, To confirm, the cargo LCL arrived in Mombasa port at 23:15 on 8 August. Thanks, Chen

email_chain.subject: Offer to Purchase 9,200MT Palm Oil from Nigeria to Calcutta
email_chain.body:
Dear Client,

We are pleased to inform you that you have the opportunity to purchase 9,200MT of palm oil, which will be shipped from Nigeria to Calcutta. Mr. Cheng, our Shipping Manager, has checked the ports and provided the best offer details as follows:

1. Less Container Load (LCL) Surcharge: +1.00%
2. Gross Port Handling: +0.50%

The shipping details include:
- Order Type: LCL
- Loading Rate
- Delivery Rate
- Insurance Rate
- Demurrage Rate
- Dispatch Rate
Please review and let us know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
The Shipping Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer to Purchase 9,200MT Palm Oil from Nigeria to Calcutta
email_chain.body:
Dear Shipping Manager,

Thank you for the details on the palm oil shipment. I am reviewing the provided rates and conditions. Could you please also confirm the per metric ton rate for both LCL and bulk? Additionally, could you provide a more detailed breakdown of insurance and demurrage rates?

Looking forward to your prompt reply.

Best regards,
[Client's Name]

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Response Needed for Palm Oil Shipment Deal
email_chain.body:
Dear Client,

I wanted to bring to your attention that our partners in China have expressed interest in finalizing a purchase order before this Sunday evening. Doing so will secure the deal under the discussed terms. Could I get the contact emails for the respective stakeholders on your end to facilitate this process?

Please let us know at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Mr. Cheng

email_chain.subject: Request for Rate Quotation - 1500MT Chemical Product Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. James,

I am interested in offloading 1500MT of chemical products in Asia, specifically requiring a total unit size of 2500GP. We aim to complete this within the next 30 days. Could you please provide an immediate rate quotation?

Thank you,
Daniel Mills

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Rate Quotation - 1500MT Chemical Product Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email of 12th June inquiring about our rates for 2500GP with our Chemical Company in Asia.

As you might be aware, our shipping program is strictly scheduled with our vendor in the Far East. Your vessel is slated to arrive at our docks on the morning of 15th June 2020 and will depart at 15:30 PM on the same day.

Please review our rates below and let me know what can work for you:

1. Per Unit Rate (USD/MT)
   2500GP: 27,650

2. Consolidation Basis (USD/MT)
   2500GP: 27,650

We plan to begin loading your cargo around 16th June 2020 using standard SWB bags (1250 kgs each).

Best regards,
Mr. James

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Delivery for Shipping
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email.

We will have the full cargo ready to load as per your shipping schedule for the specified container. It will be delivered to your docks on the 15th of June 2020.

Regards,
Daniel Mills

email_chain.subject: Shipment Schedule Confirmation and Query on Load Time
email_chain.body:
Greetings Mr. James,

We are pleased to confirm our shipment order of 2500GP of Chemical Materials from our ship’s berth at Your Company’s Port on 16th June 2020. Our shipping line is Vessel Name, which will be arriving at the port on 15th June 2020.

Could you please inform me how much time is required for loading our shipment? Our cargo will be delivered to your port as previously mentioned on 15th June 2020.

Thank you for your kind response.

Best regards,
Daniel Mills

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vessel Availability for Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Benjamin, We need to confirm your vessel's availability to avoid any delays in cargo shipments. We are planning to ship a load of lime three times consecutively, followed by a shipment of vegetable oil in two weeks. We understand that you have a dry cargo vessel available for the lime, but will need to confirm availability for the vegetable oil. Could you please let us know the available dates for shipping lime and the potential availability for the vegetable oil? We look forward to your prompt response to plan accordingly. Thank you, Luis.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Vessel Availability for Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Luis, Thank you for reaching out. Our vessel 'KT BV' is available to load lime starting 12/27/13. We can also accommodate your lime shipments on these dates: 12/27/13 and 1/2/14. For the vegetable oil, 'KT BV' will be available on 1/15/14. Additionally, our vessel 'RHV BV' can transport a load of lime on 12/27/13, and a load of vegetable oil on 12/29/13. Let us know if these arrangements work for you. Best regards, Nina.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Vessel Availability for Upcoming Shipments
email_chain.body: Hi Nina, Thank you for the detailed information. The availability of 'KT BV' for the lime shipments starting from 12/27/13 works well for us. We accept this schedule and will prepare accordingly. Please confirm the final arrangements as soon as possible. Thanks again, Luis.

email_chain.subject: Arrangements for Loading on 'KT BV'
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Benjamin, I am coordinating with the transporter who will be loading your vessel 'KT BV' today. While we do not yet have a complete bill of lading, we are ready to proceed with a load confirmation. Could you advise on when you'll be able to provide the necessary documentation, including a signed cargo receipt? Thank you, Luis.

email_chain.subject: Re: Arrangements for Loading on 'KT BV'
email_chain.body: Hi Luis, We can confirm receipt of the cargo from your shipper by tomorrow (12/31/13). Our master will also have the bill of lading ready to receive. He will be available at our pier tomorrow. Let us know if this schedule works for you. Regards, Nina.

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation for Tomorrow's Cargo and Documentation
email_chain.body: Hello Luis, Following up on our earlier communication, the signed cargo receipt has been arranged. Our master will arrive at the pier on 1/1/14 at approximately 10:00 AM. If the bill of lading arrives earlier, we will forward it to you. Could you please confirm if this arrangement works for your schedule? Thanks, Nina.

email_chain.subject: Request for LPG Shipment from Singapore to Bremen
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Labonante,

We require a shipment of 1,600MT of LPG from Singapore to Bremen. Could you please confirm if your vessel is available to service this route within the next 15 days? Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could provide the monthly rates for shipping 1,600MT of LPG on this route.

Thank you,
Valentin

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Shipment from Singapore to Bremen
email_chain.body:
Hello Valentin,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer you a rate of $80/MT for the shipment. If our vessel is available, we can arrange a spot charter for the shipment to be delivered by March 1. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this arrangement.

Best Regards,
Tom Labonante

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for LPG Shipment from Singapore to Bremen
email_chain.body:
Thank you for the offer!

We are interested in proceeding with the charter bound for Bremen, carrying 1,600MT of LPG. Could you also provide the monthly rates for future shipments on this route?

Best Regards,
Valentin

email_chain.subject: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bagos,

We plan to move 7,500MT of polyethylene pellets from Ningbo to Vladivostok next month. Could you share your earliest laycan dates and confirm if you offer any flexibility on demurrage?

Best regards,
Stephanie

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Stephanie,

Thank you for your enquiry. We can offer a laycan date of May 7th and confirm that there will be no demurrage charge. We expect our shipments from China this month to be on time.

Best regards,
Austin

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Austin,

Thank you for the information. Could you please provide an earlier laycan date if possible? Additionally, confirming again, there will be no demurrage charges?

Best regards,
Stephanie

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Stephanie,

At this moment, the earliest laycan date available is still May 7th. And yes, I confirm once again that there won’t be any demurrage charges.

Best regards,
Austin

email_chain.subject: Request for CIF Freight Quote for Corn Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Porter,

We have 2,500MT of corn oil for delivery from Northfleet to Tianjin. Could you please provide us with a CIF freight quote? Additionally, could you inform us about the temperature control capabilities in your tanks for each of the export destinations?

Regards,
Sunny

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for CIF Freight Quote for Corn Oil
email_chain.body:
Hi Sunny,

2,500MT of corn oil from Northfleet to Tianjin is a task well within our capabilities. All our tanks maintain standard temperatures, suitable for safe transport except for those situated in the north of England. Your cargo is scheduled for offloading on October 7th and delivery by October 12th. The exact delivery location will be confirmed on the day of the cargo.

We will provide you with the freight quote shortly.

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Proposal for PE Cargo Shipment to Europe for March
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Smith, I am interested in trading 2,000MT of PE to Europe using a combination of FOB and CFR terms. Please note, the market rate for March has already started to rise. Could you confirm the rates from your supplier and revert with an acceptable rate? I look forward to your details. Regards, Alfred

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for PE Cargo Shipment to Europe for March
email_chain.body: Hi Alfred, Thanks for your email. Could you please provide more details on the terms of trade, especially how you plan to price it for a March shipment? I look forward to your response. Regards, Liz

email_chain.subject: Request for FOB Pricing - New Delhi
email_chain.body: Thanks, Alfred. Could you please prepare a rate based on FOB New Delhi as the prices for CIF New Delhi and Rotterdam are slightly higher than expected. Regards, Liz

email_chain.subject: FOB New Delhi Price Proposal
email_chain.body: Hi Liz, Here is the price for FOB New Delhi. Let me know if this works for you. Regards, Alfred

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB New Delhi Price Proposal
email_chain.body: Hi Alfred, Thanks for the response. However, the rates you have mentioned are from two weeks back. The price of March has already started to rise. Could you please refresh the rate based on 1st March? Regards, Liz

email_chain.subject: Updated FOB New Delhi Rate as of 1st March
email_chain.body: Hi Liz, I have updated the rate as per your request to be based on 1st March. Please review and confirm. Regards, Alfred

email_chain.subject: Request for CIF Rotterdam Pricing
email_chain.body: Hi Alfred, Thanks for the update. However, this updated price still doesn't match the current market rate at European FOB port prices which are our primary concern. Could you possibly provide an offer on CIF Rotterdam basis? I look forward to your proposal. Regards, Liz

email_chain.subject: CIF Rotterdam Pricing Offer
email_chain.body: Thanks, Liz. Here is the offer on CIF Rotterdam basis. Please check and let me know if it meets your requirements. Regards, Alfred

email_chain.subject: Re: CIF Rotterdam Pricing Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Alfred, Thanks for the price. However, the CIF Rotterdam price seems to be slightly higher than the FOB New Delhi price. So, please try and match FOB New Delhi price. Regards, Liz

email_chain.subject: Final Offer - CIF Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Liz, Sorry, I do not have the exact price at FOB New Delhi currently. I can, however, offer you the same on CIF Rotterdam basis at a slightly higher rate. Regards, Alfred

email_chain.subject: Inquiry on Freight Quote for Anthracite Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We are planning to ship 4,100MT of anthracite coal from West Bengal to Kuching. Could you please confirm your demurrage rate, any berth restrictions during weekends, and if it is possible to receive a lump sum freight quote?

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Freight Quote for Anthracite Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Jade,

Thank you for your email. The demurrage charges would be USD 10 per day, subject additionally to the ICD storage fee. We would require a two-week clearance for processing. We can provide you with a lump sum quote upon receipt of the Full Corporate Offer (FCO), Bill of Lading (B/L) details, and Direct Consignment Status (DCS) information.

Your coal samples can be shipped along with the main consignment, or we can arrange to receive and pick up the sample at the ICD. Kindly note, we are unable to open samples at the ICD, but this can be arranged at the port facility. Your vessel is scheduled for berth between July 26 and August 3, allowing us to load your shipment within these dates.

Please let us know if you need any further assistance.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Freight Quote for Anthracite Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your prompt response.

Could you please confirm if you can process the cargo under my terms and conditions? Also, could you send your standard terms and conditions via email? How should I proceed with sending you the completed quotation?

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry on Freight Quote for Anthracite Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Jade,

It's my pleasure to provide the requested information. Sample testing will be conducted at the port facility. We require a sample FCO for each item received. Upon testing, we will generate a test report for each item but not the quantities of each item separately. The invoice for the samples will be issued separately from the main cargo invoice.

We can share our standard terms and conditions via email. Please confirm whether you can accept these terms, and advise how you would like to proceed with the quotation submission.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Space Booking
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Smith,

I'm seeking to verify capacity availability for 2,000MT of cotton from Chennai to Mumbai. Could you let me know if there are any openings available soon? We'd need to coordinate a booking by the 16th. Thank you.

Best regards,
Casey

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Space Booking
email_chain.body:
Hi Casey,

Can you please confirm if you would like to proceed with booking 2,000MT of Cotton FOB from Chennai to Mumbai as discussed? I will arrange the booking and provide you with a booking reference number upon confirmation.

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Reference Number
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I confirm the booking of 2,000MT FOB Chennai to Mumbai for our cotton shipment. Thank you for providing the booking reference number L8A63I. I will send our terms and conditions shortly.

Best regards,
Casey

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice and Terms & Conditions
email_chain.body:
Hi Casey,

Please find attached the Proforma invoice for your reference. We need you to review and sign the attached terms and conditions.

We look forward to your response.

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proforma Invoice and Terms & Conditions
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I will review and get back to you with our feedback on the attached Proforma Invoice and terms and conditions.

Thank you,
Casey

email_chain.subject: Awaiting Feedback on Proforma Invoice
email_chain.body:
Hi Casey,

Just a gentle reminder that we are awaiting your feedback regarding the Proforma Invoice for your cargo shipment.

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: Our Terms & Conditions for Your Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Below please find attached our adapted terms and conditions for your confirmation.

Thank you,
Casey

email_chain.subject: Receipt and Invoice Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Casey,

Please find attached the receipt for your cargo. We have received payment of INR 10,43,25,000 for the shipment details. We appreciate your quick cooperation and look forward to finalizing the rest of the shipment process.

Thank you,
John

email_chain.subject: MGO Vessel Expected Arrival 08/22/21
email_chain.body: Hi Devin, Ample J. is expected to arrive at Antwerp with 39,100MT of MGO 180 CST on August 22, 2021. This is the current loading sequence, followed by our capacity utilization. We can load this cargo up to August 24. Please confirm your earliest available vessel arrival date to assist with cargo scheduling. Regards, Rax

email_chain.subject: MGO Antwerp Capacity Usage 08/20/21
email_chain.body: Hi Reha, The Antwerp Jetty is now fully utilized and no additional capacity will be available before Sept 1st. By that time I believe there will be more vessels in Antwerp to take on MGO products. Best, Devin

email_chain.subject: Vessel AMFIE Cargo Booking
email_chain.body: Dear Reha, I am informed that the vessel AMFIE, expected to arrive in Antwerp tomorrow, is carrying products totaling 50,000 MT. I am ready to book cargo forward. Please let me know if we can proceed. Regards, Devin

email_chain.subject: No MGO Vessels Scheduled
email_chain.body: Hi Reha, There are no MGO vessels scheduled at Antwerp in the foreseeable future. Should Antwerp become available, we will let you know. Best, Devin

email_chain.subject: Update on Antwerp MGO Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Devin, Antwerp was filled recently and no MGO vessels were in the queue when I checked last. I will continue to monitor Antwerp's availability and keep you updated. Regards, Rax

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Vessel Requirement for Steel Shipment from Port Kelang to Khor Al Zabbar
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Phal, we are experiencing issues with lightering at Port Kelang and need to discharge steel cargo within 3 hours. Could you please identify the fastest and most reliable vessel available to transport the cargo from Port Kelang to Khor Al Zabbar? Kind regards, Prince

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Vessel Requirement for Steel Shipment from Port Kelang to Khor Al Zabbar
email_chain.body: I assume you are referring to the STS discharge from BULKER Berth 7, Port Kelang, Malaysia. The most reliable vessel for this task is the bulker ZEMASHTO. Here is a link to the ZEMASHTO's schedule: http://www.fleeter.com/Schedu...CafCoMarine-DwhThomo.txt. Please contact Mr. E. Sary at 'Sary@kelangmarine.com' for further coordination. Sincerely, Quan Chu

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Vessel Requirement for Steel Shipment from Port Kelang to Khor Al Zabbar
email_chain.body: Dear Quan Chu, Thank you for the prompt response. I have spoken with our agent, Mr. E. Sary, in Port Kelang. He confirmed that ZEMASHTO is currently at the berth and can offload within 8 hours. I believe this vessel will be most suitable for our needs at BULKER Berth 7, Malaysia. Please let me know if there are any further issues or questions. Regards, Prince

email_chain.subject: Schedule Update: MSTINAPOL at Khor Al Zabbar Port
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Phal, The MSTINAPOL has just docked at Khor Al Zabbar Port in Egypt. However, her schedule has been delayed by one day. Can we postpone the cargo loading accordingly? Please advise as soon as possible. Kindly, Prince

email_chain.subject: Queries Regarding the Port of Tema
email_chain.body: Sirs, I have several questions about the Port of Tema: 1) Is there a fourth berth at this location? 2) If so, what are the length and depth of the berth? 3) Are special permits required for anchoring or any particular docking procedures? 4) Is it permissible for ships to anchor 2 miles from the seawall? 5) Will the pilot come aboard in the morning? 6) Please provide the contact details for the pilotage station. 7) Could you also provide the contact information for the local tug company? 8) Lastly, please provide the contact details for customs. Thank you, Prince

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Diesel Shipment from Venezuela to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hello M/s Alex, I need to schedule a shipment of 3,200MT of diesel from Venezuela to Rotterdam. I have 8 deliveries planned from July 15 to August 1. Could you please inform me about the deposit requirements? Do you prefer payment by wire transfer or cash? Looking forward to your reply. Regards, Tal

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Diesel Shipment from Venezuela to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Tal, Thank you for your inquiry. We would be glad to assist with your shipment. Our minimum deposit amount is US$100,000 per shipment. Since you are requesting 8 shipments, the total minimum deposit would be US$800,000. This will be made in 8 installments of US$100,000 each, and will be deducted from the total shipment value. For instance, if you are shipping 3,200MT of diesel at US$500 per MT, the total cost would be US$1,600,000. After deposit deductions, the remaining cost would be US$800,000. We require this advance payment to guarantee your shipment. This deposit acts as a surety for covering our freight charges. Best regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Additional Information on Freight and Deposit Requirements
email_chain.body: Hi Tal, I apologize if there was any misunderstanding earlier. It can be challenging to arrange such a significant amount of money in a short period, which is why we require a higher deposit than usual. This advance payment is necessary to secure your shipments and ensure the coverage of our freight charges. Our forwarders are quite risk-averse and often operate with limited resources, which mainly go towards covering freight. They do not take chances on shipments easily. I fully understand their concerns and hope this clarifies the situation. Have a good day. Regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability and Proposal
email_chain.body: Dear Christian, I am seeking a vessel to transport 3,000MT of rapeseed from Hamburg to Nizhny Novgorod, with desired dispatch between March 8-12. Could you kindly send me a proposal that includes demurrage terms within the next three days? Thank you very much, Ursula Herron

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Proposal
email_chain.body: Dear Ursula, Thank you for your inquiry. We are currently reviewing our vessel schedules and will need some additional time before we can provide a detailed proposal. Would a two-week period be acceptable for you to wait? Best regards, Christian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability and Proposal
email_chain.body: Dear Ursula, Thank you for your patience. After careful consideration, we have decided not to proceed with a booking at this time. We appreciate your understanding. Best wishes, Christian

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Limassol to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Zoe,

We are looking to consolidate 2,800MT of frozen pork from Limassol to Amsterdam. We're considering a 40' High Cube container for the shipment. Could you please provide a quote for this transportation?

Regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote: Limassol to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

To provide you with a precise quote, I need to confirm the following: How much weight does the cargo have? Additionally, do you have any specific preferences for the port of discharge and the required delivery date?

Thank you for your time.
Zoe

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Options: Limassol to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

Here are the available options for shipping 2,800MT of frozen pork from Limassol to Amsterdam using a 40' High Cube container:

- Departure Date: November 11th, 2022  | Cost: €5,350 per container
- Departure Date: November 14th, 2022  | Cost: €5,450 per container
- Departure Date: November 18th, 2022  | Cost: €5,650 per container
- Departure Date: November 20th, 2022  | Cost: €5,850 per container
- Departure Date: November 23rd, 2022  | Cost: €6,200 per container
- Departure Date: November 26th, 2022  | Cost: €6,550 per container

Please let me know your preferred option.

Best regards,
Zoe

email_chain.body:

Mr. S.D. Jha
Managing Director
Sethi International

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Zircon from Dammam to Amiens, France
email_chain.body: Hi, Can your team handle a shipment of 8,800MT of zircon from Dammam to Amiens, France? I appreciate your assistance. Thank you. Please respond within 4 hours. Best regards, Kenny

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Non-Latin Characters Issue in Email
email_chain.body: Dear Team, We encountered non-Latin characters in an email that doesn't render correctly in Outlook. Please advise the sender to correct this for future correspondence. Thank you. Regards, Kenny

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment: 3500MT Coal from Rusita to Port Antalya
email_chain.body: Dear Team, I'm inquiring about shipping 3500MT of coal from Rusita to Port Antalya (TURC). Your prompt response within 4 hours would be appreciated. Thank you for your support. Best, Kenny

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Soybeans from S. Vancouver to Sydney, Australia
email_chain.body: Hi, Could your team manage a shipment of 300MT of soybeans from South Vancouver to Sydney, Australia? Thanks for your assistance. Please reply within 4 hours. Regards, Kenny

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping 100MT LPG from Melbourne to Zurich
email_chain.body: Hi, We are looking to transport 100MT of LPG from Melbourne to Zurich, Switzerland. Your assistance is valuable, and a response within 4 hours would be great. Thanks, Kenny

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping 1600MT Urea from Rawalpindi
email_chain.body: Hi Team, Could you handle a shipment of 1600MT of urea from Rawalpindi? Your quick response would be appreciated. Thank you. Best regards, Kenny

email_chain.subject: Request for Laycan Availability and CIF Quotation
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Ingram, We are interested in shipping 1,200MT of apples from Edinburgh to Santiago. Could you please confirm your earliest available laycan slot and clarify if you provide quotes under CIF terms? Kind regards, Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Laycan Availability and CIF Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Ron, Yes, we do have an available laycan slot on 31st August. We can quote under CIF terms. Please provide your sea bills, and we will proceed with the arrangements. Thanks, Gail

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Additional Information
email_chain.body: Hi Gail, Thank you for confirming the laycan for 31st August and clarifying the CIF terms. For your information, although our primary focus is agricultural products, we are also involved in contract work related to the oil and gas industry in Saudi Arabia. Best regards, Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation and Additional Information
email_chain.body: Hi Ron, Thanks for your confirmation. We will finalize the laycan details shortly and send you the updated slots. Please let me know if you need this information by tomorrow evening. Have a great day! Gail

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Information
email_chain.body:
Dear Logistics Manager,

I am looking to arrange transportation for a cargo of 2,900MT from Rotterdam to Mombasa. Could you please confirm if you have a vessel available that departs late next month? I would appreciate it if you could confirm the laycan period as well.

Best regards,
Pat

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Information
email_chain.body:
Hello Pat,

Thank you for reaching out. To proceed with your request, could you please provide the following details about the cargo?
1. Name of the cargo
2. GT/NT
3. Gross weight
4. Weight of packaging
5. Specify if LCL or FCL
6. Time of loading
7. Port of discharge
8. Type of container required

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Logistics Manager

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation for Canola Seed Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Cooper,

Please confirm your quote for 13,100MT of canola seed from Revelstoke to Rotterdam. We expect delivery to be on January 21, 2019.

Kind regards,
Brian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Loading Availability and Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for your assistance. Could you let us know if you have the availability to load your consignment from Regina this month and provide us with a quote assuming the service is available?

Kind regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Quote and Availability for Shipping from Regina
email_chain.body:
Dear Brian and Laura,

Thank you for your previous inquiry. We are available to load your consignment from Regina to Rotterdam. The price will be $34,000.00/T, FOB Regina, shipped by rail. We would love to offer our services for your shipping needs.

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Quote and Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. James,

We are interested in your quote of $34,000.00/T, FOB Regina, shipped by rail. Kindly confirm the availability of the vessel on January 22, 2019, as we expect to ship on that date.

Thank you,
Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Quote and Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, the offer to load from Regina on January 22, 2019, is unavailable.

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Transit Availability from Gulf of Guinea to Algeciras
email_chain.body: Hi Samantha, We are looking to ship 500MT of fertilizers from the Gulf of Guinea to Algeciras. Do you have any suitable transit options available? Please advise. Best regards, Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transit Availability from Gulf of Guinea to Algeciras
email_chain.body: Hi Emma, I'm very interested in this deal. Could you please provide more details about the product specifications? Best regards, Mohammed

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Transit Availability from Gulf of Guinea to Algeciras
email_chain.body: Hi Mohammed, Apologies for any confusion, but it seems there was a mistake in my initial request. We actually need to ship 400MT of cement, not fertilizers. Can you accommodate this? Regards, Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Cargo Requirement - Cement Shipping
email_chain.body: Hi Emma, Thank you for the clarification. The transit is available for 400MT of cement. Let me know when you are ready to further discuss the export details. Regards, Mohammed

email_chain.subject: Availability Inquiry for Liquid Sugar Transport
email_chain.body: Hi! We are looking to transport 6,000MT of liquid sugar to Surabaya using a 27,000MT capacity Heavy lift/Project cargo carrier. Could you please let us know if you have availability to load by June 20th, and what your demurrage rates would be? Thank you for your time. Regards, Brian.

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Inquiry for Liquid Sugar Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Brian, Thank you for your enquiry. Unfortunately, we do not have any availability for cargo for the 20th of June due to pending Bunker Bill payments, expected to be settled by the 13th of June. The earliest availability for our vessels to load and depart from the US would be the 25th of June. Regarding demurrage, our rates start at USD 1.00 per cubic foot per day, subject to a maximum annual rate of USD 75 per cubic foot. We can discuss this in detail to tailor the terms to your needs. Best regards, Shipping Operations Team.

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Update for Liquid Sugar Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Brian, Upon further review of our schedule, unfortunately, there are no available slots for your cargo until August. We apologize for any inconvenience and hope we can assist you in the future. Best regards, Katie.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Rajan,

Could you provide your estimate for 6,000MT of crude palm oil to Mataram? We are looking for a fast 7-day sail.

Best regards,
Mark Goh

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Goh,

Thank you for your inquiry. Due to unforeseen circumstances, we will require an additional day to provide you with the estimate. I look forward to working together.

Best regards,
Ms. Rajan
Team Magellan Shipping Line

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Rajan,

We appreciate the extra time for a response, but could you also check if a sail date of July 5th would be available? Thank you.

Best regards,
Mark Goh

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate and Sail Date Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Goh,

Thank you for your sail date inquiry. We will look into the possibility of setting sail on July 5th immediately. We understand the urgency and are prioritizing your other requirements as well. Please let us know if you have any other inquiries.

Kind regards,
Ms. Rajan
Team Magellan Shipping Line

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Estimate and Sail Date Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Rajan,

We are glad to hear your prompt efforts in meeting our delivery requirements. We await the details. 

Thank you,
Mark Goh

email_chain.subject: Final Estimate and Confirmation for Shipping
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Goh,

We can confirm the availability of transport for 6,000MT of crude palm oil to Mataram by July 5th. We will provide you with the complete quote and other details via email shortly.

Thank you for choosing Magellan Shipping Line,
Ms. Rajan

email_chain.subject: Booking Change Request for Kermanshah-Houston (KMX-MOH)
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Lee, I was hoping to change our Kermanshah-Houston (KMX-MOH) booking. Could you please provide your forward schedule for that route? Many thanks, Jeanne

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Ticket from Iran to Canada
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Babad, Good morning. I am writing to inquire about a ticket from Iran to Canada. I noticed on your website that you do not sell these tickets. What are your policies? What are my options? Thank you, Jeanne

email_chain.subject: Request for Review of Startup Aviation Company
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Park, As an aviation enthusiast working at a startup aviation company, I'd appreciate if you could consider writing a review for us. You can find more information on my website linked at the bottom of this email, including a recent blog post about taxis in Paris. Thanks, Marc

email_chain.subject: Follow-up After Flight
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Park, I wanted to ensure that you received my earlier email and to thank you again for your services after last night's flight. Looking forward to seeing you soon! Regards, Charlie

email_chain.subject: Transport Inquiry for 50,000MT of Napalm from Cartagena to Calcutta
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Mertens, 
Can your ship transport 50,000MT of napalm from Cartagena to Calcutta by the end of October? Are there possibilities to use the same lines for transporting rubber as well? Could you also provide me with a cost estimate for this shipment? 
Thanks, 
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Inquiry for 50,000MT of Napalm from Cartagena to Calcutta
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor, 
I regret to inform you that we are unable to transport 50,000MT of napalm as requested due to capacity limits; our ship can only accommodate up to 30,000MT of goods. We are, however, available to transport rubber. Here are our charges: 
- 100,000 napalm per roundtrip 
- 10,000 rubber per roundtrip 
- 200,000 rupees 
Please arrange payment via the following account: 
Account name: Steven Catherst 
Email: ddc@thegoodstuff.com 
Regards, 
Roger Mertens

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Payment Account Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Sir, 
Could you please send your account details through a secure channel? I need to expedite this transaction as my schedule is very tight. 
Thanks, 
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Payment Account Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Sir, 
The account details are as follows: 
- Account email: ddc@thegoodstuff.com 
Please ensure to secure your transactions appropriately. 
Regards, 
Roger Mertens

email_chain.subject: Final Transportation Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir, 
Unfortunately, after further review, it appears that I can't transport your goods as previously discussed. Our vessel's current capacity allows us to only take 20,000MT of goods. Nonetheless, given that you were quick to provide payment details, I have arranged a compensation charge which is 2% of the value of the cargo amount we discussed (60,000MT of napalm). Accordingly, please note the following charges: 
- 100,000 napalm 
- 100,000 rubber 
- 200,000 rupees 
- Roundtrip charge: 1,200 napalm 
Please remit the payment to the account information I provided earlier. 
Best Regards, 
Roger Mertens

email_chain.subject: Price Adjustment Inquiry for Methanol Cargo
email_chain.body:

Yes, $300 to $305 per ton FOB CS for 25k MT of DME was our best offer. We're now interested in more of the April 19 shipment of methanol as well. Please advise if you can come to $300.

Best regards,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Price Adjustment for April 19 Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Carl,

You're the most responsive, I have to say. I'm sure the guys on my end will adjust to the $300 TEC FOB CS price for the April 19 shipment of methanol. I'll get back to you on this later.

Regards,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Response to Price Adjustment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Dana,

That's great to hear. Please let me know by email as soon as you're ready to price 50k MT of the April 19 cargo of methanol. I'm in the office now.

Thanks,
Best,
Carl

email_chain.subject: Finalizing the Price and Quantity for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Carl,

Is the sale of the April 19 methanol shipment completed, or would you consider 50k MT at $300 TEC FOB CS? The booking cost is $35 per unit of MT.

Regards,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Agreement on Price and Booking Cost for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Dana,

Thanks for the note. I'm glad we reached an agreement on price for 25k MT. I can lock it in for 50k MT of the April 19 methanol at $300 TEC FOB CS, and I'm ready to book it now. Is that a deal?

Thanks,
Carl

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Additional Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Yes, Carl, I'm ready to finalize the sale of the April 19 methanol at $300 TEC FOB CS. We're going to need a booking cost of $35 per unit of MT to hold the cargo in Rotterdam.

Best,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Last Year's Budget for Sales Reps
email_chain.body: Hi there, I recently attended an event where I met an individual discussing their annual budget for sales representatives. I recall a figure around $200,000 but I'm uncertain. Could you remind me what our budget was last year? Regards, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Last Year's Budget for Sales Reps
email_chain.body: Hi David, Last year, the budget for our sales rep division was approximately $2,500,000. If you have access to similar funding, I'd definitely be interested in discussing this further. Please feel free to contact me directly to talk more about this. Regards

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Last Year's Budget for Sales Reps
email_chain.body: That would be $50,000 then. Regards, David

email_chain.subject: Proposal of New Role
email_chain.body: Hi David, After giving it considerable thought, I am sincerely impressed by your capabilities. In fact, I think you would be excellent at leading our company. Let me know if you're interested, unless you have other commitments, like coding, that would prevent you from accepting. Regards

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Coal to Al Khobar
email_chain.body:
Could you please provide me with some freight options for shipping 1,000 MT of coal to Al Khobar next week? We plan to use an open-top container for the transport. Looking forward to your prompt response.
Sincerely,
Joseph

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Coal Types Needed
email_chain.body:
I realized I did not specify the type of coal in my last communication. For this consignment, we need both bituminous and anthracite coal. Please confirm the availability of these cargoes as we will need them for the next couple of months.
Yours Truly,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Weekly Update Needed
email_chain.body:
I hope you had a nice weekend. Could you update me on any developments this week? Looking forward to your prompt reply.
Regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Issue with Last Week's Shipment
email_chain.body:
I need to inform you that last week’s shipment had issues with 15% of the cargo being over-dimension. Please make sure to review this week's shipment to ensure compliance with the specifications.
Best Regards,
Shawn

email_chain.subject: Apology and Confirmation of Compliance
email_chain.body:
We apologize for the oversight in the previous shipment. Our team has reviewed this week’s shipment and confirmed that all parameters meet the specified requirements. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Best regards,
The Logistics Team

email_chain.subject: Request for Spot Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Chun,

We need to ship 5,000MT of lithium iron phosphate cells from Inchon to Los Angeles. Could you provide us with a spot freight quote for this shipment?

Thank you,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Spot Freight Quote
email_chain.body:
Thank you for the opportunity to serve you.

We have prepared the spot freight quote for the shipment of 5,000MT of lithium iron phosphate cells from Inchon to Los Angeles. The spot freight rate and details will be sent to you via FedEx express overnight courier. The documentation and pricing will also be detailed in a dedicated FCL/TIM transportation document.

Please find the information at the following link: https://www.wcssupplychain.com/?/WhatsApp/701253689110&order=DESC

Best regards,
Ms. Chun

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quotation Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Chun,

Please kindly let us know the shipping quotation for 25 units of MmkBMA2502E_M06 (total weight = 275 kg) and 2 units of MKRPHD1002S_M06 (total weight = 3.5 kg).

The shipping address is JHG-KYA-NA2-10-3, MTO-NA-NVT-50, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea.

Thank you so much.

Best Regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Confirmation Required for Shipping Details and Costs
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Could you confirm the lead time, and the shipping cost for the details you have emailed? Additionally, please confirm if you have included the shipping documentation mentioned.

Thanks,
Sapphire

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation Required for Shipping Details and Costs
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your mail.

We will reply to you by tomorrow with the details requested.

Regards,
Sapphire

email_chain.subject: Shipping Information for Items
email_chain.body:
Hi Sara,

The items weigh about 100KG for LCL shipments and less than 5kg per unit for air cargo. Please find the detailed specifications for each item you requested below:

- 2x 48B-7S 38mm Length x 13mm Width x 34mm Height
- 48pcs, less than 25KG per unit

Regards,
Sapphire

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Diesel Transportation from Amsterdam to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Reid,

I require urgent assistance to transport 5,000MT of diesel from Amsterdam to Karachi at the earliest opportunity. Could you provide information on availability and what steps need to be taken to proceed?

Kind regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Freight Services and Support
email_chain.body:
Hello again,

I would like to gain some clarifications regarding your freight services. Do you offer customer support throughout the shipping process, or will I be required to manage the details personally? Additionally, could you provide information on the necessary documents needed for the shipment, as well as your air and ocean freight rates from Karachi to Amsterdam?

Thank you for your assistance,
Janni

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Freight Services and Support
email_chain.body:
Hello,

It's great to hear from you. Our company prides itself in offering professional Freight Shipping Services both from and to Karachi. We aim to provide customers with the most cost-effective solutions for transporting their cargo. All required from your side is the provision of a proper tracking number, and we handle all other aspects of the shipping process.

Kind regards,
Aarjav

email_chain.subject: The Maersk Emden
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Quintero,

We are the charterers of the Maersk Emden which is due to call at Port Said from Algeciras next week. Please can you advise us on:
- Berths at your port
- PIA landing and destination restrictions
- Relevant charges
- The exact time of arrival.

Sincerely,
Gonzalo Romero

email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Quintero,

- Berths at your port

email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Quintero,

We are the charterers of the MSC San Jacinto which is due to call at Port Said from Algeciras next week. Please can you advise us on:
