email_chain.subject: Offer to Transport 5,000MT Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Ernesto, We propose to transport a 5,000MT chemical shipment comprised of base chemicals from Hamburg to Elsenborn via the Meuse river mouth. The chartering cost amounts to 80% of the total freight. A letter of credit should be available from your bank upon the vessel's arrival. We plan to call on the 24th of March and expect to confirm the charter within 24 hours, with the loading completed by the 26th of March. Looking forward to closing this deal soon. Kind regards, Irina

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer to Transport 5,000MT Chemical Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Irina, Thank you for your email and for sending the contract in advance. I will review it this evening and provide you with my comments by tomorrow. Thanks again. Regards, Sven

email_chain.subject: Update on Banking Arrangements
email_chain.body: Dear Sven, Thank you for your remarks concerning the letter of credit. We experienced some initial issues with the banks, but I'm pleased to inform you that all has now been resolved. Our new banking arrangements will be effective from the 24th of March onwards. Kind regards, Martin

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping 4000MT of Steel Ingots
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Hernandez,
Our group needs to ship 4,000MT of steel ingots from Caracas to Acapulco. Could you confirm if there is space available on your latest vessel and inform us about any potential port congestion?
Yours,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 4000MT of Steel Ingots
email_chain.body:
Good morning Patrick,
We currently have enough space for your shipment of steel ingots on our latest vessel, scheduled to leave Caracas on January 4th, arriving in Acapulco 15 days later. There are no issues with port congestion currently. Would you like to confirm this ship date?
Best regards,
Santiago Hernandez
P.S.: Once we've got your confirmation, we can add your cargo to the latest vessel manifest!

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping 4000MT of Steel Ingots
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hernandez,
Thank you for your prompt response. We would like to confirm the shipping date of January 4th. Please keep us updated on any changes regarding port congestion or shipping schedules.
Best regards,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Update on Port Congestion and Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Patrick,
Unfortunately, we've received word that there's a heavy amount of cargo coming through the ports. We might have to delay our cargo for a week. We will keep you posted on the new arrival date.
Best regards,
Santiago Hernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Port Congestion and Shipping Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hernandez,
We got some good news! The heavy cargo congestion has cleared. We can confirm that the steel ingots will indeed arrive in Acapulco on February 9. Could you please add this updated information to our latest vessel manifest?
Best regards,
Patrick

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Addition to Vessel Manifest
email_chain.body:
Hi Patrick,
I've added your cargo to the latest vessel manifest. If there are any last-minute changes, we will contact you immediately.
Best regards,
Santiago Hernandez

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Maize Flour Transport Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Nansen, Could you please confirm if you are available to pick up 2,000MT of maize flour from Oxera next week? We have your rate as $30/MT FOB plus $7/MT inland from Oxera to the FOB port. Looking forward to your confirmation. Best wishes, Giorgio

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Maize Flour Transport Availability
email_chain.body: Dear Giorgio, Thank you for your email. Unfortunately, I will be unavailable in the week of May 16-22. I am only available on May 15, 17, and 19. Could we possibly make arrangements for these dates? Please advise. Best regards, Ms. Nansen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Maize Flour Transport Availability
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Nansen, Thank you for your response. Unfortunately, I am only available to coordinate the transport on May 21st or May 22nd. Could you manage to arrange your availability for these dates? Looking forward to your reply. Best Regards, Giorgio

email_chain.subject: Request for Container Clearance
email_chain.body: Hi Giorgio, Could you arrange with the supplier for two containers to be cleared through the FOB ports in 3 weeks' time? Thank you, Francesco

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Blake,

We have 8,000MT of chemical products due for departure from Kaohsiung, and we are looking to fill the truck. Currently, we are planning on 1,000MT of adhesives and 2,000MT of lighteners. We are open to both FCL and LCL options. Could you please provide your quote for this shipment?

Thank you,
Robert.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Load and Costs
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

We have confirmed the availability for 1,000MT of adhesives to be loaded in Kaohsiung. The service charge will be $300 USD, with an outgassing fee of $25 USD per day. We are expecting the truck on February 10th. Please let us know if you have any further requirements.

Regards,
Shawn.

email_chain.subject: Shipment Received and Future Services
email_chain.body:
Robert,

We've successfully received your FCL shipment of adhesives and lighteners from Kaohsiung. Please let us know if you require any additional services in the future.

Thank you!

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Future Shipments
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

We have received details for the upcoming shipments involving 1,000MT of adhesives and 1,000MT of lighteners from Zhejiang to Los Angeles (Shipment #9999). We can schedule the receipt between February 10th and 12th. Could you please confirm if these dates work for you? We kindly request your advice by Friday, February 1st, 2018.

Thank you,
Bhaiyya Cargo Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Dates
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Thank you for the quotation. We confirm the receipt of the shipment of adhesives and lighteners on February 10th and 12th as proposed. Please proceed with the arrangements.

Best regards,
Robert.

email_chain.subject: Interest in Your Ivory Stock
email_chain.body: Mr. Kaulen, How are you? This is Rita from Synergy Trading, Ltd. We are interested in your ivory stock. Please find attached the proposed terms for your ivory acquisition. If you agree with these terms, please give me a call at (212) 555-9876. I am looking forward to working with you. Best regards, Rita

email_chain.subject: Pleasure Meeting You This Morning
email_chain.body: Mr. Kaulen, It was a pleasure meeting you this morning. I will be sending you a contract for 1,740MT of ivory shortly. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Regards, Rita

email_chain.subject: Technical Issue Affecting Ivory Order
email_chain.body: Mr. Kaulen, Following up from our previous communications, I regret to inform you that I will have to postpone your order of 1,740MT of ivory due to a technical issue. I appreciate your understanding in this matter. Please let me know if you have further questions. Regards, Rita

email_chain.subject: Request for Purchase Order Details
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Bernhardt, could you please forward me the purchase order for 3,000MT of isopropanol from Houston to Brisbane? Thanks, Trevor

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Purchase Order Details
email_chain.body: Thanks Trevor. I’ve emailed them through to Procurement and will send you copies once they've been approved. Please let me know if you have any urgent changes to orders. Thanks.

email_chain.subject: Order Request for Glycol and Isopropanol
email_chain.body: Thanks for the updates. Could you also place an order for 2,000MT of glycol and 4,000MT of isopropanol from Brisbane to Singapore? It has been a slow month, and we are trying to optimize space utilization in the trucks.

email_chain.subject: Re: Order Request for Glycol and Isopropanol
email_chain.body: Thanks for your email Trevor. You will find the updated purchase order attached. Please prepare the final docs as per the order.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Plums from Maracay to Tijuana
email_chain.body:
Good morning Ms. Browne,

I am looking to transport 5,000MT of plums from Maracay to Tijuana under an FIO basis. Having heard excellent feedback about your services, I am keen to engage your company for this shipment. Could you please provide your proposed rate by the end of the day? Thank you in advance!

Regards,
Marty Vega

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Plums from Maracay to Tijuana
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Vega,

It's always a pleasure to serve one of our best customers. I have just discussed with Maria from fio.com, and I can confirm that we can offer you a competitive rate that is sure to meet, if not exceed, your expectations compared to your current offers. Should you have any concerns or require further discussion, feel free to call me. I am looking forward to our meeting later today.

Regards,
Matt Browne

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Coal Cargo Transport
email_chain.body: Good day, I would like to inform you about a coal cargo we are planning to transport in the coming months. Could we rely on your support for this operation? Regards, Captain Ogas

email_chain.subject: Re: Upcoming Coal Cargo Transport
email_chain.body: Dear Captain Ogas, We have noted that vessels heading to the port for unloading your client's coal cargo are experiencing delays due to ongoing covid restrictions. We hope to facilitate the offloading as soon as the conditions permit. Kind regards, Captain Sos

email_chain.subject: Following Up on Coal Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Good day, We have not yet received a response regarding the coal cargo shipment mentioned earlier. Can we expect your support in the near future? With best regards, Captain Wong

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment in January
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Xander, I heard you are shipping a shipment of vanadium pentoxide in January. Could you please provide the price per metric ton? Thanks for your time. Regards, Ziembla

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment in January
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry, Ziembla. I am indeed arranging a shipment of vanadium pentoxide scheduled for the first week of January for a private customer in Australia. I will provide you with a quote shortly. Hope this helps. Best, Zoë

email_chain.subject: Re: Quotation Required for Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Xander, Thank you very much for your response. I eagerly await your quotation. Additionally, please let me know your preferred method of payment and if there are any special requirements for the contract. Kind regards, Ziembla

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Receipt and Payment for Vanadium Pentoxide Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Xander, I am Alex Jones from Peet Shippers. I am pleased to inform you that we have successfully received the shipment of vanadium pentoxide at our facility. Attached you will find the bill of lading for this transaction. We will remit payment this week. Thank you for choosing Peet Shippers. Regards, Alex Jones

email_chain.subject: Status Update Request on LNG Terminal Assessment
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Reynolds,

How's the next LNG terminal coming along? Please confirm when you'll have your assessment of the option for Chile.

Thanks,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Re: Status Update Request on LNG Terminal Assessment and Inquiry on E&P Situation
email_chain.body:
Hi Gabriel,

Good to hear from you. We had an internal meeting yesterday about projects. The press has shown interest in the supply and demand aspect of the E&P situation, particularly if the PEMEX operation in Trinidad and Tobago will be renewed. Could you prepare something for them for an upcoming article?

We also discussed advancing with the new supply/demand report. We're reviewing the 2012 report first and may need more data. Afterward, we plan to continue with the report on Latin America. Let me know if you have further suggestions or questions.

Looking forward to our next conversation.

Best regards,
Eric

email_chain.subject: Re: E&P Report Data Submission
email_chain.body:
Hi Eric,

How is the E&P report coming along? We have some additional data ready for the E&P facilities that might be useful to you. I will send it to you after confirming the report's status, and await your copy for internal review.

Looking forward to our next conversation.

Best regards,
Gabriel

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Styrene Shipment from Kaohsiung to Daesan
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Brunner,

Can you provide a quote for shipping 1,900MT of styrene from Kaohsiung to Daesan? Additionally, could you handle all necessary customs clearing and breakbulk operations? I am also concerned about potential sea weather issues that might affect the schedule. Looking forward to a friendly trade.

Best regards,
Stuart

email_chain.subject: Shipping Options from Daesan to Chicago in June
email_chain.body:
Hi,

On behalf of a family friend in South Korea, we are looking to ship approximately 3,600kg of goods, including 1,900kg of polyester filament yarn and 700kg of acetate fiber from Daesan to Chicago. We need the shipping container to arrive within the first week of June. Please provide a rate, itinerary, and shipping options for a June 8th deadline. Options include:

A. Barge shipping to Vancouver in a container followed by rail to Chicago.

Estimated cost for 3,000kg: $30,000 USD. If you have any questions, please let us know.

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Request for Financial Assistance to Purchase a Truck
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

We are in need of a truck for transporting materials for a new road construction project, but we are currently short on funds to pay in cash. Can you assist us in securing a loan? Attached are the necessary documents for your reference. I am available until Friday for any further discussions.

Best regards

email_chain.subject: Offer to Sell a 2004 Ford F-350
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

We have a 2004 Ford F-350 pickup truck in very good condition, with less than 100,000 miles. We would like to offer it at a negotiable price of $13,000 USD. Here are the details:

- Asking Price: $13,000 (USD)
- Model: Ford F-350
- Transmission: Automatic

Regards

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Roll Containers and Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi,

A customer has sent a letter requesting a quote and is inquiring about the availability of roll containers along with transportation options. Could you provide information on this as soon as possible?

Thanks,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quote for Water from Baltimore to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

I am looking for a quote on shipping 14,000,000 liters of water from Baltimore to New York via barge. Please let me know the cost for this shipment.

Best regards,
Louise

labels.commodity: styrene, polyester filament yarn, acetate fiber

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for a Shipment from Tianjin to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Chan,

We have a shipment of 4,700 MT of petroleum that needs to be transported from Tianjin to Sri Lanka. Do you have any available vessel to make this trip? We would like to schedule a demo this week if possible.

Thank you!
Samuel

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for a Shipment from Tianjin to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Hi Samuel!

Please let me know your availability for a demonstration this week.

Best regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for a Shipment from Tianjin to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Hi Mike!

I am available next Tuesday for the demo. Does that work for you?

Best regards,
Samuel

email_chain.subject: Availability of Vessel TT Platinum for Shipping to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Hello Samuel,

Our vessel TT Platinum departed from Tianjin last week and is expected to arrive in Colombo, Sri Lanka, this Thursday. If you are interested in discussing further, please reply with the details of the cargo and quantity.

Thank you.
Zeno

email_chain.subject: Urgent request for NVOCC shipment space: Tangier to Guangzhou
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lee,

We are planning to ship 8,000 metric tonnes of raisins from Tangier to Guangzhou this weekend using combined NVOCC shipment. Could you please confirm if you have space available and if we could finalize the freight rate within the next two days?

Best regards,
Dylan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for additional shipment capacity to Guangzhou
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

Following up on our previous requests, we now require an additional capacity of 2,000 MT, totaling 10,000 MT of raisins to be shipped to Guangzhou next weekend. If available, we'd like to proceed with a combined NVOCC shipment. Could you respond within two days to discuss further?

Best regards,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of shipment space availability
email_chain.body:
Mr. Lee,

Can we confirm if there's still availability for a 10,000MT raisin shipment on a combined NVOCC basis this coming weekend? Looking forward to your swift response.

Best,
George

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of shipment space availability
email_chain.body:
Hi George,

Yes, we have space available for the 10,000 MT of raisins. Is your shipment planned as FCL or LCL?

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping type confirmation
email_chain.body:
Mark,

Our shipment is planned as Less than Container Load (LCL).

Best,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping quote for LCL
email_chain.body:
Hello Charles,

Thank you for confirming. The combined rate for both FCL and LCL types is $0.90 per Metric Tonne. Please send us a detailed email with your pickup and dropoff locations to proceed further.

Best regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgement of freight quote
email_chain.body:
Mark,

We appreciate your prompt response and the freight quote provided. We will review the details and respond shortly with a purchase order.

Thank you,
William

email_chain.subject: Route Change Request for Corn Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your quote for the 600MT shipment of corn from Philadelphia to Hamburg. I'd like to change the route and request a quotation for a vessel from Philadelphia to Kiel instead.

Kind regards,
Allyn

email_chain.subject: Revised Quote for Philadelphia to Kiel Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Allyn,

Here is my revised quote for the shipment from Philadelphia to Kiel. Details of the vessel and potential departure dates are listed below. I look forward to working with you.

Regards,
James

Note: Ensure to update your API settings to reflect the new route to make a successful API call as discussed.

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Houston to East London
email_chain.body: Hello, I would like to inquire about availability and pricing for shipping 5,200MT of oil field machinery from Houston to East London. We are planning for the cargo to leave in the next couple of weeks. Could you also provide the cost for 40 days’ demurrage? Thank you, Bert

email_chain.subject: Delivery Confirmation: Farm Machinery to East London
email_chain.body: Hi John, I wanted to confirm that the trailer load of farm machinery which departed on our weekly transport from Houston has arrived safely in East London. All items have been securely received by our client on the ground. Regards, Nicola

email_chain.subject: Request for Permission to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Maddy,
I have received an email containing an image of Ms. Karina. I would like to use this image in my communication. Could you please confirm if that would be acceptable?
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Permission to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hi Sana,
I need a bit more clarification on your request. Are you asking for permission to use Ms. Karina's image in an email to another recipient, or are you inquiring about technical steps on embedding the image in an email?
Best regards,
Ms. Maddy

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Permission to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Maddy,
Thank you for your quick response. I am seeking permission to use Ms. Karina's image in my emails to others as part of our communications. I am aware of the technical process to embed the image; I just want to ensure there are no restrictions on using it.
Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Permission to Use Image
email_chain.body:
Hi Sana,
Thank you for clarifying. You are allowed to use Ms. Karina's image in your emails as long as it pertains to relevant and appropriate content. Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Best regards,
Ms. Maddy

email_chain.subject: Update on New Warehouse Location
email_chain.body: Hi Dr. Tang, I am pleased to announce that our new warehouse is located in Shenzhen, within the customs area. The warehouse spans 3 floors with a total area of 1,600 m2. We are committed to continuing our provision of high-quality, cost-effective products reinforced by competitive logistics services. I hope all is well with you and I look forward to your visit soon! Yours sincerely, Arthur

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on New Warehouse Location
email_chain.body: Dear Arthur, Thanks for your update on the new warehouse. We are progressing as scheduled with the establishment of our new factory. We plan to begin testing operations next week and would request at least four samples for this purpose. Specifically, of those, one will be utilized for in-depth testing. Should the tests be successful, we will advance to full-scale production. We will dispatch the samples by next week for testing at your lab. Please keep us informed promptly of any issues with the samples to facilitate necessary adjustments before mass production begins. Sincerely, Dr. Tang

email_chain.subject: Request for Laycan Availability and Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Xander,

I hope this message finds you well. I would like to confirm the following shipment details:

- From: Singapore
- To: Yangon
- Quantity: 7,200MT

Could you please confirm if bunker services are on the owner’s account and provide the earliest laycan you can offer?

Thank you,
Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Laycan Availability and Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Xander,

I believe you received my earlier email regarding the shipment from Singapore to Yangon for 7,200MT. Could you kindly confirm the details and let us know the earliest available laycan? We appreciate your prompt response as it will greatly assist in our planning.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Earlier Communication
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Xander,

I trust you are well. I want to ensure you received my earlier emails regarding our interest in transporting 7,200MT from Singapore to Yangon. Could you please confirm if the bunker services are on the owner’s account and provide us with the earliest laycan date you can offer?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Thank you,
Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Confirmation Required for Shipping Arrangements
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Xander,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to follow up once again regarding our shipping arrangement from Singapore to Yangon for 7,200MT. Your confirmation on the bunker services and the earliest laycan is crucial for our scheduling.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Jacinta

email_chain.subject: Urgent: LPG Shipment Value Date Confirmation Needed
email_chain.body:
Hello Emilio,

Thank you for your email. I hope you are enjoying your Christmas. We still need to load your shipment of LPG. Can you provide a value date by Monday morning, please?

Thank you,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Action Required: RLC Case Logging
email_chain.body:
Hello again Emilio,

I have heard from Logan at the dealership. He is taking the day off today. In light of this, it might be beneficial for you to handle the RLC case logging yourself this evening. Please let me know whether you wish to do this yourself or would prefer a staff member to handle it. Kindly respond by Monday morning.

Thank you,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Fuel Pump Upgrade at 45,000 Miles
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We are writing to inform you that we will be upgrading the fuel pump in your car to a more reliable model at 45,000 miles. Unfortunately, this upgrade means an unscheduled service despite our previous extension of the warranty to cover the RLC pump. The service is scheduled for Saturday, January 1, and you may bring your car in at any time during the day. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: Update on LPG Shipment Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ju Li,

We regret to inform you that your LPG shipment has not arrived at the dealership as scheduled. We are actively working to resolve this issue and will update you with a new delivery date as soon as possible. Please contact us if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About LPG Shipment and Car Upgrade
email_chain.body:
Hi Logan,

Thank you for your email sent on Friday about the car fuel pump upgrade. I have not yet received any update on the LPG shipment status. Could you please respond to these two issues as soon as possible? I apologize for the delay in my response.

Best regards,
Ben

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Overdue Payment for Kerosene Shipment
email_chain.body: This is a gentle reminder that there is still an outstanding payment for your recent kerosene shipment from Lagos to Casablanca. We would greatly appreciate your prompt attention to this matter and look forward to receiving your payment soon. Kind regards, Ben

email_chain.subject: Technical Issues Affecting Network Connectivity
email_chain.body: I wanted to inform you about the technical problems we are experiencing which have impacted our network connectivity. We understand the importance of maintaining a good network and are actively working to resolve the issues. We appreciate your support and understanding. Best regards.

email_chain.subject: Update on Your Order Status
email_chain.body: As we are currently entering a peak period, please be advised that there has been a slight delay in the processing of your order. We are committed to ensuring that your items will be delivered soon. Thank you for your patience. Regards, Mammoud

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping Schedule and Rates for Almond Meal
email_chain.body: Hi Jarrett, I would like to understand the shipping schedule and rates for moving 50,000MT of almond meal from Algeciras to Marseille over the next 3 months. Would the best route be via the Suez Canal? Thanks. Best regards, Siddhartha

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Schedule and Rates for Almond Meal
email_chain.body: Hi again, Here are more details. The shipment is 50,000MT in dry bulk 25’ containers, planned from Algeciras Port starting 01/11/2016 to Marseille on 04/11/2016 with delivery to Terminal Lagrange. Please provide me with a quote. Thanks, Siddhartha

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping Details Confirmed
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Siddhartha, I have reviewed your request and reviewed our rates and schedule. Unfortunately, we are fully booked from October 2016 to January 2017. The next available slot will be on January 19, 2017. The preliminary rate offer is USD 9,350 per container. This is a general estimate, and final rates will be decided only after space confirmation on our vessels. We will communicate the exact rates as soon as they are finalized. Best regards, Jarrett

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for Diesel Transport
email_chain.body: Hello, We have a lead for 20,000MT of diesel from Karachi to Al Jubail. How long will it take you to locate a suitable vessel, and can you accommodate a mid-May laycan? Regards, Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability for Diesel Transport
email_chain.body: Thank you for the inquiry. Please confirm your requirements of vessel type, quality, specification, and the on-time availability of cargo. Kindly let us know these details via email as soon as possible so we can proceed with locating a vessel. Kind regards, Broker

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel Requirements
email_chain.body: Kindly go ahead with the confirmation and send the Bill of Lading. Thanks, Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Updated Rate List
email_chain.body: Hello, This is the updated rate list. I hope you find this helpful. Best, Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about cargo load date and use of airport
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Asad, We have a 15,000MT cargo of auto parts needing shipment from Singapore to Xiamen. Could you confirm the earliest load date available, and can we utilize the airport for this shipment? Cheers, Victoria

email_chain.subject: Request for cargo shipment details from Singapore to Xiamen
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Wang, Following our recent communications, I would like to confirm our regular shipping of 15,000MT of auto parts from Singapore to Xiamen Port, occurring monthly. Can you provide the latest expected cargo arrival and load dates? Thank you! Cheers, Victoria

email_chain.subject: Awaiting updates on cargo shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Asad, Thank you for your prompt response, and glad to hear you've returned to the office. Do you have any updates for us regarding the cargo arrangement? Thanks! Victoria

email_chain.subject: Clarification on shipment timings
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Wang, Currently, our exact arrival in Singapore is uncertain. Could you please advise on the earliest possible load date and the latest cargo arrival date in Xiamen? Ensuring timely shipping of our cargo is paramount. Cheers, Victoria

email_chain.subject: Charter Enquiry for Fuel Oil Transport from Nagasaki to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Davis,

Please confirm your availability for chartering a tanker to load 15,000MT of Fuel Oil from Nagasaki to Singapore by the 25th, with an option to extend for an additional 10,000MT.

Best regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Enquiry for Fuel Oil Transport from Nagasaki to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

Thank you for your email. I am currently reviewing our tanker availability for the dates you mentioned. It's a bit tight, but I will keep you updated as soon as possible.

Regards,
Alan

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Enquiry for Fuel Oil Transport from Nagasaki to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

We have identified a tanker that might be available on the 25th. To proceed, we need to quickly put together a charter party. Please confirm your commitment as there's limited time between now and the required date.

Regards,
Julie

labels.cargo_size: 15000MT, with option to extend for an additional 10000MT

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Petch,

I need to book three vessels next month for the transportation of goods. The requirements are as follows: one for 3,000MT from St. Petersburg to Portovik, one for 2,200MT from Shanghai to San Juan, and one for 5,000MT from Busan to Rostock. Could you please provide your competitive rates for these routes?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. Here are the rates for the requested shipments: 
- St. Petersburg to Portovik: $60/mt by container ship.
- Shanghai to San Juan: $45/mt by bulk carrier, with a 50% chance of securing a vessel.
- Busan to Rostock: $4/mt by bulk carrier.

The total estimated cost for all shipments is $165,000. This is the lowest rate we can offer currently.

Kind regards,
Ilya

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Ilya,

Thank you for the detailed quote. The total rate of $165,000 seems reasonable to me. I look forward to proceeding with the arrangements soon.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Freight Enquiry: Transhipping Sugar Cane from Jiangyin to Washington
email_chain.body: Hello, Do you have any lead time available for transhipping 7,000MT of sugar cane (REF50) from Jiangyin, China, to Rotterdam and then from Rotterdam to Washington? Could you handle this under CIF terms and provide details on the earliest laycan slot available? Regards, Mr. Ashok

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Transhipping Sugar Cane from Jiangyin to Washington
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Ashok, Thank you for your inquiry regarding the export of 7000 MT of sugar cane valued at approximately US $300,000 from Jiangyin, Jiangsu Province, China to Washington, DC, USA. Our available freight quote in FCL mode includes transshipment via Rotterdam. Please note that our quote excludes clearance charges, tuck-in/out charge, loading/unloading charges, VGM declaration, terminal and pilotage dues, lock fees, port call surcharges, and detention/demurrage. Additional terminal handling charges will also apply, based on the selected service and required handling facilities. Rates for shipper's and consignee's transport insurance will vary depending on cargo handling in transit. Please let us know if you would like more detailed estimates. Best regards, Logistics Team

email_chain.subject: Request for Ocean Shipment of Shoes from Europe to California
email_chain.body: Dear Sir or Madam, We are planning a 52ft ocean shipment of 5,000 x 20' pallets containing various types of footwear, all packed in shoe boxes, for a 1/29/2017 sailing. The cargo's estimated weight is 30,000 lbs or 13,020Kgs. We can manage the shipping arrangements from China on this date. I have attached a detailed Information Guide to assist in preparing the necessary documentation. Please contact me should you need any further information. Best regards, Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Transporting an Empty Container from Hamburg to St. John's
email_chain.body: Dear Sir or Madam, I am looking for a vessel or agent capable of carrying an empty container from Hamburg to St. John's, NL, Canada. The transportation must commence no later than 1/23/2017 to ensure arrival at the destination port on or before 1/28/2017. The service request includes both loading and unloading of the container. Kindly let me know your availability and rates for this transportation. Please feel free to contact me should you have any further questions. Best regards, Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Jones, We urgently need 8,000MT of glycerine shipped from West Kalimantan to Jebel Ali. Can you confirm vessel availability by the 9th, and are you open to part cargo? Regards, Raoul

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Request for Vessel Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Raoul, We can allow partial loading but cannot accept less than 5,000MT per shipment. Confirming vessel availability from the 13th. Regards, Jeff

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability and Shipment Details
email_chain.body: Thanks Jeff, please hold the shipment availability for me. Regards, Raoul

email_chain.subject: Coordination for Vessel Arrival and Loading
email_chain.body: Hello Raoul, Our vessel will be arriving in Jakarta on the 12th. Please confirm your readiness to load. Regards, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Coordination for Vessel Arrival and Loading
email_chain.body: Hi Joe, Unfortunately, we are unable to accept shipment until the 20th. Regards, Raoul

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body: Raoul, we require the 8,000MT by the 14th. Is there any way to expedite? Regards, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgency in Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body: Hi Joe, We will need vessel availability from at least the 13th to meet your timeline. Regards, Raoul

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Duisburg to Kashima
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Oliver,

I'm interested in shipping 1,000 MT of wood chips from Duisburg to Kashima and am seeking a competitive freight quote. I also need confirmation on whether the port dues are covered under CFR terms. Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you.
Kind regards,
Lana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote: Duisburg to Kashima
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Lana,

Thank you for your inquiry dated 12th January regarding the proposed shipment of 1,000MT of wood chips from Duisburg to Kashima. We are processing your request and will provide you with the detailed ship and rail quote shortly.

Best regards,
Adam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Rate: Jakarta to Ho Chi Minh
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wallace,

Could you please provide the freight rate for a 5,500MT shipment of dried coconut from Jakarta to Ho Chi Minh City? I would appreciate your prompt response as we are aiming to finalize logistics this week.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rate: Jakarta to Ho Chi Minh
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Thank you for your inquiry. To confirm, you are looking to ship 5,560 MT of dried coconut from either N’Dampar or Jakarta to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Can you please confirm the port of origin?

Our system is live and ready to provide immediate responses. We aim to get you the rate within 24 hours upon confirmation of the details.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rate: Jakarta to Ho Chi Minh
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Thank you for the quick response. The shipment will be out of Jakarta, not N’Dampar. The total weight is indeed 5,580 MT of dried coconut destined for Ho Chi Minh City. Appreciate if you could expedite the rate quoting process.

Thanks again,

Best,

email_chain.subject: Shipment of US Maize on M/V IEN28R
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, we have shipped out our 3,200MT of US maize from Aberdeen to Rotterdam on the M/V IEN28R. Could you please advise on your earliest delivery slots for a relevant breakbulk vessel to facilitate cost comparisons? Yours truly, Gail

email_chain.subject: Update on Expected Arrival Times for US Maize Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, following discussions with our logistics team and internal fleet, the expected ETAs are: Singapore between 26 February and 04 March, and Rotterdam between 25 March and early April. I trust these dates are suitable for you. Regards, Gail

email_chain.subject: Preparation for Discharging and Reloading of US Maize at Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, we are preparing to discharge your 3,200MT of US maize from the M/V IEN28R in Rotterdam between 26 February and 04 March. We hope to reload it onto the M/V SAC20S between 25 March and early April. Please advise on your earliest arrival slots, and we will coordinate accordingly. Yours truly, Gail

email_chain.subject: US Maize Ready for Transfer at Rotterdam Quay
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, the US maize onboard M/V IEN28R is now on the quay in Rotterdam and ready for transfer. Following our telephone discussion, a port slot is available from 25 March to 06 April. We have conveyed your request to our internal team and will notify you off our preferred ship. Yours truly, Gail

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Vessel for Maize Transfer
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, our internal team has chosen the M/V SAC25J as our preferred vessel for the maize transfer. The vessel will be available from 26 March to 02 April. Please confirm if this slot works for you. Regards, Gail

labels.vessel: M/V IEN28R, M/V SAC20S, M/V SAC25J

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote: Gioia Tauro to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Hi Mrs. Patel, I need a shipment quote for 5,000MT of copper ore from Gioia Tauro to Melbourne. Could you please clarify if you can provide a direct service, or if the cargo would need to be part of a breakbulk consolidation? Cheers, Tara

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote: Gioia Tauro to Melbourne
email_chain.body: Hi Tara, Unfortunately, there is no direct service for that route. The cargo will need to be consolidated with other shipments as a breakbulk load. Best regards, Mrs. Patel

email_chain.subject: Ocean Freight Inquiry: Weihai to Antwerp
email_chain.body: Good morning, I would need to arrange ocean freight for 100MT of pig iron from Weihai to Antwerp. Can you suggest the best method for shipping this cargo? Thank you. Regards, Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Ocean Freight Inquiry: Weihai to Antwerp
email_chain.body: Hi Jessica, Please be advised that the shipment from Weihai will proceed as planned. Thank you, Mrs. Patel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Plastic Waste Shipment from Ningbo to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Carl, Can you handle a shipment of 3,000MT of waste plastic from Ningbo to Rotterdam this week? Do you have any berths available? Best, Stella

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Plastic Waste Shipment from Ningbo to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Stella, Thanks for your inquiry. Unfortunately, we cannot accommodate the shipment this week. If you can schedule it for next week, we can offer you a discount. Best regards, Lina

email_chain.subject: Request for Sales Team Contact
email_chain.body: Hey Lina, Could you please send me the sales team's email? I need to discuss a potential campaign with them. Thanks, Kevin

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Sales Team Contact
email_chain.body: Hello Kevin, Sure, I will forward you the contact details of our sales team. Please let me know when you need this information. Thanks, Lina

email_chain.subject: Urgent: YouTube Account Issue
email_chain.body: Hi Tom, I am experiencing issues with my YouTube account and need your immediate assistance. I have sent you my username and password. Thanks, Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: YouTube Account Issue
email_chain.body: Hi Fred, I will check your YouTube account; however, I believe this might not be a technical issue. I'll give you a call after discussing it with our video marketing team. Thanks, Lina

email_chain.subject: Request for Soymeal Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: You are very fortunate to have received our attention. Following our review of your previous correspondences, we would like a quote for 3,200MT of soymeal from New Orleans to Shepparton. Can you provide the lump sum price for this order? Best wishes, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Soymeal Shipping Quote
email_chain.body: I have closely reviewed your request, however, our records show no previous transactions regarding soymeal that might help us offer a competitive quote. Your delivery volumes show hundreds of thousands of tonnes per month. We typically provide quotes for orders starting at 50,000 tonnes. Could you provide further details or adjustments to meet this threshold? Regards, Kirsty

email_chain.subject: Possibility of Extended Collaboration
email_chain.body: Having reflected on your situation, we can offer a reduced rate if we ensure a minimum monthly delivery of at least 1,000 tonnes over an extended period. This aligns well with our monthly soymeal requirements and would not significantly disrupt our operation. However, this offer depends on securing the necessary volumes from your end. Could you commit to this delivery schedule? We will send our latest supply schedule for your review. Please let us know your interest in this proposal. Best wishes, Joe

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Sea Transport of Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xavier,
We have a small shipment of 160MT of fresh garlic from Cairo to Jeddah that will sail on the Sea Navigator on the 26th of August. The cargo will be ready for loading at the discharge port by the 26th of August. Are you interested in handling this shipment?
Best regards,
Henry

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry for Sea Transport of Fresh Garlic from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Henry,
Thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, we are currently preparing for a scheduled vacation and will be unavailable until 1st September. We regret any inconvenience this may cause.
Best regards,
Xavier

email_chain.subject: Interest in Fresh Garlic Shipment from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,
We are back at work and want to confirm the fresh garlic order. Is this still available? Can you provide the full weight and the packing volume of the cargo? Also, when are you planning to load the container?
Thanks,
Tony

email_chain.subject: RE: Interest in Fresh Garlic Shipment from Cairo to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,
Yes, the order is still valid. The full weight of the cargo is 160MT and the packing volume is 36CBM. The container will be loaded on 2nd September. How are you planning to handle this shipment?
Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Details for Handling Fresh Garlic Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,
I'm glad to hear the shipment is still on. We are considering using the Seaway Transit liner for sea transport. Do you think it can provide us with a suitable transit time for this shipment? Also, I assume the previously mentioned packing volume and weights still stand?
Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: RE: Details for Handling Fresh Garlic Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,
Yes, the packing volume and weight remain unchanged. The Seaway Transit liner should be suitable for the transport needs; I anticipate the shipment will take a few days to reach Saudi Arabia.
Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Lead Shipment Request
email_chain.body: Hello John, Thank you for shipping your containers to us on time; it was very appreciated. If you have finished your trade show in New York, could you arrange a truck to ship those 2,000MT of lead to us as soon as possible? Sincerely, Gail Williams

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipping Address for Lead
email_chain.body: Dear Jim, Sorry for the confusion, this is the correct information for you. Please ship the 2,000MT of lead to our address. Thanks! Elaine Harris

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Shipping Address
email_chain.body: Dear Gail, I thought I heard from you the other day. I emailed you. What's your new shipping address? Thanks, Jim Moore

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Shipping Address
email_chain.body: Hi Jim, I'm sorry. I haven't been able to get through to Elaine; she's been away on vacation. I just got her voicemail. I'm going to leave a message for her and will get back to you. Thanks, Gail Williams

email_chain.subject: Readiness of 2,000MT Lead Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Gail, We received your email, and the 2,000MT of lead is almost ready. We will contact you as soon as it's on the truck. Sincerely, Jim Moore

email_chain.subject: Request for Heavy Lift Cargo Rates from Japan to London
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I hope you are doing well! I need to arrange the transportation of a heavy lift cargo from Japan to London. Could you please provide your current shipping rates and the terms for lumpers? Your prompt response would greatly assist with planning.

Thanks,
Seth

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Heavy Lift Cargo Rates from Japan to London
email_chain.body:
Hi Seth,

Thanks for reaching out. Please find attached our best offers for shipping rates along with the terms for lumpers. We'd appreciate it if you could confirm the specific details of your cargo to proceed with the booking at these rates.

Best Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Shipping Schedule Confirmation for Jet Fuel
email_chain.body: Hi Maria, I’m looking at shipping 11,500MT of ex-Rotterdam jet fuel to New Orleans via the Suez Canal. Could you send me details of your laycan from outload to Estimated Date of Completion of Transit (EDCT) to confirm that you can match the Jetty Window Contract (JWC)? Many thanks, Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Schedule Confirmation for Jet Fuel
email_chain.body: Dear Simon, Apologies for the delay in response. Please find the following details: 1. Expected onboard time to the Suez Canal is approximately 10 hours. 2. Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) to New Orleans is on 17 June 2022. 3. Vessel name: L5, with Captain Henrique Damasceno and Chief Mate Mercu Regalado. Could you please check with the charterer your specific schedule from the dock to the EDCT? Looking forward to your confirmation. Regards, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Schedule Confirmation for Jet Fuel
email_chain.body: Hi Maria, The charterer has informed me that the required EDCT is at 11:59 PM on 13 June 2022. Are you still able to accommodate the schedule you provided for 12 June? Many thanks, Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirming Loading Window Details
email_chain.body: Dear Simon, We can initiate the loading of oil at 5:00 AM and continue up to 5:30 AM. However, we cannot extend the loading past 6:30 AM until the next day. To clarify, loading can resume at 9:00 AM on 13 June 2022, but must halt by 9:30 AM and cannot recommence before 6:00 PM; we will therefore complete loading at 5:30 AM on 14 June 2022. Loadings must cease after 6:30 AM as per the EDCT manager's instructions. I will recheck and confirm the ETA. Thank you, Maria

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Slot for Kerosene Transportation
email_chain.body: Thanks for confirming your slot on the kerosene job. I just need to confirm your draft restrictions - are you cleared to touch at Las Palmas? I’ll see you on September 12. Best, Eva

email_chain.subject: Request to Reschedule Arrival Date Due to Weather Concerns
email_chain.body: We would like to reschedule our entry to Saturday, September 10 due to the increasingly strong winds anticipated in the coming days. This could potentially slow us down or disrupt our plans extensively, affecting the essential kerosene job. Could we discuss this possibility? Thanks so much. Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request to Reschedule Arrival Date Due to Weather Concerns
email_chain.body: Thanks for getting back to me. Unfortunately, I’ll be in Hong Kong from 7th to 11th September so the job will have to be postponed to 13th. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Also, please arrange to have my flights changed. I'll be able to return from Hong Kong on the 13th, but my baggage will need to be forwarded from Hong Kong to Paris, then to Marseille, and finally to Valencia by the 12th. Best regards, Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Meeting and Job Schedule
email_chain.body: Thanks for letting me know your new schedule! We will plan accordingly and take off on the 15th of September, arriving in Valencia on the 16th. We'll be staying at the Grand Hôtel du Grand Port Maritime. Looking forward to meeting you there! Best, Julie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Grain Shipment from Jeddah to Puntarenas
email_chain.body: Good morning Carlos, We need to load 2,400MT of grain from Jeddah to Puntarenas. Do you allow direct voyages and could you advise on the best arrival date? Thanks, Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Grain Shipment from Jeddah to Puntarenas
email_chain.body: Good morning Simon, We allow direct voyages. Is it possible to ship between 21-25 June with an optimal arrival date around 12-16 July? I can ensure loading until 4 July. Please let us know what further details you require from us. Thanks, Efraim

email_chain.subject: Update on Grain Shipment Availability
email_chain.body: Good morning Simon, We can deliver your 2,400MT cargo in Jeddah to APM Terminals Algeciras with an ETA of 19/07/2022, and we can ensure delivery until 21/07/2022. Please confirm if this schedule is possible for you. Best Regards, Carlos

email_chain.subject: Booking and Documentation for Grain Shipment
email_chain.body: Good morning Carlos, Thank you for the information on the shipment. I need assistance on how to schedule the booking with the vessel and upload the necessary documents; I couldn't find the relevant forms on your website. Thank you, Gerardo

email_chain.subject: Document Upload for Grain Shipment
email_chain.body: Good morning Carlos, I am preparing to send you the documents as soon as they are ready, but I still need the upload form for the documents. Thanks, Gerardo

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking and Documentation for Grain Shipment
email_chain.body: Good morning Gerardo, We have received the list of documents necessary for this booking. Please confirm which documents you will be using. Afterwards, we will proceed with the shipping documents and the bills of lading. Best Regards, Carlos

email_chain.subject: Receipt of Documents for Grain Shipment
email_chain.body: Good morning Carlos, I wanted to inform you that we have received the documents and all the necessary information. Regards, Gerardo

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Smith, We're looking to send 15,000MT of methanol from Busan to Daesan. How soon can you load and deliver? Also, please confirm if you offer any flexibility on demurrage. Thanks, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Methanol Shipment from Busan to Daesan
email_chain.body: Hi Natalie, Thank you for reaching out to us. We can load and deliver the 15,000MT of methanol from Busan to Daesan in 10 days. The FOB cost will be USD 100 per ton. Unfortunately, we have no flexibility regarding the demurrage charges. Additionally, I have referred you to Alex because of a potential project he is working on. Is he available to discuss it? Thanks for your time, Angel

email_chain.subject: Introduction and Contact
email_chain.body: Hi Ray, Thanks for introducing me to Angel. His email address and phone number are Angel@shippingco.com, (+country-code-unit-phone-number). He seems very well-connected, and I look forward to speaking with him. Please let me know if you have any more questions, Natalie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Spot LNG Cargo Delivery from Qatar to China
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Shaw, We are interested in procuring a spot LNG cargo from Qatar to China for delivery within the coming week. We plan to order 80,000 MMscf. Could you confirm whether it would be possible to agree on a reduced allocation of 20,000 MMscf, should the delivery be delayed? Thank you, Ramya

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Spot LNG Cargo Delivery from Qatar to China
email_chain.body: Hi Ramya, Thank you for your email. Based on the latest information from our partners, securing a spot LNG cargo to China within your requested timeframe is feasible. The seller estimates up to one week to source the cargo, but expects delivery in approximately 6 days. Please confirm if this schedule is acceptable. Thank you, Olivia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Container Transport from Hobart to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bond,

We need a carrier for a container of tuna from Hobart to Halifax. Do you have any recommendations?

Thanks,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Container Transport from Hobart to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Hi Anthony,

Yes, I have a vessel that can accommodate your needs. I recommend discussing the specifics of the pilot services available in Halifax to ensure smooth logistics. We should discuss the details in-depth to tailor our services to your requirements.

Looking forward to your response,
Dwight

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Container Transport from Hobart to Halifax

Anthony

email_chain.subject: Meeting Confirmation and Further Discussion
email_chain.body:

See you soon,
Dwight

email_chain.body:

Transporting lobsters to the Middle East involves multiple logistics and cost considerations, including transport types and container specifics. To better understand the costs, I recommend contacting a specialized shipping company like Carriers USA who currently works with us.

Best,
Dwight

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Capacity for Rapeseed Oil Transportation

email_chain.subject: Clarification and Details Required for Rapeseed Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lian,

I need to clarify the details of your offer. Currently, there is an existing oil cargo of 4,000MT in a London warehouse waiting for a buyer. The port's handling charge would be 30 Euros/MT. Given this, the potential profit margin could still be around 150,000 Euros. Please confirm the balance needed for ship hire and insurance to proceed further.

Thank you,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Release and Payment Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Customer,

We are pleased to inform you that we have received the full payment of $300,000 as you indicated. We have released your cargo from storage accordingly. Please note that you will receive 70% of the total invoice amount by the end of this week and the remainder by the end of next week.

Cargo Booking No: XXXXXXXXXXXX.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
Director, FALCO SHIPPING & LOGISTICS PTE LTD.

email_chain.subject: Requirement for Payment Fulfillment as per Contract
email_chain.body:

I have just rechecked the bank account and found that our balance is zero. Could you please confirm the balance we need to pay to you? Is there any possibility of expediting the process?

Thanks,
Mateo

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Rates: Rotterdam to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Williams,

We are looking to ship 5,000MT of refined petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. We are seeking your best available freight rates and a confirmation on the loading schedule. Are there any current issues with congestion at Rotterdam, or any adjustments in pricing we should be aware of?

Regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rates: Rotterdam to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Dear Ann,

Unfortunately, we are unable to accept your offer to transport 5,000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. Due to regulatory constraints, we can't transship petroleum products through Rotterdam. Could we explore the possibility of shipping directly to Port Sudan on a FOB (Free On Board) basis instead?

Thanks and best regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rates: Rotterdam to Port Sudan
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

Thank you for your response. We understand the regulatory issues with shipping from Rotterdam. We will adjust our offer to ship the petroleum products directly to Port Sudan on a FOB basis, as you suggested. Please advise if this arrangement suits your operations and what the next steps would be.

Regards,
Ann

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Soybean Cargo Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Larsen, I am inquiring about the availability for the release of 8,500MT of 1st grade soybeans from Boston, with the destination being Tangier. It would be helpful to know when your current charter will be clear. Regards, Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Soybean Cargo Availability
email_chain.body: Hi, Jessica. Thank you for your inquiry. The soybean cargo of 8,500MT is indeed available for shipment. We can plan for a dispatch around mid-June, which aligns well with the high season demands. I will get back to you shortly with more detailed information. Regards, Kevin

email_chain.subject: Further Details on Soybean Cargo Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Jessica, Following our earlier conversation, I can confirm that you can charter the 8,500 MT of 1st grade soybeans from Boston with the destination of Tangier. We can clear the charter for dispatch at any time suitable after finalizing the terms. I’m looking forward to finalizing the details with you. Best, Kevin

email_chain.subject: Request for Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We require a vessel for transporting 7,300MT of liquefied petroleum gas from Bahrain to Mina Al Ahmadi. Could you please advise on your vessel's next available laycan? Additionally, are you open to a lumpsum deal for this shipment?

Best regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

Vessel 8022 is scheduled to arrive in Manama on 2015-01-14. We can engage with a trader willing to issue a Letter of Credit (L/C) for the full cargo amount (7,300MT) and manage the arrangement against a small proforma invoice. If you are interested, please confirm the tonnage, and I will provide you with the vessel manager’s contact info and account details for sending the proforma invoice.

Regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Thank you for the update. We have prepared and sent our proforma invoice for the complete cargo amount (7,300MT). The vessel manager has requested a Letter of Credit to be issued to our account number 421123. Could you guide us on how to proceed with this?

Best regards,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

Thank you for your swift actions. The Letter of Credit for the deal has been issued and directed towards the supplier. Two separate Letters of Credit have been arranged: one for the supplier and another for the shipping line, both processed by our finance department. These documents should be on your account shortly. Please confirm upon receipt.

Best regards,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Payment Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

We have received the Letter of Credit as well as confirmation on the financial processing of both documents. Additionally, our company will be transferring the remaining balance of $14,000 to your account within the next 2 days.

Please confirm once the transaction has been completed.

Thank you,
Tiana

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiana,

We have received your balance transfer of $14,000. The funds will appear in your account shortly. Your vessel, currently traveling the Pacific Ocean, is scheduled to arrive in the Arabian Gulf soon. The total cost of the shipment has been calculated as $102,290,000.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Changes in State Tax Ruling on Ethanol
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Jones, We have received information about a potential change in the state tax ruling in Alaska that could impact our ethanol shipping operations. Could you please clarify how this pending decision will alter your rate structure, and the expected date for these changes to take effect? Thank you for your assistance. Best regards, Oliver

email_chain.subject: Response to Inquiry on Tax Changes
email_chain.body: Hello Oliver, Thank you for your inquiry about the pending tax ruling changes. We are currently evaluating the implications of this change and will provide you with a detailed explanation of how the rate structure for shipping ethanol might be affected. We aim to finalize our decision and communicate the details by the end of this month. Please feel free to reach out if you have further questions in the meantime. Sincerely, Mollie Harrison, Regional Manager, Alaska State Tax Department

email_chain.subject: Further Details on Alaska Fuel Tax on Ethanol
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Harrison, As a company devoted to supporting Alaska’s energy independence via cleaner, lower-emission fuels, we currently offer discounted rates for ethanol due to the lack of differentiation between ethanol and petroleum-based products in Alaska's fuel tax. Should the new law pass, taxing ethanol at 60 percent of the full rate, we will need to adjust our rates and pass through the new tax to maintain compliance. We hope to continue our support by absorbing the tax increase until June 30, 2013. However, if rates remain unchanged, our fuel costs to consumers may significantly increase. We appreciate your support in this matter. Kind regards, Oliver

email_chain.subject: Attachment: Alaska State Fuel Tax Department's Response
email_chain.body: Dear Oliver, Please find attached our email correspondence with the Alaska State Fuel Tax Department regarding the change in the state tax ruling. This attachment should provide a comprehensive view on how the potential regulation changes might affect our ability to ship ethanol to Alaska. Kind regards, [Your Name], Pacific Ethanol Inc.

email_chain.subject: Request for Earliest Loading Date for Adhesive Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lie,

We require a shipment of 3,400MT of adhesives, to be transported from Rotterdam to Lübeck, ideally in early October. Could you please inform us of the earliest available loading date?

Best regards,
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Earliest Loading Date for Adhesive Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Jan,

Thank you for your inquiry. The earliest we can schedule the 3,400MT shipment is October 4th. Please note, this date falls on a Monday which usually coincides with our slower operational week. If this schedule doesn't suit your needs, we could potentially expedite the loading to October 2nd or even October 1st. Be aware, however, that October 1st operates under our limited summer sailing schedule and would necessitate using a larger vessel than usual. The option for October 2nd uses a regularly scheduled vessel which is fully booked and could result in reduced throughput.

We can guarantee the loading dates up to October 7th, allowing you some flexibility. Please let us know your preferred loading date so that we can proceed with the respective arrangements and invoice generation.

Best regards,
Lie Best

email_chain.subject: Shipping Opportunity for 6,100MT of Liquid Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Akira,

I have an opportunity for you involving the transport of 6,100MT of liquid sugar from Nakhon Si Thammarat to Port Klang. Could you please provide me with an estimate? Are you interested in this opportunity?

Best regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Opportunity for 6,100MT of Liquid Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear Scott,

Thank you for the offer. I'll review the details and get back to you soon.

Best regards,
Akira

email_chain.subject: Awaiting Your Response
email_chain.body:

I'm looking forward to your estimate and decision on the shipping opportunity. Please let me know at your earliest convenience.

Best,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Opportunity for 6,100MT of Liquid Sugar
email_chain.body:

Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: No-Pay Order Issue
email_chain.body:

This is indeed very unfortunate. I share your hopes for a future collaboration when circumstances allow.

Sincerely,
Akira

email_chain.subject: Final Communication
email_chain.body:
