Acknowledged. Let’s strive for smoother cooperation in future endeavors. This will be our last exchange on this particular matter.

Regards,
Scott

email_chain.subject: Request for Provisional Quotation and Laytime Availability for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wang,

We’d like to arrange for the shipment of 12,000MT of methanol from Durban to Los Angeles. Could you please provide a provisional quote and inform us about the laytime availability? 

Regards,
Christian

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Provisional Quotation and Laytime Availability for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Christian,

Thank you for your email. I have checked our schedule and we do have availability for the requested dates. 

Best regards,
Angie

email_chain.subject: RE: Re: Request for Provisional Quotation and Laytime Availability for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Angie,

Many thanks for confirming the availability. Please send me your provisional quotation for transporting 12,000MT of methanol to a US port and specify the laytime.

Regards,
Christian

email_chain.subject: Quotation and Laytime Details for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Christian,

Thank you for your prompt response. Our provisional quotation for the shipment and details of the laytime are included. We can also accommodate payment on L/C terms if required.

Best regards,
Angie

email_chain.subject: Re: Quotation and Laytime Details for Methanol Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Angie,

Many thanks for your quick reply. I am having trouble printing your Excel sheet. Could you kindly send it to my colleague? His email address is [email protected]

Regards,
Christian

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Wheat Flour Availability and Detention Charges
email_chain.body: We’d like to import 13,000MT of wheat flour from Bandar Abbas to New Orleans. Please let me know if you have any available for a late-week laycan, and whether or not you charge detention. Thanks, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Wheat Flour Availability and Detention Charges
email_chain.body: Thanks, Peter. Yes, I have this commodity in stock, and I await the necessary documents from your side to proceed. Regards, Nadia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Wheat Flour Availability and Detention Charges
email_chain.body: Hello Nadia, Thanks for the confirmation. I will send the release letters as soon as possible. Could you confirm if the same terms apply to additional consignments? Thanks again, Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Wheat Flour Availability and Detention Charges
email_chain.body: Hi Peter, Good to know. Yes, we can supply the same volume under the same terms. Do you have the release letters ready? Regards, Nadia

email_chain.subject: Request for Cement Delivery Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

Hope you are well.

I am writing to you with a request for a quote for the delivery of 1000 x 150 kg bags of cement to your facility in London next week. I'm not sure if you offer such services, but I would appreciate it if you could provide details on cost, available dates, and any other relevant information before I place an order.

Thanks for your time,
Lara

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cement Delivery Quote
email_chain.body:
Hello Lara,

Thank you for your email. I can confirm that we do offer delivery services for bulk cement orders. For the delivery of 1000 x 150 kg bags of cement to our London facility next week, I will need to check on the exact dates and costs available and will get back to you with a detailed quote shortly.

Thanks for reaching out,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Urea Transportation from Aqaba to Lattakia
email_chain.body:
Hi Frank,

I'd like to arrange for the shipment of 3,000MT of urea fertilizer from Aqaba to Lattakia next week. Could you please let me know if you have availability? Additionally, could you inform me about the demurrage charges in case of delays?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Kyle

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Urea Transportation from Aqaba to Lattakia
email_chain.body:
Hi Kyle,

Thanks for reaching out. Apologies for the slight delay in my response; it's been a busy day.

To proceed, could you confirm if the 3,000 MT of urea is ready for loading? Do you have all necessary documents such as the berth confirmation in Aqaba, the proforma invoice, and the Freight and Charge Agreement (FCA) noted on the Bill of Lading? Additionally, it would be helpful to know if CW (clean water) provisions are met as per the Bill of Lading. For your cargo, please ensure you have the Bill of Lading Number and House Air Waybill Number ready.

I will also explore other port options and send you the best logistics Solutions to optimize service and reduce costs.

Thanks again,
Best regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Chartering a 60m Dry Bulk Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hello Amanda,

I am looking to charter a 60m dry bulk vessel this summer. Could you please check if there are any available candidates in your fleet? Also, could you provide me with the available dates in June, July, and August?

Regards,
William

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chartering a 60m Dry Bulk Vessel
email_chain.body:
Hi William,

Great to hear from you! We have several ships available during the specified months, including two interesting dry bulkers: MV Armati and MV Semara. The MV Armati is fully operational, but the MV Semara is currently experiencing some technical issues; I will check what can be done about that. I can send over more detailed information about the charter options for these vessels if you are interested.

Best regards,
Amanda

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Chartering a 60m Dry Bulk Vessel
email_chain.body:
Amanda,

Thank you for your prompt response. Yes, I would like to receive more detailed information on both of these vessels. I'll get back to you in a few days after reviewing the details you provide.

Thanks,
William

email_chain.subject: Availability for Discussing Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Dallas, How is everything in the shipping department? I was wondering if you could meet this afternoon to discuss the details of a 5,500MT load we need to ship from Singapore to Yokohama. I've encountered some issues with the connection from Germany to South Korea, and I'm hoping you might have a new solution. Please let me know as soon as possible. Regards, Kristian

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Discussing Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Kristian, Could you please provide more details about the 5,500MT shipment, as I currently do not have access to those container details. I'll get back to you later this week. Best, Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Discussing Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Ron, Thank you for your response. Could you send me the details of the container when you have access to them? I would be glad to help you out. Regards, Kristian

email_chain.subject: Container Details Obtained
email_chain.body: Dear Kristian, We've managed to find the details about the container. Please note that this email address will soon be inactive. Thank you very much for your efforts; your performance has been very impressive. Regards, Ron

email_chain.subject: Issue with Hatcher Holders in Shipment
email_chain.body: Kristian, I want to inform you that the 5,500MT shipment was picked up in Singapore. However, we are experiencing issues with some of the Hatcher holders as they do not fit properly. I will contact the carrier to address this problem, but could you assist with this? If so, please send pictures for follow-up. I will attach the shipment details separately. Let me know if you can help. Regards, Richard

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote from Muscat to Fujairah
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Shokhra,

I'd like to inquire about moving 7,500MT of chemical fertilizer from Muscat to Fujairah next month. I'm also interested in knowing if your vessel has any specific draft requirements. Could you please provide a quote that includes Harbor Service Tax (HST) and tonnage tax? Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

Thanks, 
Sherry

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Chartering a Chemical/Project Vessel
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I am interested in chartering a vessel suitable for carrying both chemical and project cargoes, accompanied by a bunker barge for storing crude oil during the loading of chemicals. Could you provide an estimate of the daily hire rates for this setup? Currently, I am traveling overseas and may not be able to manage the related formalities. Could you kindly send me the necessary documents and terms for my review and approval?

Thank you, 
Mally

email_chain.subject: Charter Hire Request for Chemical Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shokhra,

As an independent contractor, I am looking to charter a vessel from October to January to carry two types of chemical cargo totaling 9,000MT, requiring shipment in cylinders. I would appreciate a quote for this two-month charter period. Additionally, could you suggest a suitable destination port for this voyage? Your guidance would be invaluable.

Thank you in advance, 
Juhana P.

labels.commodity: Chemical fertilizer, oil products, petroleum gas, chemical cargo
labels.cargo_size: 7500MT for the first email, 9000MT for the third email

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Palm Oil Spillage Incident
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bovino,

We have encountered a minor spillage of palm oil on one of our trucks heading to Lagos. Please advise on your damage prevention measures (DPM) so we can address the situation efficiently.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Best regards,
Jhon Ogu
P.S: The spill incident is being handled.

email_chain.subject: Clarification Required on Spillage Issue
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bovino,

It seems there might be some confusion regarding the spillage situation. Please understand the severity and potential hazards of driving a truck spilled with palm oil. Your prompt action would be appreciated.

Thanks for your attention to this matter.

Regards,
Jhon Ogu
P.S: The spill is being managed.

email_chain.subject: Immediate Action Required for Spillage Resolution
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bovino,

I must insist on the urgency of this matter concerning the palm oil spill. Please do not delay further; send the necessary documentation and proceed with the payment as discussed to expedite the cleanup process.

Thank you for your prompt attention.

Best regards,
Jhon Ogu
P.S: The spill management is ongoing.

email_chain.subject: Reiteration of Urgency: Spillage Issue
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bovino,

This is a further reminder of the ongoing urgency concerning the palm oil spillage. We require your immediate cooperation on this matter.

Thank you for handling this expeditiously.

Best,
Jhon Ogu
P.S: The spill is still being managed.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping 6000MT Vegetables from Trieste to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Weir,

I need to ship 6,000MT of vegetables from Trieste to Hamburg. Do you have space available on your vessel, and can we get the rate ASAP? Looking forward to your prompt response.

Regards,
Samuel

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Space and Rate Information for Vegetables
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Weir,

Following up on our need to send load of vegetables from Trieste, I would like to confirm if you could accommodate us in your space, and kindly provide us your shipping rates. We aim to dispatch the goods by the 7th of April at the latest. Are you able to assist?

Regards,
Mr. Ian Robeson

email_chain.subject: Space Requirement for Shipping Meat from Trieste to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Weir,

Could you please let me know if you have available space on your ship for transporting meat from Trieste to Hamburg? Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated as we need to finalize the logistics ASAP.

Best regards,
Sammy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Capacity for 300 Tons of Steel and Wheat from Malta to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Mr. Weir,

I was wondering if you can accommodate 300 tons of steel along with my wheat shipment from Malta to Hamburg in your vessel. Please let me know your availability and rates at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Sammy

email_chain.subject: Shipping 500MT of Vegetables from Trieste to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Weir,

I would like to inform you that I am looking to ship 500MT of vegetables from Trieste to Hamburg. Could you please confirm if you can accommodate this cargo size in your vessel? Additionally, I would like to know if the general freight and cargo handling rates for vegetables are consistent between these two ports. Your prompt confirmation of these rates would be helpful.

Best regards,
Mohammad

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Coffee Beans Shipment to Chennai
email_chain.body: Hi, We have 25kmt of coffee beans to send to Chennai. What freight do you quote and is laytime negotiable beyond 6 days? Thanks, Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Coffee Beans Shipment to Chennai
email_chain.body: Hello Linda, Greetings! The transportation terms include: 1. Fixed price transportation, not negotiable. The coffee must be delivered between November 21st and 25th to Coffee Chennai. 2. We would prefer that this shipment originates from Ecuador. Based on our long-standing partnership with Albrecht and Petersons since August 2015, we recommend contacting them for this shipment: Martin Peterson +49 1512 3664097, Isabell Schmied +49 163 9431815. Regards, Roast Coffee (Trigon) Pvt Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request and Invoice Clarification
email_chain.body: Hiya, I have received an invoice related to the coffee shipment. However, it appears that I received only one invoice, and I'm checking if a second is expected. Please confirm at your earliest convenience. Thank you, Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request and Invoice Clarification
email_chain.body: Hello Linda, Thanks for your query. We have verified the invoice amount and it matches the order. The shipment details are correct and correspond to the shipment to Chennai, India. This order was confirmed through two separate sales orders, and the pricing details are accurate as shown in the documents. Thank you for your attention to detail. Regards, Roast Coffee (Trigon) Pvt Ltd

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement of Crude Oil Transport Service from Suez to Santos
email_chain.body:
Good day Ms. Quintero,

We require the transportation of 4,000 MT of crude oil from Suez to Santos, which must arrive within 15 days from today. Could you please advise on the earliest position of your vessel at Suez?

Sincerely,
Ilana

email_chain.subject: Position of Vessel MM Monet
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ilana,

Following our 72 hours MasterTrack forecast, the position of the vessel MM Monet as of May 5, 2022, is at 28.69N 35.76E. We estimate the MM Monet to arrive in Suez on May 13, 2022, with times expected throughout the day at 07:00 EDT, 08:00 EDT, 10:00 EDT, and finally at 16:00 EDT. Please let us know how you wish to proceed.

Sincerely, 
Jean-Louis

email_chain.subject: Updated forecast: Position of MM Monet
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ilana,

We have updated the MM Monet's position based on our latest 72 hours MasterTrack forecast. As of May 9, 2022, the MM Monet is positioned at 30.55N 35.29E. The vessel's estimated arrival time in Santos is on May 17, 2022, at 07:00 EDT, 08:00 EDT, 10:00 EDT, and 16:00 EDT.

Sincerely,
Jean-Louis

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Reduced Cargo Size
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Adams, The final quantities for a 1,700MT lot of syrup are still uncertain. Can we get a freight rate for 1,500MT instead? Also, will this cargo be part of a consolidated shipment? Thanks, Mira

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Reduced Cargo Size
email_chain.body: Hello Mira, Thank you for your patience as we finalize the details with the shipper. I haven't received confirmation on the final quantities yet, but I've prepared a preliminary quote based on 1,500MT. The shipment will indeed be consolidated. Please let me know if you have any further questions. Regards, Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Adjustment Pending Shipper Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello Mira, Yes, the rate per ton will likely increase with the reduced quantity. I'm awaiting final figures from the shipper and will adjust the quote accordingly as soon as we receive that information. Thanks, Mark

email_chain.subject: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Liao, We have a cargo of 7,400MT of diesel to load at the China Southern port of Shekou. We can meet you in about a week from now. Can you advise of your rates? Regards, Nathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Nathan, I apologize for the delay in my reply, as I have been handling a lot of paperwork. Could you please specify the rate per container of diesel? Best Regards, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Joe, The cargo was purchased at USD 375/MT FOB and the CIF to Shekou port is USD 2,920/MT. The current freight cost at Shekou Port is USD 2,370/MT. Regards, Nathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Nathan, I am interested in the job. Could you please provide more details regarding this transportation? Regards, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Joe, We need to transport one 20 foot container of diesel cargo from Shekou port to Paris port by sea. The volume of the cargo is 7,400MT. If you can provide a suitable price for this cargo, I will consider your proposal. Regards, Nathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Nathan, Thank you for your proposal. However, I cannot transport the cargo without the hull owner's authorization letter. Best regards, Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transportation Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Joe, You do not need the letter from the hull owner for this operation. Nathan

email_chain.subject: Request for Transportation Estimate of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Oakley,

Could you please provide me with an estimate for the transportation of 10,000MT of sugar from Guatemala City to Houston via a deep draft vessel? Additionally, could you advise on which ports in each country are the most efficient for clearance to avoid customs delays?

Best Regards,
Philip

email_chain.subject: Request for Transportation Estimates for Maize and Beans
email_chain.body:
Mr. Oakley,

Following up on my previous email about sugar transportation, I am also seeking transport for 10,000 MT of maize and 10,000 MT of beans from the port of Alston to the port of Houston. We aim to ship these as soon as possible. Could you please send me a quote for these transports?

Kind Regards,
Philip

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Wood Pellets and Wheat Transportation
email_chain.body:
Gentlemen,

We are interested in transporting a large amount of wood pellets from the port of Savannah to Houston. Additionally, we are initiating a project in Guatemala involving wheat exports. Could you please provide an estimate for transporting 5,000 MT of wheat from Savannah to Guatemala on a deep draft vessel? Which ports would you recommend? How long would customs clearance take?

Kind Regards,
Phil

email_chain.subject: Request for Multiple Transportation Estimates
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Oakley,

Please send me an estimate for the transportation of the following:
- 10,000 MT of corn and 3,000 MT of soybeans to Houston, 
- 2,000 MT of sugar and 3,000 MT of sorghum to Guatemala,
- 3,000 MT of wheat to Houston, and
- 2,000 MT of sugar to Guatemala.

Additionally, I would like an estimate to transport 10,000 MT of fertilizer to Houston and 3,000 MT of sugar from Guatemala.

Best Regards,
Philip

email_chain.subject: Wood Chip Loading Availability
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Dang, I have a vessel fully ready to be loaded with wood chips at Laem Chabang. Please let me know when you're ready to proceed with loading. Best regards, Inge

email_chain.subject: Container Transport Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Ms. Dang, I am currently in London and have a container ready for transportation to Laem Chabang with its contents displayed in the attached photos. I aim to have the container loaded by the 1st of May; however, I am uncertain if I can travel to Thailand, as the content cannot remain in the container for an extended period. I look forward to your response. Best regards, Barry

email_chain.subject: Loading of Vessel BAZULAR
email_chain.body: Hello Barry, Our vessel BAZULAR will begin loading wood chips at Laem Chabang starting Monday, 9th May. The allocation is as follows: South side (5400 cbm), North side (5400 cbm), #1 deck (400 cbm), and #2 deck (200 cbm). Please confirm if this is suitable for you as soon as possible. Best regards, Inge

email_chain.subject: Loading of BAZULAR
email_chain.body: Hi Inge, Thanks for your email. Could you please confirm how many tonnes of wood chips can be loaded onto the vessel? I am interested in purchasing the full available quantity. Thanks, Barry

email_chain.subject: Loading of BAZULAR
email_chain.body: Hello Barry, Thank you for your email. The vessel will be loaded with 110000 tons of wood chips. The vessel is scheduled to leave Laem Chabang on 12th May, but due to possible wind conditions, the departure might be delayed until 15th May. I'd like to fix the loading date as soon as possible to confirm with the shipper. Best regards, Inge

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Transport Capacity and Fees
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Warren,

When your ship arrives in New Orleans, we would like to send you 50 tons of industrial chemicals by truck. Could you please provide the following information?
- What are the truck dimensions that your ship can accommodate?
- Are there any fees associated with this service? If so, what are they and how are they calculated?
- Do you have any spare capacity available?

Thank you in advance for your information.

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Chemical Shipment and Fees
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Warren,

We have arranged the shipment of 50 tons of chemicals to your ship. Below are the cost details:
- Freight to your ship: $10,000 U.S. dollars
- Other fees: $12,000 U.S. dollars
- Tankage: $5,000 U.S. dollars
- Spare capacity: $3,000 U.S. dollars

Your total invoice amount is $30,000 U.S. dollars.

We appreciate your services and look forward to another business opportunity with you in the future.

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Flour Shipment from Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body: Mr. Tokai, can your vessel load 600MT of flour from Shanghai to Singapore by mid-March? Best regards, Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Flour Shipment from Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body: Hi Laura, could your request be more specific regarding the loading of a larger amount than 100MT by mid-July? Thanks, Tokai

email_chain.subject: Request for Increased Quantity Acceptance
email_chain.body: Hi, my company in Sao Paulo (Brazil) will accept only 90% of our total order currently. Could you make it 95% by the deadline? Can your company come through for us? Regards.

email_chain.subject: Delivery Time Inquiry from Porto Alegre to New York
email_chain.body: Hello, what would be the delivery time from Porto Alegre to New York? Is it possible to ensure delivery conforms with the pre-agreed deadline? Best, Christopher

email_chain.subject: Urgent Cargo Load Request
email_chain.body: We will soon be in a logistically complex situation. Is your company able to load 100MT in just four days? How many hours of shipment can you commit to this accelerated schedule? Sincerely, Alex

email_chain.subject: Freight Cost Reduction Inquiry
email_chain.body: Could your company consider reducing the freight cost by $500? What would be the implications of such a reduction? Thanks, Sam

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

We are planning to ship 2,000MT of steel plates from China to India. Could you please provide us with an estimate for shipping? Thank you.

Best regards,
Kim

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Kim,

I apologize for the inconvenience, but our company no longer offers shipping services to India. We can, however, provide quotations for other destinations. Your Quotation ID is xxxxxxx. Please confirm or let me know if you would like us to explore alternative solutions.

Best regards,
Noah

email_chain.subject: Regarding Your Cargo Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Lina,

I received your email and understand that your cargo is relatively small for our vessels. However, I'm happy to look into it. Could you please confirm the final quantities? Also, please confirm if you are able to use Penang as a discharge port within the next two weeks.

Could you also share the details regarding the location, timing, and the mode of the loadout? We are planning to transship to a subsea FPSO in Mozambique.

Kind regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Your Cargo Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Mike,

Thank you for your email. I am glad that you are willing to consider our freight. Please find the details below:

Location: Pasir Panjang Terminal, Singapore
Port: Singapore
Cargo mode: Bulk cargo
Unit of measure: Tonnes
Starting date of load out: 1st November 2018
Ending date of load out: 2nd November 2018
Number of containers: 4,724 units
Number of cargo items: 6,756 items
Quantity: 248 tons
Unit price per ton: $1,500

We are willing to cover 70% of the freight. We look forward to a successful collaboration.

Best regards,
Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Your Cargo Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Lina,

You mentioned that you would like to cover 70% of the freight. Could you please share additional details about the cargo that falls into this category? Also, do you have a fixed freight payment schedule we should be aware of?

Kind regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Rate from Tangshan to Sharjah, DXB
email_chain.body: We have a 5,200MT fertilizer shipment ready from Tangshan to Sharjah, DXB. Could you please advise on your best freight rate and confirm if weekend loadings are acceptable? Thank you, Sonny

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Freight Rate from Tangshan to Sharjah, DXB
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Sonny, Thank you for your inquiry. We are indeed equipped to handle the bulk cargo shipment between China and the UAE. Our agents are based in Tangshan and our terminals are in Dubai, UAE. We do have availability for your requested loading times. Could you please provide more details such as exact loading and unloading ports, and the type of cargo? We are eager to discuss further and earn your business. Regards, Manager

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Manager, I apologize for any confusion earlier; we have decided to book your service for our shipment. Initially, I was under the impression that it would need to go through a traditional tender process. This is the first time we are proceeding based on a direct email interaction. We will keep you updated on any developments. Regards, Sonny

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello Sonny, We appreciate your decision and are looking forward to working together on this shipment. We also have facilities in Tangerang, Indonesia, which could be beneficial depending on your future needs. Our terms and conditions regarding rates and payments are straightforward, and we will share these details in our subsequent communications. Please let us know if you have any additional questions. Regards, Manager

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry for Dolomite and Gypsum
email_chain.body: Hello Sonny, We currently have 2,000MT of Dolomite and 2,500MT of Gypsum available for shipment. We are seeking the best market freight rate. We have two scheduled loadings; the final loading will be 4-5 days before the vessel's arrival at Bahrain port. Please let us know your best rates. Regards, Manager

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Capt. Ford, I would like to request a quote for 4,000MT of bitumen for our shipment planned from Mombasa to Fujairah. Could you please provide the current freight rate and your availability for a mid-March laycan? Thank you, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on Freight Services
email_chain.body: Hi Capt. Ford, Thank you for your prompt response. It would be beneficial if you could provide a complimentary quote this time as it might help in finalizing the deal promptly. Additionally, could you provide a competitive quote for a subsequent dry bulk shipment? Thanks again, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Ship Sizes and Discounts
email_chain.body: Dear Captain Ford, Thank you for your prompt and detailed proposal. I have a question about the ship sizes; you mentioned a capacity of 20,000DWT for our first shipment. Is it possible to use a larger ship size for our second and third shipments, possibly around 30,000DWT each? Additionally, is there a possibility for a multi-user discount considering our fleet includes six 10,000DWT vessels? Thank you, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Request for Updated Quotation Based on New Requirements
email_chain.body: Dear Captain Ford, As the Purchasing Manager of Company A, I received your quotation for our request regarding shipments from Rotterdam to St. Petersburg. However, in light of new information, could you update this quote reflecting the larger vessel requirements and potential discounts discussed previously? Regards, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Inquiry from Rotterdam to Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Hello Taeko,

I am looking to ship 3,900 MT of coke from Rotterdam to Port Klang. Could you please let me know if you have any available vessels during the week beginning 4th November?

Regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Inquiry from Rotterdam to Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Dear Carlos,

We have the following vessels available arriving at Port Klang from 4th to 11th November:

- Kumari, 20,000 DWT, available 4-6 November
- Ming Tzu, 10,000 DWT, available 5-8 November
- Ho Zhihai, 16,000 DWT, available 6-9 November
- Grand Kema, 20,000 DWT, available 8-11 November
- Raj Mata, 10,000 DWT, available 9-12 November
- Fukang, 13,000 DWT, available 10-13 November
- Huanghe, 17,000 DWT, available 11-14 November

Regards,
Tetsuo

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: 5000 MT Beans from Tanga to Port Klang
email_chain.body: Hey Ashish! Could you please provide us with an estimate for 5000 MT of beans from Tanga to Port Klang? We are planning to book soon and it would be great to receive a quote as early as possible. Looking forward to your advice. Thanks, Harish

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: 5000 MT Beans from Tanga to Port Klang
email_chain.body: Dear Harish, Thank you for your message. Below are the details of our offer: - Commodity: Tangerine Skin Grade (TS) Beans - Origin: Tanga - Destination: Port Klang - Booking Time: Immediate - Quantity: 5000MT - Net Price: RM 3600.00 per MT Additional information: - Packaging: 100% Scraped Sacks - Transportation: Truck to wharf, then by cargo boat to the harbor - Payment Terms: 100% LC/irrevocable L/C, with full payment before port discharge. Please review and let us know if you have any questions. Best regards, Ashish

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: 5000 MT Beans from Tanga to Port Klang
email_chain.body: Dear Ashish, Thank you for the prompt response and the pricing details. Could you please send the terms & conditions to my email at harish@someco.com? Thanks, Harish

email_chain.subject: Terms and Conditions for Bean Purchase

email_chain.subject: Re: Terms and Conditions for Bean Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Ashish, Thanks for providing the terms and conditions. We're looking to complete the order within the next 2 weeks. Could you also provide a detailed breakdown of the freight charges? What's included and what's additional? Looking forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Harish

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Booking Request: Fujairah to Houston

As we discussed previously, please remember that my office hours are from 9am to 2pm, and I'm unavailable for business meetings before 10am. I look forward to your response regarding the shipping inquiry.

Raj

Additionally, I am looking to redesign my company website with the introduction of our new logo later this month. I hope to have the website operational by the beginning of next month. Could your team assist with this?

Could you please provide more details about the website design services you offer for international companies? I am considering this in alignment with our company's new branding campaign.

Raj

email_chain.subject: Shipping Options Inquiry for 1,700MT of PCBs
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Tan,

I am verifying the options for shipping 1,700MT of PCBs from Jebel Ali to Thessaloniki at the end of April. Could you please inform me if there are any additional surcharges that will apply? Thank you.

Kind regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Options Inquiry for 1,700MT of PCBs
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

We are currently holding space for the voyage and need confirmation of the full loaded quantity. The estimate is based on the final quantities provided. Final confirmation will be made once we receive the final values.

Please also confirm acceptance of the following rates:
1. USD Sales L/C
2. USD Sale on Board Terms
3. USD Arrival L/C
4. USD Deferred L/C

Kind regards,
Tan

P.S. The charges will be required to be pre-paid at the point of sale against a confirmed loading of shipment, with 50% of the charges due 30 days prior to the vessel sail date. The balance will be payable at loading.

email_chain.subject: Re: Surcharge Details for 1,700MT of PCBs Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Tan,

Thank you very much for your reply. We will get back to you with the final quantity before the end of the week.

Many thanks,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about STP for Paper Shipment from Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body: Hi, Would you be able to confirm your earliest date for an STP for 3,000MT of paper from Barcelona to Casablanca? Also, do you charge for your expert judgement to advise us on the terminal rules? With best regards, Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about STP for Paper Shipment from Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body: Thank you for your enquiry. I am sorry but at this time our Operations team has no availability until January. Our charter rates can be viewed on the rate page on our website, and these are subject to Standard Charters terms & conditions. Please note the rates are offered on a per direction basis. We charge two-way rates but allow a few days turnaround at sea between the outward and return legs. Additionally, there is no charge for our expert advice on terminal rules. We will contact you once availability has been confirmed and our rates have been reconfirmed. Kind regards, Vassili Kakias

email_chain.subject: Enquiry on Consolidation of Cargo and Express Charter Options
email_chain.body: Dear Vassili, I trust you are well. I was hoping you could help me out with a couple of queries. Is it possible to combine freight items on an express charter, and if so, what rates apply? I also have a query regarding return slots and consolidation of cargo. We would like to consolidate three flights of around 500 kgs each on one flight, as this will reduce the number of flights we need and associated costs and delivery times. What would be a reasonable request time for us to supply this service (3-4 days)? Kind regards, Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry on Consolidation of Cargo and Express Charter Options
email_chain.body: Thank you for your enquiry. Regarding your first query, if you have two destinations and only want to travel once per cargo item and your freight exceeds 3,000kg, there will be a minimum charge of $5,000 to open up your freight as Standard Charters freight. For your second query, the Standard Charters will be 40 days turnaround per trip, and for the return leg from airport to airport, we allow up to 5 days turnaround. Generally, 3-4 days should be enough time to collect your cargo. Kind regards, Vassili Kakias

email_chain.subject: Your Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Miss Karina,

Thank you for your inquiry. I have prepared a quote for your review and would like to discuss it with you at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Re: Your Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,

Thank you for the quote. I would like to proceed with the order for 5 modules at 9 euros per module as quoted. Could you please finalize and send me the details?

Regards,
Karina

email_chain.subject: Request for FOB Ex-Bucharest Quote
email_chain.body: Mr. Omeh, I've reviewed your rates and am interested in discussing a potential shipment. Could you kindly provide a quote for FOB ex-Bucharest for 3000MT, with a laycan period starting mid-July? Additionally, please confirm who will cover the port dues and LASH. Let's discuss a non-Flexi term for the freight rate. Thank you, Artwork

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for FOB Ex-Bucharest Quote
email_chain.body: Dear Artwork, Thank you for your request. The initial quote for FOB ex-Bucharest for 3,000MT with a Flexi term is set. Please note, adding a 5% surcharge for a non-Flexi term arrangement. I will forward the revised quote shortly. Best regards, Mr. Omeh

email_chain.subject: Revised FOB Ex-Bucharest Quote Confirmation
email_chain.body: Mr. Omeh, Thanks for sending over the revised rate for FOB ex-Bucharest. The current proposal, including the additional $5,000 for the non-Flexi term, looks competitive. Could you please send the contract for FOB ex-Bucharest so we can finalize the negotiations? I will consider your rate and update you soon. Best regards, Artwork

email_chain.subject: FOB Ex-Bucharest Finalization
email_chain.body: Dear Artwork, I have received interest from a potential buyer for the FOB ex-Bucharest with a 3,000MT load, commencing 15 July. Please provide your lowest possible bid for this delivery. Thank you for considering the earlier quote. Regards, Mr. Omeh

email_chain.subject: Query on Vessel Availability and Berth Confirmation for Industrial Corn Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Quintero, We have 2,500MT of industrial corn destined for Valencia from Surabaya. Could you confirm your earliest vessel position, and is a berth guaranteed on arrival? Best regards, Enrique

email_chain.subject: Re: Query on Vessel Availability and Berth Confirmation for Industrial Corn Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Enrique, The vessel Fast 8 will arrive and be at berth on Arrival 4 at 3PM, in Valencia on Sunday. Could you please confirm the earliest dates you would like to ship, and the total expected shipment weight? Best regards, Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Query on Vessel Availability and Berth Confirmation for Industrial Corn Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Carlos, Thank you for confirming berth arrival. We have initially booked the first 1,500MT, and are expecting more bookings soon. Our shipment windows are set from Feb 12 to Mar 12, with 15,000MT per shipment. Please note, the vessel will depart Surabaya on Feb 4. Best regards, Enrique

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Shipment from Rotterdam to Trieste
email_chain.body: Hi Sven, I’d like to schedule a shipment of 11,200MT of bitumen from Rotterdam to Trieste. There is flexibility on the loading schedule, so there’s no rush. Could you provide an initial price estimate for this transaction? Best regards, Andy

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment from Rotterdam to Trieste
email_chain.body: Hello Andy, Greetings from your business partner in Rotterdam. The bitumen shipment sounds great. How about an initial offer of 8 million euros for this deal? Unfortunately, I won't be able to cover the freight costs in this quote. I hope you understand and we can discuss this further. Sincerely, Sven

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment from Rotterdam to Trieste
email_chain.body: Hi Sven, Let me take a week to arrange the details for this bitumen delivery and I will get back to you with a finalized price. Should this price meet our targets, could the discount equivalent to the freight costs be considered? I look forward to your response. Regards, Andy

email_chain.subject: Request for Caustic Soda Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Fadel, We request a quote for caustic soda to be shipped from Karachi. The vessel is scheduled to depart on the 30th with a delivery of 10,000mt at Jebel Ali. Please confirm if a one-week turnaround is possible. Regards, Diana

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Caustic Soda
email_chain.body: Dear Diana, Please find attached our quotation for Caustic Soda from Karachi to Jebel Ali. We kindly ask you to review our offer and respond at your earliest convenience. With best regards, Rashid and Ali

email_chain.subject: Urgency in Processing the Order
email_chain.body: Dear Rashid and Ali, Following our request for caustic soda, please note the urgency to place the order due to our tight production schedule. Immediate action is required. Regards, Diana

email_chain.subject: Issue with Caustic Soda Supply
email_chain.body: Dear Diana, Unfortunately, our Karachi supplier reports that the vessel's capacity for caustic soda is fully booked. We regret the inconvenience and are coordinating with a direct supplier from Pakistan to meet your needs. With best regards, Ali

email_chain.subject: Appreciation for Efforts
email_chain.body: Dear Ali, Thank you for managing the logistics with a two-week turnaround time. We appreciate your efforts in ensuring the timely delivery. Regards, Diana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Caustic Soda Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Diana, I have reviewed your request for the caustic soda shipment from Karachi. We will collaborate closely to ensure all specifications are met as per your schedule. Best, Fadel

email_chain.subject: Request for Air Freight Rates from London to Dubai
email_chain.body: Hi Joseph, I am interested in obtaining some rates for air freight from London to Dubai. Could you please schedule a time for a callback to discuss the details? I look forward to your prompt response. Best regards, James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Estimates for Dubai Purchase
email_chain.body: Hi Joseph, We are finalizing the purchase of four containers of goods in Dubai and need to get some shipping estimates. Could you please call me back at your earliest convenience to discuss this? Thank you, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry from Lagos to Benin
email_chain.body: Dear Mary, I am looking to book a shipment from Lagos to Benin, including tea and sugar. Could you provide information on the freight charges? Also, is a 14-day transport period a realistic estimate? Thanks, Jenny

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry from Lagos to Benin
email_chain.body: Dear Jenny, The freight charge from Lagos to Benin is approximately 500 USD. A 14-day transit time is generally sufficient. Please note that customs clearance might require additional days. For details on customs procedures, you may contact the consignee directly via their Facebook page or provided contact number. Best regards, Mary

email_chain.subject: Courier Service Inquiry from Lagos to Cotonou
email_chain.body: Hi Mary, I am inquiring about courier services from Lagos to Cotonou. How much would it cost to send one box? Best regards, Pedro

email_chain.subject: Cargo Truck Availability from Lagos to Abidjan
email_chain.body: Hello Mary, Following up on my last inquiry, could you confirm if you offer a cargo truck service from Lagos to Abidjan? I appreciate your prompt response. Best regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Update on Cargo Shipment for Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Dear Team,
The cargo shipment for Dar es Salaam will not proceed as planned due to the lack of market liquidity in the area. We will need to reassess our strategy moving forward.
Best,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Cargo Shipment for Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Rami,
I have received your email regarding the cargo shipment. After further research, we discovered that market conditions in Dar es Salaam do not present a major risk factor to our operations. This issue is just one of many that contributed to the delayed start of operations. We are compiling a complete list of these issues along with proposed solutions for each. A detailed presentation will be sent to you within the next two weeks. 
Thank you for your efforts in managing the logistics.
Best regards,
Support Team

email_chain.subject: Offers for Assistance on Cargo Handling Issues
email_chain.body:
Hello Team,
If anyone needs clarification or further discussion on the recent issues surrounding the cargo shipments, feel free to reach out. I'm here to help resolve any obstacles we encounter.
Remember, an innovative approach is crucial for inspiring enthusiasm and seeing problems in a new light.
Best Regards,
Support Team

email_chain.subject: Delivery Order Instructions
email_chain.body:
Dear Finance Team,
Please process the following payments for the recent delivery orders:
1. $50 for shipping - please send directly to Seattle.
2. $80 for payment and taxes - please send directly to Dar es Salaam.
3. $50 for initial hire - send to both Seattle and Dar es Salaam.
Ensure the payments are sent in the mentioned order to avoid financial discrepancies.
Thank you for your prompt action.
Malia

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Payments
email_chain.body:
Hi Malia,
Thank you for the details on the payments. I would like to confirm that the $80 payment is specifically to cover both the shipping and hire fees for the taxes, correct?
Best regards,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Re: Clarification on Payments
email_chain.body:
Hello Rami,
Yes, your understanding is correct. The $80 payment covers all taxes related to the shipping and hire cost. I have also attached a tax receipt for your $50 shipping payment.
Best,
Malia

email_chain.subject: Proposal: Transport 3,300 MT of Gelato from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Hi Mark,
How about transporting 3,300 MT of gelato from Naples to Melbourne? Should we start with a full cargo hold, or can we distribute 3 MT between the reefer plug and cargo hold?
Best regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal: Transport 3,300 MT of Gelato from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Hello Daniel,
Excellent proposal. To clarify, you've secured 3,000 MT of gelato that we're aiming to bring to Australia by October, in time for the festival. The idea to mix this shipment with other Neapolitan foodstuffs, or as a full gelato load, sounds intriguing. I'm also considering future orders for our ongoing festivals given the rising demand.
Best, Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Proposal: Transport 3,300 MT of Gelato from Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Mark,
Indeed, a mixed shipment could add cultural value. Let’s keep options open for how to integrate smaller gelato batches in the future, possibly via different transport methods.
Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Distribution Plans for Gelato in Australia
email_chain.body:
Daniel,
Regarding the customer preferences in Australia – how much of the gelato should we market locally versus use for promotional purposes, given the diverse tastes?
Cheers,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Distribution Plans for Gelato in Australia
email_chain.body:
Mark,
Great consideration. The majority of the gelato will be sold, but we'll also donate some to hospitals and nursing homes across Western Australia.
Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Proposal: Matilda Forest Festival
email_chain.body:
Daniel,
I'd like to propose the Matilda Forest Festival in Australia — a vibrant event celebrating music and gastronomy over three days. It's an opportunity to showcase our products and culture to a global audience.
Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal: Matilda Forest Festival
email_chain.body:
Mark,
Exciting idea! We will need to negotiate with the local forest community to ensure a smooth integration of the festival into the local environment.
Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Inquiry from Rostock to Mumbai

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:

We have 55,000 BBL of crude oil ready to ship from Cushing to Rotterdam. Could you please provide an FOB lumpsum freight quote? Additionally, could you inform us if any insurance is required for this shipment?

email_chain.body:
Hi Neil,

The FOB price will be $60 per barrel, which includes insurance. There is also a bunker surcharge of $1.70 per barrel. Please confirm the order and let us know your preferred payment method if you decide to proceed.

Thank you,
Siddharth

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Order and Final Price Agreement
email_chain.body:

Thank you,
Neil

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Order and Final Price Agreement
email_chain.body:
Hi Neil,

The final FOB price of $65 per barrel is confirmed. Please proceed to send the 200 LCL crude oil from Cushing to Rotterdam as agreed.

Thank you,
Siddharth

email_chain.subject: Quote for Iron Ore Shipment to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping from Shenzhen to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

My client wishes to begin exporting products from Shenzhen to Genoa. Could you provide the available shipping schedules for this routing?

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping from Shenzhen to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Hello Jane,

Thank you for your email. The route to Genoa is currently our most efficient. The transit time is approximately 28 days. We can also store the goods in our warehouse before shipping if needed. The cost for this service to Genoa is $195. Let me know if you have further questions.

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping from Shenzhen to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Rebecca,

Thanks for the information. Could I arrange to make the $195 payment over the phone?

Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping from Shenzhen to Genoa
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Sure, the payment of $195 can indeed be taken over the phone. Feel free to call me at 838-723-6668 if you have any further questions.

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment Confirmation and Storage Options
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Thank you for your call. To confirm, you are welcome to store the product at our office for up to 28 days before it is shipped to Genoa. The associated cost will be $195.

Regards,
Rebecca

email_chain.subject: Booking Inquiry for Cheddar Cheese Shipment
email_chain.body: Mr. K, We’ve got a 3,600MT shipment of cheddar cheese from Marseille to Kobe. Can we book your spot in May? All the best, Madeleine

email_chain.subject: Issue with Cheddar Cheese Quality
email_chain.body: Hi Madeleine, The team and I inspected the cheddar cheese during our trip to Calais today, and unfortunately, it’s not up to quality standards. We would like to assume responsibility for the shipment costs. Can you expedite the rest of the shipment, hopefully by tomorrow? Sincerely, Michael

email_chain.subject: Update on Cheddar Cheese Shipment Issues
email_chain.body: Mr. K, We’ve been in touch with our client in Calais. We’ve received a 100% refund on your shipment and they’ve also agreed to reimburse us for the $7,500 we paid in shipping costs. It was also a great opportunity to see the Parisian railway station. We’ll keep monitoring the process of getting this cheese to Kobe. All the best, Madeleine

email_chain.subject: Please Send Your File
email_chain.body: Mr. K, Please send your file to the green inbox and let me know after you’ve sent it. Once it’s in the green inbox, I will mark it as completed. All the best, Madeleine

email_chain.subject: Update on Schedule
email_chain.body: Mr. K, I’ll let you know next week what my schedule will be like for the next two months. All the best, Madeleine

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment of Fertilizers: Balikpapan to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment of Fertilizers: Balikpapan to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Charter Options for Next Month from Chennai to Balboa
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Can you offer a lumpsum rate from Chennai to Balboa? Are there any options to charter next month?

Thank you,
Heather

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Charter Options for Next Month from Chennai to Balboa

The voyage duration is 7.5 days, covering food, port charges, off days, and the charter fee, all inclusive. The total rate is $12,750.

Please let us know your preferred dates for the voyage.

Kind Regards,
Dylan

email_chain.subject: Seeking Trustworthy Agent for Bulk Cargoes in the Region

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Steel Plate Shipment
email_chain.body:

Alma

email_chain.subject: Quotation for Steel Plate Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Alma,

We will give full priority to your shipment and ensure that all required documents are prepared and ready for collection at the port of origin.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Yours faithfully,
IFS-KOBE LLC
1111.1st Line Road, Azabu Minami, Minato, Tokyo 105-0011 Japan
TEL: +81-3-3487-7700 FAX: +81-3-3487-7799

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Soybean Oil Supply
email_chain.body:

We are inquiring about the potential supply of 100,000 metric tons of soybean oil for delivery to Mar Del Plata. Could you please let us know if this amount can be shipped, and if so, when could the shipment be arranged?

Warm Regards,
Armando

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Soybean Oil Supply
email_chain.body:
Dear Armando,

Thank you for reaching out. We are currently reviewing the availability of shipping 100,000 metric tons of soybean oil as requested. I would like to inform you that our current price stands at $2700 per metric ton. We ship in parcels of 20,000 metric tons per barge. I will conduct further checks on our end and update you with the final details as soon as possible.

Thank you for your patience.

Best regards,
Maria Miguel

email_chain.subject: Shipping Query for Wood Pulp from Marseille to Piraeus
email_chain.body:

We are planning to transport 7,600MT of wood pulp from Marseille to Piraeus. Could you please inform us if you have any damaged crates that need to be sent back, and if the proposed shipping date is convenient for you?

Kind regards,
Oscar

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Query for Wood Pulp from Marseille to Piraeus
email_chain.body:
Dear Oscar,

Thank you for your email. Yes, we do have 120 broken crates that need to be returned from Piraeus to Trieste. Could you please give us a call at +39 0306653833 to discuss the contents and arrangements? We are available from 07:30 to 12:00 CET.

Kind regards,
Charlie

email_chain.subject: Request for Liquid Nitrogen Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Huang,

We require 250MT of liquid nitrogen to be shipped from Alexandria to Balikpapan by the end of this week. Our vessel will be in dry dock starting at 16:00 today, and as such, it would be beneficial if we could receive your freight quote by 12:00 today.

Additionally, please note that our associated broker, Mr. Lewis, a major shareholder in our shipping company, will be leaving the firm at end of this month. Should you require any further documents, such as an EPCD, please inform us as one is attached for your reference.

Best regards,
Daniel James
NGL

email_chain.subject: Update on Liquid Nitrogen Shipment Arrangement
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Huang,

I would like to update you that the 250MT of liquid nitrogen will be shipped from Alexandria to Balikpapan aboard vessel XXX in four days. Since the vessel will be at dry dock for the next 20 days, we appreciate your prompt action on this matter. We initially received a request for 150MT, so please confirm if this increase to 250MT is within our shipping capacity.

Best regards,
Daniel James
NGL

email_chain.subject: Issue with Vessel XXX for Nitrogen Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Huang,

Unfortunately, I must inform you that we are unable to arrange the shipment of liquid nitrogen aboard vessel XXX as initially planned. Our broker, Mr. Lewis, has confirmed this. If you can secure a vessel with adequate capacity, please contact him directly to facilitate the arrangement.

Best regards,
Daniel James
NGL

email_chain.subject: Offer for Polymer Transport from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hey Chris, We’ve just started our first voyage. I’m willing to pay a minimum guaranteed rate of $35/MT on 6,500MT of polymers from Rotterdam to Hamburg. However, I can consider going down to $20/MT. Do you think that’s a fair offer? Thanks in advance, Judy

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Polymer Transport from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hey Judy, I believe $20/MT is a fair rate. Please confirm if this rate is acceptable to you so we can arrange for a contract. Thanks for the inquiry! Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Polymer Transport from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hi Chris, Thanks for your email. Unfortunately, the rate you proposed doesn’t align with our current budget expectations. Could we discuss other possible options? Thanks, Judy

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Polymer Transport from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hi Judy, Thanks for your message. However, I need to inform you that our company would have to charge a shipping commission of $3,000 for your order. Thanks, Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Polymer Transport from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hi Chris, Thank you for your reply. I believe we can negotiate a lower commission for all my future orders. Thanks, Judy

email_chain.subject: Rate Acceptance and Contract Request
email_chain.body: Hi Chris, The rate of $20/MT is acceptable. Could you please arrange for a contract for us to sign? Thanks, Judy

email_chain.subject: Request for Ocean Freight Quote - September
email_chain.body:
Dear Raimund,

Could you provide an ocean freight quote for 4,800MT of fluid glass from Port Said to Los Angeles in September? Also, please confirm what units are used to indicate cargo tonnage.

Many thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Ocean Freight Quote - September
email_chain.body:
Hello Paul,

I'm currently getting the rate for your cargo between Egypt & USA. The cargo amount is 4,800 MT of fluid glass. We'll use 40'HQ and 20'GP containers. Could you please confirm if you need packing lists or shipping notices?

Best regards,
Raimund

email_chain.subject: Additional Details Needed
email_chain.body:
Hi Raimund,

Yes, please include packing lists and shipping notices in the documentation. Could you also let me know if loading in the morning is possible to avoid waiting times?

Thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Quote Request for Fluid Glass Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Raimund,

We would be interested in receiving a quote for approximately 35 - 40 containers of fluid glass from Egypt to California. The fluid glass will be transported in 20-30x45ft high cube containers, depending on availability.

Kind regards,
Harry

email_chain.subject: Ocean Freight Quote for Borosilicate Glass
email_chain.body:
Dear Raimund,

We would like to request an ocean freight quote for 23 MT of borosilicate glass from Port Said, Egypt.

Best wishes,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Follow-up: Ocean Freight Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Raimund,

Can you provide an update on the ocean freight quote for the fluid glass shipment?

Thanks,
Harry

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hello Michael,

We are planning two shipments of chrome ore from Singapore to Sydney. Please provide the cost estimate and expected delivery time. See the attached shipment details for your reference.

Best regards,
Toni

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Toni,

Thank you for providing the details of the shipments. I am reviewing the attached documents and will revert with a cost estimation and delivery timeline by tomorrow morning.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Shipment Cost and Delivery Time Estimate
email_chain.body:
Dear Toni,

After reviewing the shipment details, the estimated cost for transporting the chrome ore from Singapore to Sydney is approximately $10,000 USD per shipment. Expected delivery time is within 14 days from the date of departure. Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Fixture for Los Angeles Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Renfro,

We are preparing to ship 6,400MT of adhesive powder entirely within Los Angeles. I would like to inquire whether this shipment requires a specific fixture, or if it could be included with any existing arrangements we have? Your guidance would be appreciated.

Regards,
Vivian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Fixture for Los Angeles Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Vivian,

Thank you for your email. We do have available fixture space, and I suggest we use one of our dollies for this shipment. Could you please specify the carton number and provide the product weights? This information will help us proceed efficiently.

Looking forward to your response.

Thank you,
Howard

email_chain.subject: Clinker Transportation Inquiry: Sohar to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Can your vessel lift 8,400MT of clinker from Sohar to Mombasa? Additionally, do you apply a bunker escalation clause or offer a fixed rate? Regards, Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Clinker Transportation Inquiry: Sohar to Mombasa
email_chain.body: Hello Andrew, In regards to your inquiry, our bulk rates are influenced by both bunker price and tonnage. We typically use a mix of escalation clauses including simple and indexed, which are prevalent in the sea cargo industry. These clauses help adjust the contract rate in response to bunker price fluctuations without the need to renegotiate terms mid-contract. An escalation clause ensures timely indexation of contracts, and increases negotiation leverage for cost adjustments should bunker prices rise. Let us know if you have further questions or need detailed rates. Best regards, Shipping Co.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Elastomers shipment from Port Klang
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Kang, I am reviewing your customer list and noticed that we are potentially aligned in business interests. Could you handle a shipment of 2,800MT of elastomers from Port Klang to Surabaya? Thanks, Alex

email_chain.subject: Interest in 700MT PVC Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello, I'm interested in discussing your available cargo of 700MT PVC. Could you provide information on potential volumes available for shipment? Many thanks, Alex

email_chain.subject: Request for LDPE Delivery
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Tumser, You recently delivered 180MT of PP cargo to our port. I now require an additional 120MT of LDPE to be delivered within the next 2 days. Could you confirm the availability of this material? Kind Regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Details
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Shueh, I received your cargo notice of arrival from PSA Singapore. We are interested in the detailed specifics of your 800MT PVC cargo shipment. Kind Regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about PP Cargo and LDPE Requirements
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Lai, Could you please confirm the specifics of the cargo that you have sent from PSA Singapore and inquire if you have any PP Cargo from Yangpu port? We also require 120MT of LDPE to be delivered within the next 2 days. Kind Regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Naphtha Transportation from Singapore to Fujairah
email_chain.body:
Hi Kape,

We’re organizing a transportation of 3,500MT of Naphtha from Singapore to Fujairah. Could you please provide details on your usual demurrage structure?

Cheers,
George

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Naphtha Transportation from Singapore to Fujairah
email_chain.body:
Hi George,

Thank you for reaching out. In terms of demurrage, we usually offer 3 days free demurrage as per our current norms. Further details can be discussed once we proceed.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Further Details on Naphtha Transportation Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi George,

We are honored to serve your company. To cover transport costs effectively, a minimum of 10 tonnes is required. Our rate is $3.50 per tonne per day. The first payment of $35.00 will be due upon cargo receipt. Please confirm if the freight payment terms received last week are agreeable to you.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Contracting Your Services for Naphtha Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Kape,

We would like to contract your services for the transportation of the cargo. Could you please send over your final quote including terms and conditions?

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Final Quote and Terms for Naphtha Cargo Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Below is our final quote with the terms and conditions. Please review and confirm the contract with us. Let us know if you have any questions. We look forward to working together with you.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote - Corn from Savannah to Philadelphia
email_chain.body: Dear Sir or Madam, I would like to ship 6,000 MT of corn from the Port of Savannah to Philadelphia, with the vessel loading from January 15 to 20. I request your offer based on Ex Ship FOB vessel terms. Thank you, Ms. Meggie

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote - Corn from Savannah to Philadelphia
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Meggie, Thanks for submitting your request for import and export shipments. I will review your request and contact you shortly. Thanks, Edith

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Corn Shipment in December 2015
email_chain.body: Dear Edith, I am the Chairman of the North Georgia Grocery and we have over 300,000 pounds of corn available. We would like to ship 400,000 pounds from Savannah, GA to Philadelphia. We need the corn to arrive in December 2015. Please provide the best price quote and terms for a shipment with FOB Savannah. Thank you, Mr. Mike North

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation - Corn & Wheat Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, I'm the owner of XYZ Corporation in Norfolk, VA. I'm interested in purchasing 300,000 pounds of wheat and would also like to order 400,000 pounds of corn. Please send me a quote and include FOB vessel terms for these commodities. Regards, Mr. Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation - Corn & Wheat Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Fred, Thank you for contacting our firm. I have reviewed your email and noted your interest in purchasing 300,000 pounds of wheat and 400,000 pounds of corn for delivery to Philadelphia. I will prepare a detailed price offer and send you my terms and conditions shortly. Please confirm if this matches your request. Thank you, Ms. Edith

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Details and Freight Payment Options
email_chain.body: Hi Anna, I have just secured a deal for 5,000MT of corn oil to be transported from Dhahran to Naples. Could you handle this shipment? Additionally, could you recommend a suitable freight payment system for my client's preferences? Kind Regards, Terry

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Details and Freight Payment Options
email_chain.body: Hello Terry, I can certainly assist with this shipment and provide you with an offer. I will also include information about the available freight payment systems. Thank you for choosing us and bringing in a new client. Best regards, Anna

email_chain.subject: Logistics and Costs Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Charlotte, I have received Mr. Russell's request and reviewed it with our logistics department, which confirmed our capability to manage the order. Could you please specify the logistics costs? Are these going to be additional to our regular land transport rate? Looking forward to your clarification. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Logistics and Costs Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hello Sarah, Following up on Mr. Russell's email, he has confirmed the need for 20 new pallets to accommodate 20,000 units, with a desired delivery timeline of 3 weeks. We should be able to meet this demand using our current resources, though it will be tightly scheduled. Regarding the shipping costs, there is a $2,000 deposit already in place. We need to run some numbers to provide a detailed cost breakdown and will update you shortly. Let me know if there are any further details you need. Regards, Tami

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Delivery Confirmation Needed
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Tami's update is with our Logistics Manager who will respond soon. Meanwhile, Mr. Russell is awaiting our confirmation for delivery by next Tuesday. The first pallet is targeted to be ready by this Friday. Can you confirm these dates at your end? Thanks, Charlotte

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Delivery Confirmation Needed
email_chain.body: Charlotte, Tami has informed me that she will call shortly to confirm the delivery details. Thank you for the reminder. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Request for CIF Quotation of Flour - Rotterdam Port
email_chain.body:
Hi Mrs. Ocampo,

Can you provide your best offer for 2,000MT of flour from Japan to Rotterdam this Saturday? Please quote CIF.

Thanks,
Etienne

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for CIF Quotation of Flour - Rotterdam Port
email_chain.body:
Dear Etienne,

As the largest producer of flour in the world, exporting 100,000 tons of flour each year, we are interested in your offer. Our CIF offer for 2,000MT of flour shipped from Japan to Rotterdam is EUR 1,000 per ton.

Please let us know if you require additional details.

Sincerely,
Harriet Ocampo
Ritger Flour Mills B.V.
Rue de Brabant 88
1000 Bruxelles
Belgium

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for CIF Quotation of Flour - Rotterdam Port
email_chain.body:
Dear Harriet,

Thank you for your offer. However, after considering our budget, our revised offer is EUR 1,500 per ton CIF. Please let us know if you are open to this rate.

Best regards,
Etienne

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Rates from Sydney to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,
We have 6,200MT of wine to ship from Sydney to Shanghai. We'd like your rate for a mid-December cargo. Could you provide your best price? Thanks, Rod

email_chain.subject: Customer Feedback
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,
Here's what our customers have told us they like about working with you: "When there are no shipments out for 5-10 days, the office is always run by Peter. Peter is a trusted and professional businessman. You are a real friend of ours." Thanks a lot, Sincerely, Rod

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Payment
email_chain.body:
Hello Peter,
Please use the attached invoice for your payment.
Thanks and regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Service Feedback
email_chain.body:

Great service. Everything is fine.
Thanks again.

John

email_chain.subject: Goods Received in Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,
Arrived here in Melbourne.
Thanks,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Glycerine from Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:

Regards,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Glycerine from Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:

DTC Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quote for Glycerine Cargo to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sebastian,
We propose a direct-to-customer rate that is competitive compared to our regular agents. We still need your forwarder's details for finalization. Also, please confirm the expected sailing date as we would like to secure the booking in advance to avoid any logistical issues.
Regards,
DTC Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Dear Bob, I am looking for current rates for shipping bulk cargo from Valencia to Miami. Could you help? Regards, Alice.

email_chain.subject: RE: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Alice, I’ll look into it and get back to you shortly. Best, Bob.

email_chain.subject: RE: Cargo Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body: Alice, I’ve confirmed that the rate for a shipment from Valencia to Miami is $2000 per container. Let me know how you'd like to proceed. Regards, Bob.

email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Scrap from Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Martinez, We have received your requirement for the shipment of approximately 20,000MT of steel scrap from Chile to Antwerp. We propose a freight rate of €70 per ton. Could you please provide more details on the shipment terms and voyage? Best regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Details and Freight Offer
email_chain.body: I would like to confirm our offer of €70 per ton for the transport of fresh steel scrap from Chile to Antwerp. The cargo terms are Free Carrier (FCA) for loading and port-to-port for transportation. We propose a shipment date of April 30th, 2019. Can we begin negotiations on this basis? Best regards, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Shipment Details and Freight Offer
email_chain.body: Thank you for the details. We are interested in proceeding with the negotiation based on your offer. Please let us know any further information or arrangements needed for this shipment. Could you confirm the date of shipment? We look forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Ms. Martinez

email_chain.subject: Review of Freight Offer for Steel Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body: Thank you very much for confirming the shipment details for the fresh steel scrap from Chile to Antwerp under FCA terms on April 30th, 2019. Our team is currently reviewing your offer of €70 per ton and we will be in contact within the next 48 hours to finalize the agreement. Thank you for your cooperation. Best regards, Valeriya

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Special Requirements for Steel Scrap Shipment
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email concerning the freight offer. Could you please confirm if there are any special requirements for the shipment, or specific terms and conditions we need to be aware of regarding the transport of the steel scrap? We want to ensure all stipulations are clear before finalizing our agreement. Best regards, Smith

email_chain.subject: Meeting Request in San Francisco
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, Please let me know when you will be in San Francisco. I would like to meet with you to discuss our current issues with Accounts Payables reconciliations. Best regards, Marko

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Discrepancy in 1099s and Payables Vouchers
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, We have recently received the 1099s for all our monthly vendors, and there seems to be a mismatch with the information on the payables vouchers. This needs immediate attention as we are required to notify each of our vendors about this discrepancy. Please advise. Best Regards, Annette

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Discrepancy in 1099s and Payables Vouchers
email_chain.body: Hi Marko and Annette, I’ve noted the discrepancies mentioned. Since this seems specific to accounts handling, I am looping in Andrew, our Accounting expert, for his input on this matter. Regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Discrepancy in 1099s and Payables Vouchers
email_chain.body: Hi Julie, I've received your email about the 1099s from Annette and I am currently reviewing the details to determine the cause of the mismatch. Is it possible that there's an account error? I'll get back to you by tomorrow with my findings. Best Regards, Andrew

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on 1099s error
email_chain.body: Hi Andrew, Upon reviewing the 1099s and accounts payables vouchers, it appears that the payables vouchers are indeed correct and the error lies in the 1099 entries. How could this have happened? I haven't found anything that directly indicates a discrepancy or error in our vouchers. Can you look further into this? Regards, Julie

email_chain.subject: Transport Request for Citrus

Thanks,
Phillip

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Request for Citrus

Mr. Park

I've got the flat sheets, so I'll take those on. Could you put in my tender 3,000MT of metal cutlery?

Thanks,
Mr. Powell

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Metal Cutlery and Flat Sheets Transport

Mr. Powell,

Absolutely. We can provide you with transport for the 6,000MT of flat sheets. On the tender, you can also send your order for 4,000MT of metal cutlery. How about the other cargo?

Thanks,
Phillip

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Palm Oil Shipment from Port Klang to Surabaya
email_chain.body: Dear Don, We are looking to source a 7,400MT cargo of crude palm oil from Port Klang to Surabaya. Could you please inform us if you have a vessel available in the next two weeks? Also, could you provide details on your demurrage policy? Many thanks, Clara

email_chain.subject: Request for Barge Transport from Penang to Mumbai
email_chain.body: Dear Don, I need to transport a 22,000MT cargo of cassava from Penang to Mumbai. We can hold the cargo for five days while we finalize pricing negotiations. Can you provide a barge for this shipment? Many thanks, Melissa

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry for Cassava Shipment from Mumbai to Singapore
email_chain.body: Dear Don, We are planning to charter a 22,000MT cargo of cassava from Mumbai to Singapore. Would your vessel be available for this trade in three weeks? Many thanks, Katie

email_chain.subject: Crude Palm Oil Shipment Inquiry from Chennai to Singapore
email_chain.body: Dear Don, We are arranging the shipment for 16,000MT of crude palm oil from Chennai to Singapore. Could you provide availability and pricing details for your vessel? Many thanks, Clara
