email_chain.subject: Urgent: Status Update Needed on Steel Plates Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Gualtieri,

I am reaching out to request an update on our recent order of 12,900MT of steel plates scheduled from Rotterdam to El País. We have encountered issues with customs clearance and would appreciate insights on the steps being taken to address this matter at your end.

Kindly respond as soon as possible.

Regards,
Greg

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Status Update Needed on Steel Plates Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Greg,

Thank you for your query regarding the customs clearance issues. Unfortunately, the clearance of our shipment has been delayed due to enhanced security measures and health inspections prompted by COVID-19.

We are committed to ensuring compliance with all governmental regulations, and this has necessitated a postponement in the delivery schedule of your goods. We have been actively communicating about this issue, but please let us confirm that we are making all possible efforts to expedite the process.

Should you have any more questions concerning this order or any other matter, feel free to contact us.

Best Regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: Updated ETA for MS Mangrovia
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anders,
I have an updated ETA for the MS Mangrovia. I am expecting her on March 4th. I will update you with the port of discharge information once I know.
Yours truly,
Ricardo

email_chain.subject: Departure and Arrival Information of MS Mangrovia
email_chain.body:
Hello Anders,
Yes, I believe her departure from Nantong will occur on the 4th of March. She is now 3 days ahead of schedule and is operating in the Taiwan Strait.
Here is her updated arrival information at Shanghai:
    - Arrival Date & Time: 03/04/18 10:00 AM
    - Departure Date & Time: 03/04/18 11:00 AM
    - Location: Port of Call
    - Updated: 03/04/2018.
Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Berthing Information for MS Mangrovia
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anders,
She will be arriving in the late morning/early afternoon, but not in the Anchorage Channel. Instead, we have scheduled her to berth at Shed No. 5 at the Port of Sydney (also known as St. Heliers Wharf).
Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Transfer Request for Hull from 05 Shetland to Shed No. 5
email_chain.body:
G'day Anders,
If you could get your yard to transfer the hull, from 05 Shetland to Shed No. 5, we can then get her to push in for final handover. If that's not possible please advise.
Regards,
Tony

labels.discharge_port: Shed No. 5, St. Heliers Wharf, Sydney

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Shipping Services and Costs
email_chain.body: Dear Bernard, do dry ports exist in Vietnam? I need to send approximately 4,000 kgs of auto parts from Ho Chi Minh City to Dalat. Could you please inform me about the charges for this service? Thank you, Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Shipping Services and Costs
email_chain.body: Dear Jack, thank you for your email. Yes, Vietnam has dry ports, including an option at Hai Phong port under the import office named Sava. The standard service charge for using Sava is $100 USD per 40' container. Please note, we do not provide specialized handling services at Sava. For more queries, feel free to contact me. Best regards, Bernard

email_chain.subject: Clarification on Tariffs and Additional Services
email_chain.body: Hello Bernard, thank you for the clarification. I came across different tariffs on your website; it states $600 per container. Can you confirm if this is the total cost, or are there additional charges we should be aware of? Thanks, Jack

email_chain.subject: Questions about Payment Terms for Shipping
email_chain.body: Hi Bernard, can you please confirm if the payment term is 30% before shipping and the balance upon arrival in Cambodia? Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation in PDF Format
email_chain.body: Hello Bernard, could you send me the quotation in PDF format? Thank you, Jack

email_chain.subject: Follow-up on Quotation and Additional Questions
email_chain.body: Hi Bernard, thank you for the PDF file. I need to know the port of loading in China and the estimated transit time. Thanks, Jack

email_chain.subject: Further Clarification Needed
email_chain.body: Hello Bernard, regarding our cargo from Korea (Dong Ha Port) going to Cambodia, I found information suggesting we need to use Sava Customs clearance. Can you confirm if this is necessary, or if there are alternatives? Thanks, Jack

email_chain.subject: Cost Estimate Inquiry
email_chain.body: Hi Bernard, can you please provide an estimate of costs for your services based on the prior shipment details provided? Also, does this include import duties? Thank you, Jack

email_chain.subject: Additional Information Requested
email_chain.body: Dear Bernard, thanks for all your information. Could you also let me know the scheduled time for loading our container? Regards, Jack

email_chain.subject: Freight Estimate Request for Sugar Transport from São Vicente to Cádiz

Kind regards,
Sue

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quote Needed for Container Transport from the Americas to the Mediterranean
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Robb,

We are looking for a carrier to move our 10 containers from the Americas to the Mediterranean in May. Could you please provide a quote for this shipment? Thank you.

Kind regards,
Nancy

email_chain.subject: A possible cargo for mid-June
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir, 

We have a potential cargo available for the mid-June window. We need to act urgently, ideally within seven days. 

Port of loading and the respective drafts: Al Khobar, ranging from 15-16 meters; Zeebrugge, approximately 13.2 meters. 
The cargo is 6,600MT of LSHS. 
Discharge is planned at Port of Balikpapan, Indonesia with an ETA of mid-May 2023. 

Please let me know if this aligns with your capacities and interest. 

Thank you, 
Mr. Chen

email_chain.subject: Canceled Suez transit for Balikpapan vessel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zee, 

In response to your inquiry regarding the Suez Canal transit, please be informed that the IMO regulations require the vessel to transit within 24 hours after loading LSHS. Unfortunately, this time frame is too restrictive for our scheduled departure. We will need to consider alternative arrangements. 

Best regards, 
Mr. Chen 
Manager, International Trade Department

email_chain.subject: A cargo to the north of Borneo from Bangladesh
email_chain.body:
Mr. Chen, 

We are arranging for a shipment to the northern part of Borneo from Bangladesh. It appears that there may be a possible coordination required with your team. 

Regards, 
Mr. Zee

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for Freight Rate Adjustment and Space Reservation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. X, Thank you for your recent freight quote. Unfortunately, the rate provided exceeds our budget. We are planning a shipment of 5,000MT of soybeans from Houston to Santos, required within the next 10 days. Could you please confirm if you are able to hold the necessary space for us and reconsider the rate to match our budget? Looking forward to your prompt response. Sincerely, Mr. Y

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Request for Freight Rate Adjustment and Space Reservation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Y, Thank you for reaching out. I am currently reviewing the possibility of adjusting the freight rate and reserving the required space for your soybeans shipment. I will get back to you with a detailed proposal by tomorrow. Best regards, Mr. X

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Freight Rate Adjustment and Space Reservation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Y, Following our recent discussion, I am pleased to offer a revised freight rate that fits within your budget. Additionally, we can hold the necessary space for your 5,000MT shipment of soybeans from Houston to Santos. Please confirm at your earliest convenience so we can finalize the arrangements. Kind regards, Mr. X

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Freight Rate Adjustment and Space Reservation
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. X, Thank you for the adjusted freight rate and for reserving the space. We accept the proposal and look forward to proceeding with the shipment arrangements. Please send us the necessary documentation to formalize this agreement. Best, Mr. Y

email_chain.subject: Request for Berth Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

We’ll be needing a berth for a 25,000MT cargo of energy coal. Could you accommodate us in your schedule? Please let us know your available dates.

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Alumina Cargo Loading Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

We are scheduled to load a 50,000MT cargo of alumina within the next 2 days. The vessel is set to depart on 7th July, 2009. Could you please confirm berth availability on 6th July? Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated.

Sincerely,
Sarosh

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Alumina Cargo Loading Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

This is a reminder of my earlier request regarding the loading of a 50,000MT cargo of alumina. We are planning the departure for the 7th of July, 2009, and we need confirmation for the loading schedule on the 6th of July. Please let us know at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,
Sarosh

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Coffee Beans from Shanghai to Paris
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mrs. Min,

I am considering shipping approximately 400 kg of coffee beans from Shanghai to Paris next month. Could you please provide me with a quote for this shipment? Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Nicole

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Coffee Beans from Shanghai to Paris
email_chain.body:
Dear Nicole,

Thank you for your inquiry. The cost of shipping 400 kg of coffee beans from Shanghai to Paris is typically around $400. However, I can offer you a 40% discount, bringing the total to $240. This will be reflected in your final bill.

Best regards,
Mrs. Min

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Ms. Taylor, I’m working on an export of bulk wheat from Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada. Could you provide me with a freight quote, and is that for regular service or LC? Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, Thanks for your email. The quote for 500 tonnes of bulk wheat is $4,500.00 plus V.A.T. Regards, Taylor

email_chain.subject: Query on Refrigerated Service
email_chain.body: Hi Taylor, Thank you for the quote. Does the price differ for refrigerated service? I would need to ship within the next couple of days, but refrigerated service could wait for up to 20 days. Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Query on Refrigerated Service
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, For refrigerated service, we can deliver with reefer speed in 12 days; the Full Container Load (FCL) with this consideration will reach within 20 days. Regards, Taylor

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on Bulk Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Thank you. Could I have the FOB price for 4000 tons of wheat? Can we arrange for a prepaid payment, or do you require an initial payment? What are the rates for this volume? I would also like to know the inland charge of $1.50 from port to consumer. Are there any restrictions on grade, or certificates required? Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Further Inquiry on Bulk Wheat Export
email_chain.body: Hi Lea, Could you send me the specific wheat grade you will need for the purchase? I can also attach a sample certificate for the consumer. Regards, Taylor

email_chain.subject: Specification of Wheat Grade
email_chain.body: We will be needing the following grades: 1027--410, 2554--320, 3044--330. Are any additional certificates needed? Regards, Lea

email_chain.subject: Request to Check Files for Printing
email_chain.body: Hi Aaron, It's Chris from the back office team. We've received a request from a senior manager asking if you could check with your manager during your lunch break to ensure all files are ready for printing. Could you please confirm once you've checked? Thanks, Chris.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Missing Files in Your Folder
email_chain.body: Hi Aaron, We've noticed that some necessary files are missing from your folder, which were scheduled for printing today. The manager has emphasized the urgency of this task. Please address this as soon as possible. Thanks, Chris.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Missing Files in Your Folder
email_chain.body: Hi Chris, I wasn't informed of any files needing to be printed today by my manager. I'll double-check everything once I'm back in my office and update you accordingly. Thanks, Aaron.

email_chain.subject: Printing Files Status Update Request
email_chain.body: Hi Aaron, The manager asked if you have finalized printing the files. If you can't print them today, please label them as 'Ready for Printing' for tomorrow. We appreciate your cooperation. Thanks, Chris.

email_chain.subject: Clarification Needed: Your Office Number
email_chain.body: Hi Aaron, As I'm relatively new here, I realized I don't know your office number. Could you please provide it when you have a moment? Thanks, Chris.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Rates and Flexibility on Loading
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

We are interested in shipping 10,000MT of chemicals from Hamburg to Gdansk. Could you please send us your rate proposals? Additionally, we would like to know if your vessel has flexibility on partial loading windows.

Sincerely,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Rates and Flexibility on Loading
email_chain.body:
Hi Louis,

Great to hear from you. Unfortunately, we are unable to load your chemicals from Hamburg to Gdansk. Could you please inform us about the available loading windows for your cargo, and if there are any special requirements? The rates we discussed earlier were for reference only.

Thank you,
Sven

email_chain.subject: Unsatisfactory Response on Shipping Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Sven,

Your response is unsatisfactory as it does not address our initial inquiry about rate ideas or the flexibility on partial loading windows. We have decided to seek services from another freight forwarder for our chemical shipment.

Best wishes,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Contractual Concerns Regarding Non-responsiveness
email_chain.body:
Hi Sven,

Upon reviewing our contractual agreements, I am compelled to express our disappointment in your recent communications, which do not align with the service standards we expect. Please revisit our concerns and provide a clearer resolution.

Regards,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Request for Crude Oil Shipment from West Africa to Guayaquil
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Roper,

Could you arrange for the shipment of 4,300MT of crude oil from West Africa to Guayaquil later this month? Please advise if this is feasible.

Regards,
Miloslav

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Crude Oil Shipment from West Africa to Guayaquil
email_chain.body:
Hi Miloslav,

I have scheduled space for this cargo in August. The earliest available date is August 20. Can you confirm this date works for you?

Regards,
Mr. Roper

email_chain.subject: Request for Revised Shipment of Crude Oil
email_chain.body:
Mr. Roper,

Could you arrange for a new shipment of 1,000MT of crude oil from West Africa to Guayaquil later this month? Please confirm your availability.

Best regards,
M. McMillan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Revised Shipment of Crude Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello M. McMillan,

I have received your request for a new shipment. I will check the availability and revert back as soon as possible.

Regards,
Mr. Roper

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Revised Shipment of Crude Oil
email_chain.body:
Mr. Roper,

Due to changes in our requirements, can we discuss the potential adjustment of terms for the shipment? Please let me know a suitable time for a call.

Best,
Miloslav

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Revised Shipment of Crude Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Miloslav,

Thank you for your update. Let's schedule a call to discuss the adjustments. How does tomorrow at 10 AM sound?

Best regards,
Mr. Roper

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Mica Ore Shipment from Murmansk to Japan/China
email_chain.body: Good day, I am inquiring about shipping 1,000MT of mica ore from Murmansk to Japan or China, with a preferred shipping date around June 25 and expected to arrive by the end of July. Please provide the best lump sum rate including demurrage and a reefer rate at your earliest convenience. Thank you, Osvaldo

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Mica Ore Shipment from Murmansk to Japan/China
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry dated April 20, 2011. Currently, we are facing some logistical challenges due to the severe weather conditions and damage inflicted by Hurricane Irene. This has impacted our technical operations, and we are not prepared to perform sample tests just yet. We will keep you updated on the situation and potential shipping dates. Sincerely, Shipping Co.

email_chain.subject: Required Documentation and confirmation for shipment
email_chain.body: Thank you for your update. Can you please confirm the required documents such as a signed contract, bills of lading, and air waybill? I am ready to proceed with the shipment once these documents are arranged. Please confirm at your earliest convenience. Regards, Osvaldo

email_chain.subject: Re: Required Documentation and confirmation for shipment
email_chain.body: It's a pleasure to have you on board with our shipping company. We genuinely appreciate your patience during these challenging times. Please be assured, there is no need to worry about the shipment delay. As our valued customer, we are committed to providing you the best service. We will notify you as soon as we are ready to move forward and will confirm the required documents at that time. Best regards, Shipping Co.

Thank you for your assurance. Please keep me informed about the freight price as soon as it becomes available. I'd like to know if it would be competitive compared to other quotes. I look forward to your prompt reply. Best, Osvaldo

email_chain.subject: Request for Samples
email_chain.body: Dear David, I'm looking for samples of over-the-counter pain relievers and BRC certified peanut butter. I need these samples by February 20th. Can you arrange this for me? Thanks, Angelina

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Samples
email_chain.body: Dear Angelina, I've checked with our supplier, and they can provide the samples you requested. Could you please confirm the delivery address for these samples? Thanks, David

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Samples
email_chain.body: Dear David, Please send them to my office at 650 Fulton St, Orlando, FL 32801. Thanks, Angelina

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Samples
email_chain.body: Dear Angelina, Your samples have been dispatched to your office. I hope they meet your expectations. Thanks, David

labels.commodity: over-the-counter pain relievers, BRC certified peanut butter

email_chain.subject: Sulphuric Acid Shipping Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Karina,
Thank you for your enquiry about sulphuric acid shipping. Based on our past experiences, shipping from Antwerp to Houston typically takes 10-12 days. Most vessels on this route will be fully loaded for India with sulphuric acid as a ballast cargo, resulting in lower revenue for the vessel and consequently higher freight costs. I recommend considering a break-bulk vessel to optimize freight costs, especially given the current uncertainty in international economic conditions. Please let me know your specific requirements and if you'd like us to provide a detailed quotation.
Kind regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Request for Detailed Quotation
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,
Thank you for your prompt response and the initial information. We have evaluated your advice and would like to proceed with a detailed quotation for shipping one unit of sulphuric acid (21.3 cubic meters, 1.32 MW+ acid) under Free Carrier (FCA) terms to Houston port.
Kind regards,
Karina

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Detailed Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hi Karina and Adrian,
Thanks for your follow-up. I have received your updated enquiry and have already forwarded it to our contact in India, who will assist in providing the detailed quotation as requested.
Thank you,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Request for Palm Oil Purchase Quote
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Awad, I am writing to request a quote for purchasing 4,000MT of palm oil, for transport from Honiara to Yantian. We aim to finalize this purchase promptly and would appreciate it if you could also inform us of any contractual issues that may affect the shipment. Looking forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Jaime

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Palm Oil Purchase Quote
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Alumai, Thank you for your inquiry. I am currently preparing the detailed quote and will send it to you shortly so that we can proceed further. Best regards, Zahara

email_chain.subject: Detailed Quote for Palm Oil Purchase
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Alumai, As per your request, I am attaching the quote for 4,000MT of palm oil. Please review and let me know if there are any adjustments or further details needed. Regards, Zahara

email_chain.subject: Re: Detailed Quote for Palm Oil Purchase
email_chain.body: Hello Zahara, I have reviewed your quote and it looks satisfactory. Could you please send over the sales contract for a one-year period? We need this to proceed with raising a purchase order and arranging the initial bank draft payment of 20% for the palm oil purchase. Many thanks, Jaime

email_chain.subject: Sourcing High-Quality Polybags
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Ms. Kim,

I hope this message finds you well. Could you please advise on the best places to source high-quality polybags?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Product Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Miller,

Thank you for your inquiry. After researching, I can confirm this is the case. I would be happy to discuss more about the products we talked about earlier today.

Kind regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Update on Order Status
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Following up on our last correspondence about your order, I wanted to update you that our offices have been quite busy. We should have your order ready to ship by next week.

Kind regards,
Amy

email_chain.subject: Re: Project Collaboration
email_chain.body:
Hi there Ms. Haywood,

Thank you for your prompt reply to my email. I am very interested in working with you to help with your project. I'll get back to you soon with my next step.

Kind regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hi Amanda,

I noticed you replied to Bill seeking assistance. I'll give your office a call to see how I can assist further.

Kind regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Request for Cottonseed Oil Shipment Handling
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Ambrose,

Could you handle 8,500MT of cottonseed oil from Rotterdam to Casablanca in the last week of August? The containers are awaiting freighter loading. Could you please confirm your demurrage and laytime charges?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Cottonseed Oil Shipment Handling
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for contacting me. I'd love to handle your 8,500MT cottonseed oil shipment. Our vessels are prepared, and we should be ready to sail by late August. Please feel free to send your shipment documents now, and we can finalize the payment details once your shipment is on way.

Sincerely,
Cynthia

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Shipment Schedule
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great to hear that you'll be booking with us for your cottonseed oil shipment. We are scheduled to sail on August 30th. Can you please send us your shipment documents, and we'll arrange for loading? We can discuss the payment at that time.

Thanks,
Cynthia

email_chain.subject: Shipment Ready for Loading
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

The cottonseed oil shipment you have booked with us is now ready for loading. Everything will be arranged in the coming days. Thank you again for booking with us.

Sincerely,
Cynthia

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About LNG Availability and Berth Restrictions
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Brown,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to inquire about the availability of LNG for the MS High Hope. Additionally, could you please confirm your demurrage terms and inform me whether there are any anticipated berth restrictions over the upcoming weekend?

Sincerely,
David

email_chain.subject: Request for Information on MS Higgle High
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I am considering the acquisition of the MS Higgle High and am in need of further details about the vessel. Could you please provide its construction and last renovation dates, its fuel type, details about any refrigerated cargo capabilities, and any other relevant information?

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Offering Fully Operational Vessel for Sale
email_chain.body:
Dear Prospective Buyer,

We are delighted to present an opportunity involving the ship High Hope. Attached are the documents showcasing the vessel’s superior condition and operational readiness. The ship, purchased previously from a 36,000t, 12M2 equipped shipyard and submerged at the start of the year, has recently passed inspections and maintenance checks. It is prepared for immediate operation by its new owners.

For further details or inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: General Inquiry About Ship Purchase
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I came across your website and noticed that you deal in ships. I am currently exploring the market to purchase one. Could you please let me know if you have any ships available for sale at the moment?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards

labels.vessel: MS High Hope, MS Higgle High

email_chain.subject: Request for Crude Oil Transport Quotation
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Robby.

We would like to get a quotation for the transport of 10,000MT of crude oil from Port Louis to Toliara. This is a regular cargo from our company and we are looking for a reliable and punctual partner for this route. Can you provide us with an early estimate?

Warm regards,
Dan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Crude Oil Transport Quotation
email_chain.body:
Hi Dan,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the transport of crude oil from Port Louis to Toliara. I have confirmed with our operational team that we have availability on an incoming vessel, scheduled to arrive in Port Louis on February 1st. I will discuss the details further with my manager and provide you with a formal quotation by the end of today.

Regards,
Robby

email_chain.subject: Final Quotation - Crude Oil Transport from Port Louis to Toliara
email_chain.body:
Hi Dan,

Following up on our earlier communication, please find below the quotation for the transport of 10,000MT of crude oil from Port Louis to Toliara:

- Route: Port Louis to Toliara
- Arrival Port: Port Louis
- Departure Port: Toliara
- Estimated Time of Arrival: February 3, 2009
- Crew: 3 sailors
- Fare: $4000 per sailor
- Voyage Duration: 7 days
- Oversight and Surveys in La Reunion

The total transport cost amounts to 0.5% per day x 10,000MT which adds up to $500.

The total cost for your shipment will be $6500. We will send you the bill in PDF format via email shortly.

Kind regards,
Robby

email_chain.subject: Shipment Confirmation for Container HP 2345
email_chain.body:
Hi Teddy,

I am pleased to inform you that your shipment has been loaded in Mumbai. Details are as follows:
- Container number: HP 2345
- Loading port: Tangshan
- Vessel name: Ocean Pride
- ETA: 1st Nov. 2024
- Master: Zachary Smith
- Due date: 2nd Nov. 2024
- Bill of lading number: TBD
- Bill of lading date: TBD
- Receiver at bill of lading: Your company

Please address any inquiries to: berth4@fmarine.sg

Regards,
Elise

email_chain.subject: Response to Inquiry About Container Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Reynolds,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding container availability. We regret to inform you that the specific container is no longer available. However, we have multiple alternatives that might suit your needs:
1. Electric cargo van
2. Small Refrigerated Van
3. Dump Truck
4. Passenger Van
5. Box Truck
6. Tilt Truck
7. Dumper Truck
8. Commercial Truck
9. Nissan Van
10. Matic Cargo van
11. JCB Mini Excavator
12. JCB Skid Steer
13. Loaders
14. Used Dump Truck
15. Tractor Trailer.

email_chain.subject: Shipment Update: Dispatch to Port of Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi,

We've successfully dispatched your shipment to the Port of Singapore. Details such as Container Number, HS Code, and other specifics will be shared shortly.

Regards,
Operations Team

email_chain.subject: Shipment Received at Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Dear Teddy,

We have received your shipment at Port Klang, Malaysia. As soon as all the necessary documents are ready and details confirmed, we will send them to you.

Thank you for choosing our service. We look forward to continuing our business relationship.

Best regards,
Port Klang Operations

email_chain.subject: Availability Inquiry for Cargo Transfer from Trieste to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Hello Vassilis,

Will your vessel be available for transporting cargo from Trieste to Rio de Janeiro in the second week of June? Also, could you let us know about any flexibility regarding the dates?

Best regards,
Luca

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Inquiry for Cargo Transfer from Trieste to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Dear Luca,

How much flexibility do you have with the cargo schedule from Trieste to Rio de Janeiro? Would the last week of May possibly work for you? Also, are you open to last-minute bookings, as this is very important for our planning.

Best regards,
Vassilis

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability Inquiry for Cargo Transfer from Trieste to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Hi Vassilis,

I am looking to ship a 40' container from Trieste, aiming for loading on the 15th of June. Do you have availability in Rio de Janeiro around August/September for offloading?

Thank you,
Luca

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Container Size and Availability
email_chain.body:
Hi Luca,

I have two 20' containers available from Trieste for June. Could you please confirm if this meets your requirements or if you need the 40' container as originally mentioned?

Thank you,
Vassilis

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation of Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Vassilis,

Could you please confirm the availability of the vessel LVSEMIROS for transportation from Trieste to Rio de Janeiro? We are keen on finalizing the booking details as soon as possible.

Best,
Luca

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About LPG Shipment from Rotterdam to Montreal
email_chain.body: We’re looking to ship 1,500MT of LPG from Rotterdam to Montreal. Could you please confirm the current 'Daywork' rate and inquire about any weekend berth restrictions? We need this information for our final calculations. Sincerely, Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About LPG Shipment from Rotterdam to Montreal
email_chain.body: Hi Melissa, We have the Baltic Sky available for the dates you mentioned. However, the weekend rate for a shipment of that size is $120/MT, which exceeds your Daywork cap of $100/MT. Could you please provide more specific timing for the cargo so we can offer a more precise quote? Regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Rates and Schedule for Riga to Rotterdam Shipment in August
email_chain.body: Hi Jonas, Could you inform me about your weekend rates for August to cover our 4,000MT from Riga to Rotterdam? We’ve planned for an MV leaving ROU on the 16th, needing a 3-day turnaround. Is it possible to arrange delivery for the early morning of the 19th? Best regards, Leandro

email_chain.subject: Re: Rates and Schedule for Riga to Rotterdam Shipment in August
email_chain.body: Hi Leandro, We're currently 100% booked for August. Unfortunately, we can't offer anything for the early morning of the 19th. If you would prefer delivering the cargo on a Saturday or Sunday instead, we might have availability. Please let me know if you're interested. Regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Rates and Schedule for Riga to Rotterdam Shipment in August
email_chain.body: Hey Jonas, Sure, we're flexible for the morning of the 21st. Let's pencil that in. Regards, Leandro

email_chain.subject: Re: Rates and Schedule for Riga to Rotterdam Shipment in August
email_chain.body: Hi Leandro, Unfortunately, I'm afraid we don't have any available dates for the 21st at the moment. The only available date is the 29th when Baltic Sky will be in Rotterdam. Could that date work for you? Regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Rates and Schedule for Riga to Rotterdam Shipment in August
email_chain.body: Hey Jonas, We're in for the 29th. Regards, Leandro

email_chain.subject: Re: Rates and Schedule for Riga to Rotterdam Shipment in August
email_chain.body: Hi Leandro, I have forwarded your request to our scheduler. They'll get in touch with you as soon as a possible booking confirmation is available. If you have any questions in the meantime, please don't hesitate to contact me. Regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Wheat Delivery Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Brown,

Thank you for your enquiry. We will likely be able to arrange the shipment of the wheat to Barcelona next week. However, I must inform you that our standard laycan is 28 days. Should you wish to discuss further details, please do not hesitate to give me a call.

Best regards,
Yancey

email_chain.subject: Update on Wheat Delivery
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Brown,

Following up on your request for expedited delivery, I have spoken with Mr. James regarding this matter. Our operational team has been particularly busy, but we are able to adjust and expedite your order to a 21-day delivery timeline from tomorrow. I will call you next Monday to finalize the details.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Best regards,
Jill

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipment Inquiry for 12,500MT of Paper Rolls
email_chain.body: Ms. Smith, Ship 3764 is scheduled to leave Hamburg on May 9 and arrive in New Orleans on May 15. Could we arrange to transport 12,500MT of paper rolls on this vessel? We need to expedite the shipping process. Please confirm at your earliest convenience. Regards, Kurt

email_chain.subject: Request for Email Documents
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Smith, Thank you so much for your assistance. A colleague in Sweden is interested in reviewing our correspondence. Could you please forward this email thread to me at [email protected] ? I will pass the information onto the relevant department. Regards, Paul

email_chain.subject: Exploring Alternative Suppliers
email_chain.body: Ms. Smith, Thank you for your prompt response. While we're finalizing the current deal, I'm also considering another supplier as a potential backup. They have favorable shipping options from Hamburg that might align well with our needs. Regards, Paul

email_chain.subject: Update on Shipment for Educational Initiative
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Smith, I've been coordinating with Paul, who's currently involved with a marketing project at the University of Hamburg. It's crucial for us to secure the paper rolls for our sails. Could you send the shipping details to him at [email protected] ? Your assistance is invaluable to our initiative. Regards, Kurt

email_chain.subject: Cancellation of Paper Rolls Shipment
email_chain.body: Paul, I appreciate all your efforts. However, it turns out that the 12,500MT of paper rolls are no longer required for our project. Thank you for your diligent work on this matter. Best, Ms. Smith

email_chain.subject: Resolution Reached on Paper Rolls
email_chain.body: Paul, Good news! We've successfully resolved the shipment for the 12,500MT of paper rolls. I'll send you the finalized details shortly. Could you forward this information to your colleague at [email protected] ? Thanks a lot. Kurt

email_chain.subject: Great Deal Achieved for Paper Rolls
email_chain.body: We have secured a fantastic price of 2,500 euros for the 12,500MT of paper rolls with our supplier in Hamburg. This is a substantial saving for our project! Regards, Paul

email_chain.subject: Collaborative Project Update
email_chain.body: Dear Ms. Smith, I've updated my colleague about the recent developments in our joint project. She has confirmed her understanding and will contribute further to our goals. Best regards, Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: 1639XTE - Vessel Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Larsen,

We have a vessel available from Gijon to Antwerp on the 10th of January, or alternatively on the 11th of January. Please let us know your requirements and preferred date.

Best regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: 1639XTE - Booking Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Larsen,

Thank you for your prompt response. Please find attached the detailed document regarding this shipment. The document includes a recent change in the delivery schedule.

Best regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Re: 1639XTE - Updated Schedule and Cargo Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Larsen,

Please be advised of a slight change in the schedule for your booking. The estimated delivery time to Antwerp is now revised to 18th January, dependent on prevailing weather conditions. We are closely monitoring the situation and will update you accordingly.

Additionally, on 20th January, the cargo will be loaded onto the vessel '32', which is suited for rough weather conditions. It carries a mix of coal and general cargo. The cargo quantity has been revised to 315 metric tons. Please refer to the attached document for detailed voyage information from Antwerp back to Gijon.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Barley Cargo Shipment from Rotterdam to Hamburg
email_chain.body: Hello Debra, I am checking on a cargo of barley. Do you see a problem having it moved by rail from Rotterdam to Hamburg? Looking forward to hearing from you, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley cargoes from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hello Maria. We can arrange that shipment. There will be a surcharge of 1 Euro/Metric Ton to load the vessel and ship through the Suez canal. Regards, Willemijn

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hello Maria, By all means proceed. This is no problem. However, only the shipment instructions and additional services for the freight shall be sent to my email address. All handling with customs procedures, etc. shall remain your responsibility. Best Regards, Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Barley shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Maria, Will the vessel transportation be for 8000 tons or less, and if yes, please inform about the container service. Best regards, Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Barley shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Wolfgang, Unfortunately, the shipment is not going to be less than 10,000 tons. Best regards, Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Barley shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Maria, Then you have all information and I will do the preparations. Best regards, Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Barley shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Wolfgang, I see you have my full name here. In which format should I fill in the letters of recommendation and certificates of origin? And could you please have my form of employment in your country attached as well? Thanks in advance. Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Barley shipment from Belgium to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Maria, Let me know when you have these documents. Also please include the "endorsement" and "CoC" on the reverse side. Best regards, Wolfgang

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Availability and Bunker Surcharge
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Peterson, We plan to ship 4,500MT of FCL reefer containers from Ho Chi Minh City to Haiphong next week. Can you confirm the available laycan slots and inform us if there will be any additional bunker surcharge? Best regards, Irina Kozlovskaia

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Availability and Bunker Surcharge
email_chain.body: Thank you for your inquiry, Irina. Below is the main sailing schedule for next week (Sep 15-23): CMA CGM TC LAKE MINDORO - Capt. Martin Hoppe, CMA CGM TC LAKE MAULUD - Capt. Warren Kaiwan, CMA CGM TC LAKE MUHARRAM - Capt. Mark Von Herbeck, CMA CGM TC LAKE SHAWWAL - Capt. Matthew Williams, CMA CGM TC LAKE ZUHRA - Capt. Ilmo Kortekangas. Please confirm the booking with our dispatch office at your earliest convenience. Best regards, Martin Peterson

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation and Container Details
email_chain.body: Dear Dispatch Team, Confirming the booking for next week's shipping as discussed with Mr. Peterson. Details are as follows: Container Number: 0003/4, Container Weight: 57.60MT, Equipment Type: 40HQ, Container Size: 45'GP, Unit Qty: 1. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements. Best, Irina Kozlovskaia

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hello Irina, Based on your booking, here are the calculations for the freight rate: 1) 40'Hq as GTCS - Rate: 3500 PHP/hour, Number of Hours: 5, Total: 17500 PHP; 2) WOR - Rate: 3500 PHP/hour, Number of Hours: 10, Total: 35000 PHP. Total Freight Charge: 52500 PHP. The bill of lading is issued under CMA CGM TCM. Best regards, CMA CGM Billing Department

labels.vessel: TC LAKE MINDORO, TC LAKE MAULUD, TC LAKE MUHARRAM, TC LAKE SHAWWAL, TC LAKE ZUHRA

email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Crude Purchase
email_chain.body: Jonas, This is Noah again. I am considering the purchase of 10,000mt of crude in the next 10 days. Could you provide me with a quote for delivery to New York and from the same port to Jiangyin in China? Please include sea freight rate quotes for these two locations. Thank you, Noah

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Crude Purchase
email_chain.body: Noah, I appreciate your inquiry. We can offer your desired quantity with a range between 10,000mt and 15,000mt from October to November this year. Our offers are based on CFR and CIF prices. Could you please indicate whether you also need a differential from the FOB price, for instance, a CIF on a FOB price of $60.70? I will consult with our management and revert with detailed information. Thank you for your patience. Regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Interest in Contract and Additional Service Inquiries
email_chain.body: Jonas, I appreciate your detailed response and your competitive prices. Could you provide information on whether DDP terms are available and the associated costs for this service? Many thanks again for your time. Regards, Noah

email_chain.subject: Confirming Purchase Intent for Crude Product
email_chain.body: Jonas, Based on our previous discussion, I would like to proceed with a buy contract for the crude product. Could you please send me a hard copy of your Terms and Conditions for further review at our upcoming meeting? Thank you and regards, Noah

email_chain.subject: Terms and Conditions Document
email_chain.body: Noah, Attached you will find our Terms and Conditions document concerning the purchase of crude oil. Please review it and let me know if there are any points that need clarification. Thanks and regards, Jonas

email_chain.subject: Query on Terms and Conditions
email_chain.body: Jonas, Thank you for the documentation. Upon review, I have a few questions regarding the terms and conditions specified. Could you please provide answers to these questions at your earliest convenience? Best, Noah

email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote to Pecem
email_chain.body:
David,

We have 6,000MT of plastic granules available from Gdansk to Pecem. Could you provide your best rate to the above port as soon as possible? Thank you.

Regards,
Jeff

email_chain.subject: Assistance with Shipping and Customs in Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

It seems like a lot of paperwork is needed for shipments from the USA to Brazil. Can you assist in finding a carrier and handling customs for transport to Brazil?

Regards,
Carolina

email_chain.subject: Re: Assistance with Shipping and Customs in Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear Carolina,

I can confirm that we have 6,000MT of plastic granules ready for shipment from Gdansk to Pecem. We have secured a carrier and arranged for customs clearance to facilitate the shipment to Pecem. Please let me know if you approve this arrangement so we can proceed accordingly.

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Brokerage Partners in Brazil
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

On August 10, 2017, I had a discussion with Ingo Geladenkamp from Andersen Cartago regarding brokerage services in Brazil. He is committed to providing a competent team that is ISO certified. Andersen Cartago is known for their excellence in brokerage services for seaborne and break bulk trades, particularly in the ports of Rio, Sao Paulo, Paraná, and Pecem.

Best regards,
Paulo

email_chain.subject: Ports Information
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Paulo,

Here is the information regarding Brazilian ports:
• Port of Santos
• Port of Rio de Janeiro
• Port of Pecem
• Port of Paraná

Best regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Shipping Requirement: 5,000 Barrels of Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Hi Flora,

We will be shipping 5,000 barrels of jet fuel from Houston to Genoa. Can you handle that?

Regards,
Tabitha

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Requirement: 5,000 Barrels of Jet Fuel
email_chain.body:
Hi Tabitha,

Thank you for reaching out. We can handle the shipping of 5,000 barrels of jet fuel from Houston to Genoa. Please provide a quote so we can proceed with the comparison.

Sincerely,
Flora Chung
CEO
SilverOak Logistics Company

email_chain.subject: Re: Update on Your request
email_chain.body: Thanks, Pat

email_chain.subject: Need SWIFT Code for Bank Transfer
email_chain.body: Hi Pat, I'm preparing to transfer the house deposit through Internet Banking or the Bankwest Mobile App, which will take me about 2 hours to complete. However, I face an issue as the system is still requesting the SWIFT code, despite earlier saying it was not necessary. Can you please confirm this detail and provide the code if needed?

email_chain.subject: Urgent: SWIFT Code Requirement
email_chain.body: If you could hurry with the code,I could complete the transfer soon. I would appreciate your prompt support. Many thanks, Christine

email_chain.subject: Re: Need SWIFT Code for Bank Transfer
email_chain.body: Here is the code you need: BNPBP22F. You should enter this code in the 'Transfer Funds' section under 'Pay Others'. It appears there's an interface issue with BNP Paribas which prompts for the code unexpectedly. I hope this resolves the problem. Let me know if there's more I can help with.

email_chain.subject: Thank You
email_chain.body: Thank you very much, Christine

email_chain.subject: Apologies for Any Inconvenience
email_chain.body: Sorry to bother you

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Durkulp Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Liu,

Thanks for reaching out, and sorry for the delay. I will be traveling out of the country next week and may not be able to reply promptly. In the meantime, let's initiate preparations for a 70,000MT shipment of Durkulp from San Francisco to Tianjin. I have attached the charter party for your review. If the terms are agreeable, I can ensure the charter party is signed today.

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Durkulp Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Maura,

The charter party looks reasonable to me. I am interested in proceeding with this deal. Could you please send me a signed copy as soon as possible? Thank you.

Best regards,
Mr. Liu

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Durkulp Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Maura,

I’ve reviewed the charter party thoroughly. It’s generally good, but I need a slight amendment. I will email you shortly with the proposed updated terms.

Thank you.
Mr. Liu

email_chain.subject: Amended Terms for Charter Party
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Liu,

I have received your email and incorporated the terms you requested into the charter party. Attached is the updated document. Please review, sign, and send it back to me at your earliest convenience.

Thank you again.
Best,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Signed Charter Party - Durkulp Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Maura,

Attached is the signed copy of the charter party. Could you please process the funds transfer to our company account today? Thank you once again.

Best regards,
Mr. Liu

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Lead Times
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Hamilton,

I hope this message finds you well. Could you please inform me about the lead times your company can currently handle?

Best regards,
Luka Smith

email_chain.subject: Question on Express Delivery
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your inquiry. Could you please specify if you need express delivery for your order?

Best regards,
Lena Hamilton

email_chain.subject: Welcome to Your First School Day!
email_chain.body:
Dear Student,

Are you excited for your first day at school? We are looking forward to welcoming you!

Best regards,
Zack

email_chain.subject: Have a Great Day at Work!
email_chain.body:
Dear Mom,

I hope you have a fantastic day at the office today!

Best regards,
Jayne

email_chain.subject: Quarterly Performance Review
email_chain.body:
Dear Boss,

I wanted to express how proud I am of my performance this past quarter. Thank you for your support.

Best regards,
Jennifer

email_chain.subject: Kudos on Your Last Presentation
email_chain.body:
Dear Teacher,

Your presentation last Friday was absolutely amazing. Thank you for the insightful session.

Best regards,
Dan

email_chain.subject: Course Progress Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Professor,

I hope you are doing well. I was wondering how you find the progression of our current course so far?

Best regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Procedure Progress
email_chain.body:
Dear Doctor,

I hope all is well. Could you update me on how the procedure is progressing?

Best regards,
Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Request for Bitumen Quote
email_chain.body:
Thekla, I have an order for bitumen and require a quote as soon as possible. Please find the details below:
- Quantity: 90 tons
- Origin: USA
- Delivery port: Houston, Texas, USA
- Delivery timeline: 15 days after loading, 20 days end-to-end
- Payment terms: DDP Houston
I need to forward this to my client by tomorrow morning. Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Quote Required for Client
email_chain.body: Thekla, It's been three weeks since my initial request and I have yet to receive your quote. My client is awaiting this and it is critical for us to proceed. Please let me know of any issues or further information you require. Your immediate response is crucial.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Quote Required for Client
email_chain.body: Thekla, I’m writing to remind you that I still haven't received a response regarding the bitumen quote requested. If there's any additional information you need from my side to proceed with the quote, please let me know immediately. My client is pressing for an answer.

email_chain.subject: Immediate Attention Required: Quote Not Received
email_chain.body: Thekla, It has now been over a month since my original request, and I have not yet received any communication from your end concerning the bitumen quote. This job is crucial for my company’s pipeline and client relationship. Please provide an update at your earliest convenience, or let me know if there are any complications.

email_chain.subject: Final Reminder: Need for Response
email_chain.body: Thekla, I have sent multiple reminders, and it has now been two months without a response. I've reached out several times asking for a quote or any communication regarding the order placed. Please advise if there's anything further required from my end to facilitate this process. Your immediate attention to this matter would be deeply appreciated.

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Air-Freight Costs for Codfish
email_chain.body: Dear Morgan, the air-freight of codfish from Mauritius to Brazil has increased significantly. Could you give me a sense of the cost per box? Thanks, Fred

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quotation
email_chain.body: Dear Morgan, last week we did a shipment of 2,000 boxes of tuna to South Africa. I would like to get a quotation for similar future shipments. Could you provide a price for that? Thanks, Fred

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Need for Boxes and Pricing
email_chain.body: Dear Morgan, I am afraid our message transmission is breaking down. We urgently require additional boxes to send to France. Could you please provide a pricing estimate? Best regards, Fred

email_chain.subject: Query Regarding Box Price Refund
email_chain.body: Dear Morgan, I just wanted to let you know that we received the boxes. Could you tell me if the price for these boxes can be refunded? Kind regards, Fred

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about FOB Port Arthur Rate for Fertilizer
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lee,

We have your ship-to discharge plan for fertilizer. Could you please provide your latest FOB Port Arthur rate to proceed with the order?

Kind regards,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about FOB Port Arthur Rate for Fertilizer
email_chain.body:
Dear Jack,

Thank you for your email. The current FOB Port Arthur rate for fertilizer is $470 per ton. Please confirm this rate so we can proceed with the arrangements.

Best Regards,
Cindy Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Port Arthur Rate Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Mrs. Lee,

Thank you for providing the latest FOB Port Arthur rate. We are confirming the rate of $470 per ton and will proceed with the shipping schedule.

Kind regards,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Coal Shipment from Qinhuangdao to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Lin,

I am looking to ship 15,000MT of coal from Qinhuangdao to Hamburg between May 14 and 20. Could you please provide me with an approximate freight quote for this route?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Freight Quote from Qinhuangdao to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lin,

I am currently evaluating freight options for a 20,000MT coal shipment from Qinhuangdao to Shanghai, scheduled from May 7 to 9. I've received a competitive quote of 400 yuan per metric ton for a similar shipment from Dalian to Ningbo. Could you please offer a freight quote for the specified dates and quantity?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Request for Coal Shipment Quote from Zhuhai to Germany
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lin,

I am considering a sizable coal shipment of 200,000MT from November 1 to November 9. I've heard that coal prices from Zhuhai are significantly lower than those from the North China coast. Could you please provide a quote for a shipment from Zhuhai to Germany during these dates?

Thank you,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment Inquiry for Early November
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lin,

I am looking to purchase 300,000MT of coal with shipment dates from November 5 to November 9, avoiding the Chinese National Day holiday. I am considering various ports including Lianyungang, Qinhuangdao, Huanghua, and Zhuhai. Can you provide any relevant information and a freight quote for these ports?

Thank you,
Bao

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Large Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lin,

I am currently exploring the shipment of 500,000MT of coal from November 15 to December 15. Could you provide an approximate freight quote for such a large volume?

Thank you,
Jim

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Space
email_chain.body: Hi, I would like to inquire if you have space to carry 500MT of flour from Livorno to Liverpool. Do you have space available next week? Best regards, Lucy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Space
email_chain.body: Hi, I would like to inquire if you have space to carry 600MT of maize from Mauritius to Liverpool. Do you have space for this shipment next week? Best regards, Lucy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Shipping Space
email_chain.body: Hi, Can you accommodate a shipment of 900MT of wheat from Canada to Denmark next week? Best regards, Lucy

email_chain.subject: Analysis of Email Queries
email_chain.body: The first two emails appear to be generated by a spam bot and can be difficult to detect due to their targeted content. In contrast, the third email's clear and concise nature makes it easily detectable as a legitimate query. Our detection methods should focus on distinguishing these traits to improve accuracy in identifying genuine leads.

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Lumber Shipment from Korea to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Hello Hongyuan,

Any chance we could sell you 60,000MT of lumber from Korea to Vancouver? Is there a time window you are most interested in, and how quickly can you put together a proposal for us?

Thanks,
Lida

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Lumber Shipment from Korea to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Dear Lida,

Thank you for your inquiry. Could you please share images and additional specifications of the lumber? This will help us proceed with your request more efficiently.

Thank you so much.
Regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Lumber Shipment from Korea to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Hi Gloria,

Thanks for getting back to me. I will gather the necessary images and specifications and send them to you shortly.

Best regards,
Lida

email_chain.subject: Invitation to Exhibition in Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Dear Lida,

Thank you for your inquiry. We are planning to hold an exhibition in Vancouver. I would like to extend an invitation for you to participate in the trade show where we will showcase a variety of products. Let me know if you need further details or if there is anything specific you require to prepare.

Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Invitation to Exhibition in Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Hello David,

I have checked out the events on your website and you indeed have a great selection of available products for potential buyers. I am interested in participating in the trade show. Please let me know the steps I need to follow to register and prepare for the event.

Best regards,
Lida

email_chain.subject: Availability for Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Lida,

Please note that I am currently travelling to meet a few clients in Sweden. My European trip will conclude at 5:30 PM CET on April 20th, so I will not be able to respond to emails until after this date. I look forward to discussing with you in detail after I am back.

Take care,
Toby

email_chain.subject: Re: Availability for Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Toby,

Great, thanks for letting me know. I have sent a meeting request to your inbox for a time after your return. Looking forward to our discussion.

Best regards,
Lida

email_chain.subject: Request for Updated ETA for MS Mangrovia
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Das,

Could you please provide me with an updated Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) for MS Mangrovia, departing from Yangon? I’d appreciate your immediate response.

Regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Request for Updated ETA for MS Mangrovia
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Das,

Following my earlier email, I am writing to re-emphasize the urgency of receiving the updated Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) for MS Mangrovia, which is scheduled to depart from Yangon. Please get back to me at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Grace

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Clemens,

Could you please provide a quote for a 6,000MT shipment of molasses from Batumi to Zeebrugge? Please specify if your quote includes CIF terms or FOB terms.

Looking forward to receiving your quote!

Best regards,
Matthew

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Matthew,

Thank you for your inquiry. Currently, the shipping from Batumi to Zeebrugge is handled by North German Lloyd. I have enclosed an initial quote for FOB terms, which is valid for the next two weeks. I am in the process of consulting with our contact at NGN to update the freight rate, as this specific routing option is not directly listed on their website.

I will get back to you as soon as I receive the updated freight information.

With kind regards,
Clemens

email_chain.subject: Cargo Transportation Inquiry: Osaka to Kashima
email_chain.body: Hi Mr. Santiago, I require a 12,000MT tanker to carry coal from Osaka to Kashima. Do you have vessels available for this service? We have special requests for faster sailing times than normally required. Could you also prioritize us on your service list? Regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Additional Inquiry: Vessel Charter Availability
email_chain.body: Good morning, I noted that we had chartered 2000MT tankers for previous operations. Are these vessels still available for new charters? Could you include us on your priority list for these charters? If not available, could you inform me about the next availability? Additionally, could you provide a current list of chartered vessels and their specifications, including whether they are designed for deep sea or shallow draft conditions? Best regards, Peter

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shallow Draft Vessel from Kashima to Kobe
email_chain.body: Hi, I am in need of a 2000MT, shallow draft, slow cargo vessel for a route from Kashima to Kobe. Could you please send me the list of currently available ships along with their prices? Also, are there any vessels explicitly suited for this type of trade currently available? Thanks, Peter

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Request for June
email_chain.body: Hello Meg, I need to ship 3,300MT of crushed ore from Dalbeattie to Plymouth. Do you have any open slots in June, and can you confirm your ship's draft restrictions? Warm regards, Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request for June
email_chain.body: Hi Eva, sorry for the late reply, I hadn't received your initial email. Is there anything else urgent with the shipping? I'll check if we have any slots available in June and get you a copy of our ship's draft restrictions. Please let me know if this works for you. Thanks, Meg

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Request for June
email_chain.body: Hi Meg. The order is very urgent as I need to ship it by the 10th of June. However, I will wait for your confirmation. Thanks. Eva

email_chain.subject: Shipping Update for June
email_chain.body: Dear Eva, Unfortunately, we don't have any open slots available for a single vessel in June. All our ships have tight schedules. I’ve attached our ship's draft restrictions and our full schedule for your reference. Please let me know if there’s any flexibility in your shipping date or if you would like to discuss alternative options. Regards, Meg

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Vessel Availability Kobe to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Connor,

Do you have a suitable vessel for 4,500MT of coal from Kobe to Jakarta next week? We've already reserved a vessel on Alisports, but I'd like to get some other quotes as well. Thank you.

Best regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Vessel Availability Kobe to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

Thanks for reaching out. We can provide a vessel for the shipment of coal from Kobe to Jakarta. However, I would need a bit more time to confirm the availability and cost. I'll have our captain and legal team follow up with detailed information.

Best regards,
Captain Ray Connor

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Additional Details Needed for Kobe-Jakarta Route
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I need an estimation of the transport cost and more details about the vessel route from Kobe to Jakarta as mentioned in our ongoing communication. Your immediate response would be appreciated.

Thank you,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Additional Details Needed for Kobe-Jakarta Route
email_chain.body:
Hello Ryan,

Apologies for the delay. Are you available for a call before noon today? We can arrange for our captain to provide you with the required information during the conversation.

Best regards,
Marie

email_chain.subject: Inquiry About Delays Due to Strike
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Roy, Our customer is currently on a week-long strike, and we need to schedule a shipment of boilers from Fujairah to Liverpool. Can you provide information on whether there is a repair rate or any charge for potential delays caused by issues on our end? Thank you, Rory.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry About Delays Due to Strike
email_chain.body: Hello Rory, Please ensure that your purchase order is booked prior to sending us the shipment. If the order is booked, we will issue a credit to your account. If not, you need to complete the order before shipping. Best regards, Roy.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement of F6 Series Boilers
email_chain.body: Dear Supplier, Our inventory is currently out of the F6 series boilers. Can you confirm the availability to ship one out today? I am prepared to send you a purchase order immediately. Thank you, Owen.

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: EXW Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello Mike,

I see from your website that you can handle EXW for my cargo. Could you please provide me with a quote for transporting 2,000MT of raw material from Istanbul to Hamburg? Additionally, could you attach a photo of your truck?

Cheers,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: EXW Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Sam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I’m pleased to assist with shipping the mentioned cargo. Please note, we need your FOB terms stated in the Proforma Invoice to proceed. Our preliminary FOB quote from Istanbul is US$1,270.00 per ton. We'll send the detailed Proforma Invoice and final quote within the next 2 days.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Final Quotation for Your Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Dear Sam,

We have received your FOB terms and are now able to provide a formal quote. The price for shipping is US$1,270.00 per ton FOB. The invoice will reflect FOB terms at Istanbul. We require an advance payment of 50% before delivery, covering export, clearing, loading, trucking, insurance, and all necessary international documentation. We need the FOB finalized by March 24th, 2014.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Thanks,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Quotation for Your Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Mike,

Thank you for the detailed quote. Please proceed with the details as per our last discussion and let me know when the first installment is due.

Best,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Sevan Semi Load to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body: I've been following your latest shipments through the Suez Canal. I'm interested in chartering a Sevan semi to load 1,000MT of maize pellets to Sri Lanka. Could we arrange a letter of credit for this transaction? Are there any limitations or restrictions on your services? Thanks, Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Sevan Semi Load to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body: Thank you for your email. I've secured a berth for next week on the MT Crewing 1st. Once I receive a confirmed arrival time from the Master, I will start preparing the chartering documents and COCs. I'll keep you updated. Regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Re: Booking Confirmation and Document Preparation
email_chain.body: Following our recent communication, I'm confirming that we're booked for the date discussed. Please ensure the necessary documents are provided as soon as possible so we can obtain a bank letter of credit for Sri Lanka. Regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Cargo Load to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body: I must bring to your attention an issue regarding the cargo loading in Sri Lanka. Unfortunately, we haven't been able to secure a berth there. However, we now have a ship ready for an arrival on June 23rd. If you confirm this cargo, we can also secure a berth for the following week. Please let me know if this is feasible. Thanks, Regards, Rory

email_chain.subject: Progress Update on Freight Agreement
email_chain.body: We've been in touch with our third-party provider regarding your proposed freight rates and conditions. They've confirmed the quantities are correct, but we're still resolving a few details to ensure we can load the cargo. We'll inform you of any updates soon. Regards, Rory

email_chain.subject: Unable to Meet Request for PDI Maize
email_chain.body: Dear Sir, regarding your request for 15,000MT of PDI maize, unfortunately, we are unable to assist with this currently. Our third party provider has the capability in terms of quantity, but they will not be able to meet the deadline. Regards, P.O.

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote: Soybeans from Hamburg to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Hoare,

We need to ship 9,800MT of soybeans from Hamburg to Rotterdam. We’re open to any type of vessel. Could you please provide us with a quote?

Regards,
Kajsa

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Shipping Quote: Soybeans from Hamburg to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Li,

Thank you for your email. I have made some enquiries and received a preliminary price for the carriage of the cargo. Could you please confirm if you wish to proceed so we can discuss further details?

Regards,
Alexander

email_chain.subject: Details Required for Shipping Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Li,

Following up on your recent communication with Mr. Hoare regarding your intent to proceed, could you provide the following details for shipping arrangement:
1. Master name and address
2. Vessel name and address
3. Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA)
4. Departure port
5. Arrival port

Please reply directly to this email so that I can ensure the documents will be ready for collection from the Agent in Rotterdam.

With best regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Details Required for Shipping Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email, Sam.

We are proceeding with the shipment. I will send the requested details shortly.

Best regards,
Kajsa

email_chain.subject: Urgent Dispatch of Biodiesel
email_chain.body:
Ms. Santos,
We have successfully loaded 4,000MT of biodiesel for shipping from Neptun to Singapore. The vessel is scheduled to anchor offshore shortly. Can you confirm the dispatch of this shipment by tomorrow?
Regards,
Amy

email_chain.subject: Container Requirement for Upcoming Shipment
email_chain.body:

Could you please inform us about the number of shipping containers required for the shipment scheduled to arrive at your port next week?

email_chain.subject: Meeting to View Your New Home
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Missed Calls and Visit Reminder
email_chain.body:
Harry,
I have tried to reach you early in the morning for the second time in three months. Your cellphone is set to reject calls. I hope to see you next Sunday to discuss your new home viewing.
Regards

email_chain.subject: Great Meeting You!
email_chain.body:
Mrs. Wilkinson,
It was delightful to finally meet you! Your vacation stories about Puerto Rico were quite captivating. I hope your journey was pleasant. Looking forward to catching up again soon!
Best wishes

email_chain.subject: Time to Catch Up?
email_chain.body:
Harry,
It's already been two weeks since our last conversation. We really need to catch up soon!
Best

email_chain.subject: Contract Acceptance for Barge Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

Thank you for sending us your offer. We would be happy to accept an eight-barge charter contract from Dammam to Singapore for our new project. Could you please confirm if that works for you?

Regards,
Fred.

email_chain.subject: Details regarding the Barge Charter
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

Thank you for your quick response to our initial proposal regarding the eight-chartered crewed barges. As discussed, we are looking forward to initiating this project with your company soon. Would you like to proceed with the supply in 90 days' time?

Thanks and regards,
Bob and Fred.

email_chain.subject: Preparation for Order Placement
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

We are excited to proceed with the supply of the eight-chartered barges in 90 days' time. Do let us know if there are any further details you require before we finalize the order.

With best regards,
Bob and Fred.

email_chain.subject: Invitation for Barge Inspection
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

We would appreciate a discussion before finalizing the order. You are welcome to visit our office at Quay No: 15, Shankar Nagar, Durban to inspect the barges for the contract.

Best regards,
Bob and Fred.

email_chain.subject: Visit Confirmation for Barge Inspection
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

We are thrilled for your upcoming visit to inspect the barges designated for your order. Please inform us of a suitable date for your visit at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Bob and Fred.

email_chain.subject: Barges Ready for Inspection
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

We have prepared all our barges at Quay No: 15, Shankar Nagar, Durban, for your upcoming inspection. We would be grateful if you could visit to inspect the barges designated for your order.

Best regards,
Bob and Fred.

email_chain.subject: Payment Confirmation and Laycan Schedule
email_chain.body: Hey Zoë, Thanks for your prompt response on the payment. The payment has been received, and I can confirm our laycan of May 6th. Hope you have a great day! Best, Luca Torres

email_chain.subject: Re: Payment Confirmation and Laycan Schedule
email_chain.body: Hi Luca, Thanks for confirming our laycan. Looks like a good summer so far, hope it continues! Are you ready for our first review meeting? Warm regards, Zoë Dang

email_chain.subject: Re: Our Upcoming Review Meeting
email_chain.body: Hi Zoë, See you in London then! Good luck with the review. It's very tough, and you need to be on top of your game to succeed. Ciao, Luca Torres

email_chain.subject: Space Availability Check

Jon

Peter

email_chain.subject: Next Available Transfer Date

Following up on your transfer request, the earliest available date is the 26th of February. Should you need to leave a message, please feel free to contact our travel office at +90121 1234 5678 or email us.

Kind regards,
Tommie Carter

email_chain.subject: Rescheduling due to worsened port conditions at El Bayao
email_chain.body:
Hi Luci,

Due to slightly worsened conditions at El Bayao, we need to reschedule our planned trip. Our new estimated time of arrival is Thursday, and we anticipate a 3-day port freeze may be necessary. Thank you for adjusting your schedules accordingly.

Best regards,
Marcus

email_chain.subject: Recommendation to Delay Trip Due to Incoming Storm
email_chain.body:
Hi Luci and Marcus,

Please be advised that a small storm system is currently moving through the Gulf and is expected to intensify as it approaches our area. Local boats have already started to evacuate their crews. Given these conditions, we strongly recommend postponing the planned trip and pushing it to the next workweek.

D&L offers robust support during the storm season, and we can accommodate a rescheduled date for May 5th, should you decide to delay further.

Thanks,
Em

email_chain.body:

We represent Cargill Minerals and currently have an urgent requirement to ship 300MT of coal from Newcastle to Texas. The priority shipment needs to be fulfilled within a lead time of two weeks. Could you please provide us with a quote for a suitable vessel?

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Charter Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hong,

Natalie

email_chain.subject: Available Shipping Options
email_chain.body:
Good morning Natalie,

Below is the list of available ships we can offer:
- FALMOUTH, 138 LUCK, available from 2021-09-21 to 2021-10-13, quoted at $89,999 from Demerara.
- 132 LUCK, available from 2021-09-26 to 2021-10-20, quoted at $58,500 from Abidjan.
- 144 LUCK, available from 2021-09-26 to 2021-10-17, quoted at $62,000 from Abidjan.
- 142 HANJIN, available from 2021-09-26 to 2021-10-24, quoted at $65,000 from Abidjan.
- 142 HANJIN, available from 2021-09-27 to 2021-10-27, quoted at $67,000 from Abidjan.

Please let us know your preference.

Regards,
Mr. Hong

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Cargo Booking on Hanjin
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Hong,

Please proceed with the booking of cargo on the Hanjin vessel, 142, for the route from Abidjan to Newcastle, scheduled from 27/09/2021 to 27/10/2021, with a freight charge of $67,000.

Regards,

We are considering purchasing 5,000MT of corn originating from the West African coast. As part of our tendering process, we are required to obtain multiple bids. email_chain.body:

We have 5,400MT of lubricants ready for shipment from Antwerp to Hamburg. We intend to start the shipment as soon as possible, however, due to prior commitments, the earliest we can begin is on the 3rd of May. Could you please confirm if this schedule is acceptable for you?
