email_chain.subject: Request for Specific Lubricant Products
email_chain.body:
Hi Hanny,

We are interested in purchasing 50 tons of lubricants, specifically 96 W5/Multi-Gard/Multi-Gard 220, with one 5-gallon sample of each. We need these products to be delivered within the first week of May. Please let me know if we can collaborate on this request.

Warm Regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Lubricant Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Paul,

Thank you for your email. Hanny has received your request and we will reply shortly with a suitable offer.

Regards,
Hanny’s Shipper

email_chain.subject: Marine Gas Oil (MGO) Offer Discussion Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Hanny,

Would you like to discuss the following Marine Gas Oil (MGO) offer with Ema Ardaoui, whom I oversee as her Team Manager? The offer details are as follows: 1) Base quantity of 150,000MT, 2) Forward contract term of 7 months, 3) Planned delivery in Saudi Arabia. Post-delivery, Aramco will conduct a review of the transaction.

Please let us know if you are interested.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Request for Shipping Quote - Montreal to Japan
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Could you please provide me with a shipping quote for containerized onions from Montreal to Japan? Additionally, is weekend loading an option at the Montreal port?

Thank you,
Your Name

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Rates - New York to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi,

I am looking to get a shipping quote for containerized onions from New York to Singapore. Could you also let me know if you allow weekend loading for this route?

Thanks,
Your Name

email_chain.subject: Freight and Demurrage Inquiry for Rice Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Rogers,

We are planning to ship 3,200MT of rice from Yangon to Phnom Penh. Could you please advise on the freight charges and your demurrage policy for this route? Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

Many thanks,
Carla

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight and Demurrage Inquiry for Rice Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Carla,

I hope you are doing well. We can certainly handle full loads from Yangon to Phnom Penh. To provide you with the best freight offer, please provide the following information:
1. Confirmation that Yangon is the origin port and Phnom Penh the destination port
2. Desired arrival date
3. Specify if the shipment is Full Container Load (FCL) or Less than Container Load (LCL)
4. Gross/Metric weight of the goods
5. Exact name of the goods
6. Net volumetric weight (N.V.W.) and any commodity breakdown if applicable
7. Type of container required (Ocean container, flat rack, etc.)
8. Any specific requirements for container carriage (on/off lift, regional lift, etc.)
9. Tentative shipment confirmation date
10. Detailed contact information for both the shipper and consignee
Thank you for the details in advance.

Best regards,
Mr. Rogers

email_chain.subject: Request for Extension of Laytime and Price Update
email_chain.body:
Hello Tetsu,

We are planning to move 4,000MT of electronics from Osaka to Shekou. I wanted to inquire if you are open to extending the laytime for this shipment. Additionally, could you provide an updated price quote within the next two days?

Best regards,
Warren

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Extension of Laytime and Price Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Warren,

Thank you for reaching out. Our rate stands firm at 70 USD/MT for the shipment from Osaka to Shekou. Furthermore, we can accommodate an additional request to deliver 500MT to Shenzhen at a rate of 110 USD/MT. Please let us know if this arrangement works for you.

We look forward to your prompt response.

Regards,
Noriko

Best regards,
Neal

email_chain.subject: Re: Tanker Requirement for Ethanol Shipment on 28 September
email_chain.body:
Dear Marwan,

email_chain.subject: Re: Tanker Requirement for Ethanol Shipment on 28 September

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation and Laycan Dates for Dry-Bulk Vessel Charter

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Further Inquiry on Dry Bulk Charter Rates and Discount Possibilities
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Leah

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement for Soybean Meal Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Wang,

I am writing to request your assistance with the transportation of 1,400MT of soybean meal from Baltimore to Bahia. It is an urgent order, and we are hoping you could facilitate this request at your earliest convenience.

Kind regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Requirement for Soybean Meal Transportation
email_chain.body:
Hello Bob,

Currently, it’s challenging to find bulk cargo ships available for Brazil due to low popularity among our routes. An alternative could be using container shipping; however, I understand this might not be your preferred method. Please let me know how you wish to proceed.

Thank you,
Ms. Wang

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Alternatives for Soybean Meal to Brazil
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Wang,

We will proceed without using container shipping. Note that our pricing will be slightly higher than the rates typically offered for container transport.

Regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Ammonia Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Please confirm the quantity and port of discharge for the shipment of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico. This will help us provide a detailed breakdown of our offer.

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Port of Discharge
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Could you please confirm the port of discharge in Veracruz, Mexico for the ammonia shipment?

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Ammonia Test Results and Verification
email_chain.body:
Dear Bill,

Sorry for the delay. We have completed the mandatory sample tests for your verification. Our lab has tested an average sample of 10 kilograms. The best results from our series of tests confirm that the ammonia content is within acceptable limits. We await your acknowledgment for record purposes.

Thank you,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Acknowledgment of Test Results and FOB Sale Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We acknowledge the satisfactory ammonia test results. We agree to proceed with an FOB sale for 5,000MT of ammonia and have sent you an offer involving shipping carrier Alstec. Please confirm separately the FOB terms and the shipping offer as instructed in our documentation.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of FOB Sale Terms
email_chain.body:
Hi Bill,

We accept the FOB sale terms for the shipment of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico. Details are as follows:
Supplier: Robert Pitts
Purchase order number: 000133709-01
Quantity: 5,000MT
Item: Ammonia (NH3)
Port of Export: Port Newark, New Jersey
Port of Discharge: Veracruz, Mexico
Cargo Arrival date: Jan 1, 2008
FOB price: US$300,000

Please confirm receipt of this email for your records.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Acceptance of Shipping Carrier Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Bill,

We accept the shipping offer with Alstec for the transport of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Request: Pricing for Tanker Requirements

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request for Suwon to Taizhou Shipment

Mr. Kim

email_chain.subject: Support and Encouragement
email_chain.body:
Hi,

I'm sorry to hear about the challenges you've been facing recently. It's commendable how you are managing to focus and handle your assignments despite these hurdles. I encourage you to continue employing your current strategies and to not overlook self-care and adequate breaks throughout the day. Such practices are vital for maintaining focus and energy. Let me know if you need further support. Have a wonderful week ahead!

Warm regards,
Emma

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Quote Adjustment: 30k mt Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Hello Javier,
I have received your quote for the shipment of 30,000 metric tons of palm kernel oil from London to Sharjah scheduled for 6 April. Could you please provide an adjusted quote for a reduced amount of 20,000 metric tons, with a planned departure on 1 May?
Cheers,
Alexander

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Shipping Quote Adjustment: 20k mt Palm Kernel Oil
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,
Thank you for your message. Yes, we can provide a shipping rate for 20,000 metric tons departing on 1 May 2023. I have attached the revised quote to this email. We aim to secure this shipment promptly and load the cargo within 48 hours of confirmation.
Kind regards,
Vanessa

email_chain.subject: Request for CFRA Quotation for Rubber Shipment from Singapore to Karachi
email_chain.body: Hello Mr. Khan, I need to ship 8,000 metric tons of rubber from Singapore to Karachi. Could you please provide me with a CFRA quote? Looking forward to your prompt response. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request for CIF Karachi Price
email_chain.body: Mr. Khan, Our new order of rubber needs to be shipped before the end of this month. Can you kindly provide us with the CIF price for Karachi? Thank you. Regards, Safwan (Manager)

email_chain.subject: Urgent Requirement of Bill of Lading and Shipping Details
email_chain.body: We urgently need our bill of lading today to meet our deadline. Please provide the LCL/LCL shipping dates as soon as possible after checking with your contacts in Pakistan. We also require a FOB invoice and the packing list attached. Payment will be made upon receipt of these documents. Thank you, Mayu

email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Shipping Flour from Jakarta to Karachi
email_chain.body: Dear Mr. Khan, We require a quotation for shipping flour from Jakarta to Karachi. Please provide a pickup date and send the transportation invoice along with the Bill of Lading. We also need all necessary customs documents. Your prompt response would be appreciated. Thank you, Muzaffer

email_chain.subject: Issue with Order, Need to Re-export
email_chain.body: Mr. Khan, We are experiencing issues with our current order and need to re-export the goods. Please email me at your earliest convenience to discuss the next steps. Thank you, Mohammed
